anya-e0301n:15: Sañjātaṃ so hadaye mayhaṃ, tamokhandhaṃ panūdataṃ.
anya-e0301n:20: Na tāhi tuṭṭhiṃ vindanti, ye sāratthā bhimānino;
anya-e0301n:21: Te maṃ saṅgamma yācanti, paramatthassa dīpanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:35_0: 1. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ kattukāmo anuruddhatthero saṅgahārabbhe tāva sappayojane
anya-e0301n:35_1: pañcapiṇḍatthe dassento ādigātha māha. Pañcapiṇḍatthānāma ratanattayavandanā, ganthābhidheyyo,
anya-e0301n:35_2: ganthappakāro, ganthābhidhānaṃ, ganthappayojanaṃ. Tattha tīsu ratanesu nippaccakārakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:35_4: etehi padehi dassitā. Sakalena ganthena abhihitā padhānatthabhūtā cattāro abhidhammatthā
anya-e0301n:35_5: ganthābhidheyyo. So abhidhammatthasaṅgahantipade abhidhammattha saddena dassito.
anya-e0301n:37: Saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyoyevāti katvā abhidheyyo abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadena dassitotivuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:38_0: Na hi so appadhānatthabhūto saṅgahitabhāvo imasmiṃ piṇḍatthadassane abhidheyyo nāma
anya-e0301n:38_1: bhavituṃ yuttoti. Ito paṭṭhāyaca ṭīkāyanti vutte imassa saṅgahassa dvīsu sīhaḷaṭīkāsu
anya-e0301n:38_2: pathamāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā. Vibhāvaniyanti vutte etarahi pākaṭā dutīyā. Ṭīkāsūti vutte
anya-e0301n:38_3: dvepi. Mahāṭīkāyanti vutte visuddhimagge mahāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā. Yañca vacanaṃ vibhāvaniyaṃpi
anya-e0301n:38_4: āgataṃ, aññatthāpi āgataṃ, taṃpi idha vibhāvaniyaṃtveva vuccati āsannattāti. Sabhāgadhammasaṅgahavasena
anya-e0301n:38_5: ganthavidhānākāro ganthappakāro. So pana saṅgaha saddena dassito.
anya-e0301n:41_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddo ganthavidhānākāraṃ dīpetīti. Atthā nugatā ganthasamaññā
anya-e0301n:41_1: vanthābhidhānaṃ. Taṃ abhidhammattha saṅgahapadena dassitaṃ. Saṅgahaganthe kate sati
anya-e0301n:41_2: taduggahaparipucchādivasena anāyāsato laddhabbaṃ dhammānaṃ sarūpāvabodhādikaṃ anupādāparinibbānantaṃ
anya-e0301n:41_3: ganthassa phalānuphalaṃ ganthappayojanaṃ taṃpi abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadeneva sāmatthiyato dassitaṃ.
anya-e0301n:44_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddena vinā anāyāsato saṃsiddhimattadīpakena saṅgahasaddamattena
anya-e0301n:44_1: tādiso anupādāparinibbānanto payo janaviseso sakkā viññātuṃ, asaddhamma saṅgahānaṃpi
anya-e0301n:45: 2. Tattha ratanattayavandanā tāva asaṅkheyyaappameyyappayojanā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:46: Te tādise pūjayato, nibbute akuto bhaye;
anya-e0301n:47: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, yamettha mapi kenacīti.
anya-e0301n:48_0: Ya metthamapītiettha yenakenaci api manussenavā devenavā brahmunāvā saṅkhātuṃ na
anya-e0301n:48_1: sakkāti yojanā. Ṭīkākārāpi taṃ payojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti. Saṅgahakārā
anya-e0301n:48_2: pana antarāyanīvāraṇameva visesato paccāsīsanti. Saṅgahakārā tica buddhaghosattherādayo
anya-e0301n:53_1: hi nāma vandanākiriyābhinipphādako sattakkhattuṃ sattakkhattuṃ anekakoṭisatasahassavāre
anya-e0301n:53_2: pavattamāno mahanto puññābhisando puññappavāho. So ca anuttaresu buddhādīsu puññakkhettesu
anya-e0301n:53_3: saṃvaḍḍhitattā therassa ca uḷāracchandasaddhābuddhiguṇehi paribhāvitattā mahājutiko
anya-e0301n:53_4: mahapphalo mahānisaṃso ca puññātisayo hoti. So sayaṃ payogasampattibhāve ṭhatvā bahiddhā
anya-e0301n:53_5: vipattipaccaye apanetvā sampattipaccaye upanetvā atipaṇītautucittāhāra samuṭṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0301n:53_6: sarīraṭṭhakadhātūnaṃ upabrūhanaṃ katvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya laddho kāsassa janakakammassa
anya-e0301n:53_7: anubalaṃ deti. Aladdhokāsassa ca puññantarassa okāsalābhaṃ karoti. Atha laddhānubalena
anya-e0301n:53_8: laddho kāsena ca tadubhayena puññena nibbattā rūpārūpasantatiyo therasantāne yamakamahānadiyo
anya-e0301n:53_9: viya balavabalavanti yo hutvā pavattanti. Tadā tasmiṃ iṭṭhaphalaghanaparipūrite therasantāne
anya-e0301n:53_10: aniṭṭhaphalabhūtānaṃ rogādi antarāyānaṃ uppattiyā okāso nāma natthīti iṭṭhaphalasantānavibādhakāni
anya-e0301n:53_11: aniṭṭhaphalasantānajanakāni ca apuññakammāni dūrato apanītāneva honti. Na hi kammānināma
anya-e0301n:53_12: puññāni apuññāni ca attano vipākuppattiyā okāse asati vipaccantīti. Tato tasmiṃ santāne
anya-e0301n:53_13: āyuvaṇṇā dayo iṭṭhaphaladhammā yāva ganthaniṭṭhānā yāva āyukappapariyo sānāpi vā
anya-e0301n:55: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyuvaṇṇo sukhaṃ balanti.
anya-e0301n:56_0: Evaṃ tāya vandanāya antarāyanīvāraṇaṃ hotīti. Tasmā saṅgahārabbhe ratanattayavandanākaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:56_1: therassa attanā ārabbha mānasaṅgahassa anantarāyena parisamāpanutthaṃ. Na kevalañca
anya-e0301n:56_2: therasseva, sotūnañca saṅgahaṃ gaṇhantānaṃ ādimhiyeva ratanattaya vandanā siddhito
anya-e0301n:58: Sattasu javanesu pathamajavana vaseneva vandanā payojanaṃ vibhāvitaṃ viya dissati. “Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā”ti hi tattha vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:59_0: Upatthambhanakiccasseva idha adhippetattā. Tassa ca sattasupi javanesu upaladdhattāti.
anya-e0301n:59_1: Yathā hi āhārarūpassa dvīsu kiccesu ojaṭṭhamakarūpajananakiccaṃ parittakaṃ appamattakaṃ
anya-e0301n:59_2: hoti. Catussanta tirūpupatthambhanakiccameva mahantaṃ adhimattaṃ. Tathāhi paṭṭhānepi
anya-e0301n:59_3: tadupatthambhanakiccameva gahetvā kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena
anya-e0301n:59_4: paccayoti vibhaṅgavāro vibhatto. Evamevaṃ idhapi pathamajavanassa avunāva vipākajananakiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:59_5: parittakaṃ appamattakaṃ hoti. Ahetukavipākamattaṃ janetīti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Kammantarupatthambhanakiccameva
anya-e0301n:59_6: mahantaṃ adhimattaṃ. Tañca sattasupi javanesu upalabbhati yevāti. Yasmā pana ganthābhidheyye
anya-e0301n:59_7: ganthappakāre ganthappayojane ca ādito vivitesati sotu janānaṃ ganthassavane ussāho
anya-e0301n:59_8: jāyati. Tasmā tesaṃ ganthā bhidheyyādīnaṃ dassanaṃ ganthe ussāhajananatthaṃ. Ganthābhidhānadassanaṃ
anya-e0301n:60_0: 4. Ayaṃ pana padattho. Sammāca bujjhi sāmañca bujjhīti sammā sambuddho. Ettha ca
anya-e0301n:60_1: sammāsaddo aviparītatthe nipāto. So bujjhitabbesu ñeyyadhammesu bujjhanakriyāya asesabyāvibhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:60_2: dīpeti. Tathāhi padesañāṇe ṭhitā paccekabuddhādayo attano visaye eva aviparītaṃ bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n:60_3: Avisaye pana andhakāre paviṭṭhāviya hontīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Visayo ca tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:60_4: appamattakova sabbaññuvisayaṃ upādāya yathā hattha puṭe ākāso appamattakova ajaṭākāsaṃ
anya-e0301n:60_5: upādāyāti. Te hi phassādīsu dhammesu ekadhammampi sabbākārato bujjhituṃ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n:60_6: Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ pana avisayo nāma natthi, yattha te viparītaṃ bujjheyyuṃ. Te hi
anya-e0301n:60_7: anamatagge saṃsāre anantāsu ca lokadhātūsu tiyaddhagate addhamuttake ca dhamme hatthamaṇike
anya-e0301n:60_8: viya samasame katvā bujjhanti. Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe
anya-e0301n:60_9: āpāta māgacchantīti hi vuttaṃ. Tattha ñāṇamukheti sabbaññuṃmahābhavaṅgaṃ sandhāyāha.
anya-e0301n:60_10: Tattha hi te dhammā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaṃ abhidhammaṃ sammasanato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṃ
anya-e0301n:60_11: upaṭṭhahantīti. Sabbaññubuddhā pana yattake dhamme vicāretuṃ icchanti. Tattake dhamme
anya-e0301n:60_12: āvajjanāya visuṃ katvā āvajjitvā vicārentīti. Nanu dhammā mahantā bhavaṅgaṃ parittakanti
anya-e0301n:60_13: na codetabbametaṃ. Arūpadhammānañhi paramukkaṃsapattānaṃ esa ānubhāvoti. Saṃsaddo
anya-e0301n:60_14: pana sāmanti etassa atthe upasaggo. So bhagavato paṭivedhadhammesu anācariyakataṃ
anya-e0301n:60_15: dīpeti. Na me ācariyo atthīti hi vuttaṃ. Nanu bhagavato tatīyacatutthāruppa samāpattiyo
anya-e0301n:60_16: āḷārudakamūlikāti. Saccaṃ. Tā pana analaṅkaritvā laddhamattāva hutvā chaḍḍitattā
anya-e0301n:60_17: pacchā bujjhanakriyāya pādakamattāpi nahonti. Kuto paṭivedhadhammāti. Tasmā tā bhagavato
anya-e0301n:60_18: buddhabhāve sācariyakataṃ na sādhentīti. Ayamettha pāḷi anugato attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:61_0: Tattha katamo ca puggalo sammāsambuddho. Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu
anya-e0301n:61_1: sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi. Tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ pāpuṇāti. Balesu ca vasibhāvaṃ.
anya-e0301n:62_0: Tatthāti nimitte bhummaṃ. Balesūti dasabala ñāṇesu. Vasibhāvanti issarabhāvaṃ. Etthaca
anya-e0301n:62_1: pubbe. La. Sāmantietena saṃsaddassa atthaṃ dasseti. Tatthātiādinā [sammāsaddassaatthanti.
anya-e0301n:63_0: 5. Idāni thero attano vandanaṃ suṭṭhubalavaṃ karonto atulanti āha. Anekaguṇapadavisayā
anya-e0301n:63_1: hi vandanā suṭṭhutaraṃ balavatī hotīti. Nanu ekaguṇapadavisayāpi vandanā antarā yanīvāraṇesamatthā
anya-e0301n:63_2: siyāti kiṃ dutīyenāti. Na na samatthā. Viññujātikā pana satthuguṇatthomane mattakārino
anya-e0301n:63_3: nāma na honti. Thero ca tesaṃ aññataro. Tvaṃ pana aviññujātiko. Tasmā mattaṃ karonto
anya-e0301n:63_4: codesīti. Apica. Na kevalaṃ antarā yanīvāraṇameva vandanāya icchitabbaṃ hoti. Athakho
anya-e0301n:63_5: paññāpāṭavādiatthopi icchitabboyeva. Sopi hi anāyāsena gantha niṭṭhānassa ganthapārisuddhiyā
anya-e0301n:63_6: ca paccayo hotīti. Anussatiṭṭhānesu hi cittabhāvanā cittasamādhānāvahā hoti. Citta
anya-e0301n:63_7: samādhāne ca sati paññātikkhāsūrā hutvā pahati. Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti
anya-e0301n:63_8: hi vuttaṃ. Tasmā tadatthāyapi attano vandanā suṭṭhu balavatī kātabbāyevāti.
anya-e0301n:65: “Yathāvuttavacanattha yogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā atulanti iminā vise setī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:66_0: Mahantañhi satthuguṇapadānaṃ majjhe etaṃ sammāsambuddhapadaṃ, cando viya tārakānaṃ
anya-e0301n:66_1: majjhe. Tasmā taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ jānantānaṃsantike bhāvatthasuññaṃ satthusamaññāmattaṃ
anya-e0301n:66_2: bhavituṃ nārahati. Aññesaṃ pana padasahassaṃ vuccamānaṃpi satthu samaññāmattameva
anya-e0301n:66_3: sampajjatīti. Tulayitabbo aññena saha pamitabboti tulo. Na tulo atulo, natthitulo
anya-e0301n:66_4: sadiso etassāti vā atulo. Bhagavā. Na hi atthi bhagavato attanā sadiso koci lokasminti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:67: Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0301n:69_0: Anacchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ buddhabhūtassa atulattaṃ. Sampatijātassapi panassa atulatā
anya-e0301n:69_1: paññāyati. Tadā hi mahāpuriso sampatijātova samāno puratthimadisābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0301n:69_2: Tasmiṃ disā bhāge anantāni cakkavāḷāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tesu ṭhitā devabrahmāno
anya-e0301n:69_3: mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadiso natthi. Kuto uttaritaroti paramāya pujāya pūjesuṃ.
anya-e0301n:69_4: Evaṃ sesadisāsupi. Tadā mahāpuriso attano sabbalokaggabhāvaṃ ñatvā aggohamasmi lokassa,
anya-e0301n:69_5: seṭṭhohamasmilokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmilokassa ayamanti mājāti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti
anya-e0301n:69_6: evaṃ achambhivācaṃ nicchāresīti. Idaṃpi anacchariyaṃ, yaṃ pacchimabhavaṃ pattassa
anya-e0301n:69_7: atulattaṃ. Yadā pana so sumedhabhūto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa santike niyatabyākaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:69_8: gaṇhi. Tadāpi thapetvā dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhaṃ pāramitāguṇehi tena sadiso koci nattheva.
anya-e0301n:69_9: Natthibhāvocassa tadā pavatte hi dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīhi asādhāraṇapāṭihāriyehi
anya-e0301n:69_10: dīpetabbo. Tāni hi paccekabodhisattānaṃ satasahassaṃpi pavattetuṃ na sakkhissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:69_11: Kuto sāvakabodhi sattānanti. Teneva hi tadā pavattipāramipavicayaññāṇaṃ attano visaye
anya-e0301n:69_12: sabbaññuthaññāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Sāvakabodhisattāpi hi yato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n:69_13: attano bodhiyā anurūpe sambhāradhamme sayameva jānituṃ sakkonti. Tato paṭṭhāya anivattidhammā
anya-e0301n:69_14: hutvā vattānusārimahāputhujjanabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā bodhisattabhūmiṃ okkantā honti.
anya-e0301n:69_15: Ekena pariyāyena niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ca nāma honti. Tadā eva buddhānaṃ sammukhibhāve
anya-e0301n:69_16: sati niyatabyākaraṇaṃ labhanti. Sabbaññu bodhisatta paccekabodhisattesu vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0301n:71: Samitatthe yyakārassa akārassa vā vasena etaṃ siddhanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:72_0: Na hi tulasaddo dhātusiddho kammasādhano ca bhavituṃ na yutto. Tulayituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti
anya-e0301n:72_1: atulo. Appame yyoti hi ṭīkāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Etena tulasaddo kammasādhanoti dipeti. Evañca
anya-e0301n:72_2: sati kammasādhaneneva tadatthasiddhito kiṃ tato samitatthe yyakārassaakārassa vā
anya-e0301n:72_3: cintāyāti. Vatticchānugato saddappayogoti katvā etaṃ vuttanti ce. Na. Yathā sutaṃ
anya-e0301n:72_4: yuttaṃ vajjetvā assutassa parikappanāya payo janābhāvatoti. [Atula padaṃ]
anya-e0301n:73_0: 6. Imehi pana dvīhi padehi satthu tisso sampadā vibhā vitā honti. Hetusampadā phalasampadā
anya-e0301n:73_1: sattupakārasampadācāti. Tattha satthu mahākaruṇā samaṅgitā bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca
anya-e0301n:73_2: hetusampadānāma. Bodhimaṇḍe pavattitā catuvīsati koṭisabhasahassasaṅkhā mahāvajiraññāṇasaṅkhātā
anya-e0301n:73_3: sabbaññumahā vipassanāpi ettheva saṅgahitā. Sā hi mahābodhiyā padaṭṭhāna bhūtāti.
anya-e0301n:73_4: Pahāna sampadāyameva vā sā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Phalasampadā catubbidhā pahānasampadā
anya-e0301n:73_5: ñāṇasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti. Tattha saha vāsanāya kilesappahānaṃ
anya-e0301n:73_6: pahānasampadā nāma. Pahānassa sabbapāripūritāti attho. Atthato pana ariyamaggo, aggamaggaññāṇameva
anya-e0301n:75_0: Etāsu dvīsu sampadāsu ñāṇasampadā pathamaṃ vuttā, tato pahānasampadā. Pahānasampadāyeva
anya-e0301n:75_1: pana pathamaṃ vattabbā. Sā hi ñāṇasampadāyapubbaṅgamabhūtā paccayabhūtā ca. Mahāṭīkāyañca
anya-e0301n:77: “Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ aggamaggaññāṇa”nti ñāṇasampadāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:78_0: Aggamaggaññāṇañhi pahānasampadā eva bhavituṃ arahati. Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma
anya-e0301n:78_1: atthīti. Yañca koci vadeyya maggaññāṇaṃ ñāṇañca hoti pahānañca. Tasmā ubhayattha
anya-e0301n:78_2: vattuṃ yuttanti. Taṃpi na yujjati. Evañhi sati sampadāsaṅkaro hotīti.
anya-e0301n:80: Ñāṇasampadāyaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ sabbapathamaṃ vattabbaṃpi na vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:81: Nanu “tammūlakāni ca dasabalādi ññāṇānī”ti ettha ādisaddena sabbaññutaññāṇaṃpi gahitanti ce. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:82_0: Na hi appadhānaṃ sarūpato niddisitvā padhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ ādisaddena gahitanti ñāyāgataṃ
anya-e0301n:82_1: hotīti. Acinteyyānubhāvehi sīlā diguṇehi iddhi dhammehi ca sampadā ānubhāvasampadā.
anya-e0301n:82_2: Lakkhaṇā nubyañjanappaṭimaṇḍitassa rūpakāyassa sampatti rūpakāyasampadā. Sattupakāroduvidho
anya-e0301n:82_3: āsayasampadā, payogasampadā ca. Ajjhāsayassa uḷāratā kāyavacīpayogassa ca parisuddhatāti
anya-e0301n:82_4: attho. Tattha devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā āsaya sampadā.
anya-e0301n:82_5: Loke abhiññātānaṃ rājūnaṃ rājamahāmattānaṃ seṭṭhi gahapatīnaṃ devarājūnampi dhammaṃ
anya-e0301n:82_6: desentassa lābhasakkārādi nirapekkhatāvasena desanāpayogasuddhi payogasampadā. Tattha
anya-e0301n:82_7: dve pahānañāṇasampadā sammāsambuddhapadena vibhāvitā. Dvīhi ānu bhāvarūpakāyasampadāhi
anya-e0301n:82_8: saha dve sattupakārasampadā atulapadena. Hetusampadā pana dvīhipi padehi sāmatthiyato
anya-e0301n:82_9: vibhāvitā. Na hi tādisiyā hetusampadāya vinā itarāsaṃ pavatti atthīti. [Sampadā]
anya-e0301n:83_0: 7. Punapi thero attano vandanaṃ balavataraṃ karonto sasaddhammagaṇuttamanti āha.
anya-e0301n:83_1: Etena dhammasaṅghānaṃpi vandanā katā hoti. Dūratohaṃ namassissaṃ, sasaṅghaṃ lokanāyakanti
anya-e0301n:83_2: hi vutte saṅghassapi namanakriyāpatti sahasaddena viññāyati. Eva midaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:85_0: “Guṇībhūtānaṃpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṃ abhivādetabba bhāvo sahayogena viññāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:85_1: Tattha abhivādetabba bhāvoti navattabbaṃ. Abhivāditabhāvoti pana abhivādananti vā
anya-e0301n:85_2: vattabbaṃ. Evañhi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddhattā dhammasaṅghānaṃpi
anya-e0301n:85_3: therassa vandanā kriyāpatti siddhā hotīti. Itarathā tabbapaccayassa arahatthadīpanato
anya-e0301n:85_4: abhivādanā rahatā saṅkhāta guṇasamavāyo vutto siyā. Soca idha nādhippeto. Attano
anya-e0301n:85_5: nidassanena ca saha na sameti saputtadāro āgatoti.
anya-e0301n:86_0: Apica thero imaṃ ganthaṃ racayissāmīti pubbabhāgeyeva tīṇi ratanāni vandi, atha taṃ
anya-e0301n:86_1: attano vandanaṃ ganthappaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassento imaṃ gāthaṃ racayītipi na
anya-e0301n:86_2: na sakkā vattunti. Tathāhi abhivādiyāti vuttaṃ. Na abhivādiyāmīti. Esanayo aññatthapi.
anya-e0301n:86_3: Tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakalalokassa saraṇabhūtena
anya-e0301n:86_4: saha vattatīti sasaddhamma gaṇuttamo. Sammāsambuddho. Na hi paranimmitena saddhammena
anya-e0301n:86_5: gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sasaddhammāti ca sagaṇuttamāti ca vuccanti. Na ca attanoeva
anya-e0301n:86_6: saraṇabhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacārigaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanaṃ
anya-e0301n:86_7: arahantīti, tasmā idaṃpi satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:87_0: Tattha dhāretīti dhammo. Ke dhāreti, attānaṃ dhārente. Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti
anya-e0301n:87_1: hi vuttaṃ. Kathañca dhāreti, catūsu apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca apatamāne karonto. Kiñca
anya-e0301n:87_2: dhāraṇaṃnāma, yesaṃ vasena sattā apāyesuvā vaṭṭadukkhesuvā patanti, tesaṃ kilesānaṃ
anya-e0301n:87_3: ekadesenavā sabbasovā samucchindanaṃ. Imasmiṃ atthe cattāro ariyamaggā nibbānañca
anya-e0301n:87_4: nippariyāyato dhammonāma. Ariyamaggā hi kilese samucchindantā nibbānena saheva hutvā
anya-e0301n:87_5: samucchindanti. Na vināti, tasmā teyeva pañca ekantato dhammonāmāti. Pariyattidhammo
anya-e0301n:87_6: pana dhāraṇupāyoyeva hoti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalānica dhāraṇaphalāniyeva honti, kilesānaṃ
anya-e0301n:87_7: paṭippassambhanavasena pavattattā dhāraṇānukūlappavattāni ca. Tasmā ete pañca pariyāyadhammāyevāti.
anya-e0301n:87_8: Athavā, dhārīyatīti dhammo. Dhāraṇārahoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo hi dhārentaṃ ekantena dukkhato
anya-e0301n:87_9: moceti. Aggasukheca patiṭṭhāpeti. Soyeva dhāraṇārahattā idha dhammonāmāti. Kopana
anya-e0301n:87_10: soti, yathā puttadhammāyeva. Tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriyavasena keci
anya-e0301n:87_11: diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena keci uggaha dhāraṇavasena dhārīyanti. Te ca evaṃ dhārīyamānā
anya-e0301n:87_12: dhārentaṃ yathārahaṃ apāyadukkhato vaṭṭadukkhatoca mocenti, aggeca phalasukhevā nibbānasukhevā
anya-e0301n:87_13: patiṭṭhāpentīti. Dhārentivā sappurisājanā apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca attānaṃ apata mānaṃ
anya-e0301n:87_14: vahanti etenāti dhammo. Dharantivā ettha dhammadīpā dhammappaṭisaraṇā janā laddhappatiṭṭhā
anya-e0301n:87_15: hontīti dhammotipi yujjatiyeva. Kasmā panettha dhammo dasavidhova vutto. Nanu paṭipattidhammena
anya-e0301n:87_16: saha ekādasavidhova vattabboti. Saccaṃ. Sopana paṭipattidhammo maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāeva
anya-e0301n:87_17: hotīti pubbacetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahito. Tasmā dhammo dasavidhova sabbattha vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:88_0: Apica, yadaggena pariyattidhammo idha dhammasmiṃ saṅgahito. Tadaggena pariyattidhārakopi
anya-e0301n:88_1: saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahitoti yutto. Yadaggenaca puthujjanakalyāṇako saṅghe sekkhesu
anya-e0301n:88_2: saṅgahito. Tadaggena tassa kalyāṇahetubhūto paṭipatti dhammopi dhamme vandaneyye
anya-e0301n:88_3: saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo. So hi puthujjanabhūtopi yehi dhammehi samannāgatattā sekhe
anya-e0301n:88_4: sotāpatti phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito. Te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpattimagge
anya-e0301n:88_5: asaṅgahitāti nasakkā vattunti. Ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmīti, ettha
anya-e0301n:88_6: puthujjana kalyāṇako saṅghe asaṅgahito. Na hi taṃsaraṇaṃ gacchantassa saraṇagamanaṃ
anya-e0301n:88_7: sampajjatīti. Tesaṃ taṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Evaṃ pana vattabbo, yo vo ānanda mayā
anya-e0301n:88_8: dhammoca vinayoca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthāti evaṃ satthuṭhāne thapetvā
anya-e0301n:88_9: bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇito pariyattidhammo dhammasaraṇe saṅgahitoti yutto, taṃ dhārentopana
anya-e0301n:88_10: kalyāṇappaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitopi atthi. Aṭṭhitopi atthi. Yo aṭṭhito, so attanopi saraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:88_11: nahoti. Kuto parassa. Satthārā ca anekesu suttasahassesu so garahito. Tasmā so saṅghasaraṇe
anya-e0301n:89_0: Santānaṃ dhammoti saddhammo. Samitakilesānaṃ tatoyeva pasatthānaṃ pūjitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ
anya-e0301n:89_1: paṇḍitānañca dhammoti attho. Yoca santānaṃ dhammo, sopi ekantena santoyeva hotīti
anya-e0301n:89_2: santo dhammotipi saddhammo. Pasattho pūjito dhammoti attho. Sacco vā. Ayañhi aññatitthiyadhammo
anya-e0301n:89_3: viya dhārentaṃ navisaṃvādeti. So hi ayaṃ me hitoti dhārentassa ahitoyeva sampajjati.
anya-e0301n:89_4: Ayaṃ pana tathādhārentassa hitoyeva sampajjatīti. [Saddhammapadaṃ]. Gaṇuttamapade
anya-e0301n:89_5: loke samāna diṭṭhisīlānaṃ sahadhammikānaṃ samūho gaṇoti vuccati. Idha pana uttamehi
anya-e0301n:89_6: sīlādiguṇehi yutto bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamoca so gaṇocāti atthena uttamagaṇonāma.
anya-e0301n:89_7: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati yathā muniseṭṭho munivaroti.
anya-e0301n:91: “Gaṇānaṃ gaṇesuvā devamanussādisamūhesu uttamo gaṇuttamo”ti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:92_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati uttamasaddo padhānabhūto hoti. Soca guṇamhiyeva pavattatīti
anya-e0301n:92_1: tena idha ariyasaṅgho vuttoti nasijjhatīti. Etthaca gaṇoti saṅghoyeva vuccati. Soca
anya-e0301n:92_2: saṅgho duvidho sammutisaṅgho, dakkhiṇeyyasaṅghoti. Tattha samaggena saṅghena kataṃ
anya-e0301n:92_3: upasampadākammaṃ sammutināma. Tāya sammutiyā upasampannabhūmiṃ patvā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho
anya-e0301n:92_4: sammutisaṅghonāma. So vinayakammesu pasiddho. Dakkhiṇeyyasaṅgho nāma aṭṭha ariyapuggalasamūho.
anya-e0301n:92_5: Sopana kiñcāpi sammutisaṅghepi antogadhoyeva hoti. Tathāpi saraṇagamana vandanā māna
anya-e0301n:92_6: pūjāsakkārānussatiṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sapariggahatthaṃ bhagavatā
anya-e0301n:92_7: tathā tathā saṃvaṇṇetvā so visuṃ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo. Puthujjanasaṅghohi puññakkhettaṃ
anya-e0301n:92_8: samānopi anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ nahoti. Kasmā. Sālikkhette tiṇānaṃ viya khettaduṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:92_9: sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchānusayānaṃ sabbhāvāti. Puññakkhettabhāvo panassa purime saddhammapade
anya-e0301n:93_0: 8. Abhivādiyāti visesato vanditvā. Ettha ca ayaṃ loke sīlādiguṇayutto seṭṭho vandaneyyoti
anya-e0301n:93_1: evaṃ seṭṭha cittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandanto visesato vandatīti vuccati. Vandanā
anya-e0301n:94: Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā, katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatīti.
anya-e0301n:95_0: Tattha seṭṭhacittaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvaya kapparadvaya nalāṭa saṅkhātāni pañca
anya-e0301n:95_1: aṅgāni bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vandaneyyānaṃ abhimukhaṃ nippajjanto kāyena vandatināma.
anya-e0301n:95_2: Yaṃ sandhāya pañcappatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti tattha tattha vuttaṃ. Yāyaca avandiyaṭṭhānesu
anya-e0301n:95_3: vandantassa āpatti hotīti. Guṇapadāni vācāya pavattento vācāya vandatināma. Namo
anya-e0301n:95_4: buddhassa, namatthu buddhassa, namo vimuttiyā, namo vimuttānaṃ, vipassissa namatthūti
anya-e0301n:95_5: evamādīsupi vācā vandanāyeva. Guṇapadāni anugantvā guṇe anussaranto manasā vandatināmāti.
anya-e0301n:96_0: 9. Bhāsissanti kathessāmi. Kāmañca thero imaṃ saṅgahaṃ racayanto potthakāruḷhaṃ katvāva
anya-e0301n:96_1: racayissati. Ganthakammaṃ nāma vācākammesu pasiddhanti katvā bhāsissanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:97_0: 10. Abhidhammatthasaṅgahanti pade abhidhamme vuttā atthā abhidhammatthā. Te saṅgayhanti
anya-e0301n:97_1: ettha etenātivā abhidhammatthasaṅgaho. Saṅgayhantitica therena saṃkhipitvā gayhanti
anya-e0301n:97_2: kathīyantīti attho. Abhidhammeti cettha abhiatireko abhivise soca dhammo abhidhammo.
anya-e0301n:97_3: Dhammoti ca vinayapāḷito aññaṃpāḷi dvayaṃ vuccati. Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca
anya-e0301n:97_4: desito paññattoti hi vuttaṃ. Tañca pāḷidvayaṃ āṇāvidhānasaṅkhātaṃ vinayana kiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_5: vajjetvā kusalādike yathāpavatte paramatthadhamme eva dīpetīti. Evaṃ dīpentesuca
anya-e0301n:97_6: tesu dvīsu dhammesu yo itarato atirekoca hoti visesoca. Ayameva abhidhammo nāma.
anya-e0301n:97_7: Itaropana dhammoyeva. Evañca katvā dhammo abhidhammo vinayo abhivinayoti idaṃ catukkaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_8: veditabbaṃ. Tattha dhammonāma suttantapiṭakaṃ. Abhidhammonāma yattapakaraṇāni. Vinayonāma
anya-e0301n:97_9: ubhato vibhaṅgo, abhivinayonāma khandhakaparivārāti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ. Atirekavisesatā
anya-e0301n:97_10: cettha kusalādi vasena khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena tathā tathā desetabbappakārānaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_12: Yato sabbaññubuddhā imaṃ abhidhammadesanaṃ devesueva desenti. Na hi manussā evarūpaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_13: tayo māse nirantaraṃ pavattanayogyaṃ kathāmaggaṃ ekena iriyāpathena ādito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n:97_14: pariyosānaṃ pāpetvā paṭiggahetuṃ sakkonti, naca eva rūpo ekamātikānubandho kathāmaggo
anya-e0301n:97_15: nānākhaṇesu nānājanānaṃ desetuṃ sakkuṇeyyo hotīti. Kecipana vinayapāḷitopi abhirekavisesataṃ
anya-e0301n:97_16: tassa vaṇṇenti. Taṃ aṭṭhasāliniyā na sameti. Tattha hi dhammanāmikānaṃ dvinnaṃ pāḷīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_17: majjheeva ayaṃ atirekavisesatā vicāritā. Naca yujjati vinayena saha tathā vicāretuṃ
anya-e0301n:97_18: asamānakiccavisayattā. Vinayo hi kāyavācānaṃ vinayanakicco, ajjhācāravisayoca. Dhammo
anya-e0301n:97_19: pana dhammavibhāgakicco dhammappavatti visayocāti. Kecipana vadanti evaṃ santepi
anya-e0301n:97_20: vinayo eva sabbajeṭṭhako siyā. Vinayaṃ vivaṇṇentassa hi pācittiyāpatti hoti. Dhammaṃ
anya-e0301n:97_21: vivaṇṇentassa dukkaṭāpattimattāti, taṃ nayujjati. Vinayo hi āṇācakkaṃ. Dhammoca dhammacakkaṃ.
anya-e0301n:97_22: Tattha vinayaṃ vivaṇṇento satthu āṇācakke pahāraṃ deti. Satthari agāravo mahanto
anya-e0301n:97_23: hoti. Yassaca satthari agāravo, tassa dhammasaṅghesu tīsu sikkhāsuca agāravo siddho
anya-e0301n:97_24: hoti. Tasmā vinaya vivaṇṇane āpatti mahantī hoti. Na sabbajeṭṭhakattāti. Apica, vinayonāma
anya-e0301n:97_25: sāsanassa mūlaṃ. Vinaye aṭṭhite sāsanaṃ natiṭṭhati. Tasmā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṃpi
anya-e0301n:102_0: 11. Evaṃ ādigāthāyataṃtaṃ payojana sahite pañca atthe dassetvā idāni te abhidhammatthe
anya-e0301n:102_1: uddesato dassento dutīyagāthamāha. Tattha tatthāti bhāsissaṃ abhidhammattha saṅgahanti
anya-e0301n:102_2: vutte tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapade mayā vuttā abhidhammatthā sabbathāparamatthato
anya-e0301n:104: Tattha tasmiṃ abhidhammatthasaṅgahapakaraṇetivā abhidhammattha padetivā abhidhammetivā tasaddattho niddiṭṭho. Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana tasmiṃ abhidhammeti. Sabbaṃ nasundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:105_0: Na hi abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇe mayā vuttā abhidhammatthāti yujjati. Pakaraṇaṃpi
anya-e0301n:105_1: hi upari vuccamānameva hoti. Natu vuttaṃ. Kuto abhidhammatthāti. Na ca saṃvaṇṇanāpakaraṇesu
anya-e0301n:105_2: ādimhiyeva tāva tasaddo appadhānapadāni paccāmasatīti atthi. Tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0301n:105_3: ādimhi tattha kena ṭṭhena abhidhammoti vākyeviya idha tasaddattho veditabboti. Evañhi sati –
anya-e0301n:108_0: Sā hi vakkhamānehi sabbayāpi dvādasa, sabbathāpi aṭṭhārasātiādīhi nasametīti. Tatta
anya-e0301n:108_1: sabbathāti dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vuttena kusalādinā sabbappakārenapi catudhāva honti,
anya-e0301n:108_2: vibhaṅge vibhatte na khandhādinā sabbappakārenapi catudhāva hontīti attho. Dhātu
anya-e0301n:109_0: 12. Paramatthatoti paramattha saccato. Dve hi saccāni sammutisaccaṃ, paramatthasaccanti,
anya-e0301n:109_1: tattha satta puggala atta jīvādikā paññattiatthā sabhāvato avijjamānāyeva honti.
anya-e0301n:109_2: Dhammavavatthānaññāṇarahitānaṃpana mahājanānaṃ citte mahantamahantāpi hutvā vijjamānāviya
anya-e0301n:109_3: paññāyanti, teca mahājanā samaggā hutvā tesaṃ ekantena atthibhāvaṃ gahetvā tathā
anya-e0301n:109_4: tathā voharanti ceva sampaṭicchantica. Tasmā te mahājanehi samaggehi sammatattātatoyevaca
anya-e0301n:109_5: vacīsaccaviratisaccānaṃ vatthubhūtattāsammuti saccanti vuccanti. Tasmiṃ sammutisacce
anya-e0301n:109_6: ṭhatvā sammā paṭipajjantā sabba lokiyasampattiyoca sabbabodhisambhāra dhammeca ārādhenti.
anya-e0301n:109_7: Micchāpaṭipajjantā apāyapūrakā honti. Evaṃ mahantañhi sammuti saccanti. Paramatthasaccaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_8: pana patvā taṃ saccameva nahoti. Tañhi sayaṃ avijjamānaṃyeva samānaṃ mahājane vijjamānantveva
anya-e0301n:109_9: gaṇhāpeti. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhi tividhamicchādiṭṭhīnaṃ vatthu hutvā bālajanānaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_10: vaṭṭadukkhato niyyātuṃ nadeti. Evaṃ viparītañhi sammutisaccaṃ. Evaṃ mahāsāvajjañcāti.
anya-e0301n:109_11: Paramatthasaccaṃpana duvidhaṃ sabhāvasaccaṃ ariyasaccanti. Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiādīsu
anya-e0301n:109_12: sattasu pakaraṇesu vibhattā kusalādayo dhammā sabhāvasaccaṃnāma. Te hi sayaṃ sabhāvato
anya-e0301n:109_13: vijjamānattā kusalānāma dhammā atthi sukhānāma vedanā atthīti gaṇhantena visaṃvādentīti.
anya-e0301n:109_14: Taṃ pana ariyasaccaṃ patvā kiñci asaccaṃpi hotiyeva. Tathāhi anubhavanabhedamattaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_15: upādāyeva vedanā sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhāti vuttā. Na sabbākārato sukhabhūtattā.
anya-e0301n:109_16: Sabbehi pana aniccatā saṅkhatatādīhi anekasatehi ākārehi sabbāpi vedanā dukkhāeva.
anya-e0301n:109_17: Tathā anavajjasukhavipākaṭṭhena kusalabhāvopi akusalaṃ upādāyeva vutto. Sabbepi hi
anya-e0301n:109_18: tebhūmakā kusalasammatā dhammā sāsavatā saṃkilesikatā oghaniya yoganiya upādāniyatā
anya-e0301n:109_19: saṅkhātehi vajjehi sāvajjāeva honti. Dukkhasaccabhūtānañca vipākānaṃ jananaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:109_20: ekantena dukkhavipākāeva honti. Ajjhattattikañca sabbalokiyasammataṃ upādāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:109_21: Sabbepi hi catubbhū makadhammā ekantena attāpināma natthi. Kuto ajjhattānāma. Bahiddhāeva
anya-e0301n:109_22: honti. Saṅkhāre parato passāti hi vuttanti. Ayaṃ nayo sesattika dukadhammesupi yathārahaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_23: netabbo. Ariya saccaṃnāma sabbesaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ ekanta dukkhabhāvo taṇhāya
anya-e0301n:109_24: ekanta dukkhasamudaya bhāvo nibbānasseva dukkhanirodha bhāvo aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggasseva
anya-e0301n:109_25: dukkhanirodhamaggabhāvocāti. Idhameva hi parisuddhabuddhīnaṃ ariyānaṃ ñāṇe acalamānaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_26: sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ nippariyāyasaccaṃ hotīti. Tesu idha sammutisaccaṃ nivattento
anya-e0301n:109_27: paramatthatoti ida māha. Tena vuttaṃ paramatthatoti paramatthasaccatoti. Tattha attho
anya-e0301n:109_28: duvidho sabhāvasiddhoca parikappasiddhoca. Tattha yo vinā aññāpadesena kevalaṃ visuṃ
anya-e0301n:109_29: visuṃ attano lakkhaṇena vijjamāno hutvā siddho. So cittādiko attho sabhāvasiddhonāma.
anya-e0301n:109_30: Yopana attano lakkhaṇena vijjamānoyeva nahoti. Vijjamānassapana atthassa nānā pavattiākāre
anya-e0301n:109_31: upādāya cittena parikappetvā saviggahaṃ katvā gahito cittamayo cittanimmito hutvā
anya-e0301n:109_32: citteeva upalabbhamāno hoti. So sattapuggalādiko attho parikappasiddho nāma. Tesu
anya-e0301n:109_33: sabhāvasiddhoyeva paramatthonāma. So hi santi bhavanti buddhisaddā etthāti attho.
anya-e0301n:109_34: Ekantavijjamānaṭṭhena itarato paramo ukkaṃsagato atthoti paramattho. Api ca, ye ayaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_35: atthi ayaṃ upalabbhatīti gahetvā tassa abhiññeyyassa abhiññatthāya, pariññeyyassa
anya-e0301n:109_36: pariññatthāya, pahātabbassa pahānatthāya, sacchikātabbassa sacchikaraṇatthāya, bhāvetabbassa
anya-e0301n:109_37: bhāvanatthāya paṭipajjanti. Tesaṃ tadatthasādhane avisaṃvādakaṭṭhena paramo uttamo
anya-e0301n:109_38: atthoti paramattho. Itaropana avijjamānattā tassa abhiññādiatthāya paṭipajjantānaṃ
anya-e0301n:109_39: tadatthasādhane visaṃvādakoyeva bhavissati. Napana tadatthaṃ sādhessa tīti paramatthoti vattuṃ nārahatīti.
anya-e0301n:111: “Paramassavā uttamassa ñāṇassa attho gocaroti paramattho”tipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:112_0: Na hi paramasaddoñāṇe vattamāno dissati. Naca atthasaddo gocareti. Yañca anuṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:112_1: saccameva saccikaṃ. So eva attho aviparītassa ñāṇassa visayabhāvaṭṭhenāti saccikaṭṭhoti
anya-e0301n:112_2: vuttaṃ. Taṃpi aviparītena ñāṇena araṇīyato upagantabba to atthoti imamatthaṃ dasseti.
anya-e0301n:113_0: 13. Cittanti ettha cintetīti cittaṃ. Etthaca cintanakriyā nāma niccaṃ ārammaṇāpekkhā
anya-e0301n:113_1: hoti. Na hi sā ārammaṇena vinā labbhatīti. Tasmā ārammaṇaggahaṇa ārammaṇupaladdhiyeva
anya-e0301n:113_2: idha cintanāti daṭṭhabbāti. Evañhi sati bhavaṅgasamaya visaññisamayesu cittaṃ ārammaṇena
anya-e0301n:113_3: vināpi pavattatīti evaṃ vādīnaṃ vādo paṭikkhitto hoti. Santesupica nissaya samanantarādīsu
anya-e0301n:113_4: tassa paccayesu tehi nāmaṃ alabhitvā ārammaṇapaccayavasenevassa nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:113_5: Cintenti sampayuttakā dhammā etenāti cittaṃ. Tañhi ārammaṇaggahaṇakicce pubbaṅgamabhūtanti
anya-e0301n:113_6: taṃ sampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantā tassa vaseneva gaṇhantīti. Cintanamattaṃvā
anya-e0301n:113_7: cittaṃ. Sabbepi hi dhammā taṃtaṃ kriyāmattāva honti. Na tesu dabbaṃvā saṇṭhānaṃ vā
anya-e0301n:113_8: viggahovā upalabbhati. Paccayāyatta vuttino ca honti. Na te attano thāmenavā balenavā
anya-e0301n:113_9: vasenavā sattiyāvā uppajjituṃpi sakkonti. Pageva cintetuṃvā phusetuṃvāti. Khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinoca
anya-e0301n:113_10: honti, na kadāci kassaci vase vattituṃ sakkontīti. Tasmā tesu idaṃ dabbaṃ, ayaṃ satti,
anya-e0301n:113_11: aya kriyāti evaṃ vibhāgo nalabbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca katvā sabbesu paramatthapadesu
anya-e0301n:113_12: ekaṃ bhāvasādhanameva padhānato labbhati. Tadañña sādhanānipana pariyāyatova labbhantīti
anya-e0301n:113_13: veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca dabbādivasena abhedassa cintanassa atthavisesañāpanatthaṃ vibhāga
anya-e0301n:113_14: kappanāvasena bhedakaraṇaṃ pariyāyakathāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathā silā puttakassasarīranti,
anya-e0301n:113_15: tathā karaṇañca taṃ taṃ kriyāsaṅkhāta dhammavimuttassa paraparikappitassa kārakabhūtassa
anya-e0301n:113_16: atta jīva satta puggalassa sabbaso abhāvadīpanatthaṃ. Sati hi attādimhi kiṃ abhedassa bhedakappanāyāti.
anya-e0301n:115_0: Sasavisāṇaṃ viya abhūtassa bhūta kappanā vuttā viya dissati. Ayamassādhippāyo-dhammesu
anya-e0301n:115_1: kattāvā kāre tāvā koci natthi. Lokepana attappadhāno kriyā nipphādako kattānāma siddho.
anya-e0301n:115_2: Tasmā cintanakicce attappadhānatā dīpanatthaṃ taṃ kattubhāvaṃ citte āropetvā cintetīti cittanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:116_0: Cittassaca balena taṃsampayuttānaṃpi tasmiṃ kicce tadanukūlappavattidīpanatthaṃ punakaraṇabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:116_1: citte kattubhāvañca tesu āropetvā cintenti sampayuttakā dhammā etenāti cittanti vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:116_2: Api cettha cittasaddo vicitratthavācako daṭṭhabbo. Vuttañhe taṃ saṃyuttake –
anya-e0301n:117_0: Diṭṭhaṃ vo bhikkhave caraṇaṃnāma cittanti. Evaṃ bhante. Tampi kho bhikkhave caraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:117_1: cittaṃ citteneva cintitanti. Tenāpi kho bhikkhave caraṇena cittena cittaññeva cittataranti,
anya-e0301n:117_2: nā haṃ bhikkhave aññaṃ ekanikāyaṃpi samanupassāmi yaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ. Yathayidaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:117_3: tiracchānagatā pāṇā. Tepi kho bhikkhave tiracchānagatā pāṇā citteneva cittikatā.
anya-e0301n:117_4: Tehipi kho bhikkhave tiracchāna gatehi pāṇehi cittaññeva cittataranti.
anya-e0301n:118_0: Tattha caraṇaṃnāma cittanti yatthavicitrāni dibbavimānādīni cittakammāni katvā idañcidañca
anya-e0301n:118_1: puññaṃ karontā idhacidhaca nibbattāti dassento vicaranti. Tassa paṭakoṭṭhakassetaṃ
anya-e0301n:118_2: nāmaṃ. Cittenāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. Yathayidanti yathā ime. Cittikatāti vicitrā
anya-e0301n:118_3: katā. Etthaca cittavicittakāya saññāvicittā. Saññāvicittatāya taṇhāvicittā. Taṇhāvicittatāya
anya-e0301n:118_4: kammāni vicittāni. Kammavicitta tāya yoniyo vicittā. Yonivicittatāya tesaṃ tiracchā
anya-e0301n:119: Taṃ taṃ sabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ, kiccasampattiyo raso;
anya-e0301n:121: Āsannakāraṇaṃ yaṃ taṃ, padaṭṭhānanti taṃ mataṃ;
anya-e0301n:124_0: 14. Cetasikanti ettha cetasi bhavaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti cetasikaṃ. Phassādi dhammajātaṃ.
anya-e0301n:124_1: Etthaca tadāyattavuttitā nāma ekuppādatādīhi lakkhaṇehi cittena saha ekī bhūtassa
anya-e0301n:124_2: viya pavatti. Etena yā cittassa jāti. Sāeva phassādīnaṃ. Yā cittassa jarā, yaṃ cittassa
anya-e0301n:124_3: maraṇaṃ, yaṃ cittassa ārammaṇaṃ, yaṃ cittassa vatthu, tadeva phassādīnanti evaṃ ekapuppha
anya-e0301n:124_4: mañjariyaṃ ekavaṇṭupanibbandhāni pupphāni viya cittena saha ekajātiyādi upanibbandhā
anya-e0301n:124_5: phassādayo dhammā idha cetasikaṃnāmāti siddhā honti. Evañca sati cittaṃpi tehi phassādīhi
anya-e0301n:124_6: saha tatheva āyattaṃ pavattatīti taṃpi phassikaṃ vedanikantiādinā vattabbanti ce.
anya-e0301n:124_7: Na. Cittasseva jeṭṭhakattā. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā, manoseṭṭhā manomayāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:124_8: Etthaca manomayāti manasāeva pakatā nimmitā cittakriyā bhūtāti attho. Etena te phassādayo
anya-e0301n:124_9: dhammā cittena vinā nupalabbhantīti dasseti. Cittaṃpana tehi kehici vināpi pavattatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:124_10: Pañcaviññāṇa cittañhitehi kehici vitakkādīhi vinā uppajjatīti. Tasmā tesaññeva tadāyatta
anya-e0301n:126: Ekālambaṇatā mattena tesaṃ tadāyattavuttitaṃ cetasi kattañca vibhāveti. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:127_0: Na hi ekālambaṇatāmattena cetasikaṃnāma jātanti. Ettha ca loke nānāvaṇṇadhātuyo udake
anya-e0301n:127_1: ghaṃsitvā vatthumhi nānā cittakammāni karonti, tattha vatthumhi pharaṇaṃ bandhanañca
anya-e0301n:127_2: udakasseva kiccaṃ, na vaṇṇadhātūnaṃ. Nānārūpa dassanaṃ vaṇṇadhātūnameva kiccaṃ, na
anya-e0301n:127_3: udakassa. Tattha vatthuviya ārammaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Udakaṃviya cittaṃ. Nānā vaṇṇadhātuyoviya
anya-e0301n:128: 15. Rūpanti ettha ruppatīti rūpaṃ. Sītuṇhādīhi virodhi paccayehi visama pavatti vasena vikāraṃ āpajjati, tehi vā vikāraṃ āpādīyatīti attho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:129_0: Ruppatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā rūpanti vuccati. Kena ruppati. Sitenapi ruppati. Uṇhenapi
anya-e0301n:129_1: ruppati. Jighacchāyapi ruppati. Vipāsāyapi ruppati. Ḍaṃsa makasa vātātapa sariṃ sapa
anya-e0301n:129_2: sapphassehipi ruppatīti. Ruppatītica ruppati, kuppati, ghaṭṭīyati, piḷī yati, bhijjatīti.
anya-e0301n:130_0: Mahāniddese vuttaṃ. Ayamettha piṇḍattho, ye dhammā ciraṭṭhitikāca honti sappaṭighasabhāvāca.
anya-e0301n:130_1: Tesaññeva ṭhitikkhaṇesu virodhipaccayehi samāgamonāma hoti. Napanaññesaṃ parittakkhaṇānaṃ
anya-e0301n:130_2: appaṭighasabhāvānanti. Tesañhi appaṭighasabhāvānaṃ sukhuma rūpānaṃpi bahiddhā sītādīhi
anya-e0301n:130_3: samāgamonāma natthi. Kuto parittakkhaṇānaṃ appaṭighasabhāvānañca arūpadhammānanti.
anya-e0301n:130_4: Yadievaṃ sukhumarūpānaṃ arūpatāpatti siyāti. Nasiyā. Oḷārikarūpehi samānagati kattā.
anya-e0301n:130_5: Tānihi oḷārikesu ruppamānesu ruppantiyevāti. Samāgamoca nāma idha thapetvā āpātagamanaṃ
anya-e0301n:130_7: aññamaññābhighaṭṭanaṃ vuccati, ruppati ghaṭṭīyati pīḷīyatīti hi vuttaṃ. Ruppanañcanāma
anya-e0301n:130_8: parasenāyuddhena raṭṭhakhobhoviya kalāpantaragatadhātūnaṃ kuppanaṃ bhijjanaṃca vuccati.
anya-e0301n:130_9: Kuppati bhijjatīti hi vuttaṃ. Etthaca kuppatīti khobhati cañcalati, bhijjatīti vikāraṃ
anya-e0301n:130_10: āpajjati. Yasmiṃ khaṇe virodhipaccayasamāgamaṃ labhanti. Tato paṭṭhāya sayaṃpi vikārapattā
anya-e0301n:130_11: honti. Omattādhimattarūpasantatīnaṃ uppattiyā paccayabhāvaṃ pattā hontīti attho.
anya-e0301n:130_12: Apicettha ruppanaṃ duvidhaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ, hāyanañca. Tadubhayaṃpi kappavuṭṭhāne kappasaṇṭhāne
anya-e0301n:130_13: nānāāyukappa saṃvacchara utu māsa ratti divādīnaṃ parivattaneca pākaṭaṃ hotīti. Kasmā
anya-e0301n:130_14: pana rūpanti nāmaṃ ghaṭṭanavasena ruppanadhammānameva siddhanti. Tesameva saviggahattā.
anya-e0301n:130_15: Rūpadhammā hi samūhasaṇṭhānādi bhāvapattiyā saviggahā honti. Tasmā tesameva ruppanaṃ
anya-e0301n:130_16: paccakkhatopi lokassa pākaṭanti tesveva rūpanti nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Arūpadhammā
anya-e0301n:130_17: pana aviggahāti na tesaṃ vikāro paccakkhato lokassa pākaṭo hoti. Taṃ taṃ rūpavikāraṃ
anya-e0301n:130_18: disvāvā sutvā vā pucchitvāyeva vā so lokena jānitabbo aññatra paracittavidūhi. Tasmā
anya-e0301n:132_0: Tesaṃ rūpatāpattippasaṅgo sītādiggahaṇa sāmatthiyena nivattito. Yasmā pana vohāronāma
anya-e0301n:132_1: lokopacārena vinā nasijjhati. Lokopacāroca pākaṭanimittavase neva pavatto. Tasmā
anya-e0301n:132_2: idha sītādiggahaṇena vināpi tappasaṅganivatti lokatova siddhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:133_0: Yasmā ca brahmaloke brahmānaṃ kāyavikāra vacīvikārā ca iddhivikuppanāvasappavattā
anya-e0301n:133_1: nānārūpavikārāca dissantiyeva. Teca ekena pariyāyena ruppanākārāeva nāma honti, tasmā
anya-e0301n:133_2: tesaṃ vasena tattha rūpānaṃ rūpatāsiddhi hotīti veditabbaṃ. Rūpayati vā attano sabhāvena
anya-e0301n:133_3: pakāsatīti rūpaṃ. Arūpadhammā hi na attano sabhāvena pākaṭā honti. Rūpasannissayeneva
anya-e0301n:133_4: gahetabbā. Idaṃ pana attano sabhāveneva pākaṭaṃ pañcaviññāṇehipi gahetabbanti. Imasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:133_5: atthe sati brahmaloke rūpānaṃpi uju katova rūpatāsiddhi hotīti.
anya-e0301n:135_0: Anuggāhakānaṃ sītādīnaṃ vasena taṃ sabhāvā nātivattana vasenaca tattha rūpatāsiddhi
anya-e0301n:135_1: vibhāvitā. Yasmāpana sīte nāpi uṇhenāpītiādivacanaṃ nidassanamattaṃ hoti. Kamma cittāhārānaṃpi
anya-e0301n:135_2: vasena ruppanassa sambhavato, tathāhi saññā viññāṇānipi rūpārammaṇarasārammaṇehi
anya-e0301n:135_3: eva pāḷiyaṃ niddiṭṭhāni. Na hi saññā rūpaṃeva sañjānāti. Na ca viññāṇaṃ rasa meva
anya-e0301n:135_4: vijānāti. Nidassanamattena desanā hotīti viññāyatīti. Tasmā sītādiggahaṇaṃ amuñcitvāva
anya-e0301n:136_0: 16. Nibbānanti ettha nibbāyanti sabbe vaṭṭadukkhasantāpā etasminti nibbānaṃ. Nibbāyantīti
anya-e0301n:136_1: ye kilesāvā khandhāvā abhāvitamaggassa āyatiṃ uppajjanārahapakkhe ṭhitā honti. Teyeva
anya-e0301n:136_2: bhāvitamaggassa anuppajjanārahapakkhaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho. Na hi khaṇattayaṃ patvā
anya-e0301n:136_3: niruddhā atītadhammā nibbāyanti nāma. Paccuppannesu āyatiṃ avassaṃ uppajjamānesuca
anya-e0301n:136_4: dhammesu vattabbameva natthīti. Vaṭṭadukkhasantāpāti kilesavaṭṭa kammavaṭṭa vipākavaṭṭa
anya-e0301n:136_5: dukkhasantāpā. Na hi tividha vaṭṭadukkhasantāparahitānaṃ rukkhādīnaṃ anuppādanirodho
anya-e0301n:136_6: nibbānaṃnāma hotīti. Etasminti visaye bhummaṃ. Yathā ākāse sakuṇā pakkhantīti. Yehi
anya-e0301n:136_7: te nibbāyanti. Tesaṃ tabbinimuttaṃ aññaṃ nibbutiṭṭhānaṃnāma kiñci natthīti. Nibbāyanti
anya-e0301n:136_8: vā ariyajanā etasminti nibbānaṃ. Nibbanti dhīrā yathayaṃ padīpoti hi vuttaṃ. Nibbāyantīti
anya-e0301n:136_9: taṃ taṃ kilesānaṃvā khandhānaṃvā puna appaṭisandhikabhāvaṃ pāpuṇantīti attho. Ekasminti
anya-e0301n:136_10: visayeeva bhummaṃ, etasmiṃ adhi gatetipi yojenti. Ṭīkāsupana bhavābhavaṃ vinanato
anya-e0301n:136_11: saṃsibbana to vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā. Tato nikkhantanti nibbānanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:138: “Nibbābhivā etena rāgaggiādikoti nibbāna”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:139: Na hi maggeviya nibbāne katthaci karaṇasādhanaṃ diṭṭhaṃ, naca nibbānaṃ nibbūti kriyāsādhane rāgādikassa kattuno saha kāripaccayo hotīti. [Nibbānaṃ]
anya-e0301n:142: 17. Idāni uddesakkamena cittaṃ tāva niddisanto tattha cittantiādimāha. Tatthāti tesu catūsu abhidhammatthesu. Tāva pathamaṃ. Cattāro vidhā pakārā yassa taṃ catubbidhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:143_0: 18. Kāmāvacaranti ettha kāmīyatīti kāmo. Kāmentivā ettha sattā avikkhambhitakāmarāgattā
anya-e0301n:143_1: kāmaratiyāeva ramanti. Na uparibhūmīsu viya jhānaratiyāti kāmo. Ekādasavidhā kāmabhūmi.
anya-e0301n:143_2: Nanu cettha jhānalābhinopi santīti. Na na santi. Tepana kadāci devāti natthettha
anya-e0301n:143_3: doso. Avīcinirayādayo kathaṃ kāmīyanti. Kathañca tattha sattā kāmaratiyā ramantīti.
anya-e0301n:143_4: Nimittassādavasenavā bhavanikantivasenavāti. Maraṇakāle hi upaṭṭhitā nirayaggijālā
anya-e0301n:143_5: suvaṇṇavaṇṇāviya khāyanti. Eko kira micchādiṭṭhiko brāhmaṇo maraṇamañce nippanno
anya-e0301n:143_6: hoti. Tassa ācariyabrāhmaṇā samīpe ṭhatvā brahmalokaṃ bho gacchāti vadanti. Tassapana
anya-e0301n:143_7: avīciniraye aggijālā upaṭṭhahanti. Tadā so bho ācariyā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā paññāyantīti
anya-e0301n:143_8: āha. Esa bho brahmaloko. Tattha gacchāti vadanti. So kālaṅkatvā avīcimhi uppajji.
anya-e0301n:143_9: Evaṃ nimittassādavasena te kāmīyanti. Tattha uppannānaṃpi bhavanikantināma hotīti.
anya-e0301n:143_10: Apica, tattha uppannā avikkhambhitakāmarāgāeva honti, okāse sati kāmaratiyā ramissanti
anya-e0301n:143_11: yevāti. Tasmiṃ kāme avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ. Etthaca avacaratīti padassa uppajjatīti
anya-e0301n:143_12: attho na gahetabbo. So hi attho pāḷiyāca nasameti. Nānādosayuttoca hotīti. Yaṃ etasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:143_13: antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannāti hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yadi cettha so attho adhippeto
anya-e0301n:143_14: siyā. Evaṃ sabhi etthāvacarā etthuppannāti vuttaṃ siyā. Napana vuttaṃ. Naca pariyāpannasaddo
anya-e0301n:143_15: uppannasaddena saha samānatthoti sakkā vattuṃ. Na hi lokuttaracittāni tīsu bhavesu
anya-e0301n:143_16: uppannā nipi tatra pariyāpannāniyeva hontīti. Evaṃ tāva pāḷiyā nasametīti.
anya-e0301n:144_0: Yadica so attho gahito siyā. Evañca sati tasmiṃ kāme ye mahaggata lokuttaradhammā
anya-e0301n:144_1: uppajjanti. Tesaṃpi kāmā vacaratāpattidoso rūpāvacaratādi muttidosoca āpajjati. Yeca
anya-e0301n:144_2: kāmāvacaradhammā rūpārūpabhūmīsu uppajjanti. Tesañca rūpārūpā vacaratā pattidoso
anya-e0301n:144_3: kāmāvacaratā muttidosoca āpajjatīti. Nanu yebhuyyavuttivasenapi kesañci nāmalābho
anya-e0301n:144_4: hoti. Yathā vanacarako saṅgāmāvacaroti. Tasmā idhapi tesaṃ dhammānaṃ attano attano
anya-e0301n:144_5: bhummīsu uppannabahulattā kāmāvacarādi nāmalābhe sati na koci dosoti.Na. Evañhi sati
anya-e0301n:144_6: lokuttara dhammānaṃ kāmāvacaratādi muccanatthaṃ yebhuyyena uppannabhūmi visuṃ vattabbā
anya-e0301n:144_7: siyā. Na ca sā nāmabhūmi atthi. Yattha te yebhuyyena uppajjantīti. Tehi uppajjantā
anya-e0301n:144_8: tīsu bhavesu eva uppajjanti. Tasmā tesaṃ kāma rūpārūpāvacaratāpattidoso dunnivāro
anya-e0301n:144_9: siyāti. Evaṃ nānādosayutto hotīti. Tasmāssa tathā atthaṃ aggahetvā etthāvacarā ettha
anya-e0301n:144_10: pariyāpannāti bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitena pāḷinayenevassa attho gahetabboti. Ayañhettha
anya-e0301n:144_11: attho. Kāme avacarati pariyāpannabhāvena tasmiṃ ajjhogāhetvā carati pavattatīti kāmāvacaranti.
anya-e0301n:144_12: Pariyāpannabhāvocanāma attano ādhārabhūtena tena kāmena saha samānajātigottanāmatā
anya-e0301n:144_13: saṅkhātehi paritobhāgehi tasmiṃ kāme āpannabhāvo anuppaviṭṭha bhāvo. Antogadhabhāvoti
anya-e0301n:144_14: vuttaṃ hoti. Soca tathā pariyāpannabhāvo pariggāhiniyā kāmataṇhāya katoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:144_15: Ettāvatā yedhammā rūpārūpasattasantānabhūtāpi mayhaṃ eteti kāma taṇhāya pariggahitā
anya-e0301n:144_16: kāme pariyāpannāva honti. Te kāmāvacarānāmāti siddhā honti. Rūpārūpā vacaresupi ayaṃ
anya-e0301n:144_17: nayo netabbo. Tesupana rūpataṇhā arūpataṇhāca pariggāhinī taṇhā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:145_0: Yepana dhammā tiṇṇaṃ taṇhānaṃ pariggahavimuttā honti. Te tīsu bhavesu uppannāpi tatra
anya-e0301n:145_1: apariyāpannāeva hontīti lokuttarā nāma jātāti veditabbā. Etthaca paṭṭhāne āruppe
anya-e0301n:145_2: kāmacchandaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca uddhaccanīvaraṇantiādinā arūpasattasantānepi kāmacchandasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0301n:145_3: kāmataṇhāya uppatti vuttā. Tasmā rūpārūpa bhūmīsu uppannānaṃ kāmadhammānaṃ pariggāhinītaṇhā
anya-e0301n:145_4: rūpārūpasattasantāna gatāpi daṭṭhabbā. Pāḷiyaṃ kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti idaṃ nīvaraṇajātikattā
anya-e0301n:145_5: vuttaṃ. Na hi jhānabhūmīsu ekantanīvaraṇakiccāni nīvaraṇāni sakkā laddhunti. Atra
anya-e0301n:145_6: kāmabhedo vattabbo. Dvekāmā kile sakāmoca, vatthukāmocāti. Tattha thapetvā rūpārūparāge
anya-e0301n:145_7: añño sabbopi lobho imasmiṃ catubbhūmiparicchede kile sakāmonāma. Thapetvāca rūpārūpāvacaradhamme
anya-e0301n:145_8: aññe sabbepi tīsu bhūmīsu uppannā kāmāvacaradhammā vatthukāmonāmāti. Yaṃpana aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0301n:145_9: sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā vatthukāmoti vuttaṃ. Taṃ mahāniddese niddiṭṭhena suttantikapariyāyena
anya-e0301n:145_10: vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. Na hi rūpārūpāvacaradhammā abhidhamme kāmanāmena vuttā atthīti. [Kāmāvacarapadaṃ]
anya-e0301n:146_0: 19. Rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaranti ettha rūpārūpasaddā tāsu bhūmīsu niruḷhāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:146_1: Apica dve bhūmiyo rūpabhūmi, arūpabhūmīti. Tattha ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ rūpaṃ yattha natthi,
anya-e0301n:146_2: sā catubbidhā bhummi arūpabhūmināma. Sesā sattavīsatividhā bhummi rūpabhūmināma.
anya-e0301n:146_3: Tatthaca heṭṭhā ekādasavidhā bhummi oḷārikena kāmena visesetvā kāma bhūmīti vuttā.
anya-e0301n:146_4: Upari soḷasavidhā bhummi rūpabhūmiicceva vuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Yatthapana taṇhāvā jhānānivā
anya-e0301n:146_5: rūpārūpasaddehi vuttāni. Tattha nissayassanāmaṃ nissite āropanavasena nissayopacāro
anya-e0301n:146_6: veditabbo. Yatthaca kāmāvacarādisaddehi bhūmieva vuttā. Tattha nissitassa nāmaṃ nissaye
anya-e0301n:146_7: āropanavasena nissito pacāroti. Yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ kāmāvacarapade vuttanayamevāti.
anya-e0301n:146_8: Ayamettha tebhūmaka paricchede pāḷianugatā paramatthadīpanā. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:147_0: Katame dhammā kāmāvacarā. Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito paranimmitavasavattīdeve
anya-e0301n:147_1: anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā
anya-e0301n:147_2: rūpā vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ. Imedhammā kāmāvacarā. Katame dhammā rūpāvacarā.
anya-e0301n:147_3: Heṭṭhato brahmalokaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito akaniṭṭhe deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:147_4: antare etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā samāpannassavā upapannassavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissavā
anya-e0301n:147_5: cittacetasikā dhammā, ime dhammā rūpāvacarā. Katame dhammā arūpāvacarā. Heṭṭhato
anya-e0301n:147_6: ākāsānañcāyatanupage deve pariyantaṃ karitvā uparito nevasaññā nāsaññā yatanupage
anya-e0301n:147_7: deve anto karitvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare. La. Ime dhammā arūpāvacarāti.
anya-e0301n:149: Yathāvuttaṃ suvisadaṃ pāḷinayaṃ aggahetvā aññathā vacanatthāca vinicchayāca ettha vuttā. Sabbe te sārato na paccetabbāti.
anya-e0301n:150: Nanu aṭṭhasāliniyameva teca aññeca atthā vuttāti. Saccaṃ. Bhūtaṃpana suvisadaṃ pāḷianugataṃ atthaṃ ñatvā kiṃvikkhepenāti.
anya-e0301n:151_0: 20. Lokuttaranti ettha lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko vuccati yathāvutto tebhūmakadhammo.
anya-e0301n:151_1: Yathāha lujjati palujjatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā lokoti vuccatīti. Evaṃ sante lokuttaradhammānaṃpi
anya-e0301n:151_2: nibbānavajjānaṃ lokatāpatti siyā. Kasmā, tesaṃpi lujjanapalujjanadhammattāti. Nasiyā.
anya-e0301n:151_3: Yattha hi nicco dhuvo sassatoti mahājanassa micchāgāho nivisati. Tattheva tassa nivāraṇatthaṃ
anya-e0301n:151_4: ayaṃ lokasamaññā niyamīyati. Tasmā sabbaso micchāgāhavimuttānaṃ tesaṃ lokatāpatti
anya-e0301n:151_5: natthīti vadanti. Yesaṃvā lujjanaṃpalujjanañca mahājanassa pākaṭaṃ. Tesaññeva lokatāsiddhīti
anya-e0301n:151_6: natthi lokuttarānaṃ lokattappasaṅgoti. Lokato uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ. Maggacittaṃ.
anya-e0301n:151_7: Tato uttiṇṇanti lokuttaraṃ. Phalacittaṃ. Nibbānaṃpana idha nalabbhatīti. Uttaraṇañcettha
anya-e0301n:151_8: taṇhāttayaggāha vimuttiyā tīsu lokesu apariyāpannabhāvoyeva. Soca apariyāpannabhāvo
anya-e0301n:151_9: kesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhāna bhūtoviya gayhatīti visuṃ ekā catutthī avatthābhūmināmāti.
anya-e0301n:153_0: 21. Evaṃ cittaṃ bhūmibhedena hīnapaṇītā nukkamato catudhā niddisitvā idāni tadeva
anya-e0301n:153_1: catubbidhaṃ cittaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhakkamena vibhajanto pathamaṃ kāmāvacaracittaṃ. Tatthaca
anya-e0301n:153_2: hīnaṃ asobhaṇacittaṃ. Tatthaca sabbahīnaṃ akusalacittaṃ tāva dassetuṃ somanassasaha
anya-e0301n:153_3: gatantiādimāha. Etthaca kāmāvacaracittassapi akusalāhetuka sahetukānukkamo hīna paṇītānukkamavasena vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:155: Upari vuccamānānaṃ bahūnaṃ cittānaṃ sobhaṇasaññākaraṇasukhatthaṃ appake pāpāhetukeyeva pathamaṃ dassentoti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:158: Tesu tesuca bhavesu gahitappaṭisandhikassa sattassa ādito vīthicittavasena lobhasahagata cittuppādāna meva sambhavato teyeva pathamanti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:159_0: Ādito vīthicittavasena manodvārā vajjanasseva sabbapathamaṃ uppajjanatoti. Akusalesu
anya-e0301n:159_1: pana lobhamūla cittaṃ bahukañca hoti. Dvīhi vaṭṭamūlehi yuttattā padhānaṃ pākaṭañca
anya-e0301n:160_0: 22. Tattha sundaraṃ manoti sumano. Siniddhacittaṃ. Na hi anavajjaṭṭhena sundaratā
anya-e0301n:160_1: idha yuttāti. Sundaraṃ mano etassābhivā sumano. Siniddhacittasamaṅgī puggalo. Sumanassa
anya-e0301n:160_2: bhāvo somanassa. Mānasikasukhavedanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. Etthaca sumanassa bhāvoti tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:160_3: citte puggalevā sumanābhidhānassavā ayaṃ so sumanoti sumanabuddhiyāvā pavattinimittanti
anya-e0301n:160_4: attho. Bhāvoti hi abhidhānabuddhīnaṃ pavattinimittaṃ vuccati. Bhavanti pavattanti
anya-e0301n:160_5: abhidhānabuddhiyo etasminti katvā. Etasminti ca nimitte bhummaṃ. Yathā nāgo dantesu
anya-e0301n:160_6: haññateti. Yathā hi tattha attano dantanimittaṃ dantayutte nāge hananappavatti hoti,
anya-e0301n:160_7: evamidhapi taṃ vedanānimittaṃ vedanāyutte manasmiṃ puggalevā abhidhānabuddhiyo pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n:160_8: Bhavanti buddhisaddā etenāti bhāvotica vadanti. Etasmāti ca apare. Somanassena saha
anya-e0301n:160_9: ekato gataṃ pavattanti somanassasahagataṃ. Somanassavedanāsampayuttanti attho. Dassanaṃ
anya-e0301n:160_10: diṭṭhi. Sā pana sammādiṭṭhi, micchādiṭṭhivasena duvidhā. Idha micchādiṭṭhiyuttā.
anya-e0301n:160_11: Akusalādhikārattā. Diṭṭhiyeva diṭṭhigataṃ. Yathā gūthagataṃ muttagatanti. Diṭṭhigatena
anya-e0301n:160_12: samaṃ pakārehi yuttanti diṭṭhigata sampayuttaṃ. Diṭṭhigatena ekuppādatādīhi pakārehi
anya-e0301n:160_13: samaṃ ekībhūta miva yuttaṃ saṃsaṭṭhanti attho. Asaṅkhārikamekaṃ sasaṅkhārikamekanti
anya-e0301n:160_14: ettha saṅkhāroti pubbātisaṅkhāro. Soca duvidho payogo, upāyocāti. Tattha āṇattiyāvā
anya-e0301n:160_15: ajjhesanāyavā tajjetvā vā idaṃ karohīti parehi kato kāyavacīpayogo payogonāma. Āṇattādināpana
anya-e0301n:160_16: vināva kammassa karaṇatthaṃ taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ pare ācikkhanti. Akaraṇe ādīnavaṃ karaṇeca
anya-e0301n:160_17: ānisaṃsaṃ dassenti, katikaṃvā karonti, daṇḍaṃvā thapenti, sayameva vā taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:160_18: anussarati, paccavekkhati. Evamādinā nayena upāyo anekavidho. So duvidhopi idha saṅkhāro
anya-e0301n:160_19: nāma. Saṅkharoti attano pakatiyā kātuṃ anicchamānaṃ citta santānaṃ akātuṃ adatvā
anya-e0301n:160_20: karaṇatthāya saṃvidahati tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kamme payojetīti katvā. Yopana paccayagaṇo
anya-e0301n:160_21: tena saṅkhārena virahito hoti. So asaṅkhāro. Yopana tenasahito hoti. So sasaṅkhāroti.
anya-e0301n:161: Saha saṅkhārenāti sasaṅkhāro. Tena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena saupāyena paccayagaṇenāti atthoti.
anya-e0301n:162_0: Etthaca paccayagaṇoti ārammaṇādiko sādhāraṇo paccaya gaṇo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Asādhāraṇopana
anya-e0301n:162_2: visesetvā yojetuṃ yutto. Sopana yadā duvidhena saṅkhārena vinā sayameva cittaṃ asaṃsīdamānaṃ
anya-e0301n:162_3: katvā uṭṭhāpeti samuṭṭhāpeti, tadā soasaṅkhāronāma. Yadāpana tena vinā sayameva cittaṃ
anya-e0301n:162_4: uṭṭhāpetuṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ nasakkoti, saṅkhāraṃ sahāyaṃ labhitvāva sakkoti, tadā so
anya-e0301n:162_5: sasaṅkhāronāma. Iti asaṅkhāro sasaṅkhārotica idaṃ paccaya gaṇasseva nāmaṃ. Na cittassa.
anya-e0301n:162_6: Cittaṃpana asaṅkhārena suddhena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ. Sasaṅkhārena
anya-e0301n:162_7: paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ, uppannatthe hi ayaṃ ikapaccayoti. Yasmiṃ samaye
anya-e0301n:162_8: akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttaṃ sasaṅkhārenāti
anya-e0301n:162_9: hi pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti. Etthaca sasaṅkhārena paccayagaṇena uppannaṃ hotīti yojetabbanti.
anya-e0301n:164_0: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā cittameva asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhāranti ca gahetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0301n:164_1: “natthi saṅkhāro assāti asaṅkhāraṃ. Tadeva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Saha saṅkhārena vattatīti
anya-e0301n:164_2: sasaṅkhāraṃ. Sasaṅkhārameva sasaṅkhārikanti ca. So yassa natthi. Taṃ asaṅkhāraṃ.
anya-e0301n:164_3: Tadeva asaṅkhārikaṃ. Saṅkhārena sahitaṃ sasaṅkhāri kanti ca”. Sabbametaṃ na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:166: Saṅkharoti cittaṃ tikkhabhāvasaṅkhātamaṇḍanavisesena sajjeti. Saṅkharīyativā taṃ etena yathāvuttanayena sajjīyatīti saṅkhāroti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:167: Evañhi sati sasaṅkhārikapi cittaṃ tikkhaṃnāma siyāti.
anya-e0301n:169_0: “So pana attano pubbabhāgappavatte cittasantāneceva parasantāneca pavattatīti taṃ
anya-e0301n:169_1: nibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāva saṅkhāto visesova idha saṅkhāroti” vuttaṃ. Taṃpi
anya-e0301n:169_2: asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikapadānaṃ vacanatthesu virajjhitvā tadanu rūpassa saṅkhārassa
anya-e0301n:175_0: “Athavā, sasaṅkhārikaṃ asaṅkhārikanti ce taṃ kevalaṃsaṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvaṃ sandhāya
anya-e0301n:175_1: vuttaṃ. Natassa sahapavattisabbhā vā bhāvatoti. Bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa
anya-e0301n:175_2: idhamatthitāya taṃ vasena nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ. Salomako
anya-e0301n:175_3: sapakkhakotyādīsuviya saha saddassa vijjamānatthaparidīpanato. Tabbiparītampana tadabhāvato
anya-e0301n:175_4: vuttanayena asaṅkhārika”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsiddhaṃ ujuṃ visadaṃ atthaṃ
anya-e0301n:175_5: muñcitvā attano parikappanā vasena vuttattā na gahetabbameva.
anya-e0301n:176_0: Etthaca attano icchāya vinā paresaṃ āṇattiyāvā ajjhe sanāyavā yācanāyavā pavattitaṃ
anya-e0301n:176_1: cittaṃ payogasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma. Tathā attano icchāya vinā paresaṃ bhayenavā lajjāyavā
anya-e0301n:176_2: gāravenavā kathikāyavā daṇḍabhayenavā pavattitaṃ upāyasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma. Sayamevavā
anya-e0301n:176_3: attano līnaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā tena tena upāyena attānaṃ ovaditvāvā taṃ taṃ upāyaṃ anussaritvāvā
anya-e0301n:176_4: pavattitaṃ cittaṃ upāyasamuṭṭhitaṃ nāma. Idañca nayadassanamevāti. Diṭṭhigatena vippayuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:176_5: diṭṭhigatavippayuttaṃ. Udāsinabhāvena pekkhati anubhavanākārena ārammaṇaṃ passatīti
anya-e0301n:176_6: upekkhā. Upapattito yuttito ikkhati passatītivā upekkhā. Yathāhi somanassa domanassāni
anya-e0301n:176_7: ārammaṇaṃ adhimattato passanti. Yato somanassito puggalo tena ārammaṇena viyoge vikārapatto
anya-e0301n:176_8: hoti. Domanassitoca tena ārammaṇena saṃyoge vikārapatto hoti. Na tathā ayaṃ, ayaṃ
anya-e0301n:176_9: pana yuttitova passati na ārammaṇasaṃyoga viyogahetu puggalaṃ vikāraṃ pāpetīti. Kecipana
anya-e0301n:176_10: upapattito yuttito ikkhatīti idaṃ idha nasambhavati. Na hi akusalaṃ yuttarūpaṃ nāma
anya-e0301n:177_0: 23. Etthaca kiñcāpi phassādayo vitakkādayo mohādayoca dhammā iminā sakalena aṭṭhavidhena
anya-e0301n:177_1: cittena saha gatā sampayuttāca honti, na pana te vedanāviya sayaṃpi bhedavantā honti.
anya-e0301n:177_2: Naca diṭṭhisaṅkhārānaṃ viyatesaṃ imasmiṃ citte katthaci honti katthacinahontīti ayaṃ
anya-e0301n:177_3: vikappo atthi. Tasmāte imassacittassa bhedakarā nahontīti idha nagahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:177_4: Lobhopana aññehi imassa aṭṭhavidhassa bhedakaro hoti. Vedanādiṭṭhi saṅkhārāca imassa
anya-e0301n:177_5: aññamaññassa bhedakarā hontīti teeva idha gahitāti daṭṭhabbā. Nanu pīti māna thinamiddhānipi
anya-e0301n:177_6: bhedakarāni hontīti tānipi idha sapītikaṃ apītikanti mānasampayuttaṃ mānavippayuttanti
anya-e0301n:177_7: thinamiddhasampayuttaṃ thinamiddhavippayuttanti ca gahetabbā nīti. Na. Tesu hi somanasse
anya-e0301n:177_8: gahite pīti gahitāva hoti. Itarānica tīṇi aniyatayogīnica honti, yevāpana kānicāti nagahitānīti.
anya-e0301n:179_0: Phassādivitakkādimohādidhammā ito aññehipi citte hi yuttā hontīti nate aññehi imassa
anya-e0301n:179_1: visesaṃ karonti. Tasmā te idha na gahitāti iminā adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ “kasmā panettha
anya-e0301n:179_2: aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu somanassasahagatādibhāvova vuttoti.
anya-e0301n:179_3: Somanassādīnameva asādhāraṇa bhāvatoti. Phassādayohi keci sabbacitta sādhāraṇā keci
anya-e0301n:179_4: kusalādi sādhāraṇā. Mohādayoca sabbā kusalasādhāraṇāti na tehi sakkā cittaṃ visesetu”nti. Taṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:180: Evañhi sati somanassupekkhā saṅkhārāpi aññesu dissantīti tepi aññehi imassa visesaṃ nakaronti. Tasmā tepi idha nagahetabbā siyunti.
anya-e0301n:181_1: somanassassa kāraṇaṃ. Somanassappaṭisandhikohi sadā bhavaṅgasomanassena paribhāvita
anya-e0301n:181_2: santāno hotīti tassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yebhuyyena somanassasahagataṃ uppajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:181_3: Agambhīrappakatikoca hīnajjhāsayo appakaṃpi mahantaṃ maññati. Hīnaṃpi paṇītaṃ maññati.
anya-e0301n:181_4: Tasmā tassapi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ yebhuyyena somanassasahagataṃ hotīti. Iṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti
anya-e0301n:181_5: attanā icchitena hīnenavā paṇītenavā ārammaṇena samāyogo. Byasanamuttīti ñātibyasanādito
anya-e0301n:181_7: upekkhāya kāraṇaṃ. Etthaca gambhīrappakabhitānāma mahajjhāsayatā. Tādiso hi puggalo
anya-e0301n:181_8: mahantaṃpi appakaṃ maññati, paṇītaṃpi hīnaṃ maññatīti. Diṭṭhajjhāsayatā, diṭṭhivipannapuggalasevanā,
anya-e0301n:181_9: saddhammavimukhatā, micchāvitakkabahulatā, ayoniso ummujjanañca diṭṭhiyā kāraṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:181_10: Tattha diṭṭhajjhāsayatāti kāṇāriṭṭhassaviya sunakkhattassaviyaca purimabhave diṭṭhi
anya-e0301n:181_11: gatikabhāvena āgatattā imasmiṃ bhavepi sassatucchedāsaya bhāvo. Saddhammavimukhatāti
anya-e0301n:181_12: ciraṃpi kālaṃ saddhammena vinā āgatatā. Micchāvitakkabahulatāti attano avisayesu
anya-e0301n:181_13: sabbaññuvisayesu ṭhānesu attano pamāṇaṃ ajānitvā cintāpasutavasena micchāvitakkabahulabhāvo.
anya-e0301n:181_14: Ayoniso ummujjananti attanādiṭṭhakāraṇameva sārato saccato ummujjanaṃ. Tabbiparītena
anya-e0301n:181_16: cittatā, khanti bahulatā, purisakāresu diṭṭhānisaṃsatā, kammappasutatā, utubhojanādi
anya-e0301n:181_17: sappāya lābhoti idaṃ asaṅkhārikakāraṇaṃ. Tattha khantibahulatāti sītuṇhādīnaṃ khamanabahulatā.
anya-e0301n:181_18: Purisakāresūti purisehi kattabbesu kammesu. Kammappasutabhāti kammesu ciṇṇavasitā.
anya-e0301n:181_19: Tabbiparī tena sasaṅkhārikakāraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Imesaṃpana cittānaṃ uppatti vidhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:181_20: visuddhimagge gahetabbaṃ. Aṭṭhapīti pisaddena nesaṃ labbhamānakammapathabhedato kāla
anya-e0301n:183_0: 25. Dosamūlacitte duṭṭhumanobhi dummano. Virūpaṃ cittaṃ. Duṭṭhumano etassātivā dummano.
anya-e0301n:183_2: adhivacanaṃ. Sā hi attanā sahagate cittevā taṃ samaṅgīpuggalevā dummanā bhidhānassavā
anya-e0301n:183_3: ayaṃ so dummanoti dummanabuddhiyāvā pavattinimittaṃ hotīti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
anya-e0301n:183_4: Domanassena saha gatanti samāso. Paṭihaññatīti paṭigho. Doso. Sohi uppajjamāno sampayuttadhammepi
anya-e0301n:183_5: paṭihanati. Lūkhe santatte karoti. Attano vatthumpi paṭihanati. Hadayappadesaṃ dahati.
anya-e0301n:183_6: Taṃ puggalaṃ dummukhaṃ karoti, attano ārammaṇaṃpi paṭihanati. Taṃ bādhaya māno gaṇhāti.
anya-e0301n:184_0: 26. Ettha siyā. Saṅkhāro tāva imassa cittassa bheda karoti tassa idha gahaṇaṃ yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:184_1: Vedanā paṭighāpana bhedakarā na hontīti te idha na gahetabbāti. Vuccate, domanassaggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:184_2: tāva imassa cittassa kadāci aññavedanāyogatā pasaṅganivattanatthanti. Yadāhi rājāno
anya-e0301n:184_3: hasamānāyeva coravadhaṃ pesenti. Yadāca janā attano verīnaṃ maraṇe tuṭṭhiṃ pavedenti.
anya-e0301n:184_4: Maraṇaṃ abhinandanti. Yadāca bālajanā hasamānāva migapakkhino mārenti. Tadā idaṃ
anya-e0301n:184_5: nukho somanassena yuttanti attheva pasaṅgo. Upekkhāyogepana vattabbameva natthi.
anya-e0301n:184_7: pasaṅganivattanatthaṃ. Tathāhi ye natthikāhetukā kiriyamicchā diṭṭhikā pāṇavadhe
anya-e0301n:184_8: apuññaṃnāma natthīti gaṇhanti. Yeca manussapāṇa vadheeva apuññaṃ hoti, tiracchānagatapāṇavadhe
anya-e0301n:184_9: apuññaṃ natthīti gaṇhanti. Yeca pāṇavadhaṃ katvā yaññaṃ yajantānaṃ mahantaṃ puññaṃ
anya-e0301n:184_10: hoti, dibbasaṃvattanikanti gaṇhanti. Te sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā vissaṭṭhā pāṇavadhaṃ sayaṃvā
anya-e0301n:184_11: karonti. Aññevā pesenti. Tadā idaṃ diṭṭhiyāpi sampayuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo hotiyeva.
anya-e0301n:184_12: Yepana sammādiṭṭhikesu bālā abyattā, te kadāci tesaṃ micchādiṭṭhikānaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā
anya-e0301n:184_13: pāṇaṃ vadhantā ādito vematikajātāva honti. Tadātesaṃ idaṃ vicikicchāyapi yuttaṃ siyāti
anya-e0301n:184_14: pasaṅgo hoti. Tappasaṅga nivattanatthaṃ paṭighaggahaṇanti. Itarathā purima cittassa
anya-e0301n:184_15: lobhasahagatabhāvoviya imassa paṭighasampayuttabhāvo cūḷanigameneva siddhoti tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:184_16: gahaṇaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti. Etthaca issāmacchariyakukkuccānaṃ thinamiddhassaca aggahaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:186: “Asādhāraṇa dhammavasena cittassa upalakkhaṇatthaṃ domanassaggahaṇa”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha asādhāraṇadhammavasenāti idaṃ tāva nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:187_0: [29] Satipi imassa somanassupekkhāsahagatabhāve anaññasādhāraṇeneva domanassena imassa
anya-e0301n:187_1: upalakkhaṇatthanti atthassa āpajjanato. Yathātaṃ satipi purimassa imassaca cittassa
anya-e0301n:187_2: mohasahagatabhāve anaññasādhāraṇeneva lobhena paṭighenaca upalakkhaṇatthaṃ lobhasahagatapaṭigha
anya-e0301n:188: Evañhi sati pākaṭena domanassena apākaṭānaṃ aññavedanā naṃpi idha laddhabhāvaṃ upalakkhetīti āpajjati. Yathā laddhātapatto rājakumāroti.
anya-e0301n:190: “Paṭighasampayuttabhāvopana ubhinnaṃ ekanta sahacāritā dassanatthaṃ vutto”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:192_1: aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyo govā domanassassa paṭighassaca kāraṇaṃ. Tattha dosa bahula bhāvato
anya-e0301n:192_2: āgatavasena dosajjhāsayatā daṭṭhabbā. Agambhīrappakatitā hīnajjhāsayatā. Appassutassaca
anya-e0301n:192_3: aniṭṭha loka dhammehiphuṭṭhassa taṃkutetthalabbhāti paccavekkhanā natthīti. Imesampi
anya-e0301n:192_4: dvinnaṃ uppattividhānaṃ visuddhimagge gahetabbaṃ. Pisaddassa atthopi vuttanayoevāti.
anya-e0301n:194_0: 28. Mohamūlacitte vicikicchuddhaccānaṃ padattho upari āgamissati. Yasmāpana idaṃ
anya-e0301n:194_1: cittaṃ mūlantaravirahena laddhokāsena suṭṭhubalavantena mohenaceva saṃsappamānavikkhipamānehi
anya-e0301n:194_2: vicikicchuddhaccehi ca yuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā idha vedanāpi ārammaṇaṃ adhimattato anubhavituṃ
anya-e0301n:194_3: na sakkotīti upekkhāvedanāva yuttā hoti. Evaṃ santepi idaṃ cittaṃ somanassa domanassa
anya-e0301n:194_4: sahagatānaṃpi anantare uppajjati. Tasmā tadubhayavedanāhipi idaṃ yuttaṃ siyāti pasaṅgo
anya-e0301n:194_5: hotīti tappasaṅganivattanatthaṃ idha upekkhāgahaṇaṃ kataṃ. Anaññacittasādhāraṇena
anya-e0301n:194_6: dhammena cittassa niyamanatthaṃ vicikicchāgahaṇaṃ. Uddhaccaṃ pana sabbākusalesu yuttaṃpi
anya-e0301n:194_7: idha laddhokāsaṃ hutvā suṭṭhu balavaṃ hotīti dassanatthaṃ idheva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:194_8: Tenevahi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ dhammuddesavāre uddhaccaṃ aññesu pāpacittesu sarūpato anuddharitvā
anya-e0301n:194_9: yevāpanakabhāveneva vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ antimacitteeva sarūpato uddhaṭanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:194_10: Yasmāca idaṃcittadvayaṃ sattānaṃ pakatisabhāvabhūtanti payogena vā upāyena vā kenaci
anya-e0301n:194_11: uppādetabbaṃ nāma natthi. Sabbakālampi bhavaṅgacittaṃviya anosakkamānaṃ asaṃsīdamānaṃ
anya-e0301n:194_12: akicchena akasirena pavattati. Tasmā ekantena asaṅkhārikameva hotīti katvā idha saṅkhārabhedo
anya-e0301n:194_13: na gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevaca pāḷiyaṃpi purimacittesuviya idha sasaṅkhārenāti
anya-e0301n:196: Imāni dve cittāni atisammuḷhatāya aticañcalatāya ca sabbatthapi rajjanadussanarahitāni honti. Tasmā upekkhā sahagatāneva pavattantīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:197: Rajjana sahitānaṃpi lobhamūla cittānaṃ upekkhā yogassa diṭṭhattāti.
anya-e0301n:199_0: “Tatoyevaca sabhāvatikkhatāya ussāhetabbatāyaca abhāvato saṅkhārabhedopi nesaṃ natthī”ti
anya-e0301n:199_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha sabhāvatikkhatāya abhāvatoti iminā imassa asaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati.
anya-e0301n:199_2: Ussāhetabbatāya abhāvatoti iminā sasaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ paṭikkhipati. Tadubhaye pana
anya-e0301n:199_3: idaṃ cittadvayaṃ sabbaso saṅkhāravimuttaṃ hotīti dasseti. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāyapi tāva na sameti.
anya-e0301n:200_1: Yadica idaṃdvayaṃ saṅkhāramuttaṃ siyā. Evaṃ sati idha mohopi saṅkhāramutto siyā.
anya-e0301n:200_2: Soca avijjāyevāti tividhabhāvova avijjāya tattha vattabbo. Naca vuttoti. Evaṃ tāva
anya-e0301n:201_0: [33] Yasmāca idha tikkhabhāvonāma vinā saṅkhārena kevalaṃ pakati paccaya gaṇa vaseneva
anya-e0301n:201_1: pavattanasamatthatā vuccati. Idañca cittaṃ tatheva pavattati. Tasmā idaṃ sabhāvatikkhaṃ
anya-e0301n:202: Laddhokāsena mohena suṭṭhu muyhantīti mohamūhānīti vattabbe niruttanayena momūhānīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:203_0: 29. Iccevantiādi mahānigamanaṃ. Tattha iccevanti iti evaṃ. Nipātasamudāyo hesa. Pacchimovā
anya-e0301n:203_1: evaṃ saddo purimassa itisaddassa atthavacano. Iccevantivā visuṃ eko nipāto. Sabbathāpi
anya-e0301n:203_2: iminā somanassasahagatantiādinā vuttappakāre nāti attho daṭṭhabbo. Idañca dvādasāti
anya-e0301n:203_3: ettha visesanaṃ veditabbaṃ. Sabbathāpīti dhammasaṅgaṇīyaṃ vuttena pakārenāpi dvādaseva.
anya-e0301n:203_4: Vibhaṅge vibhattena pakārenāpi dvādaseva. Dhātukathādīsu vuttena pakārenāpi dvādaseva.
anya-e0301n:203_5: Tesu tesu suttantesu vuttena pakārenāpi dvādaseva. Kāladesa santānādi bhedabhinnena
anya-e0301n:203_6: pakārenāpi dvādaseva. Kathaṃ dvādasevāti. Iccevaṃ dvādasevāti yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:205: Heṭṭhā vutto sampayogādi ākārova vibhāvito. Sopana iccevanti imināva siddhoti.
anya-e0301n:206_0: Akusalacittānīti kusalapaṭiviruddhasabhāvattā evaṃ laddhanā māni cittāni. Etthaca
anya-e0301n:206_1: ekantena saddhādayoeva kusalānāma. Mohādayoeva akusalā nāma. Cittaṃpana phassādayo
anya-e0301n:206_2: viya aññasamānameva hoti, na hi ārammaṇa vijānanaṃvā ekantena muyhanādiviya sāvajjaṃvā
anya-e0301n:206_3: hoti. Saddahanādiviya anavajjaṃvāti. Taṃpana akusalehi yuttaṃ akusalanti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:206_4: Kusalehi yuttaṃ kusalanti. Saddhādīnaṃpana mohādīnañca paṭiviruddhabhāvo yathākkamaṃ
anya-e0301n:206_5: pahāyakapahātabbabhāvena veditabbo. Akusaladhammāhi dubbalā honti. Suvaṇṇappaṭirūpakāviya
anya-e0301n:206_6: pheggubhūtā abhāvanārahā punappunaṃ āsevīyamānāpi cañcalantiyeva vikkirantiyeva.
anya-e0301n:206_7: Niyāmaṃ okkamantāpi ekasmiṃbhave eva apāyabhāgitāya okkamanti. Napana kusalamūlāni
anya-e0301n:206_8: sabbaso pacchinditvā satte vaṭṭasotaniyate kātuṃ sakkonti. Kusaladhammāpana balavantā
anya-e0301n:206_9: honti. Jātisuvaṇṇāviya sārabhūtā bhāvanārahā punappunaṃ āsevīyamānā thiratarapattā
anya-e0301n:206_10: lokiyesu yāva iddhividhānā lokuttaresuca yāva arahattamaggā vuddhiviruḷhīdhammā honti.
anya-e0301n:206_11: Niyāmaṃ okkamantā apāyasotaṃvā vaṭṭaso taṃvā sabbaso samucchinditvā anupādisesanibbānabhāgitāya
anya-e0301n:206_12: okkamanti. Tasmā kusala dhammāeva pahāyakānāma. Itarepana pahātabbāeva nāmāti veditabbā.
anya-e0301n:206_13: Apica kusaladhammānāma antamaso ālopabhikkhā dānamattāpi lokebhesajjavidhānāniviyaakusalappahānāya
anya-e0301n:206_14: eva paṇḍitehipaññapīyanti karīyanti ca, tasmā teeva pahāyakā. Akusaladhammāpana loke
anya-e0301n:206_15: nānārogajātiyoviya sakalalokassa pakatisabhāvabhūtāeva hontīti te pahātabbāevāti.
anya-e0301n:206_16: Samantato anavasesato ādiyiṃsu gaṇhiyiṃsūti samattāni. Apica samattānīti niṭṭhitāni
anya-e0301n:206_17: paripuṇṇānivā. Aṭṭhadhātiādisaṅgahagāthā. Lobhomūlaṃ etesanti samāso. Dvādasā kusalā
anya-e0301n:206_18: siyunti ettha siyunti nipātapadaṃ idha daṭṭhabbaṃ. Akusala cittāni dvādasa bhavantīti attho.
anya-e0301n:210: 31. Evaṃ sabbanihīnaṃ akusalaṃ saṅgahetvā idāni ahetukaṃ saṅgaṇhanto tatthaca sabbanihīnaṃ akusalavipākaṃ tāva dassetuṃ upekkhāsahagatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:212_0: Taṃ akusala vipākattāyeva akusalānantaraṃ pathamaṃ dassitanti adhippāyena yaṃ vuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:212_1: “tesaṃ akusalavipākā divasena tividhabhāvepi akusalānantaraṃ akusalavipākeyeva vibhajitu”nti. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:213: Evañhi sati kusalavipākānipi kusalā nantareeva vattabbāni siyunti.
anya-e0301n:214_0: 31. Cakkhusotādīnaṃ padattho upari āgamissati. Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Yathāha-vijānāti
anya-e0301n:214_1: vijānātīti kho bhikkhave tasmāviññāṇanti vuccatīti. Cakkhuṃ nissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:214_2: Cakkhunāvā paccayabhūtena janitaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Kammenavā cakkhussa upanītaṃ
anya-e0301n:214_3: viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Cakkhutovā jātaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Cakkhussavā indriyabhāvena
anya-e0301n:214_4: sāmi bhūtassa viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ. Cakkhusmiṃvā uppannaṃviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:215_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave kaṭṭhañca paṭicca aggi jalati. Kaṭṭhaggītveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_1: Sakalikañca paṭicca aggi jalati. Sakali kaggītveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Tiṇañca paṭicca
anya-e0301n:215_2: aggi jalati. Tiṇaggī tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Gomayañca paṭicca aggi jalati. Gomayaggītveva
anya-e0301n:215_3: saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Thusañca paṭicca aggi jalati. Thusaggītveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_4: Saṅkārañca paṭicca aggi jalati. Saṅkāraggītveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati. Evamevakho bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:215_5: cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ. Cakkhuviññāṇanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_6: Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ. Sotaviññāṇanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_7: Ghānañca paṭicca gandheca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ. Ghānaviññāṇanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_8: Jivhañca paṭicca raseca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ. Jivhāviññāṇanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_9: Kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbeca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ. Kāyaviññāṇanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchati.
anya-e0301n:215_10: Manañca paṭicca dhammeca uppajjati viññāṇaṃ. Mano viññāṇanteva saṅkhyaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:216_0: Tathāti iminā upekkhāsahagatanti padaṃ ākaḍḍhati. Dukkhayatīti dukkhaṃ. Sampayuttadhamme
anya-e0301n:216_1: taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃvā bādhati hiṃsatīti attho. Duṭṭhuvā khanati kāyikasukhanti dukkhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:216_2: Dukkarenavā khamitabbanti dukkhaṃ. Dukkaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassātivā dukkhaṃ. Kāyikadukkhavedanāyeva
anya-e0301n:216_3: nāmaṃ. Suṭṭhu paṭimukhañca icchatīti sampaṭicchanaṃ. Suṭṭhūti amuñcamānaṃ. Paṭimukhanti
anya-e0301n:216_4: anaññāpekkhaṃ. Icchatīti kāmeti abhinandati paṭiggaṇhati. Tenevahi bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti
anya-e0301n:216_5: ettha sampaṭicchiṃ sūti vaṇṇayiṃsu. Suṭṭhu tīreti tuleti vicāretīti santīraṇaṃ. Ṭīkāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:216_6: tīreti niṭṭhāpetīti vuttaṃ. Vibhāvaniyaṃ tīreti vīmaṃsatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:217_0: 32. Etthaca cakkhussa asambhinnatā, āloka sannissayappaṭilābho, rūpānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ,
anya-e0301n:217_1: manasikāroti cattāro paccayā cakkhuviññāṇassa uppattikāraṇāni. Sotassa asambhinnatā
anya-e0301n:217_2: ākāsasannissayappaṭilābho, saddānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ manasikāroti sotaviññāṇassa. Ghānassa
anya-e0301n:217_3: asambhinnatā, vāsusannissayappaṭilābho, gandhānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ manasikāroti ghānaviññāṇassa.
anya-e0301n:217_4: Jivhāya asambhinnatā āposannissayappaṭilābho. Rasānaṃ āpātāgamanaṃ, manasikāroti
anya-e0301n:217_5: jivhāviññāṇassa. Kāyassa asambhinnatā, pathavisannissayappaṭilābho, tiṇṇaṃ phoṭṭhabbānaṃ
anya-e0301n:217_6: aññatarassa āpātāgamanaṃ, manasikāroti kāyaviññāṇassāti. Etthaca āloka ākāsādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:217_7: sannissayānaṃ gahaṇaṃ tehi vinā rūpādīnaṃ pasādesu āpātāgamanasseva abhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0301n:217_8: na hi āloke sati rūpāni sannihitānipi cakkhumhi āpātamāgacchanti. Esanayo sesesupīti.
anya-e0301n:218: Cakkhusmiṃpana asambhinnepi bahiddhārūpārammaṇe āpātaṃ anā gacchante cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati. Tasmiṃ pana āpātaṃ āgacchantepi ālokasannissaye asati nuppajjatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:219_0: Taṃ vinā ālokena viññāṇuppattiyā abhāvadassanaparaṃ. Napana āpākāgamanaṃnāma āloke
anya-e0301n:219_1: asatipi sambhavatīti dassanaparanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarathā rattandhakārepi rūpāni cakkhumhi
anya-e0301n:219_2: āpātaṃ āgacchantīti āpajjatīti. Akusalassa vipākāni akusala vipākāni.
anya-e0301n:220_0: 33. Etthā kenaṭṭhena vipākaṃnāmāti. Vipaccanaṭṭhena. Kiñca vipaccananti. Yathā loke
anya-e0301n:220_1: ambaphalādīnaṃ taruṇabhāvaṃ atikkamma pariṇatabhāvappattivipaccananti vuccati. Evamevaṃ
anya-e0301n:220_2: idhapi vipaccanaṃ veditabbanti. Ayañca attho catūhi samaṅgītāhi dīpetabbo. Catassohi
anya-e0301n:220_4: Tattha pubbe taṃ taṃ kammāyūhanakāleyā kusalākusalacetanāya khaṇattayasamaṅgitā.
anya-e0301n:220_5: Ayaṃ cetanāsamaṅgītānāma. Sāpana cetanā nirujjhamānā sabbaso abhāvaṃ patvā nanirujjhati.
anya-e0301n:220_6: Āyatiṃpana vipākapātubhāvāya attano sabbākāraparipūraṃ kriyāvisesaṃ tasmiṃ cittasantāne
anya-e0301n:220_7: nidahitvāva nirujjhati. Soca kriyāviseso yāva okāsaṃ nalabhati. Tāva kappasaṃtasahassaṃpi
anya-e0301n:220_8: taṃsantānaṃ anugatoyeva hoti. Yaṃ sandhāya dhammapade –
anya-e0301n:221: Na hi pāpaṃ kataṃ kammaṃ, sajjukhīraṃva muccati;
anya-e0301n:222: Dahantaṃ bālamanveti, bhasmā channova pāvakoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:223_0: Sopana visuṃ eko paramatthadhammotipi saṅkhyaṃ nagacchati, anusayadhātuyoviyāti.
anya-e0301n:223_1: Ayaṃ kammasamaṅgitānāma. Sopana yadā attano anurūpe paccaye labhati. Tadā vipaccanatthāya
anya-e0301n:223_2: okāsaṃ karoti. Kathaṃ karotīti. So āsannamaraṇassa sattassa attānaṃvā paccupaṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0301n:223_3: Attano nimittaṃvā paccupaṭṭhāpeti. Gatinimittaṃvā paccupaṭṭhāpeti. Soca satto taṃ
anya-e0301n:223_4: amuñcamāno yadi gaṇhāti. Tadā okāsaṃ labhati. Ayaṃ upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitānāma. Taṃ amuñcitvā
anya-e0301n:223_5: cutassapana cutianantarameva so kammasaṅkhāto kriyā viseso visuṃ eko sasampayutto
anya-e0301n:223_6: paramatthadhammarāsi hutvā ekaṃ bhavaṃ pūrayamāno vipaccati, ekaṃ bhavaṃ pūrayamānotica
anya-e0301n:223_7: yāva tāyukaṃ bhavaṅgakiccaṃ chasu dvāresu taṃ taṃ dvārikavipākakiccāni pariyosāne
anya-e0301n:223_8: cutikiccañca sādhayamānoti attho. Tattha purimā tisso samaṅgītā taruṇā vatthānāma
anya-e0301n:223_9: honti. Pacchimā vipākasamaṅgītā pariṇatāvatthānāmāti veditabbā. Iti vipaccantīti
anya-e0301n:223_10: vipākāni mudutaruṇāvatthaṃ atikkamitvā pariṇakāvatthasaṅkhātaṃ vipakkabhāvaṃ āpajjantīti
anya-e0301n:223_11: evamettha attho veditabbo. Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ kusalākusalakammasamuṭṭhānānaṃpi
anya-e0301n:223_12: kaṭattārūpānaṃ vipākapade aggahaṇaṃ hotīti. Tānihi kammasantānato visuṃ siddhattā
anya-e0301n:223_13: visuṃ kammato jātāniyeva nāma honti, navipakkāni nāmāti. Aññaṃhi arūpadhammānaṃ santānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:224_0: Yepana arūpabhāvena sārammaṇabhāvenaca kammena sadisa tāmattaṃ gahetvā arūpadhammānameva
anya-e0301n:224_1: vipākattaṃ sādhenti. Tesaṃ vipākasaddo arūpadhammesu ruḷhīvasena pavattoti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:224_2: Yañca tattha sālibījanibbattesu nāḷapattapupphaphalesu bījasadisānaṃ phalānameva
anya-e0301n:224_3: sāliphalasālipakkanāmaṃ siddhaṃ viyāti upamaṃ dassenti, sāpi nasameti. Na hi phalānipi
anya-e0301n:224_4: taruṇakāle pākanāmaṃ labhanti. Naca nāḷapattapupphānipi pariṇatakāle pākanāmaṃ nalabhantīti.
anya-e0301n:224_5: Tāni pihi tadā nāḷaṃ pakkaṃ, pattaṃ pakkaṃ, pupphaṃ pakkanti na navuccantīti. Sukhayatīti
anya-e0301n:224_6: sukhaṃ, sampayuttadhamme taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃvā laddhasātaṃ karotīti attho.
anya-e0301n:225_0: 34. Suṭṭhuvā khanati kāyikadukkhaṃ. Sukhenaca khamitabbaṃ. Sukaraṃ okāsadānaṃ etassātivā
anya-e0301n:225_1: sukhaṃ. Kusalassa vipākāni sampayutta hetuvirahato ahetukānicāti kusalavipākā hetuka cittāni.
anya-e0301n:227: Pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunāpi idha vipākassa sahetukatāpasaṅgokato. So na sundaro.
anya-e0301n:228_0: Na hi abhidhamme katthaci pubbakammasahajātena nibbattakahetunā vipākassa sahetukāhetukatā
anya-e0301n:228_1: sambhavonāma atthi. Asatica sambhave byabhicārassapi abhāvato so pasaṅgo niratthakovāti.
anya-e0301n:228_2: Tattha byabhicārassāti pasaṅgassa iccevattho. Etthaca akusalavipākānaṃ sayaṃ abyākatadhammattā
anya-e0301n:228_3: lobhādīhi akusalahetūhica sayaṃ akusalavipākattā alobhādīhi anavajjahetūhica sahetukatā
anya-e0301n:228_4: sambhavo natthi. Asati ca taṃ sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo abyabhicāroyeva hotīti
anya-e0301n:228_5: tattha ahetukaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ. Kusalavipākānaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalavipākattāyeva alobhādīhi
anya-e0301n:228_6: kusalā byākatayogīhi anavajjahetūhi sahetukatā sambhavo atthiyeva. Satica tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:228_7: sambhave tesaṃ ahetukabhāvo byabhicārasahito hotīti tattheva ahetukaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:229_0: 35. Cakkhādike pañcadvāre uppannaṃ āvajjanaṃ pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ, tañhi pañcadvāre
anya-e0301n:229_1: ghaṭṭitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjatīti. Bhavaṅgasaṅkhāte manodvāre uppannaṃ
anya-e0301n:229_2: āvajjanaṃ manodvārāvajjanaṃ. Tañhi tasmiṃ āpātaṃ āgacchantaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjantaṃ
anya-e0301n:229_3: pavattatīti. Etthaca manodvāranti sakalaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:231: Tāva “manodvāranti ettha āvajjanassa anantara paccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manoti vuccati. Tadeva dvāraṃ āvajjanajavanādi thicitta pavattiyā mukhattā”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:233: “Āvajjanassa anantara paccayabhūtaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ manodvāraṃ, pīthicittānaṃ pavattimukhabhāvato”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃpi na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:234_0: Yadihi yassa bhavaṅgassa anantaraṃ vīthicittāni pavattanti. Tadeva ekantena tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:234_1: pavattimukhattā manodvāraṃnāma hoti. Na tato purimānīti ayamattho siyā. Evañcasati
anya-e0301n:234_2: yesu cakkhādīsu rūpā dīnaṃ ghaṭṭitattā āvajjanādīni vīthicittāni pavattanti. Tāneva
anya-e0301n:234_3: ekantena tesaṃ pavattimukhattā dvārānināma honti. Na tato aññānīti ayamattho āpajjati.
anya-e0301n:234_4: Naca tāni cakkhādīni nāma atthi. Yāni cakkhādīni dvārarūpānināma na hontīti. Sabbametaṃ
anya-e0301n:234_5: upari dvāra saṅgahe āvibhavissatīti. Hasanaṃ hasitaṃ. Mukhassa pahaṭṭhākārappavatti.
anya-e0301n:234_6: Taṃ uppādeti janetīti hasituppādo. Taṃvā uppādenti khīṇāsavā etenāti hasibhuppādo.
anya-e0301n:234_7: Taṃvā uppajjati etenāti hasituppādo. Soeva cittanti samāso. Khīṇāsavānaṃ anoḷārikesu
