anya-e0301n:234_8: ārammaṇesu yena cittena sitaṃ pātukaronti, tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Na hi khīṇāsavā lokiya
anya-e0301n:234_9: mahā janāviya rajjanīyādi bhāvena oḷārikesu hasaniya vatthūsu hasantīti. Ṭīkāsu pana
anya-e0301n:234_10: cittaṃ apekkhitvā hasituppādanti niddiṭṭhaṃ siyāti. Vuttanayena ahetukānica tāni
anya-e0301n:234_11: vipaccana vipākuppādana kiccarahitattā taṃ taṃ kriyāmattabhūtāni cittānicāti ahetukakriyacittāni.
anya-e0301n:234_12: Etthaca vīthimuttacittāni kiccadubbalattā pañcaviññāṇāni vatthudubbalattā sampaṭicchanādīnica
anya-e0301n:234_13: kiccaṭṭhānadubbalattā attano ussāhena vinā kevalaṃ vipaccanamattena pavattantīti
anya-e0301n:234_14: tāni sabbāni vipākānieva honti. Yānipana balavakiccattā attano ussāhena pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:234_15: Āyatiṃca vipākuppādanatthaṃ ussāhasahitāni honti. Tāni kusalākusalānināma honti.
anya-e0301n:234_16: Yāni pana cittāni vipaccanamattaṃ atikkamma attano ussāheneva pavattanti. Tesu āvajjanadvayaṃ
anya-e0301n:234_17: vipākasantānato laddhapaccayattā thokaṃ dubbalabhāvato itarānica nirānusayasantāne
anya-e0301n:234_18: pavattattā sabbaso vipākuppādanatthaṃ ussāharahitānieva hontīti tāni sabbāni kriyānināma
anya-e0301n:235_0: 36. Idāni ādito paṭṭhāya vedanāvicāraṇā vuccati. Tathāhi cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva
anya-e0301n:235_1: vatthūnica ārammaṇānica upādārūpāneva honti, upādārūpānañca vicupiṇḍakānaṃviya aññamaññasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e0301n:235_2: dubbalamevāti tāni iṭṭhe aniṭṭheca ārammaṇe upekkhā sahagatāneva hontīti. Kāyaviññāṇassapana
anya-e0301n:235_3: ārammaṇāni mahābhūtāni hontīti yathā adhikaraṇimatthake thapitaṃ picupiṇḍakaṃ ayokūṭena
anya-e0301n:235_4: paharantānaṃ ayokūṭassa picupiṇḍakaṃ atikkamma akhikaraṇighaṭṭanaṃ balavataraṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:235_5: Tathā tesaṃ ārammabhūtānaṃ kāyavatthuṃ atikkamma kāyanissaya bhūtesu saṅghaṭṭanaṃ
anya-e0301n:235_6: balavataraṃ. Tasmā kāyaviññāṇaṃ iṭṭhe sukhasahagataṃ aniṭṭhe dukhasahagataṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:235_7: Sampaṭicchanacittaṃpana sabbadubbalānaṃ pañcaviññāṇānaṃ anantaraṃ uppajjatīti niccaṃ
anya-e0301n:235_8: dubbalaṃ hutvā sabbattha upekkhāsahagatamevāti. Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana asamānanissaye
anya-e0301n:235_9: hi tehi laddhapaccayatāvasena ayamattho vibhāvito, santīraṇaṃpana sayaṃpi balavavatthuṃ
anya-e0301n:235_10: nissāya pavattati. Tādisenaca balavavatthunissayena purimacittena laddhapaccayaṃ
anya-e0301n:235_11: hotīti thokaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tasmā taṃ kusalavipākaṃ iṭṭhe upekkhāsahagataṃ abhiiṭṭhe
anya-e0301n:235_12: somanassasahagataṃ hoti. Akusalavipākaṃpana aniṭṭhepi abhianiṭṭhepi upekkhāsahagatameva
anya-e0301n:235_13: hoti. Kasmā itice. Yadihi taṃ atianiṭṭhārammaṇavasena vedanā bhedayuttaṃ siyā. Dukkhenavā
anya-e0301n:235_14: domanassenavā yuttaṃ siyā. Tattha dukkhena tāva na yujjati, kasmā, ekantakāyikattā
anya-e0301n:235_15: dukkhassāti. Domanassenapi na yujjati. Kasmā, paṭighena paṭihaññattāeva domanassabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:235_16: pattā domanassavedanā paṭighena vinā nappavattatīti. Ekantākusalabhūtena paṭighena
anya-e0301n:235_17: niccayogino domanassassa abyākatesu asambhavatoti. Āvajjanadvayaṃpana santīraṇatopi
anya-e0301n:235_18: thokaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Vipākānañhi pavattituṃpi attano ussāhabalaṃnāma natthi. Balavantehipana
anya-e0301n:235_19: kammādipaccayehi jātāni balavantānināma honti. Dubbalehi jātāni dubbalāni nāmāti.
anya-e0301n:235_20: Evaṃ santepi taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kammānubhāvatoca muccitvā vipākasantānatoca paccayaṃ
anya-e0301n:235_21: gahetvā uṭṭhitattā dubbalameva hotīti sadāpi upekkhāsahagatamevāti.
anya-e0301n:237_0: Pañcadvārāvajjanaṃ pubbe kenaci aggahite ārammaṇe ekavā rameva pavattattā manodvārāvajjanañca
anya-e0301n:237_2: anubhavituṃ nasakkotīti sabbatthapi majjhatta vedanāyuttamevāti vuttaṃ. Tattha byāpārantarasāpekkhattāti idaṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:238_0: Na hi cittānaṃ balavadubbalatāvisesoattanopacchā pavattassa cittassa vasena sakkā
anya-e0301n:238_1: vattuṃ. Attanopana paccayehieva so sakkā vattunti. Itarathā santīraṇassapi byāpārantarasāpekkhatā
anya-e0301n:238_2: siyā. Taṃpi hi visadisacittasantānaṃ attanāparaṃ vatteti yevāti.
anya-e0301n:239: 37. Imāni cittāni attano pakati paccayagaṇasamāyoge sati nuppajjantīti natthi. Tasmā asaṅkhārikānevāti vadanti. Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana vipākuddhāre –
anya-e0301n:240_0: Ahetukavipākānaṃ aparibyattakiccattā sasaṅkhārika kamma viruddho asaṅkhārikabhāvopi
anya-e0301n:240_1: natthi. Asaṅkhārikakammaviruddho sasaṅkhārikakāvopi natthi. Tasmā tesaṃ ubhayakammenapi
anya-e0301n:241_0: Etena tiṇṇaṃ kriyacittānaṃpi tadubhayabhāvābhāvo vutto hoti. Tānipihi aparibyattakiccāniyevāti.
anya-e0301n:241_1: Athavā. Rūpadassa na saddassavanādīni sattā kadāci attano icchāya karonti. Kadāci
anya-e0301n:241_2: parehi ussāhitā karontīti paccakkhatova siddhametaṃ. Tattha yadā attano icchāya karonti.
anya-e0301n:241_3: Tadā pañcadvārāvajjanādīni sabbāni vīthicittāni asaṅkhārikānināma honti. Yadā parehi
anya-e0301n:241_4: ussāhitā karonti. Tadā sasaṅkhārikānināma honti. Dvāra vimuttesupana dvīsu upekkhāsantīraṇesu
anya-e0301n:241_5: aṭṭhamahāvipākesuviya vattabbo. Iti sabbāni ahetukacittāni tena pariyāyena saṅkhārabhedena
anya-e0301n:241_6: paccekaṃ bhinnānieva honti. Evaṃ santepi apari byattakiccattāyeva tesaṃ saṅkhārabhedo
anya-e0301n:242_0: 38. Yasmāpana hetuyonāma mahantadhammā honti. Tasmā te dubbalakammanibbattesu dubbalavatthukiccaṭṭhānesuca
anya-e0301n:242_1: imesu cittesu nuppajjanti. Tattha sabbaṃ pāpakammaṃ vikkhepayuttaṃ sayaṃpi cañcalati
anya-e0301n:242_2: dubbalaṃ hoti. Tasmā taṃ kappaṭṭhitikaṃpi samānaṃ kālantare hetuyuttaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ
anya-e0301n:242_3: nasakkoti. Tihetukakammaṃpi samānaṃ dubbalesu cakkhādivatthūsuca dassanādīsu kiccaṭṭhānesuca
anya-e0301n:242_4: hetuyuttaṃ vipākaṃ janetuṃ nasakkoti. Āvajjanahasanakiccā nica dubbalakiccānieva
anya-e0301n:242_5: honti. Tasmā imāni sabbāni sampayuttaheturahitāni jātānīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:243: 39. Sabbathāpīti padassa attho heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:245: Sabbathāpīti akusalavipāka kusalavipāka kriyabhede nāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:246_0: Sohi bhedo iccevanti imināva gahitoti. Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ akusalavipākāni vatthukiccabhedena
anya-e0301n:246_1: satta, puññapākāni vatthukiccavedanābhedena aṭṭhadhā, kriyacittāni kiccadvārabhedena
anya-e0301n:246_2: tīṇīti ahetukacittāni aṭṭhārasa hontīti yojanā. Etthaca puññapākesu vedanābhedopi
anya-e0301n:246_3: vattabbo. Itarathā santīraṇassa abhedo siyā. Tathā kriyāsu dvārabhedopi vattabbo.
anya-e0301n:246_4: Aññathā āvajjanassa abhedo siyāti. Ṭīkāsupana so na vuttoti.
anya-e0301n:248_0: 40. Idāni heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ cittānaṃ asobhaṇanāmaṃ upari vuccamānānañca sobhaṇanāmaṃ
anya-e0301n:248_1: thapento gāthamāha. Upari vuccamānānañhi sobhaṇatte vutte heṭṭhā vuttānaṃ asobhaṇatā
anya-e0301n:248_2: avuttāpi siddhā hotīti. Tattha pāpāhetukamuttānīti pāpehi ahetukehica muttāni ekūnasaṭṭhicittāni.
anya-e0301n:248_3: Athavā. Ekanavuticittānipi sobhaṇānīti vuccare vuccantīti yojanā. Tattha pāpehīti
anya-e0301n:248_4: akusalehi. Akusalānihi attasamaṅgino satte anicchanteyeva apāyaṃ pāpenti. Tasmā pāpānīti
anya-e0301n:248_5: vuccanti. Etena puññānaṃpi sugatipāpanaṭṭhena pāpatā pasaṅgo nivattito hoti. Na hi
anya-e0301n:248_6: icchantānaṃ pāpane pāpanabyāpāro pākaṭo hotīti. Lāmakaṭṭhenavā tāniyeva pāpānīti
anya-e0301n:248_7: vuccantīti. Sobhaṇehi saddhādiguṇadhammehi yuttiyā tatoyeva ca sayaṃpi sobhaggapattiyā sobhaṇānīti.
anya-e0301n:249_0: 41. Idāni tāni sobhaṇāni hīna paṇītā nukkamena dassento somanassasahagatantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:249_1: Tattha jānātīti ñāṇaṃ, yāthāvato paṭivijjhatīti attho. Ñāṇena sampayuttaṃ vippayuttanti
anya-e0301n:249_2: samāso. Natthi saṅkhāro assāti asaṅkhāro. Saṃvijjati saṅkhāro assāti sasaṅkhāro.
anya-e0301n:249_3: Sappurisupanissa yādiko kusaluppattiyā pakatipaccayagaṇo. Sohi yadā duvidhena saṅkhārena
anya-e0301n:249_4: vinā kevalaṃ attano balena kusalacittaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tadā asaṅkhāronāma. Soyeva
anya-e0301n:249_5: yadā attano balena kusalacittaṃ samuṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti. Saṅkhārasahāyaṃ labhitvāva
anya-e0301n:249_6: taṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Tadā sasaṅkhāronāma. Asaṅkhārena uppannaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ. Sasaṅkhārena
anya-e0301n:249_7: uppannaṃ sasaṅkhārikanti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Etthaca somanassādīnaṃ uppattikāraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:249_8: heṭṭhā vuttameva. Apica saddhāsampatti dassanasampatti deyyadhamma paṭiggāhaka sampattīti
anya-e0301n:249_9: evamādi somanassakāraṇaṃ, tabbiparītaṃ upekkhākāraṇaṃ. Yānica pītisambojjhaṅgassa
anya-e0301n:249_10: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassaca kāraṇāniaṭṭhakathāsu vuttāni. Tānipi imasmiṃ ṭhāne vattabbānīti.
anya-e0301n:249_11: Paññā saṃvattanika kammupanissayatā, abyāpajjalokupapattitā indriyaparipākatā, kilesadūratāca
anya-e0301n:249_14: vuttāni. Tānipi idha vattabbāni. Tabbiparītaṃ ñāṇavippayuttakāraṇaṃ. Saṅkhārakāraṇaṃpi
anya-e0301n:249_15: pubbe vuttameva. Yānica vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa passaddhisambojjhaṅgassaca kāraṇāni
anya-e0301n:249_16: aṭṭhakathāsu vuttāni. Tānipi idha vattabbānīti. Imesaṃpi uppatti vidhānaṃ visuddhimagge gahetabbanti.
anya-e0301n:250_0: 42. Aṭṭhapīti ettha pisaddo sampiṇḍanattho. Tena imesaṃ idha vuttappakārato aññehi
anya-e0301n:250_1: pakārehi anekavidhataṃ sampiṇḍeti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo. Imāni aṭṭhacittāni dasahi puññakriyāvatthūhi
anya-e0301n:250_2: guṇitāni asīti honti. Puna tāni chahi ārammaṇehi guṇitāni cattārisatāniceva asīti
anya-e0301n:250_3: ca honti. Puna tāni tīhi kammehi guṇitāni sahassaṃ cattāri satāni cattālīsaṃca honti.
anya-e0301n:250_4: Puna tāni tīhi hīnamajjhimapaṇītehi guṇitāni cattāri sahassāni tīṇi satāni vīsatica
anya-e0301n:250_5: honti. Tāni imāni suddhikānīti katvā dvīsu ṭhānesu thapetabbāni. Tato ekaṃ ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:250_6: gahetvā dvidhā karontassa ñāṇasampayuttāni dvesahassāni sataṃ saṭṭhica honti. Tathā
anya-e0301n:250_7: ñāṇavippayuttānīti. Puna tattha ñāṇasampayuttāni catūhi adhipatīhi guṇitāni aṭṭhasahassāni
anya-e0301n:250_8: chasatāni cattālīsaṃca honti. Ñāṇavippayuttānipana vīmaṃsāvajjitehi tīhi adhipatīhi
anya-e0301n:250_9: guṇitāni chasahassāni cattārisatāni asītica honti. Puna tadubhayāni sampiṇḍitāni
anya-e0301n:250_10: dasasahassaṃ pañcasahassāni sataṃ vīsatica honti. Puna tāni pubbe visuṃ thapitehi
anya-e0301n:250_11: suddhikehi sampiṇḍitāni dasasahassaṃ navasahassāni cattāri satāni cattālīsañca hontīti.
anya-e0301n:250_12: Yaṃpana ṭīkāyaṃ idha vuttanayena suddhikānica ñāṇavippayuttāni ca visuṃ akatvā sabbāni
anya-e0301n:250_13: puññakriyādīhi samaṃ guṇitāni sattarasa sahassāni dve satāni asītica hontīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:252: Suddhikāni visuṃ akatvā ñāṇavippayuttānieva visuṃ katvā tathā guṇitāni vīsa satādhika pannarasa sahassāni hontīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sabbaṃ na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:253_0: Evañhi sati imāni kāmāvacarakusalāni niccaṃ sādhipatikāni hutvā niyatādhipatikānināma
anya-e0301n:253_1: bhaveyyuṃ. Naca imāni upari mahaggata kusalāni viya lokuttarāni viya ca niyatā dhipatikāni
anya-e0301n:253_2: hontīti. Ṭīkānayenapana ñāṇavippayuttānipi vīmaṃsāsahagatānīti āpajjatīti. Yathāvā
anya-e0301n:253_4: pavattena upanissayañāṇena sambhūtattā kusalāni eva nāma honti. Evamidhapi tāni teneva
anya-e0301n:253_5: vīmaṃsādhipatibhūtena sambhūtattā vīmaṃsādhipateyyānipi nāma hontīti na nasakkā vattunti
anya-e0301n:253_6: iminā adhippāyena tāni visuṃ akatāni siyunti. Evaṃsantepi kāmakusalānināma adhipativimuttāni
anya-e0301n:253_7: eva bahutarāni honti. Tasmā nasakkā sabbāni kāmakusalāni vīmaṃsādhipatimūlikāni bhavitunti.
anya-e0301n:254_0: 43. Kāmāvacarānica tāni kusalāni cittānicāti viggaho. Tattha kenaṭṭhena kusalānīti.
anya-e0301n:254_1: Ārogyaṭṭhena, sundaraṭṭhena, chekaṭṭhena, anavajjaṭṭena, sukhavipākaṭṭhenacāti. Rāgādayohi
anya-e0301n:254_2: dhammā cittasantānassa rujjanaṭṭhena rogānāma. Ahitaṭṭhena asundarā nāma. Anipuṇaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:254_3: achekānāma. Gārayhaṭṭhena vajjānāma. Aniṭṭha vipākaṭṭhena dukkhavipākānāma honti.
anya-e0301n:254_4: Imānipana tehi vuṭṭhitattā kusalānināma arogāni nāmāti attho. Tappaṭipakkhattāca
anya-e0301n:254_5: sundarāni chekāni anavajjāni sukhavipākāni ca nāma hontīti. Kucchite pāpadhamme salayanti
anya-e0301n:254_6: cālenti kampenti viddhaṃsentīti kusalāni. Kucchitenavā ākārena sattasantāne senti
anya-e0301n:254_7: anusentīti kusā. Rāgādayo. Te lunanti chindantīti kusalāni. Kusaṃvā vuccati ñāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:254_8: kucchitānaṃ sānaṭṭhena tanukaraṇaṭṭhena antakaraṇaṭṭhenavā. Kusena lātabbānīti kusalāni.
anya-e0301n:254_9: Kusāviya hatthappadesaṃ saṃkilesapakkhaṃ lunantītivā kusalāni. Apica, kucchite pāpadhamme
anya-e0301n:254_10: saranti hiṃsantīti kusalāni. Rakārassa lakāro. Kosallasambhūtaṭṭhenavā kusalānīti.
anya-e0301n:255_0: 44. Mahāvipākesu padatthato vattabbaṃ natthi. Vedanābhedo ārammaṇavasena vattabbo.
anya-e0301n:255_1: Tānihi atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe yathākkamaṃ somanassena upekkhāya ca yuttānīti.
anya-e0301n:255_2: Sampayogabhedo kammavasena javanavasenaca vattabbo. Tānihi balavakammena janitāni
anya-e0301n:255_3: ñāṇasampayuttāni honti. Dubbalakammena janitāni ñāṇavippayuttāni. Kadācipana tadārammaṇavasena
anya-e0301n:255_4: pavattikāle yebhuyyena tihetukajavanānubandhāni ñāṇasampayuttāni honti. Itarajavanānubandhāni
anya-e0301n:255_5: ñāṇavippayuttānīti. Saṅkhārabhedopi kehici ācariyehi kammavaseneva kathito. Asaṅkhārikakammajanitāni
anya-e0301n:255_7: vutto. Tānihi paṭisandhiyaṃ purimabhave maraṇāsannakāle ñātakādīhi tena tena payogena
anya-e0301n:255_8: upaṭṭhāpitāni kammādīni ārammaṇāni gahetvā pavattāni sasaṅkhārikānināma honti. Tādisena
anya-e0301n:255_9: payogena vinā sayameva kammabalena upaṭṭhitāni gahetvā pavattāni asaṅkhārikānināma
anya-e0301n:255_10: honti. Tadārammaṇa kālepana asaṅkhārikajavanānubandhāni asaṅkhārikānināma. Sasaṅkhārika
anya-e0301n:255_11: javanānubandhāni sasaṅkhārikāni nāmāti. Etthapi sampiṇḍanattho visaddo. Tena ārammaṇachakka
anya-e0301n:255_12: hīnattikavaseneva kāladesa santānādivasenaca tesaṃ anekabhedattaṃ sampiṇḍeti. Yasmā
anya-e0301n:255_13: panetāni dānādivasena kāyakammādivasena chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā ca na pavattanti.
anya-e0301n:255_14: Tasmā tāni puññakriyāvatthūnaṃ kammādhipatīnañca vasena vaḍḍhanaṃ nalabhantīti.
anya-e0301n:257: Imāni viññattisamuṭṭhāpanābhāvato kammadvāra vasena na pavattanti. Avipākasabhāvatoca kammavasena napavattantīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ vicāretabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:258_0: Heṭṭhāhi kusalesu kammattikavaseneva vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Napana visuṃ kammadvāravasena.
anya-e0301n:258_1: Kammattikañcanāma tividha kammadvāra vaseneva siddhanti. Nanu aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yohi
anya-e0301n:258_2: kāmāvacarakusalesu kammadvāra kammapatha puññakriyāvatthubhedo vutto. So idha natthi.
anya-e0301n:258_3: Kasmā. Aviññattijanakato avipāka dhammato tathā appavattiyācāti vuttanti. Saccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:258_4: Tattha pana aviññattijanakato kammadvāra bhedo idha natthīti etena kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ
anya-e0301n:258_5: manokammanti evaṃ bhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati. Avipākadhammato kammapathabhedo idha natthīti
anya-e0301n:258_6: etena dasavidhassa kammapathabhedassa abhāvaṃ vadati. Idhapana kusalesupi kammapathabhedaṃ
anya-e0301n:258_7: aggahetvā tividhakammadvāra bhedabhinnaṃ kammattikameva gahitaṃ. Tañca viññatti samuṭṭhāpanā
anya-e0301n:258_8: bhāvato tividhakammadvāravasena napavattantīti imināva siddhaṃ. Yadica heṭṭhā kusalesupi
anya-e0301n:258_9: dasavidhakammapathabhedavasena visuṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ vuttaṃ siyā. Evaṃsati idhapi avipākasabhāvato
anya-e0301n:259_0: 45. Mahākriyacittesupi mahāvipākesuviya ārammaṇa vaseneva vedenābhedo upari sayameva
anya-e0301n:259_1: vakkhati. Ñāṇasampayutta, vippayutta, asaṅkhārika, sasaṅkhārikabhedopana yathārahaṃ
anya-e0301n:261: Tathā avicāretvā kriyacittānaṃpi kusale vuttanayena yathārahaṃ somanassa sahagatāditā veditabbāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:262_0: Iccevaṃ sabbathāpīti padānaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Sahetuka kāmāvacara kusala vipāka
anya-e0301n:262_1: kriya cittānīti ettha sahetu kaggahaṇaṃ kusala sadda sambandhe bhūtakathana visesanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:262_2: Tenevahi taṃ kusalacittānaṃ cūḷanigamena gahitaṃ. Vipāka kriya saddasambandhepana
anya-e0301n:264_0: Sakkharakathalikaṃpi macchagumbaṃpi tiṭṭhantaṃpi carantaṃpi passatīti suttapade viya
anya-e0301n:264_1: idha yathālābha yojanāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sameti. Tatthahi sakkharakathalikaṃnāma nacaratīti
anya-e0301n:264_2: yuttaṃ. Idhapana kusalaṃ sahetukaṃ nahotīti nayuttametanti.
anya-e0301n:265_0: 46. Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ vedanā ñāṇa saṅkhāra bhedenāti vedanābhedena, ñāṇabhedena, saṅkhārabhedenaca.
anya-e0301n:265_1: Tattha vedanā bhedenāti vedanābhedasiddhena cittabhedena, ñāṇabhedenāti ñāṇayogā
anya-e0301n:265_2: yogasiddhenacittabhedena. Saṅkhārabhedenāti saṅkhārena vinā sahaca pavattapaccayagaṇabhedasiddhena
anya-e0301n:265_3: cittabhedenāti attho. Idañhi samāsapadānaṃ sāmatthiyaṃ, yadidaṃ suviññātānaṃ nānāppakārānaṃ
anya-e0301n:267: Sayaṃ abhinnānaṃ ñāṇasaṅkhārānaṃ bhedavacane cittassa bhedakara bhāve ca codanāya anokāsatā sādhitā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:268: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā. Sahetu kāmāvacara puññapākakriyā vedanāñāṇasaṅkhārabhedena yathākkamaṃ chaca dvādasaca catuvīsati ca matāti. Etthaca –
anya-e0301n:271: Vattabbā. Evañhi sati atthagatica visadā hoti. Upari vakkha, mānāhica saṅgahagāthāhi saddhiṃ sametīti.
anya-e0301n:272_0: 47. Kāmetiādi sabbesaṃ kāmacittānaṃ saṅgahagāthā. Tattha kāme kāmabhūmiyaṃ pākāni
anya-e0301n:272_1: sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni vipākacittāni tevīsa. Puññāpuññāni kusalākusalacittānica
anya-e0301n:272_2: vīsati. Kriyāca sahetukāhetukavasena sabbāni kriyacittāni pana ekādasa honti. Iccevaṃ
anya-e0301n:272_3: sabbathāpi catuppaññāsa hontīti yojanā. Sabbathāti cettha visaddo lutta niddiṭṭho.
anya-e0301n:272_4: Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ vuttena sabbappakārenapi catuppaññāsaeva. Vibhaṅge vibhattena sabbappakārenapi
anya-e0301n:272_5: catuppaññāsa evātiādinā tassa attho heṭṭhā vuttoyevāti.
anya-e0301n:274: Idha vuttānaṃ kusalādīnaṃ antogadhabhedavasena tassa atthavibhāvanā paṭisiddhā hoti.
anya-e0301n:277_0: Bhavasaddo hi kusalākusalakammesu kammanibbattesuca vipāka kaṭattārūpesu vattamāno
anya-e0301n:277_1: abhidhamme diṭṭho. Na tadaññesu nāmarūpadhammesūthi. Bhūmipariyāyoca idha kāmasaddo.
anya-e0301n:277_2: Bhūmītica sahokāso indriyā nindriyabaddhadhammasamūho vuccatīti kāme kāmabhūmiyanti
anya-e0301n:277_3: ayamattho daṭṭhabbo. Bhavotivā bhūmieva vuccati suttantapariyāyena bhavanti ettha
anya-e0301n:281_0: 48. Evaṃ kāmacittasaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni yathānuppattaṃ rūpacittasaṅgahaṃ dassento
anya-e0301n:281_2: ekaggatācāti dvando. Tāhi sahitanti samāso. Vitakkavicārapītisukhe kaggatā saṅkhātenasamuditenapathamajjhānena
anya-e0301n:281_4: jhānanti. Ādito paṭipajjitabbattā pathamaṃ. Kasiṇādikassa ārammaṇassa aniccādilakkhaṇassaca
anya-e0301n:281_5: upanijjhāyanato paccanīkadhammānañca jhāpanato dayhanato jhānaṃ. Imesu dvīsu atthesu
anya-e0301n:281_6: ekaggatāeva sāti sayayuttāti daṭṭhabbā. Sāhi ekattārammaṇasaṅkhāto eko aggokoṭikoṭṭhāsovā
anya-e0301n:281_7: assāti atthena ekaggasaṅkhātassa cittassa tathāpavattane ādhipaccaguṇayogena ekaggatāti
anya-e0301n:281_8: ca vuccati. Sāyeva cittaṃ nānārammaṇesu vikkhipituṃ adatvā ekasmiṃ yevārammaṇe paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:281_9: dūrībhāvena sammāca ādhiyati thapeti. Indriyānañca samabhāvaṃ katvā tattheva līnuddhaccābhāvāpādanena
anya-e0301n:281_10: samañca ādhiyati thapetīti atthena samādhītica vuccati. Sāyevaca pāḷiyaṃ avikkhepo
anya-e0301n:281_11: avisāhāro saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti niddiṭṭhāti. Vitakkādayopi pana tassā sātisayaṃ upakārakattā
anya-e0301n:281_12: jhānanteva vuttā. Tathā hi vitakko tāva cittaṃ thinamiddhavasena osakkituṃ adatvā
anya-e0301n:281_13: daḷhaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhameva karoti. Ārammaṇābhiniropana lakkhaṇohi vitakko. Thina
anya-e0301n:281_14: middhanīvaraṇassaca ujuppaṭipakkhoti. Vicāroca naṃ vicikicchāvasena saṃsappituṃ adatvā
anya-e0301n:281_15: daḷhaṃ ārammaṇānubandhameva karoti. Ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo hi vicāro paññāpakatiko.
anya-e0301n:281_16: Vicikicchānīvaraṇassaca ujuppaṭipakkhoti. Pītica cittaṃ byāpādavasena ukkaṇṭhituṃ
anya-e0301n:281_17: adatvā ārammaṇe parituṭṭhameva karoti. Ārammaṇasaṃpi yāyanalakkhaṇā hi pīti. Byāpādanīvaraṇassaca
anya-e0301n:281_18: ujuppaṭipakkhāti. Tathā sukhañca naṃ uddhacca kukkuccavasena avūpasamituṃ adatvā
anya-e0301n:281_19: ārammaṇe laddhasātaṃ upabrūhitaṃ karoti. Sākalakkhaṇañhi sukhaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccanīvaraṇassaca ujuppaṭipakkhanti.
anya-e0301n:282_0: Upekkhāca santasabhāvattā sukheeva saṅgahitāti. Evaṃ karontāca te dhammā tasmiṃ ārammaṇe
anya-e0301n:282_1: tassa cittassa suṭṭhu ekaggabhāvatthāyaca honti. Ekaggabhāvotica ekaggatāyeva. Sāca
anya-e0301n:282_2: ekaggatā tehi dhammehi tathā anuggahitā suṭṭhu balavatī hutvā sayaṃ kāmacchandavasena
anya-e0301n:282_3: nānārammaṇesu cittavidhāvanaṃ nīvāretvā kasiṇanimittādike tasmiṃ ārammaṇe niccalaṃ
anya-e0301n:282_4: ṭhatvā taṃārammaṇaṃ upagantvā nijjhāyati oloketi. Tasmā te sabbepi dhammā upanijjhāyanaṭṭhenapi
anya-e0301n:282_5: jhānanti vuttāti. Tesuca tathā pavattamānesu tappaccanīkā nīvaraṇadhammā okāsaṃ alabhitvā
anya-e0301n:282_6: manasmiṃpi pariyuṭṭhituṃ nasakkonti. Jhāpitānāma honti. Tasmā te paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhenapi
anya-e0301n:282_7: jhānanti vuttāti. Evaṃ santepi yasmā jhāna magga sambodhisaṅkhātesu tīsu ṭhānesu
anya-e0301n:282_8: dhammasāmaggī padhānaṃ hoti. Aṅgānaṃ samaggabhāveeva appanāpattivasena upanijjhāya
anya-e0301n:282_9: nādi kiccasaṃsiddhito. Yasmāca ete dhammā vuttanayena visuṃvisuṃ attano kiccaṃ karontāpi
anya-e0301n:282_10: cittassa ārammaṇe niccalappavatti saṅkhātaṃ ekameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ sādhenti. Tasmā
anya-e0301n:282_11: rathaṅgānaṃ samudāyeeva rathavohāroviya tesaṃ samudāyeeva jhāna vohāro siddhoti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:282_12: Aparepana pañcannaṃpi tesaṃ ārammaṇābhiniropanādīni yathāsakaṃ kiccāniyeva visuṃ
anya-e0301n:282_13: visuṃ upanijjhānakiccānināma hontīti paṭṭhāne jhānapaccayaṃ patvā sabbepete visuṃ
anya-e0301n:282_14: visuṃ jhānapaccayaṃ sādhentiyeva. Tasmā te visuṃ visuṃpi jhānāniyeva hontīti sakkā
anya-e0301n:282_15: vattuṃ. Yathāca pañcaṅgikaṃ sīlaṃ dasaṅgikaṃ sīlanti ettha pañcasamuditādīni tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:282_16: sīlānaṃ pañcaṅgikā dināmalābhasseva kāraṇāni honti. Na sīlabhāvassa. Na hi pāṇātipātā
anya-e0301n:282_17: veramaṇādikaṃ ekaṃpi samānaṃ sīlaṃnāma na hotīti. Evamevaṃ idhapi pañcasamuditādīni
anya-e0301n:282_18: pañcaṅgikādi bhāvasseva pathamajjhānādi bhāvassevaca kāraṇāni. Napana jhānabhāvassāti
anya-e0301n:282_19: nasakkā viññātuṃ. Itarathā jhānapaccaye jhānaṅgāni paccaniyāniyeva siyuntipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n:282_20: Ettāvatā satipi imassa cittassa phassādīhipi sahitabhāve tesaṃ tathāvidhakiccavisesābhāvā
anya-e0301n:282_21: idha aggahaṇantipi siddhaṃ nahotīti. Vicārapītisukhekaggatā saṅkhātena dutīyajjhānena
anya-e0301n:282_22: sampayuttaṃ kusalacittaṃ dutīyajjhāna kusalacittaṃ, evaṃ sesesupi.
anya-e0301n:283_0: 49. Ettha siyā. Kenapana imesaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhedo katoti. Puggalajjhāsayena katoti.
anya-e0301n:283_1: Yohi vitakkasahāyo hutvā pañcaṅgikaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ uppādetvā tattha vasībhāvaṃ katvā
anya-e0301n:283_2: punavitakke nibbindati. Tassa vitakkaṃ samatikkamitvā avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:283_3: adhigantuṃ ajjhāsayo saṇṭhāti. Tadā so tameva pathamajjhānaṃ pādakabhāvatthāya daḷhaṃ
anya-e0301n:283_4: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tena ajjhāsayena saheva punabhāvanaṃ anuyuñjanto avitakkaṃ
anya-e0301n:283_5: caturaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ adhigacchati. Tattha sā bhāvanāsayaṃ vitakkayuttāpi tena ajjhāsayena
anya-e0301n:283_6: paribhāvitattā vitakkavirāga bhāvanānāma hoti. Tassā bhāvanāya. Balena taṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:283_7: uppajja mānaṃ avitakkaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ uppajjati. Sesajjhānādhigamesupi esevanayoti.
anya-e0301n:283_8: Evaṃ puggalajjhāsayena tesaṃ jhānānaṃ aṅgabhedo katoti veditabbo. Etthaca uttaruttarajjhānā
anya-e0301n:283_9: dhigamane pādakabhāvatthāya purimapurimajjhānassa samāpajjanaṃ avassaṃ icchitabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:283_10: Heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ paguṇajjhānaṃ uparimassa uparimassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:283_11: vuttaṃ. Ajjhāsayabalenapana uttarajjhānaṃ uppajjamānaṃ pādakajjhānasadisaṃ nahoti.
anya-e0301n:283_12: Pādakajjhānatohi puggalajjhāsayova balavataro. Tenāha bhagavā ijjhati bhikkhave sīlavato
anya-e0301n:283_13: cetopaṇidhi visuddhattāti. Ayañca attho upari lokuttaracittaṃ patvā āvi bhavissatīti.
anya-e0301n:284_0: 50. Ettha siyā. Kasmā idha saṅkhārabhedo navuttoti. Pāḷiyameva avuttattā. Kasmāca
anya-e0301n:284_1: so pāḷiyaṃ avuttoti. Paṭipadā bhedavacaneneva siddhattāti. Tathāhi sabbesaṃpi lokiya
anya-e0301n:284_2: lokuttarajjhānānaṃ sukhappaṭipadabhāve siddhe asaṅkhārikabhāvo siddhoyeva hoti. Dukkhappaṭipadabhāveca
anya-e0301n:284_3: siddhe tesaṃ sasaṅkhārikabhāvo siddhoyeva hotīti. Kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce. Aṭṭhakathādassanato.
anya-e0301n:285_0: Yo ādito kilese vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti.
anya-e0301n:285_1: Tassa dukkhā paṭipadā hoti. Yo kilese vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti.
anya-e0301n:286_0: Tathā sammohavinodanī visuddhimaggesupīti. Etthaca pubbavākye dukkhena sasaṅkhārena
anya-e0301n:286_1: sappayogenāti diṭṭhattā paravākyepi sukhe na asaṅkhārena appayogenāti diṭṭhameva
anya-e0301n:286_2: hoti. Tattha sasaṅkhārena sappayogenāti saṅkhārappayogasahitena kāmādīnavadassanādinā
anya-e0301n:286_3: paccayagaṇenāti attho. Etena sabbesaṃ dukkhappaṭipadajjhānānaṃ sasaṅkhārikabhāvo
anya-e0301n:286_4: vutto hoti. Asaṅkhārena appayogenāti saṅkhārappayogarahitena teneva paccayagaṇena.
anya-e0301n:286_5: Etena sabbesaṃ sukhappaṭipadajjhānānaṃ asaṅkhārikabhāvo vutto hotīti. Khippābhiññajjhānānaṃpihi
anya-e0301n:286_6: dukkhappaṭipadabhāve sati sasaṅkhārikatāva viññāyati. Dandhabhiññajjhānānaṃpi sukhappaṭipadabhāve
anya-e0301n:286_7: sati asaṅkhārikatāva viññāyatīti. Yadievaṃ paṭipadārahitānaṃ magga siddhaupapattisiddhajjhānānaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_8: kathaṃ saṅkhārabhedo siddhoti. Tesaṃpi vaḷañjanakāle samāpattippaṭibandhakānaṃ paccayānaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_9: sannihitā sannihitavasena dukkhasukhappaṭipadabhāvasambhavo hotiyevāti. Tattha maggasiddhajjhānaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:286_10: suddhavipassanāyānikānaṃ maggappaṭilābhena saheva siddhajjhānaṃ. Taṃ duvidhaṃ heṭṭhimamaggasiddhaṃ,
anya-e0301n:286_11: arahattamaggasiddhanti. Tattha mahāsamayasutte āgatānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_12: heṭṭhima maggasiddhaṃ. Ānandattherassa jhānaṃ arahattamaggasiddhaṃ. Yaṃpi anāgāmīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_13: ajānantānaññeva satthena hanitvā sahasā marantānaṃ uppannaṃ. Taṃpi maggasiddhagatikaṃ.
anya-e0301n:286_14: Yopana aṭṭhasamāpattiyo bhāvetvā aññatarasmiṃ rūpi brahmaloke nibbatti. Tassa tā
anya-e0301n:286_15: samāpatti yo tattha pākatikāeva honti. Idaṃ upapattisiddhanti. Ekasmiṃ bhavepi hi
anya-e0301n:286_17: Jhānuppattippaṭipadā rahitattāvā asaṅkhārikajjhānesu tesaṃ saṅgaho yutto siyāti.
anya-e0301n:286_18: Apica, nettipāḷiyaṃ sabbesaṃ lokiya lokuttarasamādhīnaṃ saṅkhārabhedo sarūpatova
anya-e0301n:286_19: niddiṭṭho. Yathāha-dve samādhayo sasaṅkhāro samādhi asaṅkhāro samādhīti. Aṭṭhakathāyañca
anya-e0301n:286_21: dukkhappaṭipadā pubbakānaṃ dvinnaṃ sasaṅkhārabhāvoca vuttoti. Ettāvatā sabbesaṃ mahaggatalokuttarajjhānacittānaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_22: asaṅkhārika sasaṅkhārikavasena visuṃ visuṃ duvidhabhāvo siddho hoti. Yasmāpana ayaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_23: saṅkhāravohāro akusalānaṃpi sādhāraṇo. Paṭipadāvohāropana visesena paṭipattidhammesveva
anya-e0301n:286_24: pākaṭo. Mahaggata lokuttaradhammāca ekantaṃ paṭipattidhammāeva. Tasmā tesaṃ bhedaṃ
anya-e0301n:286_25: saṅkhāravasena avatvā paṭipadāvaseneva dhammasaṅgaṇi pāḷiyaṃpi vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:288_1: anuppajjanato asaṅkhārikantipi. Adhikārenaca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkāravaseneva
anya-e0301n:288_2: anuppajjanato sasaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattu”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha parikammasaṅkhāta.La.
anya-e0301n:288_3: Asaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattunti idaṃ tāva nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:289_0: Na hi parikammasaṅkhāta pubbābhisaṅkhāro imasmiṃ saṅkhārabhede saṅkhāro evanāma hoti.
anya-e0301n:289_1: Kasmā, jhānuppattiyā pakatipaccaya bhūtattā, tathāhi loke sāsaneca sabbaṃpi kusalākusala
anya-e0301n:289_2: kammaṃ attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhāta pubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā uppannaṃnāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:289_3: Antamaso ālopabhikkhādānamattaṃpīti. Yañca cittaṃ yena attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhātapubbā
anya-e0301n:289_4: bhisaṅkhārena vinā na uppajjati. So tassa cittassa pakatipaccayagaṇeevaanto gadho
anya-e0301n:289_5: hoti. Jhānānica lokiya lokuttara bhūtāni sabbāni attano anurūpena parikammasaṅkhāta
anya-e0301n:289_6: pubbabhāgabhāvanā bhisaṅkhārena vinā uppannānināma natthīti so tesaṃ pakatipaccayagaṇesueva
anya-e0301n:289_7: antogadho hotīti. Itarathā sabbaṃpi kusalākusala kammaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ nāmanatthīti āpajjatīti.
anya-e0301n:291: Adhikārenaca vinā kevalaṃ.La. Sasaṅkhārikantipi nasakkā vattunti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:292_0: Na hi lokiyajjhānānināma adhikārena vinā nuppajjantīti atthi. Kevalaṃpana pubbe samathakammesu
anya-e0301n:292_2: evameva aṭṭhakathāsu āgataṃ. Vuttañhi tattha yoca samathe akatādhikāro. Tassa dukkhā
anya-e0301n:292_3: paṭipadā hoti. Katādhikārassasukhāti. Apica, purimabhave siddhaṃ adhikāraṃ gahetvā
anya-e0301n:292_4: idha saṅkhārabhedavicāraṇāpi nayuttāeva. Kusalakriyajjhānesu hi sanni hitapaccayavaseneva
anya-e0301n:294: Athavātiādiko pacchima vikappopi paṭikkhitto eva hotīti.
anya-e0301n:295_0: 52. Ettha jhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa nimittuppādato pubbaṃ paṭipadāya khettaṃ, pacchā
anya-e0301n:295_1: abhiññāya khettaṃ. Tattha pubbe viruddhapaccayānaṃ sannihitena kilamantassa sato
anya-e0301n:295_2: paṭipajjantassa bhāvanā paṭipadā dukkhānāma hoti. Akilamantassa sukhā. Pacchāca dandhaṃ
anya-e0301n:295_3: appanaṃ pattassa bhāvanābhiññā dandhābhiññānāma hoti. Khippaṃ pattassa khippābhiññānāma.
anya-e0301n:295_4: Tattha pubbe dukkhā paṭipadā pacchā dandhaṃvā khippaṃvā uppannaṃ jhānaṃ dukkhappaṭipadaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:295_5: karoti. Sukhāpana sukhappaṭipadaṃnāma karotīti. Dutīyajjhānādīsupana purimajjhāne
anya-e0301n:295_6: nikanti vikkhambhanassa dukkhasukhatāvasena paṭipadābhedo veditabbo. Yopana etarahi
anya-e0301n:295_7: gahaṭṭhovā pabbajitovā pubbabhave akatādhikāropi antarāyikadhammamutto kalyāṇapaṭipattiyaṃ
anya-e0301n:295_8: ṭhito chinnapalibodho pahitatto jhānaṃ bhāveti. Tassa jhānabhāvanā nasampajjatīti
anya-e0301n:296_0: 53. Vipākajjhāne kāmakusalaṃ appanaṃ apattaṃ mudubhūtaṃ dubbalaṃ hoti. Parittesu
anya-e0301n:296_1: nānākiccaṭṭhānesuca hīnesupi attabhāvesuca vipaccati. Tasmā taṃ attanā asadisaṃpi
anya-e0301n:296_2: vipākaṃ janeti. Mahaggatakusalaṃpana appanāpattaṃ tikkhaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Uḷāre brahmattabhāve
anya-e0301n:296_3: bhavaṅgaṭṭhānesuyeva vipaccati. Tasmā taṃ sadāpi attanā sadisameva vipākaṃ janeti.
anya-e0301n:296_4: Teneva vitakkavicārapīti sukhekaggatā sahitantiādinā vipākaṃpi sabbaso kusala sadisameva dasseti.
anya-e0301n:297: [50] Anantarabhaveyeva phaladānattā taṃ attanā sadisameva vipākaṃ janetītica vadanti, taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:298_0: Evañhi sati kāmakusalaṃpi sattamajavanaṃ attanā sadisavipāka meva janeyyāti. Yasmāca
anya-e0301n:298_1: kusalameva niranusayasantāne pavattaṃ kriyajjhānaṃ nāma hoti. Tasmā kriyacittaṃpi
anya-e0301n:299_0: 54. Pañcadhātiādisaṅgahagāthā. Tattha jhānabhedenāti pathamajjhānādīhi pañcahi jhānehi
anya-e0301n:299_1: sampayogabhedena. Rūpāvacaramānasaṃ jhānabhedena pañcadhā hoti. Pathamajjhānikaṃ,
anya-e0301n:299_2: dutīyajjhānikaṃ, tatīyajjhānikaṃ, catutthajjhānikaṃ, pañcamajjhānikanti evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ
anya-e0301n:299_3: hotīti attho. Tameva puññapākakriyābhedena pañcadasadhā bhaveti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:301: Jhānabhedenāti jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedenāti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:302_0: Añño hi jhānabhedo. Añño jhānaṅgabhedo. Tattha pathamaṃ jhānaṃ dutīyaṃ jhānantiādijhānabhedo.
anya-e0301n:302_1: Pathamajjhāne pañca aṅgāni. Dutīyajjhāne cattārītiādi jhānaṅgabhedo. Tesu idha jhānabhedova
anya-e0301n:302_2: adhippeto. Na jhānaṅgabhedo. Cittañhi jhānabhede neva pañcavidhaṃ hoti. Najhānaṅgabhedena.
anya-e0301n:304: “Pañcadhāti pañcaṅgikaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ puna duvaṅgikanti pañcavidhaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:305: Jhānameva hi pañcaṅgikādi hoti. Na cittanti.
anya-e0301n:307_0: 55. Idāni yathānuppattaṃ arūpacittaṃ niddisanto ākāsānañcā yatanakusalacittantiādi
anya-e0301n:307_1: māha. Tattha bhuso kāsati dibbatīti ākāso. So hi sayaṃ sarūpato anupalabbhamānopi
anya-e0301n:307_2: candasūriyobhāsādīnaṃ vasena ativijjotamānoviya khāyatīti. Nakassati chedana bhedana
anya-e0301n:307_3: vasena na vilekhīyatīti akāso. Akāsoeva ākāso tipi vadanti. So pana ajaṭākāso paricchinnākāso
anya-e0301n:307_4: kasiṇugghāṭimākāso rūpakalāpaparicchedākāsoti catubbidho hoti. Tattha idha kasiṇugghāṭimākāso
anya-e0301n:307_5: adhippeto. So hi anantena ajaṭākāsena saha ekībhūtoviya hoti. Yogināca anantabhāvena
anya-e0301n:307_6: pharīyati. Tasmā ananto ākāsoti ākāsānanto. Nāssa uppādantovā vayantovā paññāyatīti
anya-e0301n:307_7: anantotipi vuttaṃ. Soyeva ākāsānañcaṃ. Sakatthe yakārena saha siddhattā. Yathā pana
anya-e0301n:307_8: devānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavatthu devāyatananti vuccati. Tathā idhapi tasmiṃ appanāpattassa
anya-e0301n:307_9: sasampayuttassa jhānassa adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena tadeva āyatanantipi vuccati. Iti ākāsānañcaṃ
anya-e0301n:308: Ākāsānañcā yatananti ākāsānañcā yatanaṃ samāpannassavā upapannassavā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissavā citta ceta sikādhammāti hi vibhaṅge vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:309_1: ettha viññāṇaṃnāma ākāsānañcāyatanacittameva. Taṃpana sayaṃ uppādādi antavantaṃpi
anya-e0301n:309_2: anantasaññite ākāse pavattanato anantanti vuccati. Koṭṭhāsatthovā antasaddo. Attano
anya-e0301n:309_3: uppādādīsu koṭṭhāsesu ekadese aṭṭhatvā sakalassa pharaṇavasena tadārammaṇāya bhāvanāya
anya-e0301n:309_4: pavattanato anantanti vuccati. Anantasaññitevā ākāse pavattanato anantanti evaṃ tadārammaṇāya
anya-e0301n:309_5: bhāvanāya pavattattā anantanti vuccati. Anantasaññitevā ākāse attano pharaṇākāra
anya-e0301n:309_6: vasenapi anantanti vattuṃ yujjatiyeva. Anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇānantaṃ. Tameva viññāṇañcaṃ
anya-e0301n:309_7: niruttinayena, viññāṇañcaṃ āyatanaṃ assāti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ. Viññāṇañcāyatana saṅkhāte
anya-e0301n:312: “Dutīyā ruppa viññāṇena añcitabbaṃ pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañca”ntipi vuttaṃ. Taṃ pāḷiyā na sameti.
anya-e0301n:313_0: Anantaṃ viññāṇanti tadeva viññāṇaṃ ñāṇena phuṭṭhaṃ manasikaroti, anantaṃ pharati.
anya-e0301n:313_1: Tena vuccati anantaṃ viññāṇantītihi vuttaṃ. Etena ca taṃviññāṇaṃ ekantena anantavisesanayuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:313_2: hotīti viññāyatīti. Tameva ākāsantipi pāṭho. Ākiñcaññāyatananti ettha kiñci kiñcananti
anya-e0301n:313_3: atthato ekaṃ appamattakassa nāmaṃ. Natthi kiñcanaṃ appamattakaṃ antamaso bhaṅgamattaṃpi
anya-e0301n:313_4: avasiṭṭhaṃ assa pathamā ruppaviññāṇassāti akiñcanaṃ. Akiñcanassa bhāvo ākiñcaññaṃ.
anya-e0301n:313_5: Pathamāruppaviññāṇābhāvo. So hi natthi kiñcīti manasikāra vasena taṃnāmaṃ labhatīti.
anya-e0301n:313_6: Ākiñcaññaṃ āyatanamassātiādi vuttanayameva. Nevasaññā nāsaññāyatananti ettha oḷārika
anya-e0301n:313_7: saññaṃ sandhāya nevatthi saññā assāti nevasaññaṃ. Sukhumasaññaṃ sandhāya naca natthi
anya-e0301n:313_8: saññā assāti nāsaññaṃ, nevasaññañca taṃ nāsaññañcāti nevasaññā nāsaññaṃ majjhe dīghaṃ
anya-e0301n:313_9: katvā, citta cetasikarāsieva. Tameva yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatananti
anya-e0301n:313_10: nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ. Tasmiṃ pavattaṃ kusala cittanti samāso. Athavā. Saññāyeva
anya-e0301n:313_11: paṭusaññākiccassa abhāvato nevasaññāca hoti. Saṅkhārāvasesa sukhumabhāvena vijjamānattā
anya-e0301n:313_12: asaññāca nahotīti katvā nevasaññānā saññānāma, sāyeva āyatanaṃ, tenaca sampayuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:313_13: kusala cittanti samāso. Etthaca yasmā ādito paṭṭhāya oḷārike nīvaraṇadhamme vitakkādikeca
anya-e0301n:313_14: pajahitvā sesadhammeca bhāvanā balena uparupari sukhumabhāvaṃ pāpetvā anukkamena
anya-e0301n:313_15: paṭipajjantā sukhumaṭṭhena lokiyadhammesu muddhabhūtaṃ imaṃ samāpattiṃ pāpuṇanti.
anya-e0301n:313_16: Tasmā idha cittaṃpi nevacittanācittameva hoti. Phassopi neva phassanāphassoeva hoti,
anya-e0301n:313_17: tathā vedanādayopīti. Tasmā idhasaññāggahaṇaṃ desanāsīsamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipākesu
anya-e0301n:313_18: viññāṇañcāyatananti ettha viññāṇanti pathamāruppakusala viññāṇameva. Tañca atītānantarabhave
anya-e0301n:313_19: pavattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Akiñcana bhāvoca tasseva natthi bhāvoti. Kriyacittesu pana viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:313_20: nāma kusalabhūtaṃ kriyabhūtañca duvidhaṃ pathamāruppaviññāṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Akiñcanabhāvoca
anya-e0301n:314_1: catunnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ pabhedena. Duvidhaṃhi idha ārammaṇacatukkaṃ, atimikkatabba catukkaṃ,
anya-e0301n:314_2: ālambi tabba catukkañca. Tattha pathamāruppe rūpapañcamajjhānassa ārammaṇa bhūtaṃ.
anya-e0301n:314_3: Kasiṇanimittaṃ atikkami tabbaṃnāma. Taṃ ugghāṭetvā laddhaṃ ākāsaṃ ālambitabbaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:314_4: Dutīyāruppe pathamāruppassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ ākāsaṃ atikkamitabbaṃnāma. Pathamāruppaviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:314_5: ālambi tabbaṃnāma. Tatīyāruppe taṃpathamāruppaviññāṇaṃ atikkamitabbaṃnāma. Tassa
anya-e0301n:314_6: natthibhāvo ālambitabbaṃnāma. Catutthāruppe so natthi bhāvo atikkamitabbaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:314_7: Tatīyāruppaviññāṇaṃ ālambi tabbaṃ nāmāti. Tattha kiñcāpi imaṃ āruppamānasaṃ catunnaṃ
anya-e0301n:314_8: atikkami tabbānaṃpi bhedena catubbidhaṃ hoti, tathāpi ākāsānañcāya tanantiādinā idha
anya-e0301n:314_9: ālambitabbānaññeva sarūpato gahitattā tesaṃ bhedena imassa bhedo pākaṭoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:314_10: Āruppamānasaṃ ālambaṇappabhedena catudhā ṭhitaṃ. Tadeva puññapāka kriyabhedena dvādasadhā ṭhitanti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:316_0: 57. Idāni yathānuppattaṃ lokuttara cittaṃ dassento sotāpattimaggacittantiādimāha.
anya-e0301n:316_1: Tattha savati sandati anivattagamanavasena pavattatīti soto, gaṅgādīsu jalappavāho.
anya-e0301n:316_2: Sohi pabhavato paṭṭhāya yāvamahāsamuddā antarā anivatta māno savati sandati pavattatīti.
anya-e0301n:316_3: Sotoviyāti soto. Aṭṭhaṅgiko ariyamaggo, yathāha-yokho āvuso ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
anya-e0301n:316_4: Seyyathidaṃ, sammādiṭṭhi. La. Sammāsamādhi. Ayaṃ vuccatāvuso sototi. Ayaṃpihi yadā
anya-e0301n:316_5: uppajjati. Tato paṭṭhāya ānubhāvapharaṇavasena yāvaanupādisesanibbānadhātuyā antarā
anya-e0301n:316_6: anivattamānoyeva hutvā savati sandati pavattatīti. Yathāha -
anya-e0301n:317_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave yākāci mahānadiyo. Seyyathidaṃ. Gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū,
anya-e0301n:317_1: mahī. Sabbā tā samuddaninnā honti samuddapoṇā samuddapabbhārā. Evameva kho bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:317_2: bhikkhu ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bahulikaronto nibbānaninno hoti nibbānapoṇo nibbāna pabbhāroti.
anya-e0301n:318: Etthaca tena tena maggena pahīnānaṃ kilesānaṃ puna anupagamana vasena saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ anukkamena paripākagamanavasenaca anivattagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha -
anya-e0301n:319_0: Seyyathāpi bhikkhave ghaṭo nikkujjo vamateva udakaṃ. Nopaccāvamati. Evamevakho bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:319_1: ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ bhāvento bahulikaronto vamateva pāpake akusale dhamme.
anya-e0301n:319_2: Nopaccāvamatīti. Yathācāha-sotāpatti maggaññāṇena ye kilesā pahīnā, te kilese napuneti
anya-e0301n:320_0: Yathāca puthujjanā pahīnepi kilese puna upagacchanti. Tihe tukabhūtāpi puna dvihetukāhetukabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:320_1: gacchanti. Yato te uparibhavagge nibbattāpi puna apāyesu sandissanti. Sīlavantāpi
anya-e0301n:320_2: puna dussīlā honti. Samāhitāpi puna ummattakāvā khittacittāvā honti. Paññavāpi puna
anya-e0301n:320_3: duppaññā eḷamūgā honti. Natathā ariyā. Tepana tena tena maggena pahīne kilese puna
anya-e0301n:320_4: naupagacchanti. Puthujjanabhāvaṃvā heṭṭhimāriya bhāvaṃvā na gacchanti. Anukkamena
anya-e0301n:320_5: saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ paripakkabhāvameva upagacchantīti. Sabbañcetaṃ ariyamaggasseva
anya-e0301n:320_6: ānubhāvena siddhanti sototināmaṃ mūlappabhavabhūte tasmiṃ maggeeva niruḷhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:320_7: Tassa sotassa ādito pajjanaṃ pāpuṇanaṃ sotāpatti. Sotāpattiyā adhigamamāno maggo
anya-e0301n:320_8: sotāpattimaggo. Athavā, dhammasota samāpanno ariyoti pavuccatīti vuttattā sabbe ariyasantānagatā
anya-e0301n:320_9: lokiya lokuttarabhūtā bodhipakkhiyadhammā upari sambodhiparā yanatāvasena anupādisesanibbāna
anya-e0301n:320_10: parāyanatāvasenaca anivatta gatiyā pavattamānā yathāvuttena atthena sototi vuccanti.
anya-e0301n:320_11: Taṃ sotaṃ ādito pajjanti pāpuṇanti etāya paṭipadāyāti sotāpatti. Sotāpattica sā maggocāti
anya-e0301n:320_12: sotāpattimaggo, pathamamaggasaṅkhātāya sotāpattiyā aṅganti sotāpatti yaṅgantihi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:320_13: vuttaṃ, maggotica patho upāyo. Nibbānaṃ maggeti, nibbānatthikehi maggīyati, kilese
anya-e0301n:322: Ariyamaggasotassa ādito pajjanaṃ etassāti sotāpatti. Puggaloti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:323: Na hi puggale pavatto sotāpattisaddo katthaci diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n:324: [55] Etena tassa maggo sotāpattimaggoti idaṃpi paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:327: Sotāpattiyā laddhaṃ maggacittaṃ sotāpatti maggacittanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:328: Na hi cittasaddasambandho sotāpattisaddo katthaci pāḷiyaṃ diṭṭhoti.
anya-e0301n:329_0: 58. Paṭisandhivasena sakiṃ imaṃlokaṃ āgacchati sīlenāti sakadāgāmī. Dutīyaphalaṭṭho.
anya-e0301n:329_1: So hi asamucchinnakāma rāgānusayattā kāmalokāgamana kilesasabbhāvena taṃ sabhāvānāti
anya-e0301n:329_2: vattanato upari bhavagge ṭhitopi paṭisandhivasena puna imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ āgamanappakatikoeva
anya-e0301n:330_0: Idha sāriputta ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni appahīnāni honti, so
anya-e0301n:330_1: diṭṭhevadhamme nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. So aparihīno kālaṃ kurumāno
anya-e0301n:330_2: nesaññānāsaññā yatanupagānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati. So tato cuto āgāmī hoti
anya-e0301n:330_3: āgantvā itthattaṃ. Idha pana sāriputta ekaccassa puggalassa orambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni
anya-e0301n:330_4: pahīnāni honti, so diṭṭheva.La. So tato cuto anāgāmī hoti anāgantvā itthattanti.
anya-e0301n:331_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca itthattanti imaṃ kāmāvacara pañcakkhandha bhāvanti vuttaṃ. Ayañca
anya-e0301n:331_1: attho kilesagativasena vutto. Na puggala gativasena. Na hi brahmabhūtā sotāpanna
anya-e0301n:331_2: sakadā gāmino paṭipaṭisandhivasena heṭṭhimaṃpi brahmalokaṃ āgacchanti. Kuto kāma
anya-e0301n:332_0: Kāmadhātuyā cutassa rūpadhātuṃ arūpadhātuṃ upapajjantassa kassaci sattaanusayā anusenti,
anya-e0301n:332_1: kassaci pañcaanusayā anusenti, kassaci tayo anusayā anusentīti vatvā rūpa dhātuyā
anya-e0301n:332_2: arūpadhātuyā cutassa kāmadhātuṃ upapajjantassa satteva anusayā anusentīti.
anya-e0301n:333_0: Vuttattā viññāyati. Tattha purimavākye puthujjanassa vasena satta. Dvinnaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:333_1: vasena pañca. Anāgāmissa vasena kayoti vuttaṃ, pacchimavākyepana brahmabhūtānaṃ sotā
anya-e0301n:333_2: pannasakadāgāmianāgāmīnaṃ paṭisandhivasena kāmalokaṃ gamanassa natthitāya kevalaṃ
anya-e0301n:333_3: puthujjanasseva vasena sattevāti vuttaṃ. Dhammahadaya vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyañca –
anya-e0301n:334_0: “Rūpāvacare nibbattā sotāpannasakadāgāmino napuna idhā gacchanti, tattheva parinibbāyanti.
anya-e0301n:334_1: Etehi jhānaanāgāmino nāmā”ti ca. “Navasu brahmalokesu nibbattaariya sāvakānaṃ tatrupa
anya-e0301n:334_2: pattipi hoti uparūpapattipi. Naheṭṭhu papatti. Puthujjanānaṃpana tatrupapattipi hoti
anya-e0301n:335_0: Vuttaṃ. Tañcakho anāgamanaṃ maggasahāyena jhānānubhāveneva siddhaṃ. Namaggānubhāvenāti.
anya-e0301n:335_1: Etthaca imaṃ lokanti padassa imaṃ manussalokanti vā imaṃ kāmāvacaralokantivā dvidhāpi
anya-e0301n:335_2: attho aṭṭhakathāsu vutto. Tattha purimasmiṃ atthe sati āgacchatīti etassa devalokato
anya-e0301n:335_3: āgacchatīti attho. Pacchimasmiṃ pana brahmalokatopi ca āgacchatīti. Pāḷiyaṃpana pacchimatthova
anya-e0301n:335_4: vuttoviya dissati. Vuttañhetaṃ puggalapaññattiyaṃ anāgantvā itthattaṃ anāgāmī tena
anya-e0301n:335_5: daṭṭhabbo. Āgantvā itthattaṃ sotāpannasakadā gāmino tena daṭṭhabbāti. Etthaca anāgantvā
anya-e0301n:335_6: itthattanti iminā imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmīti atthaṃ dasseti. Āgantvā
anya-e0301n:335_7: itthattanti imināpana dvepi sotāpannasakadāgāmino sakiṃ puna imaṃ kāmāvacaralokaṃ
anya-e0301n:335_8: āgacchantīti sakadāgāminoti atthaṃ dasseti. Kasmā, nirantaravākyesu ṭhitānaṃ dvinnaṃitthatta
anya-e0301n:335_9: saddānaṃ nānātthā sambhavato. Majjhimapaṇṇāseca kaṇṇakattha sutte -
anya-e0301n:336: Yo so mahārāja brahmā sabyāpajjho, so brahmā āgantā itthattaṃ. Yoso brahmā abyāpajjho, so brahmā anāgantā itthattanti.
anya-e0301n:337_0: Bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Tattha sabyāpajjhoti etena puthujjanena saha sotāpannasakadāgāmibhūtā
anya-e0301n:337_1: brahmāno gahitā honti. Tehi paṭighānusayassa appahīnattā cetasikadukkhasaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0301n:337_2: byāpajjhaṃpi apahīnamevāti sabyāpajjhānāma. Āgantā itthattanti imaṃ kāmalokaṃ paṭisandhivasena
anya-e0301n:337_3: puna āgamanasīlo āgamanappakatikoti attho. Tabbiparītena pacchimassa vākyassa attho
anya-e0301n:337_4: veditabbo. Tesupana dvīsu sakadāgāmīsu purimassa anaññasā dhāraṇeneva sabbapathamaṃ
anya-e0301n:337_5: ariya magga sotādhi gamana guṇena sotāpanno tveva nāmaṃ siddhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Puggalagativasena
anya-e0301n:337_6: panettha brahmaloke ṭhitānaṃ sattakkhattuparamatādibhāvoviya sakadāgāmibhāvopi natthi.
anya-e0301n:337_7: Pathamadutīyaphalaṭṭhāpihi tattha anāgāmisaṅkhyameva gacchanti. Tasmā sakadāgāmīti
anya-e0301n:337_8: idaṃ kāmajātikā naṃeva dutīyaphalaṭṭhānaṃ siddhaṃ nāmanti katvā tesaṃ kāmaloke eva
anya-e0301n:337_9: heṭṭhuparupapatti vasena sakiṃ āgamanaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañca
anya-e0301n:337_10: katvā pāḷiyaṃpi pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā sattakkhattuparamassa kolaṃkolassa ekabījissa
anya-e0301n:337_11: sakadāgāmissa yoca diṭṭheva dhamme arahāti vuttanti. Sopana chabbidho hoti. Idhapatvā
anya-e0301n:337_12: idhaparinibbāyī, tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyī, idhapatvā tattha parinibbāyī, tattha
anya-e0301n:337_13: patvā idha parinibbāyī, idhapatvā tatthanibbattitvā idha parinibbāyī. Tatthapatvā
anya-e0301n:337_14: idhanibbattitvā tatthaparinibbāyīti. Tattha idha patvā idha parinibbāyīti idha manussabhave
anya-e0301n:337_15: sakadāgāmimaggaṃ patvā idhamanussa bhaveyeva arahattamaggaṃ labhitvā parinibbāyanadhammo.
anya-e0301n:337_16: Tattha patvā tattha parinibbāyīti tasmiṃdevaloke sakadāgāmimaggaṃ patvā tasmiṃ devalokeyeva
anya-e0301n:337_18: uppajjitvā. Yesaṃ pana imaṃ lokanti padassa imaṃ manussalokanti attho. Tesaṃ so pañcavidhoyeva
anya-e0301n:339: “Pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu pañcamakova idhādhippeto, so hi ito gantvā puna sakiṃ idha āgacchatī”ti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:340_0: Mahāparinibbāna suttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana mahāvagga saṃyuttaṭṭhakathā yañca sopi chaṭṭho
anya-e0301n:340_1: puggalo sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena āgatoyeva. Yasmāca sabbaññubuddhāpi yāva uparimaggo nāgacchati.
anya-e0301n:340_2: Tāva pathamaphalaṭṭhabhūtā sattakkhattu paramatāyaṃviya dutīyaphalaṭṭhabhūtā sakiṃ
anya-e0301n:340_3: āgamanappakatiyaṃ saṇṭhitāyeva honti. Tasmā idha koci dutīyaphalaṭṭho sakiṃ āgamanaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:340_4: nippariyāyena sakadā gāmīnāma na nahotīti sabbopi so chabbidho puggalo idha nippariyāyena
anya-e0301n:340_5: sakadāgāmiyevanāma hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Sakadā gāmissa maggo sakadāgāmimaggo. So hi
anya-e0301n:340_6: sayaṃ janakabhūto sakadāgāmīnaṃ janetabbaṃ janetīti idha janetabba janakasambandhena
anya-e0301n:340_7: visesana visesitabbatā ñāyāgatā eva hoti. Yathā tissamātā phussamātāti.
anya-e0301n:342_0: Sāñāyāgatāeva nahoti. Payojanaṃ pana kiñci atthi. Payojanavasena aviruddhā hotīti
anya-e0301n:342_1: iminā adhippāyenayaṃ vuttaṃ “kiñcāpi maggasamaṅgino tathāgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva
anya-e0301n:342_2: sakadāgāmīnāma. Tassapana kāraṇabhūto purimuppanno maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ
anya-e0301n:342_3: phalaṭṭhena visesetvā vuccati sakadāgāmimaggoti. Evaṃ anāgāmimaggo”ti. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:344_0: 59. Orabbhāgiyasaṃyojanānaṃ sabbaso samucchinnattā paṭisandhivasena puna imaṃ kāmalokaṃ
anya-e0301n:344_1: na āgacchatīti anāgāmī. Ekantena brahmalokaparāyanoeva hotīti attho. Idañca kevalaṃ
anya-e0301n:344_2: imassa maggassa ānubhāvavaseneva vuttaṃ. Uparimagga vipassanāya pana āgatāya so tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:344_3: ṭhāneyeva arahatta maggaparāyanopi hotiyeva. Anāgāmissa tatīyaphalaṭṭhassamaggo.
anya-e0301n:345_0: 60. Mahapphalakāritāguṇayogena pūjāvisesaṃ arahatīti arahā. Khīṇāsavo catutthaphalaṭṭho.
anya-e0301n:345_1: Arahato bhāvo arahattaṃ, catutthaphalaṃ. Tassa maggo. Tena sampayuttacittanti nibbacanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:345_2: Pisaddena pāḷiyaṃ vibhatte maggacittappabhede sampiṇḍeti. Tattha dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ
anya-e0301n:345_3: tāva pathamamagge jhānanāmena vuttesu pañcasu vāresu pathame suddhikapaṭipadāvāredvinnaṃ
anya-e0301n:345_4: catukkapañcakanayānaṃ vasena navacittāni honti. Tathā suddhikasuññatāya suññatappaṭipadāya
anya-e0301n:345_5: suddhikappaṇihite appaṇihitappaṭipadāyacāti pañcasu vāresu dasannaṃ nayānaṃ vasena
anya-e0301n:345_6: pañcacattālīsacittāni honti. Tathā maggasatipaṭṭhānādīhi ekūnavīsatiyā nāmehi vuttesu
anya-e0301n:345_7: paccekaṃ pañcasu vāresūti vīsatiyā nāmehi vutte vārasate dvinnaṃ nayasatānaṃ vasena
anya-e0301n:345_8: navacittasatāni honti. Puna catūhi adhipatīhi yojetvā vuttesu catūsu vārasatesu aṭṭhannaṃ
anya-e0301n:345_9: nayasatānaṃ vasena tīṇi sahassāni chasatānica hontīti. Evaṃ pathamamagge naya sahassavasena
anya-e0301n:345_10: cattāricittasahassāni pañcacitta satānica honti. Tathā sesamaggesupīti evaṃ catūsu
anya-e0301n:345_11: maggesu catunnaṃ naya sahassānaṃ vasena aṭṭhārasa magga citta sahassāni honti. Saccasatipaṭṭhāna
anya-e0301n:345_12: vibhaṅgesu pana vīsatinaya sahassānaṃ vasena navutimaggacittasahassāni. Maggavibhaṅge
anya-e0301n:345_13: aṭṭhavīsatiyā naya sahassānaṃ vasena satasahassaṃ chabbīsatisahassāni ca maggacittāni
anya-e0301n:345_14: hontīti. Aṭṭhakathāsupana nayabhedāeva vuttā. Nacitta bhedāti.
anya-e0301n:347: Pisaddena saccavibhaṅge āgataṃ saṭṭhisahassabhedaṃ nayaṃ saṅgaṇhātīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ imasmiṃ kusalanigame na vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:348: Sohi saṭṭhisahassabhedo nayo vipākaṭṭhāneeva aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatoti.
anya-e0301n:350: Paṭipadābhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ suññato appaṇihi toti dvidhā vibhattoti vuttaṃ. Taṃ nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:351: Pāḷiyañhi paṭipadābhedo ādimhiyeva āgatoti. Naca ādimhi suññato appaṇihitoti dvidhā vibhatto nirantaravāro atthīti.
anya-e0301n:353_0: Suññato eko nayo, appaṇihito eko, paṭipadā visiṭṭhā suññatā cattāro, appaṇihitā cattāroti
anya-e0301n:353_1: katvā dasanayā hontīti adhippāyena evaṃ jhāna nāmena dasadhā vibhattoti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:354_0: Na hi suññatādayo idha nayānāma honti. Tesu pana eke kasmiṃ dve dve catukkapañcakanayāeva
anya-e0301n:354_1: idha nayānāmāti. Etena tathā maggasatipaṭṭhāniccādikaṃpi sabbaṃ paṭikkhittaṃ hotīti. [Maggacittaṃ]
anya-e0301n:355_0: 61. Phalacitte phalanti vipākabhūto aṭṭhaṅgika maggo. Sampayuttadhammasamūhovā. Sotāpattiyā
anya-e0301n:355_1: adhigataṃ phalaṃ. Tena sampayuttaṃ, tatthavā pariyāpannaṃ cittanti sotāpatti phala
anya-e0301n:355_2: cittaṃ. Esanayo dutīyatatīyesupi. Arahattañca taṃ phalañcāti arahattaphalaṃ. Tena
anya-e0301n:356_1: aṭṭhaṅgikamaggānaṃ pabhedena. Kasmāpana te catukkhattuṃ pattabbāti. Vuccate. Sotāpattimagge
anya-e0301n:356_2: tāva saddhādīni indriyāni mudūni honti, tasmā so diṭṭhivicikicchāeva samucchindituṃ
anya-e0301n:356_3: sakkoti. Aññepana kāmarāgabyāpādepi tanubhūtepi kātuṃ nasakkoti. Dutīyamagge tāni
anya-e0301n:356_4: thokaṃ paṭūni honti. Tasmā so kāmarāgabyāpāde tanubhūte kātuṃ sakkoti. Samucchindituṃ
anya-e0301n:356_5: pana nasakkohiyeva. Tatīyamagge tāni paṭutarāni honti. Tasmā so kāmarāgabyāpāde samucchindituṃ
anya-e0301n:356_6: sakkoti. Rūpārūpa rāgamānuddhaccāvijjāyopana samucchindituṃ nasakkotiyeva. Catuttha
anya-e0301n:356_7: maggepana tāni indriyāni paṭutamāni honti. Tasmā so tāca aññeca sabbepi pāpadhamme
anya-e0301n:356_8: samucchindituṃ sakkoti. Evaṃ catukkhattuṃ pavattamānāeva pariniṭṭhitakiccattā te
anya-e0301n:356_9: maggā catukkhattuṃ pattabbā hontīti. Kusalaṃ cittaṃ catumaggappabhedena catudhā mataṃ.
anya-e0301n:356_10: Pākaṃpi tassa catubbidhassa kusalassa phalattā tathā catudhāmataṃ. Iti anuttaraṃ
anya-e0301n:356_11: cittaṃ aṭṭhadhā matanti yojanā. Natthi attano uttaraṃ adhikaṃ etassāti anuttaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:357_0: 63. Kasmā panettha kriyacittaṃnāmana gahitanti, kriyānuttarassa abhāvāti, kasmā panassa
anya-e0301n:357_1: abhāvoti. Maggacittassa ekacittakkhaṇikattāti. Yadi hi taṃ lokiyakusalaṃviya nānākkhaṇesu
anya-e0301n:357_2: pavatteyya. Tadā niranusayasantānepi pavattitvā kriyā nuttaraṃnāma siyāti. Kasmāpana
anya-e0301n:357_3: taṃ ekacittakkhaṇikameva hotīti. Maggassa mahānubhāvattāti. Kathañca mahānubhāvoti.
anya-e0301n:357_4: Vuccate. Ariyamaggohi nāma sakiṃ pavattamānoyeva attanā pahātabbe kilese puna anuppādadhammataṃ
anya-e0301n:357_5: āpādetvā pajahati. Ayamassa eko ānubhāvo. Vipākañca kusalakriyajavanaṃviya javanakicca
anya-e0301n:357_6: yuttaṃ yadā kadāci samāpajjanakkhamañca katvā attano anantarato paṭṭhāya janeti.
anya-e0301n:357_7: Ayamassa dutīyo ānubhāvo. Tasmā tassa kilesappahānatthāyapi puna uppādetabbakiccaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:357_8: natthi. Tathā samāpatti atthāyapīti. Sacepi hi koci ahaṃ phalaṃ samāpajjituṃ na icchāmi.
anya-e0301n:357_9: Pubbe laddhaṃ maggameva samāpajjissāmīti parikammaṃ kareyya. Tadā pubbe sakiṃ uppajjitvā
anya-e0301n:357_10: niruddhamaggacetanānubhāvena phalacittameva pavatteyya. Na maggacittaṃ. Kasmā, appaṭibāhi
anya-e0301n:357_11: yānubhāvattā maggassa. Ayañhi maggānubhāvonāma kenaci chandena vā vasenavā ajjhāsayenavā
anya-e0301n:358_0: 64. Dvādasākusalānevantiādi sabbesaṃ catubbhūmaka cittānaṃ jātivasena saṅgaho. Evaṃ
anya-e0301n:358_1: iminā vuttappakārena akusa lāni dvādasevahonti. Kusalāni ekavīsatieva. Vipākānichattiṃ
anya-e0301n:358_2: seva. Kriyacittāni vīsatievāti ṭīkāyaṃ yojīyati. Kecipana kusalānaṃ vipākānañca uparivaḍḍhamānattāevasaddaṃ
anya-e0301n:358_3: ādiantapadesveva yojesuṃ. Catupaññāsadhātiādi bhūmivasena saṅgaho. Kāmepariyā pannāni
anya-e0301n:358_4: cittāni catupaññāsadhā īraye katheyya. Rūpe pannarasa. Arūpe dvādasa. Tathā anuttare
anya-e0301n:358_5: pariyāpannāni cittāni aṭṭhadhā īrayeti yojanā. Etthaca anuttareti lokuttara bhūmiyaṃ.
anya-e0301n:358_6: Sā pana duvidhā saṅkhatabhūmi, asaṅkhatabhūmīti. Saṅkhatāpi catubbidhā. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:359: Yasmiṃ samaye lokuttaraṃ jhānaṃ bhāveti pathamāya bhūmiyā pattiyā.La. Dutīyāya.La. Tatīyāya.La. Catutthāya bhūmiyā pattiyāti.
anya-e0301n:360_0: Tattha bhūmīti sāmaññaphalaṃ adhippetanti vuttaṃ. Pathamamaggaphalayu gaḷaṃvā pathamabhūmi.La.
anya-e0301n:360_1: Catuttha maggaphala yugaḷaṃ catutthabhūmīti evaṃpi yujjatiyeva. Atthatopana rāgattayapariggahavimuttiyā
anya-e0301n:360_2: tebhūmakadhammesu apariyāpannatā saṅkhātena avatthā visesena yutto dhammaviseso.
anya-e0301n:362_0: Itarabhūmiyoviya lokuttarabhūmināma visuṃ natthi. Nava vidhadhammasamūhoeva tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:362_1: bhūmipariyāyoti katvā yaṃ vuttaṃ. “Katthaci apariyāpannāni navavidhalokuttara dhammasamūhekadesabhūtāni
anya-e0301n:362_2: rukkhe sākhā tyādīsu viya anuttare cittānīti vuttānī”ti. Taṃ nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:363_0: Duvidhāhi bhūmi avatthābhūmi, okāsabhūmīti. Tattha avatthā bhūmieva nippariyāyabhūmi.
anya-e0301n:363_1: Na itarā. Sā hi okāsabhūmināma dhammānaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthāvisesavaseneva siddhāti.
anya-e0301n:363_2: Taṃ taṃ avatthā visesotica heṭṭhā vuttanayena kāmāvacaratādi avatthā viseso daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n:364_0: 65. Evaṃ catubbhūmaka cittāni saṅkhepato niddisitvā idāni puna vitthārato niddisanto
anya-e0301n:364_1: itthantiādigāthamāha. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā. Athavāpana itthaṃ yathāvuttappakārena ekunanavutippabhedaṃ
anya-e0301n:364_2: mānasaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ katvā vicakkhaṇā paṇḍitā vibhajantīti.
anya-e0301n:366: Gāthāya pubbaddhaṃ purimagāthānaṃ nigamanaṃ katvā aparaddhameva ārabbhantaraṃ katvā yojenti. Taṃ kathamekūna navutividhaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ hotīti iminā nasametīti.
anya-e0301n:367_0: Idāni taṃ ekavīsasatavibhāgaṃ dassento kathaṃ.La. Hotīti pucchitvā vitakkavicārapīti
anya-e0301n:367_1: sukhekaggatā sahitantiādimāha. Tattha pathamajjhāna sotāpattimaggacittanti ettha
anya-e0301n:367_2: pañcaṅgikena pathamajjhānena yutto sotāpattimaggo pathamajjhānasotāpattimaggo. Tena
anya-e0301n:369: “Pathamajjhānañca taṃ sotāpattimaggacittañcā”ti yojenti. Taṃ na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:370: Na hi jhānaṃ cittaṃ hoti. Naca cittaṃ jhānaṃ. Aññañhi jhānaṃ, aññaṃ cittanti.
anya-e0301n:372: “Jhānaṅgavasena pathamajjhāna sadisattā pathamajjhānañcā”ti vuttaṃ. Tampi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:373_0: Na hi pañcaṅgikaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ pathamajjhānasadisaṭṭhena pathamajjhānasaññaṃ
anya-e0301n:373_1: labhatīti sakkā vattuṃ. Tañhi sayameva attano pañcaṅgikabhāvena nippariyāyato pathamajjhānaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:373_2: hotīti. Idañhi jhānaṃnāma lokiyaṃvā hotu lokuttaraṃvā. Yaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ hoti. Taṃ
anya-e0301n:373_3: sayameva pathamajjhānanti siddhaṃ. Yaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ. Tiyaṅgikaṃ. Duvaṅgikaṃ. Puna
anya-e0301n:373_4: duvaṅgikaṃ. Taṃ sayameva pañcamajjhānanti siddhanti. Lokuttarevā dutīyādibhāvassa
anya-e0301n:375_0: Sadisabhāveneva lokuttare tesaṃ pañcaṅgikādīnaṃ jhāna vohārasiddhatādīpanatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n:375_1: “Pādakajjhāna sammasitajjhāna puggalajjhāsayesu hi aññataravasena taṃ taṃ jhānasadisattā
anya-e0301n:375_2: vitakkādiaṅgapātubhāvena cattāropi maggā pathamajjhānādi vohāraṃ labhantā paccekaṃ
anya-e0301n:376_0: Na hi maggā pathamajjhānādi vohāraṃ labhanti. Añño hi maggo, aññaṃ jhānanti. Apica,
anya-e0301n:376_1: yadi upanijjhāyanaṭṭhena paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhenaca jhānaṃnāma siyā. Tadā lokuttarajjhānānieva
anya-e0301n:376_2: sātisayato jhānānināma siyuṃ. Na itarāni. Tāni hi kasiṇādinimittamattaṃ upecca nijjhāyanti.
anya-e0301n:376_4: abhiduddasaṃ nibbānaṃ upecca nijjhāyanti. Paccanīkadhammeca samūle sānusaye sabbaso
anya-e0301n:376_5: samucchindanavasena jhāpentīti. Etthaca appanājhānānaṃ pañcaṅgikabhāvonāma pakatiyā
anya-e0301n:376_6: eva siddho hotīti na pathamajjhānikesu maggaphalesu pādakajjhā nādinā paccayavisesena
anya-e0301n:376_7: kiccaṃ atthi. Caturaṅgikādi bhāvo pana tena paccayavisesena vinā na sijjhati. Asatihi
anya-e0301n:376_8: tasmiṃ sabbaṃpi jhānaṃ pañcaṅgikameva bhavissatīti. Tattha yathā lokiyajjhānesu ādikammikakāle
anya-e0301n:376_9: tassa tassa dutīyādikassa jhānassa upacārabhūtā bhāvanā sayaṃ vitakkādiyuttā samānāpi
anya-e0301n:376_10: vitakkādīsu ādīnavadassanaññāṇenaceva idāni avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ uppādessāmi, idāni avicāraṃ
anya-e0301n:376_11: jhānaṃ uppādessāmīti evamādinā pavattena ajjhāsaya visesenaca yuttattā kāci vitakkavirāgabhāvanānāma
anya-e0301n:376_12: hoti. Kāci vicāra virāgabhāvanā nāma. Kāci pītivirāgabhāvanā nāma. Kāci sukhavirāgabhāvanānāma.
anya-e0301n:376_13: Kācī rūpavirāgabhāvanānāma. Asaññigāmīnaṃ pana saññāvirāgabhāvanānāma hoti. Sā attano
anya-e0301n:376_14: attano jhānaṃ avitakkaṃvā avicāraṃvā appītikaṃvā upekkhāsaha gataṃvā kātuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n:376_15: Jhānesu vasībhūtakālepana ādīnavadassanaññāṇena vinā kevalaṃ ajjhāsayamattena yaṃyaṃ
anya-e0301n:376_16: jhānaṃ icchati. Taṃ taṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjatiyeva. Evamevaṃ idhapi tassa tassa maggassa
anya-e0301n:376_17: upacārabhūtā vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāsaṅkhātā bhāvanā sayaṃ vitakkādiyuttā samānāpi
anya-e0301n:376_18: nānāsattiyuttā hoti. Kāci vitakkavirāgabhāvanānāma. Kāci vitakkavicāravirāgabhāvanā
anya-e0301n:376_19: nāma. Kāci vitakkavicārapīti virāgabhāvanānāma. Kāci vitakkavi cārapītisukhavirāgabhāvanānāma.
anya-e0301n:376_20: Tattha yā vitakkaṃ virājetuṃ atikkāmetuṃ sakkoti. Sā vitakkavirāgabhāvanānāma. Esa nayo sesāsupīti.
anya-e0301n:377_0: 66. Kassapana balena sā vipassanā nānāsatti yuttā hotīti. Vuccate, pādakajjhānabalenāti
anya-e0301n:377_1: eko theravādo. Sammasitajjhāna balenāti eko. Puggalajjhāsaya balenāti eko. Tattha
anya-e0301n:377_2: yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ tassā vipassanāya pādakatthāya āsanne samāpajjīyati. Taṃtaṃ pādakajjhānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:377_3: Taṃce pathamajjhānaṃ hoti. Vipassanā pākatikāeva. Sace dutīyajjhānaṃ hoti. Vipassanā
anya-e0301n:377_4: vitakkavirāgasattiyuttā hoti. Magge avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ niyāmetuṃ sakkoti. Esanayo sesesupi
anya-e0301n:377_5: pādakajjhānesūti ayaṃ pādakavādo. Pādakajjhāne sati taṃsadisameva magge jhānaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:377_6: Asatipana magge pathamajjhānameva hoti. Sammasi tajjhānaṃvā puggalajjhāsayovā magge
anya-e0301n:377_7: jhānaṅgaṃ niyametuṃ nasakkotīti adhippāyoti. Pādakajjhāne sati taṃvā aññaṃvā yaṃyaṃ
anya-e0301n:377_8: jhānaṃ sammasīyati. Taṃce pathamajjhānaṃ hoti. Vipassanā pākati kāeva. Sace dutīyajjhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:377_9: hoti. Vipassanā vitakkavirāgasatti yuttā hoti. Magge avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ niyāmetuṃ sakkoti.
anya-e0301n:377_10: Esanayo sesesupi sammasitajjhānesūti ayaṃ sammasitavādo. Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhāvena
anya-e0301n:377_11: saha caritattā sammasitajjhānameva pādakajjhānato ajjhāsayatoca balavataranti adhippāyoti.
anya-e0301n:379: Vipassanāpādakaṃ kiñcijhānaṃ natthīti imasmiṃ vāde vuttaṃ. Taṃ aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n:380_0: Pādakajjhāne sati taṃvā aññaṃvā magge yaṃyaṃjhānaṃ icchati. Taṃtaṃ jhānaṃ ijjhati.
anya-e0301n:380_1: Vipassanāpi icchānurūpaṃ vitakkavirāgādibhāvaṃ pattā hotīti puggalajjhāsayavādo.
anya-e0301n:380_2: Yathā lokiyajjhānesu āsanne vuṭṭhitajjhānaṃ uparijjhānupacāra bhāvanāya upatthambhakamattaṃ
anya-e0301n:380_3: hoti. Na pana uparijjhāne jhānaṃ attasadisaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Ajjhāsayoeva uparijjhāne
anya-e0301n:380_4: jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmeti. Evamevaṃ idhapi pādakajjhānaṃ vipassanāya tikkha visadabhāvatthāya
anya-e0301n:380_5: balavupanissa yo hoti. Ajjhāsayoeva vipassanaṃ vitakkavirāgādibhāvaṃ pāpetvā magge
anya-e0301n:380_6: jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti adhippāyoti. Yo panettha vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāeva magge jhānaṅgaṃ
anya-e0301n:380_7: niyāmetīti mahāṭṭhakathā vādo. Tatthapi puggalajjhāsayavisesabalena vitakkavirāgādisatti
anya-e0301n:380_8: visesayuttā vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāevāti attho veditabbo. Kāmañcettha aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ
anya-e0301n:380_9: imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ theravādānaṃ aññamaññaṃ avirodho vuttoviya dissati. Imepana vādā aññamaññaṃ
anya-e0301n:380_10: saṃsanditvā pavattā nahonti. Paccekaṃ sabbaṃ lokuttarajjhānaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ katvā pavattā.
anya-e0301n:380_11: Tasmā nasakkā tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ virodho pariharitunti. Etthaca jhānalābhīnaṃ vipassanākamme
anya-e0301n:380_12: pādakajjhānasamā pajjanaṃnāma bhagavatāeva suṭṭhuvihitaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ cūḷasuññatasutte –
anya-e0301n:381_0: Idhānanda bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0301n:381_1: viharati. Dutīyaṃ jhānaṃ. Tatīyaṃ jhānaṃ. Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0301n:381_2: So ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasikaroti. Tassaceajjhattaṃsuññatāya cittaṃ napakkhandati.
anya-e0301n:381_3: Napasīdati. Tena bhikkhunā tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ
anya-e0301n:381_4: santhape tabbaṃ, sannisādetabbaṃ, ekodi kātabbaṃ, samādahātabbantiādi.
anya-e0301n:382: Tattha suññataṃ manasikarotīti vipassanākammaṃ vuttaṃ. Tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitteti pādakajjhānasamādhi nimitte. Navanipāteca –
anya-e0301n:383: Pathamaṃ pāhaṃ bhikkhavejhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi.La. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ pāhaṃ bhikkhave jhānaṃ nissāya āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:384_0: 67. Imesupana tīsuvādesu puggalajjhāsayavādo balavataroviya khāyati. Lokiyajjhānesupi
anya-e0301n:384_1: hi pādakajjhānaṃnāma icchitabbameva. Tañca uparijjhānassa upacārabhāvanāya tikkhavisada
anya-e0301n:384_2: bhāvatthāyaeva hoti. Ajjhāsayoevapana upacāra bhāvanāya vitakkavirāgādibhāvaṃ sādheti.
anya-e0301n:384_3: Upacārabhāvanāeva uparijjhāne jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmeti. Evamevaṃ idhapi pādakajjhānabalena
anya-e0301n:384_4: tikkhavisada bhāvapattā vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāeva ajjhāsayavisesabalena vitakkavirāgādisattivisesayuttā
anya-e0301n:384_5: hutvā magge nānājhānāni sādheti. Asati pana ajjhāsayavisese taṃtaṃ pādakajjhānānurūpaṃ
anya-e0301n:384_6: ajjhāsayasāmaññaṃsaṇṭhāti. Tasmā ajjhāsayavisese asati pādakajjhānameva pamāṇaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:384_7: Satipana tasmiṃ soeva pamāṇanti yuttaṃ. Icchi ticchita lokiyajjhāna samāpajjana sadisañhi
anya-e0301n:384_8: sabbajjhānesu ciṇṇavasībhūtānaṃ maggesu icchitajjhāna nibbattananti. Yo panettha
anya-e0301n:384_9: pādakajjhānādivasena pavatto viseso. So sabbopi vipassanā visesatthāya eva hoti.
anya-e0301n:384_10: Vipassanā visesoeva magge jhānaṅgaṃ niyāmetīti katvā aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ visuddhi maggeca
anya-e0301n:384_11: vipassanāva pamāṇaṃ katvāvuttā. So sabbopi viseso pādakajjhānena vinā nasijjhatīti
anya-e0301n:384_12: katvā maggavibhaṅgamaggasaṃyuttaṭṭha kathāsu pādakajjhānaṃ eva pamāṇaṃ katvā vuttanti
anya-e0301n:385_0: Idha gahapati bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi. La. Pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
anya-e0301n:385_1: So iti paṭisañcikkhati. Idaṃpi kho pathamajjhānaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcehayitaṃ
anya-e0301n:385_2: yaṃkhopana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayitaṃ. Tadaniccaṃ. Taṃ nirodhadhammanti
anya-e0301n:385_3: pajānāti so tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇāti. La. Dutīyaṃ jhānaṃ, tatīyaṃ jhānaṃ,
anya-e0301n:385_4: catutthaṃ jhānaṃ, mettā cetovimuttiṃ. Karuṇā, muditā, upekkhāceto vimuttiṃ, ākāsānañcā
anya-e0301n:385_5: yatanaṃ.La. Ākiñcaññā yatanaṃ upasampajja viharati. So iti paṭisañcikkhati. Ayaṃpikho
anya-e0301n:385_6: ākiñcaññā yatanasamāpatti abhisaṅkhatā abhisañcetayitā. Yaṃ khopana kiñci abhisaṅkhataṃ.La. Khayaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
anya-e0301n:387_0: Idhānanda bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
anya-e0301n:387_1: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ pathamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati. So yadeva tattha hoti
anya-e0301n:387_2: rūpagataṃ vedanāgataṃ saññāgataṃ saṅkhāragataṃ viññāṇagataṃ, te dhamme aniccato dukkhato
anya-e0301n:387_3: anattato samanupassati. So tattha ṭhito āsavānaṃ khayaṃ pāpuṇāti. No ce āsavānaṃ
anya-e0301n:387_4: khayaṃ pāpuṇāti. Teneva dhammarāgena tāya dhammanandiyā pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ
anya-e0301n:387_5: saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā upapātiko hoti. Tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokāti.
anya-e0301n:388_0: Ādinā mālukyaputtasutta anupadasuttādīsuca anekesu suttantesu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
anya-e0301n:388_1: ekekāya samāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vuṭṭhitasamāpattidhammasammasanameva āgataṃ. Napana
anya-e0301n:388_2: aññajjhāna sammasanaṃ. Tasmā satipi yogīnaṃ icchāvasena pādakajjhānato aññajjhānasammasane
anya-e0301n:388_3: pādakajjhānameva pamāṇanti sakkā viññātunti. Ettāvatā sammasitavādo sabbadubbaloti
anya-e0301n:388_4: siddho hotīti. Yepana aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinopi jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvāva maggaṃ uppādenti.
anya-e0301n:388_5: Pathamajjhānamevavā pādakaṃ katvā ajjhāsayavisesaṃ akatvā maggaṃ uppādenti. Pathamajjhānamattalābhinovā
anya-e0301n:388_6: hutvā tameva pādakaṃ katvā maggaṃ uppādenti. Yeca sukkhavipassakā hutvā maggaṃ uppādenti.
anya-e0301n:388_7: Tesaṃ pathamajjhānikova maggo hotīti veditabbo. Apica ye pakatiyāva aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
anya-e0301n:388_8: ciṇṇavasībhūtā honti. Te vināpi āsannapādakena yaṃyaṃjhānaṃ icchanti. Taṃtaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:390_0: “Sacepana puggalassa tathāvidho ajjhāsayo natthi. Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato vuṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n:390_1: uparuparijjhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā sammasitajjhānasadiso
anya-e0301n:391_0: Na hi ārammaṇamattabhūtaṃ sammasitajjhānaṃ uparimaṃpi samānaṃ āsanne vuṭṭhitajjhānato
anya-e0301n:391_1: balavataraṃ bhavituṃ arahati. Āsanne vuṭṭhitasseva cittasantānaṃ visesetuṃ samatthabhāvato.
anya-e0301n:391_2: Tato yevahi so sammasitavādo sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu kecivādapakkhe eva thapitoti. Nanu
anya-e0301n:391_3: puggalajjhāsayavādopi tathāthapitoevāti. Saccaṃ, sopana lokiyajjhānānaṃ uppattividhānena
anya-e0301n:393_0: “Uparuparijjhānato pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhima heṭṭhimajjhāna dhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo
anya-e0301n:393_1: sammasitajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā pāda kajjhānasadiso hoti. Heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānatohi
anya-e0301n:393_2: uparu parijjhānaṃ balavatara”nti. Taṃpi paṭikkhittaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:394: Na hi pādakajjhānaṃ uparima bhūtattāyeva balavataraṃ hoti. Pādakabhūtattāyeva pana balavataraṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:396_0: Magge vedanāniyamopana pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vasena nasiddho. Aññathā vipassanā yāyakāyacivedanāya
anya-e0301n:396_1: yuttā hutvā tehi niyamitāya ekekāya maggavedanāya saddhiṃ ghaṭi yeyyāti iminā adhippāyena
anya-e0301n:396_2: “vedanāniyamopana sabbatthapi vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanāniyamena hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Tampi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:397_0: Pādakajjhānādīnaṃ vaseneva vipassanāya saha vedanāniyamassa siddhattā. Tathāhi taṃtaṃ
anya-e0301n:397_1: pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya vipassantassa vipassanā ādito kadāci somanassasahagatāvā
anya-e0301n:397_2: hoti. Kadāci upekkhāsahagatāvā. Maggavuṭṭhānakālepana yadipādakajjhānaṃ somanassajjhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:397_3: hoti. Vipassanā ekantena somassasaha gatāva hutvā maggena saddhiṃ ghaṭiyatīti. Vuttañhetaṃ
anya-e0301n:398_0: Tatra bhikkhave yā cha nekkhammassitā upekkhā. Tā nissāya tā āgamma yāni cha nekkhammassitāni
anya-e0301n:398_1: somanassāni. Tāni pajahatha. Tāni samatikkamatha. Evametesaṃ pahānaṃ hoti. Evametesaṃ samatikkamo hotīti.
anya-e0301n:399_0: Aṭṭhakathāyañca aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu pathamādinica tīṇijhānāni suddhasaṅkhāreca pādake
anya-e0301n:399_1: katvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāga vipassanā somanassasahagatā
anya-e0301n:399_2: vā hoti. Upekkhāsaha gatāvāvuṭṭhānagāminīpana somanassasahagatāva hoti. Catutthajjhānādīni
anya-e0301n:399_3: pādakānikatvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā purima
anya-e0301n:399_4: sadisāva. Vuṭṭhānagāminīpana upekkhāsahagatāva hoti. Idaṃ sandhāyayā chanekkhammassitā.La.
anya-e0301n:399_5: Pajahathāti vuttaṃ. Ajjhāsayavisesena saha maggavuṭṭhānepi esevanayo. Balavavipassanākāle
anya-e0301n:399_6: hi vipassanāratināma suṭṭhu paṇītatarā hoti. Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā ajjhottharamānā
anya-e0301n:402_0: Tasmā tadā pādakajjhānavisesenavā ajjhāsayavisesena vā vinā vipassanā upekkhāsahagatā
anya-e0301n:402_1: na hoti. Ekantena somanassasahagatāva hotīti. Etthapana sabbajjhānesu vasībhūtassa
anya-e0301n:402_2: yaṃkiñci ekaṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā taṃ pā aññaṃvā maggeyaṃyaṃ jhānaṃ icchati. Maggavuṭṭhānakāle
anya-e0301n:402_3: ajjhāsayabalena taṃtaṃjhānānurūpaṃ vipassanāyaca maggeca vedanā pariṇāmo veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:403_0: 67. Saṅgahagāthāyaṃ anuttaraṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ jhānaṅgayogabhedena ekekaṃ pañcadhā
anya-e0301n:403_1: katvā cattālīsavidhanti ca vuccatīti yojanā. Idāni sabbāni mahaggatā nuttaracittāni
anya-e0301n:403_2: pañcavidhe jhāna koṭṭhāse saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ yathāca rūpāvacarantiādimāha. Yathā
anya-e0301n:403_3: rūpāvacaraṃ cittaṃ pathamādijjhānabhede gayhati. Jhāna bhedasiddhe pathamajjhānikacittādike
anya-e0301n:403_4: pañcavidhe cittabhede saṅgayhati, tathā anuttarañca cittaṃ pathamādijjhānabhede saṅgayhati.
anya-e0301n:403_5: Āruppañcacittaṃ upakkhekaggatā saṅkhātena pañcamajjhānena yuttattā pañcame jhāne
anya-e0301n:403_6: pañcamajjhānikacittabhede saṅgayhati. Tasmā ekekaṃ patamādikaṃ pathamajjhānikacittādikaṃ
anya-e0301n:403_7: jhānaṃ jhānacittaṃ ekādasa vidhaṃ hoti. Antetu antimabhūte pañcamajjhānikacittabhedepana
anya-e0301n:403_8: jhānaṃ cittaṃ tevīsatividhaṃ bhaveti yojanā. Etthaca jhānasaddena taṃsampayuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:403_9: cittameva vuccati. Na hi jhānaṃ ekādasavidhaṃvā tevīsatividhaṃvā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:405: “Rūpāvacaracittaṃ pathamajjhānantiādinā vuccatītica āruppañcāpi pañcamajjhānavohāraṃ labhatī”ti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:406: Na hi cittaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ hoti. Naca pañcamajjhānavohāraṃ labhatīti.
anya-e0301n:407: [70] Yāca imissāgāthāyaṃ aparāpi yojanā vuttā. Sāpi na yuttāeva.
anya-e0301n:408_0: Tathā saddassa pathamādijjhānabhedeti padassa purato paṭhitattāti. Evaṃ yathā vibhajitabbe
anya-e0301n:408_1: ekadese vibhatte sabbaṃ ekūnanavutividhaṃ cittaṃ ekavīsasataṃ katvā vibhattaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:408_2: hoti. Tathā vibhajitvā idāni taṃsaṅgahaṃ dassento antimagāthamāha. Puññaṃ sattatiṃsavidhaṃ
anya-e0301n:408_3: hoti. Tathā pākaṃ dvipaññāsavidhaṃ hoti. Iti ekūnanavutividhāni cittāni ekavīsasataṃ
anya-e0301n:408_4: katvā budhā paṇḍitā āhu kathesuṃ. Kathentivā vibhajanti vicakkhaṇāti vuttaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:413_0: 68. Evaṃ cittaṅgahaṃ dassetvā idāni anupattaṃ cetasika saṅgahaṃ dassento catūhi sampayogalakkhaṇehi
anya-e0301n:413_1: saha vacanatthañca sarūpatthañca tāva dassetuṃ ādi gāthamāha. Tattha ekuppādanirodhācaekālambaṇavatthukāti
anya-e0301n:413_2: catussampayogalakkhaṇadassanaṃ. Ceto yuttāti vacanatthadassanaṃ. Cetasiyuttā cetasāvā
anya-e0301n:413_3: yuttā cetasikāti dassanato. Dvipaññāsadhammāti sarūpadassanaṃ. Cetasikāti pana siddhapada
anya-e0301n:413_4: dassanaṃ. Tattha dhammānaṃ anāgatabhāvasaṅkhātā pubbantato uddhaṃ pajjanaṃ gamanaṃ
anya-e0301n:413_5: sarūpato pātubhavanaṃ uppādo. Jātīti vuttaṃ hoti. Sabbepihi saṅkhata dhammā anāgatabhāvapubbā
anya-e0301n:413_6: eva honti. Tato paccayasāmaggiṃ labhitvā paccuppannabhāvaṃ gacchanti. Tato nirujjhitvā
anya-e0301n:413_7: atītabhāvaṃ gacchantīti. Nirujjhanaṃ nirodho. Sarūpavināso bhaṅgo aniccatā maraṇanti
anya-e0301n:413_8: vuttaṃ hoti. Yā cittassa jāti, sāyeva phassādīnaṃ. Yā cittassa jarā, yaṃ cittassa
anya-e0301n:413_9: maraṇaṃ, yaṃ cittassa ārammaṇaṃ vatthu. Tadeva phassādīnantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena
anya-e0301n:413_10: eko uppādo etesanti ekuppādā. Eko nirodho etesanti ekanirodhā. Ekuppādāca te ekanirodhācāti
anya-e0301n:413_11: ekuppādanirodhā. Uttarapade ekasaddassa lopo. Evaṃ paratthapi. Ekaṃ ālambaṇaṃ etesanti
anya-e0301n:413_12: ekālambaṇā. Ekaṃ vatthu etesanti ekavatthukā. Ekālambaṇāca te ekavatthukācāti ekālambaṇavatthukā.
anya-e0301n:413_13: Ālambaṇaṃ panettha ekacittassapi bahudeva hoti. Ekattaṃpana upanetvā ekaṃ ālambaṇanti
anya-e0301n:415: “Ekato uppādoca nirodhoca yesaṃ, te ekuppādanirodhā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:416: Na hi ekakkhaṇe ekato uppādamattena ekuppādatā idha adhippetā. Athakho vuttanayeneva adhippetā. Vuttañhetaṃ mūlaṭīkāyaṃ –
anya-e0301n:419_0: Tatrāyaṃ yojanā. Ekuppādanirodhāca ekālambaṇavatthukā ca hutvā yedhammā cetoyuttā.
anya-e0301n:419_1: Te dvipaññāsadhammā cetasikā matāti. Bhāvapadhānaṃpivā ettha yuttaṃ. Visesaneca nissakkavacanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:419_2: Ekuppādanirodhabhāvena ekālambaṇa vatthuka bhāvenaca yedhammā cetoyuttā. Te dvipaññāsadhammā
anya-e0301n:419_3: cetasikānāma matā ñātāti. Etthaca ye cetoyuttā. Te cetasikāti vutte cittassa sahajātapaccayuppannarūpānipi
anya-e0301n:419_4: tadāyattavuttitāya ekantena cittasambandhīni hutvā cetoyuttāni cetasikāni nāma siyuṃ.
anya-e0301n:419_5: Tasmā tesaṃ nivattanatthaṃ ekuppādanirodhāca, ekā lambaṇavatthukāti vuttaṃ. Tānihi
anya-e0301n:419_6: cittena khaṇato sahuppannānipi bhinnasantānattā yā cittassa jāti, sāeva tesanti imaṃ
anya-e0301n:419_7: lakkhaṇaṃpi nānubhonti. Aññaṃhi rūpasantānaṃ. Aññaṃ arūpasantānanti. Phassādīnaṃpana
anya-e0301n:419_8: uppādamattameva cittena saha ekaṃ nahoti. Athakho nirodhopi ālambaṇaṃpi vatthupi
anya-e0301n:419_9: sabbaṃ ekamevāti ñāpanatthaṃ eka nirodhādiggahaṇaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na hi evaṃ
anya-e0301n:419_10: avutte sakkā tathā jānitunti. Yasmāpana yathā bahujanasantako eko goṇo tissassa goṇo
anya-e0301n:419_11: dattassa goṇoti evaṃ visuṃ visuṃpi vattabboyeva hoti. Evamevaṃ uppādo nirodhoca ekasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:419_12: rūpārūpakalāpe ekovasamānopi phassassa uppādo vedanāya uppādo pathavidhātuyā uppādo
anya-e0301n:419_13: āpodhātuyā uppādoti evamādinā nayena visuṃ visuṃpi vattabboyeva. Tasmā suttantesu –
anya-e0301n:420_0: Vedanāya uppādo paññāyati. Vayo paññāyati. Ṭhikāya aññatthaṃ paññāyati. Saññāya.
anya-e0301n:420_1: Saṅkhārānaṃ. Viññāṇassa. La. Paññāyatīti vuttaṃ. Tathā yo bhikkhave pathavidhātuyā
anya-e0301n:420_2: uppādo ṭhitiabhinibbatti pātubhāvo. Dukkhasseso uppādo rogānaṃ ṭhiti jarā maraṇassa
anya-e0301n:420_3: pātubhāvo. Yo bhikkhave āpodhātuyā. Yo bhikkhave tejo dhātuyā. Yo bhikkhave vāyodhātuyā.
anya-e0301n:420_4: Yo bhikkhave cakkhussa.La. Manassa uppādo.La. Jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvoti.
anya-e0301n:421_0: Vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Itarathā jīvitindriyādīnapi ekasmiṃ kalāpe bahubhāvo vattabbo
anya-e0301n:421_1: siyā. Yo arūpīnaṃ dhammānaṃ āyu ṭhiti avaṭṭhitīti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā vikārarūpānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:421_2: Sabbesaṃpivā cakkhādīnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ. Catunnaṃ cahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpantica catunnaṃ
anya-e0301n:421_3: mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādotica vuttanti. Kāyalahutā cittalahutādayopana atthavisesadīpanatthaṃ
anya-e0301n:421_4: dvidhā bhinditvā vuttā. Soca atthavisesoupari āvi bhavissatīti. Ayametthaparamatthadīpanā.
anya-e0301n:423_0: Imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “yadi ekuppādamatteneva cetoyuttāti adhippetā.
anya-e0301n:423_1: Tadā cittena saha uppajjamānānaṃ rūpadhammānampi cetoyuttatā āpajjeyyāti eka nirodhaggahaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:423_2: Evampi cittānuparivattino viññattidvayassa pasaṅgo nasakkā nīvāretuṃ. Tathā ekato
anya-e0301n:423_3: uppādo vā nirodhovā etesanti ekuppādanirodhāti parikappentassa puretaramuppajjitvā
anya-e0301n:423_4: cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirujjhamānānampi rūpadhammānanti ekālambaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Ye evaṃ
anya-e0301n:423_5: tividhalakkhaṇā. Te niyāmato ekavatthukā yevāti dassanatthaṃ. Ekavatthukaggahaṇanti.
anya-e0301n:424_0: 69. Kathañca dvipaññāsa hontīti pucchitvā pathamaṃ dvipaññāsa sarūpaṃ tīhi rāsīhi
anya-e0301n:424_1: vibhajitvā dassento kathantiādimāha. Tattha phusatīti phasso. Phusanti sampayuttakā
anya-e0301n:424_2: dhammā etenāti phasso. Phusanamattamevavā etanti phasso. Phusanañcettha ārammaṇassa
anya-e0301n:424_3: iṭṭhāniṭṭharasaṃ āhacca upahacca gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yato tadanubhavanti vedanā pātubhavati.
anya-e0301n:424_4: Phassapaccayā vedanāti hi vuttaṃ. Svāyaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo. Nanucāyaṃ arūpadhammo.
anya-e0301n:424_5: Naca arūpadhammā appaṭighasabhāvā kiñci phusantīti. Saccaṃ, ayaṃpana phusanā kārenaca
anya-e0301n:424_6: pavattati. Yañca phusantehi sādhetabbaṃ. Tañca kiccaṃ sādheti. Tasmā ayaṃ phassotica
anya-e0301n:424_7: phusanalakkhaṇotica vutto. Kiṃpana sādhetīti. Ārammaṇarasānurūpaṃ cittassa vikārapatti.
anya-e0301n:424_8: Vedanāvisesuppattiṃvā. Ayañca attho ambilakhādādike disvā aparassa kheḷuppādādīsu pākaṭoti.
anya-e0301n:426: “Kheḷuppādādiviya daṭṭhabbo”ti vuttaṃ. Evañcasati idaṃ upamā mattaṃ siyā. Atipākaṭāyapana phassappavattiyā dassana midanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:427_0: 70. Vedayatīti vedanā. Ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati. Aviditaṃvā ārammaṇarasaṃ sampayuttānaṃ
anya-e0301n:427_1: taṃsamaṅgipuggalānaṃ vā viditaṃpākaṭaṃ karotīti attho. Vindantiva etāya sattā sātaṃvā
anya-e0301n:427_2: asātaṃvā labhantīti vedanā. Vedayitamattamevavā etanti vedanā. Pāḷiyaṃpana –
anya-e0301n:428: Vedayati vedayatīti kho bhikkhave tasmā vedanāti vuccati. Kiñca vedayati, sukhaṃpi vedayati. Dukkhaṃpi vedayati. Adukkhamasukhaṃpi vedayatīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:429_0: Nanu sabbepi cittacetasikā dhammā ārammaṇarasānubhavanappa katikāevāti tepi vedanānāma
anya-e0301n:429_1: siyunti. Nasiyuṃ. Tehi kiccantarabyāvaṭā honti. Ārammaṇarasaṃ ujuṃ anubhavituṃ nasakkonti.
anya-e0301n:429_2: Attano attano kiccaṃ karontāva ekadesamattena anubhavanti. Vedanāyevapana anaññakiccatāya
anya-e0301n:429_3: anubhavanakicce ādhipaccayogatāyaca issarabhāvena anubhavatīti sāeva vedanānāma bhavituṃ
anya-e0301n:429_4: arahatīti. Evañcakatvā rājaggabhojana rasānubhavane tesaṃ sūdasadisatā vedanāyaevaca
anya-e0301n:430_0: 71. Sañjānātīti saññā. Puna jānanatthaṃ saññāṇaṃ karotīti attho. Ayañhi pubbe gahitasaññānena
anya-e0301n:430_1: sañjānanakālepi puna jānanatthaṃ saññāṇaṃ karotiyevāti. Sāhi evaṃ punappunaṃ saññāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:430_2: katvā uppajjamānā thirasaññābhāvaṃ patvā yāvatāyukaṃpi bhavantaraṃ patvāpi sattānaṃ
anya-e0301n:430_3: appamuṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādheti. Micchā bhinivesasaññābhāvaṃ patvāca ime satte sabbaññu
anya-e0301n:430_4: buddhehipi bodhetuṃ asakkuṇeyye karotīti. Tathāhi sā puna sañjānanatthaṃ nimittakaraṇe
anya-e0301n:430_6: andhasadisātica. Upaṭṭhitavisayaggahaṇe tiṇapurisakesu migapotakasadisātica vuttāti. Pāḷiyaṃpana –
anya-e0301n:431: Sañjānāti sañjānātītikho bhikkhave tasmā saññāti vuccati. Kiñca sañjānāti. Nīlaṃpi sañjānāti. Pītakaṃpi sañjānātītiādi vuttanti.
anya-e0301n:432_0: 72. Cetayatīti cetanā. Sampayuttadhamme tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇevā kiccevā abhisandahati
anya-e0301n:432_1: punappunaṃ ghaṭeti, tattha pabandhavasena nirantaraṃ pavattamāne karotīti attho.
anya-e0301n:432_2: Pakappeti vā te. Saṃvidahati ārammaṇapaṭilābhāyavā kammasiddhiyā abhisaṅkharoti.
anya-e0301n:432_3: Āyūhativā te. Ārammaṇe sampiṇḍeti ekato samo sarante karotīti attho. Tathāhi sā āyūhanarasāhica
anya-e0301n:432_4: saṃvidhānapaccupaṭṭhānātica vuttā. Tāyahi tasmiṃ nirantaraṃ ussukkana byāpāravasena
anya-e0301n:432_5: pavattamānāya taṃ sampayuttāpi attano attano kiccaṃ kurumānā tasmiṃ tatheva pavattantīti.
anya-e0301n:432_6: Teneva sā sakicca parakicca sādhaka jeṭṭhasissa mahāvaḍḍhaki ādisadisāti vuttāti.
anya-e0301n:434_0: Ceteti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇe byāpāramāpajjatīti vatvā tadatthasādhanatthaṃ yaṃ vuttaṃ
