anya-e0301n:1233_4: kuto vītikkamoti imamatthaṃ sandhāya maggo anāgatasāmaññaṃ kilesajātaṃ pajahatīti
anya-e0301n:1233_5: tattha tattha vutto. Tattha anāgatasāmaññanti anāgatasammataṃ, na ekanta anāgataṃ.
anya-e0301n:1233_6: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ maggo yekilese pajahati, te atītākivā anāgatātivā paccuppannātivā
anya-e0301n:1233_7: navattabbāti vuttaṃ. Etenaca maggo kilesamukhena yāni kusalākusalakammānica upādinnakakhandhapañcakeca
anya-e0301n:1233_8: pajahati, te atītātivāanāgatātivā paccuppannātivā navattabbāti dīpeti. Yadi evaṃ
anya-e0301n:1233_9: maggena pahīnā sabbe tebhūmakadhammā kālavimuttānāma ataṅkhatā nāma apaccayānāma
anya-e0301n:1233_10: siyunti.Na. Tekālikajātikattā saṅkhata sapaccayajātikattā ca. Te hi magge anuppanne
anya-e0301n:1233_11: ime nāmadhammā uppajjissanti nirujjhissantīti evaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ āhacca ñāṇena
anya-e0301n:1233_12: gahitattā lakkhaṇavasena tebhūmakādibhāvaṃ bhajantīti. Evañca katvā visuṃ sampayuttadhammabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1233_13: apattānaṃ anusayāvatthāya vā vāsanāvatthāyavā kammasamaṅgītāvatthāyavā āsayajjhāsayā
anya-e0301n:1233_14: dhimutticaritavatthāsuvā ṭhitānaṃ sabhāvānaṃ jātivasena paramattha dhammatā akusalāditāca paccetabbā hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1235_0: “Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanā rahā santāne anuanusayitā viya hontīti
anya-e0301n:1235_1: tadavatthā anusayāti vuccanti. Te pana nippariyāyato anāgata kilesā. Atītapaccuppannāpi
anya-e0301n:1235_2: taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccantī”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha anusayānāma santāne kadācipi anuppanna
anya-e0301n:1235_3: pubbā anāgata kilesā evāti katvā santāne anu anusayitā viya hontīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:1236: Na hi te anuanusayitā viya honti. Ekantena anusayitāeva hontīti.
anya-e0301n:1238: “Te pana nippariyāyato anāgatakilesā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1239_0: Na hi maggena appahīnā anusayā anāgatānāma honti. Pahīnāpica nippariyāyato anāgatāti
anya-e0301n:1239_1: nasakkā vattuṃ. Anāgata sāmaññassa adhippetattāti. Etena atītapaccuppannāpi taṃsabhāvattātathā
anya-e0301n:1239_2: vuccantīti idaṃvipaṭikkhittaṃ hoti. Apica, uppādaṭṭhitibhaṅga pattānaṃeva ekantena
anya-e0301n:1239_3: tekālikatā hotīti tadapattānaṃ anusayānaṃ paccuppannatā pariyāyova vattuṃ yutto.
anya-e0301n:1239_4: Evañca katvā pāḷiyaṃ yassa kāmarāganusayo uppajjati, tassa paṭighānusayo uppajjatītiādinā
anya-e0301n:1239_5: paccuppannakāliko uppādavāro eva vutto, na nirodhavāro, naca atītānāgata vārāti.
anya-e0301n:1239_6: Yaṃ pana paṭisambhidāmagge hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati. Tena hi ratto rāgaṃ
anya-e0301n:1239_7: pajahati, duṭṭho dosaṃ, muḷho mohanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pariyuṭṭhānapattānaṃ ekantapaccuppannakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1239_8: sandhāya vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vattamānuppannaṃ bhutvā vigatuppannaṃ
anya-e0301n:1239_9: okāsakatuppannaṃ samudācāruppannanti catubbidhaṃ uppannaṃ na maggavajjhaṃ. Bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ
anya-e0301n:1239_10: ārammaṇā dhiggahi tuppannaṃ avikkhambhituppannaṃ asamugghāṭituppannanti catubbidhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1239_11: maggavajjhanti vuttaṃ. Tattha vattamānuppannaṃ samudā cāruppannanti idaṃ dvayaṃ khaṇapaccuppannameva.
anya-e0301n:1239_12: Bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ atītameva. Okāsa katuppannaṃ anāgatameva. Tadubhayaṃ pana paccuppannasamīpattā
anya-e0301n:1240_0: Bhūmiladdhuppannaṃnāma attano khandhesu anusayitānaṃ maggena appahīnānaṃ anusayānaṃeva
anya-e0301n:1240_1: nāmaṃ. Ārammaṇādhiggahituppannaṃ nāma subhanimittādike ārammaṇe sakiṃ javitvā yāva
anya-e0301n:1240_2: tammūlako pariyuṭṭhānavego na vūpasammati, tāva adhimattathāmagata bhāvena ṭhitānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1240_3: tesaññeva nāmaṃ. Anusayā hi nāma anamatagge saṃsāre punappunaṃ pariyuṭṭhānapattānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1240_4: kilesānaṃ vasena uparupari thira tara daḷhatara pattiyā pakatiyāpi thāmagatāevanāma
anya-e0301n:1240_5: honti. Na yenavā tenavā vāyāmena pajahituṃ sakkuṇeyyā. Evaṃ santepi yadā yo yo anusayo
anya-e0301n:1240_6: paccayalābhena pariyuṭṭhāna bahulo hoti, tadā so so visesena adhimattathāma gatabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1240_7: patvā ṭhito hoti. Yadā yo yo paṭipakkhadhamma samādānena niggahapatto hoti, tadā
anya-e0301n:1240_8: so so mandathāma gatabhāvaṃ patvā ṭhito hotīti. Avikkhambhituppannaṃnāma samatha
anya-e0301n:1240_9: vipassanāhi suṭṭhuaniggahitānaṃ tesaññeva nāmaṃ. Asamugghāṭi tuppannaṃnāma maggena
anya-e0301n:1240_10: appahīnānaṃ bhūmiladdhānaṃ tesaṃeva nāmanti. Yasmā pana lokuttaradhammānāma kilesānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1240_11: accantapaṭipakkhā hontīti heṭṭhimā maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhā sekkhā attano maggaphalakkhaṇesu
anya-e0301n:1240_12: upari maggājjhehipi anusayehi sānusayātivā nirānusayātivā thāmavatātivā athāmagatātivā
anya-e0301n:1240_13: navattabbā. Tasmā anusayānaṃ tādise paccuppanna bhāve satipi hañci paccuppanne kilese
anya-e0301n:1240_14: pajahati. Tenahi thāmagato anusayaṃ pajahatīti vutta doso natthīti veditabboti. Kāmarāgoeva
anya-e0301n:1241_0: Saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanāni, tāni pana sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso
anya-e0301n:1241_1: kāmacchando byāpādoti pañca orambhāgiyāni. Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṃ avijjāti
anya-e0301n:1241_2: pañca uddhaṃbhāgiyānīti suttante abhidhammeca dasasaṃyojanāni āgatāni. Itarāni pana
anya-e0301n:1241_3: abhidhammeeva āgatānīti tato visesakaraṇatthaṃ suttanteti vuttaṃ. Kamo pana dvinnaṃpi
anya-e0301n:1241_4: pāḷiyā nasameti. Sabhāga dhammasaṅgahavasena pana idha aññathā kamo vutto siyāti.
anya-e0301n:1241_5: Cittaṃ kilissanti vibādhenti upatāpenticāti kilesā. Kilissantivā malīnabhāvaṃ nihīnabhāvañca
anya-e0301n:1241_6: gacchanti sattā etehīti kilesā. Kāmabhavanāmenāti vatthukāmadīpakena kāmanāmena rūpārūpabhavadīpakena
anya-e0301n:1241_7: ca bhavanāmena. Tādisaṃ kāma bhavasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ vatthu etissāti tabbatthukā.
anya-e0301n:1241_8: Tathā pavattanti sīlabbatāni parato āmasanākārena idaṃ me saccaṃ moghamaññanti abhinivisanākārena
anya-e0301n:1241_9: khandhesu attābhinivesākārenaca pavattaṃ. Vatthutoti sabhāvadhammato. Ayaṃ pāpasaṅgaho
anya-e0301n:1242_0: 163. Missaka saṅgahe pāṇātipātādīni pāpakammāni karontānaṃpi cittassa ārammaṇe ujukaraṇaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:1242_1: jhānena vinā na sijjhatīti vuttaṃ sattajhānaṅgānīti. Kalyāṇevā pāpakevā ārammaṇe
anya-e0301n:1242_2: ujukaṃ cittapaṭipādanasaṅkhātassa upanijjhāyana kiccassa aṅgānīti attho. Tattha domanassaṃ
anya-e0301n:1242_4: sugati duggati vivaṭṭasaṅkhātāsuca nānādisāsu taṃtaṃdisāti mukhappavattisaṅkhātā
anya-e0301n:1242_5: cittassa gatināma sammāvā micchāvā pavattehi dassanādīhi eva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ dvādasamaggaṅgānīti.
anya-e0301n:1242_6: Cittassa ujugatiyāvā vaṅkagatiyāvā gamanassa pathaṅgāni upāyaṅgānīti attho. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1242_7: micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappa micchāvāyāma micchāsamādhayo pāpakamma duggatibhava saṅkhātāsu
anya-e0301n:1242_8: ahitadisāsu cittassa vaṅkagatiyā gamanassa upāyaṅgāni, itarāni kalyāṇakamma sugatibhava
anya-e0301n:1242_9: vivaṭṭadhammasaṅkhātāsu hitadisāsu ujugatiyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha pāṇātipātakamme
anya-e0301n:1242_10: vitakka vicāra domanassekaggatā saṅkhātaṃ caturaṅgikajjhānaṃ micchāsaṅkappa micchāvāyāma
anya-e0301n:1242_11: micchāsamādhi saṅkhāto tiyaṅgīkamaggoca veditabbo. Evaṃ sesesu sucaritaduccaritakammesu
anya-e0301n:1242_12: jhānamaggā uddharitabbā. Vibhaṅge pana suttantesuca micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo
anya-e0301n:1242_13: micchāsatīti imepi cattāro āgatā. Ime pana visuṃ cetasikadhammā nahonti. Tathā tathā
anya-e0301n:1242_14: pavattānaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ adhivacananti katvā idha nagahitā.
anya-e0301n:1244: “Sugati duggatīnaṃ nibbānassa ca abhimukhaṃ pāpanato maggā; Tesaṃ pathabhūtāni aṅgāni maṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ; Taṃ na sundaraṃ;
anya-e0301n:1245: Na hi aṅgāni maggānaṃ pathabhūtānināma honti; Maggasaddoyeva pathapariyāyo aṭṭhakathāsu vutto na aṅgasaddoti;
anya-e0301n:1247: “Maggassavā aṭṭhaṅgikassa aṅgāni maggaṅgānī”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi anupapannaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1248_0: Idha hi katthaci citte tiyaṅgiko katthaci caturaṅgikotiādinā nānāmaggova adhippetoti.
anya-e0301n:1248_1: Ādhipaccaṭṭhena indriyāni. Kiñca ādhipaccaṃ. Attādhīnavuttike dhamme attano gatiyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1248_2: sabbaso vattetuṃ samatthabhāvo. Iti tesu tesu kiccesu attano ādhipaccasaṅkhātaṃ indaṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1248_3: karonti sādhentīti indriyāni. Indaṭṭhaṃ kārentītipi indriyāni. Issarā adhipatinoti
anya-e0301n:1248_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha pañcacakkhādīni dassanādikiccesu cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ issarāhonti.
anya-e0301n:1248_6: pavattiyaṃ catusamuṭṭhānika rūpānaṃ sakalakhandhapañcakasseva vā issaro hoti. Aññathā
anya-e0301n:1248_7: appavattito. Tathā hi yasmiṃ santāne paṭisandhiyaṃ itthibhāvo pavattati. Tasmiṃ sabbe
anya-e0301n:1248_9: no aññathā. Chandacittādhippāyāpi tasmiṃ mandākārasahitāva pavattanti. Tabbiparītena
anya-e0301n:1248_10: purisasantānaṃ veditabbaṃ. Jīvitadvayaṃ rūpā rūpasantatīnaṃ ratti diva māsa saṃvaccharānukkamena
anya-e0301n:1248_11: addhānapharaṇe sahajātadhammānaṃ issaro hoti. Tesaṃ tadāyattavutti kattā. Mano vijānanakicce.
anya-e0301n:1248_12: Vedanāpañcakaṃ tathā tathā ārammaṇarasānubhavane. Saddhā ārammaṇāvīmuccane. Vīriyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1248_13: kammani alīna vuttibhāve. Sati ārammaṇupaṭṭhāne. Samādhi ārammaṇe niccalaṭṭhi tiyaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1248_14: Paññā asammohakicce sampayuttadhammānaṃ issaro hoti. Anaññābhibhavanīyabhāvena pavattanato.
anya-e0301n:1248_15: Yathā hi silāyaṃ pathavī sahajātehi anabhibhavanīyā hoti. Attanāvate abhibhavitvā
anya-e0301n:1248_16: visuṃ avijjamāneviya katvā pavattati. Yathā ca udake āpo aggimhi tejo vāte vāyo.
anya-e0301n:1249_0: Aññāyittha paṭivijjhitthāti aññātaṃ. Na aññātaṃ anaññātaṃ. Catusaccadhammo. Amataṃvā
anya-e0301n:1249_1: padaṃ. Anaññātaṃ ñassāmi jānissāmīti anaññātaññassāmi. Ākhyātikaṃpi hi padaṃ saññāsaddabhāve
anya-e0301n:1249_2: ṭhitaṃ nāmikaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati. Yathā makkhaligosālo ehipassi koti. Evañhi sati tassa
anya-e0301n:1249_3: padantarena saha samāsabhāvo navirujjhatīti. Anaññātaññassāmīti evaṃ paṭipannassa
anya-e0301n:1249_4: indriyaṃ anaññā taññassāmītindriyaṃ. Ādimanasikārato paṭṭhāya tādisena ussāhena saha
anya-e0301n:1249_5: vipassanaṃ ārabhantassa tasmiṃ ussāhe apaṭipassaddheyeva sotāmattimaggaṃ paṭilabhantassa
anya-e0301n:1249_6: indriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ājānātīti aññaṃ. Tameva indriyanti aññindriyaṃ, pathamamaggena
anya-e0301n:1249_7: anaññātaṃ ñatvāpi kilesappahānakiccassa apariniṭṭhitattā tassa jānanakiccassa vippakatabhāvena
anya-e0301n:1249_8: yathā diṭṭhe tasmiṃ catusaccadhamme amatapadeeva vā punappunaṃ jānanakicca yuttānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1249_9: indriyanti vuttaṃ hoti. Aññātāvindriyanti aññā tāvino pariniṭṭhita ājānana kiccassa
anya-e0301n:1249_10: khīṇāsavassa indriyanti aññātāvindriyaṃ. Tividhaṃ petaṃ tathārūpe jānane sampayutta
anya-e0301n:1250_0: Tattha imesaṃ sattānaṃ pākaṭe rūpakāye attagāhadaḷhattaṃ tabbimuttica imesaṃ apariññāya
anya-e0301n:1250_1: pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ ādito pañca pasādindriyāni vuttāni. Tassa attassa itthipuma
anya-e0301n:1250_2: tābhedo imesaṃ vasena hoti. Tasmiṃ vā itthipurisa gāho tabbimuttica imesaṃ apariññāya
anya-e0301n:1250_3: pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ kadanantaraṃ bhāvindriyadvayaṃ vuttaṃ. Soca attā imassa
anya-e0301n:1250_4: vasena jīvasaññaṃ labhati. Tasmiṃvā jīvagāho tabbimuttica imassa apariññāya pariññāyaca
anya-e0301n:1250_5: hotīti dīpetuṃ tadanantaraṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vuttaṃ. Idaṃ pana bhāvindriyato pure vattabbaṃpi
anya-e0301n:1250_6: rūpārūpa missakattā idha vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nāmakāye attagāhadaḷhattaṃ tabbimuttica
anya-e0301n:1250_7: imassa apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ nāmindriyesu manindriyaṃ ādito vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1250_8: Soca arūpī attā imesaṃ vasena saṃkiliṭṭho vipphanditoca hoti. Tasmiṃvā sukhitadukkhitagāho
anya-e0301n:1250_9: tabbimuttica imesaṃ apariññāya pariññāyaca hotīti dīpetuṃ tadanantaraṃ pedanindriyapañcakaṃ
anya-e0301n:1250_10: vuttaṃ. Tassa saṃkiliṭṭhassa vodānappattiyā taṃtaṃgāhavimuttiyāvā paṭipattidassanatthaṃ
anya-e0301n:1250_11: tadanantaraṃ saddhādipañcindriyaṃ vuttaṃ. Tāya paṭipattiyā vodānappatti yā ādi majjha
anya-e0301n:1250_12: pariyosāna dassanatthaṃ ante tīṇi lokuttarindriyāni vuttānīti.
anya-e0301n:1252: “Ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhīti aññesaṃ agahaṇanti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:1253_0: Nahi santesupi aññesu indriyabhāvārahesu dhammesu ettāvatā adhippetatthasiddhiyā
anya-e0301n:1253_1: tesaṃ aññesaṃ bhagavato therassaca agahaṇanti yuttaṃ vattuṃ. Indriyabhāvārahassa
anya-e0301n:1253_2: aññassa asambhavato. Yadi hi sambhaveyya, sataṃpi sahassaṃpi gaṇhissatiyevāti. Baliyanti
anya-e0301n:1253_3: uppannuppanne paṭipakkhadhamme sahanti maddantīti balāni. Yathā abalānaṃ baliyanti.
anya-e0301n:1253_4: Maddantenaṃ parissayāti. Etthaca abalāti dubbalā. Nanti hīnavīriyaṃ janaṃ. Baliyantīti
anya-e0301n:1253_5: balasā karonti ajjhottharanti. Parissayāti abalā rāgādi parissayāti attho. Apica,
anya-e0301n:1253_6: paṭipakkhadhammehi akampiyaṭṭhena akkho bhaṇiyaṭṭhena balānināma. Tasmā assaddhiyasaṅkhātena
anya-e0301n:1253_7: paṭipakkhadhammena kampetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatā saddhābalaṃnāma. Kosajjasaṅkhātena kampetuṃ
anya-e0301n:1253_10: paññābalaṃ nāma. Sesadukadvayaṃ pana aññamaññaṃ paṭipakkhenayojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1255: Pāpabaladukaṃ paṭipakkhena yojetuṃ nalabbhatīti katvā “ahirikānottappadvayaṃ pana sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāve nevāti” vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1256_0: Sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvotica paṭipakkhehi akampiyatā tica atthato nānattābhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n:1256_2: kusalābyākatānīti. Adhipatīti ettha patīti sāmi issaro. So pana padesa issaro sakalissaroti
anya-e0301n:1256_3: duvidho. Tattha indriyāni paresaṃ visaye sayaṃ paravase vattitvā attano visayeeva
anya-e0301n:1256_4: parehi attano vase vattāpentīti padesissarā nāma. Pubbāti saṅkhāravasena pubbāgamanavasena
anya-e0301n:1256_5: vā visesetvā pavattaṃ adhipatiṭṭhānaṃ patvā pana añño dutiyo issaronāma natthi. Tasmā
anya-e0301n:1256_6: adhiko patīti adhipati. Attā dhīnavuttīnaṃ patīti adhipatītica vadanti.
anya-e0301n:1257_0: Chandoeva adhipatīti chandādhipati. Chandavato kiṃnāma kammaṃ nasijjhatīti evaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhāravasenavā
anya-e0301n:1257_1: pubbe atītabhavesu suṭṭhu āsevitachandāgamanavasenavā tesu tesu kalyāṇa pāpakammesu
anya-e0301n:1257_2: sampayuttadhamme mahoghoviya tiṇapaṇṇakasaṭe attaparādhīne niccaṃ paggahitadhure
anya-e0301n:1257_3: katvā pavatto kattukamyatā chando. Esa nayo sesesupi. Nanu cettha pacchimā tayo dhammā
anya-e0301n:1257_4: adhipatibhāvaṃ gaṇhantā indriyabhāvaṃ avijahitvāva gaṇhantīti adhipatibhūtāva samānā
anya-e0301n:1257_5: indriyakiccavasena paravasepi vattantīti. Saccaṃ, aññaṃ pana adhipatikiccaṃ, aññaṃ
anya-e0301n:1257_6: indriyakiccanti natthettha dosoti. Yathā hi rājā cakkavattī ekassa attano purohitassa
anya-e0301n:1257_7: santike ekaṃ dibbavijjaṃ gaṇhāti. Na ettāvatā rājā cakkavattināma nahoti. Naca vijjāhetu
anya-e0301n:1257_8: aññassa vasena vattati. Aññañhi cakkavatti rajjakiccaṃ, aññaṃ vijjāgahaṇa kiccanti.
anya-e0301n:1257_9: Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha adhipatikiccaṃnāma taṃtaṃkicca visesaṃ anapekkhitvā
anya-e0301n:1257_10: atulyabalena abhibhavitvā sahajāta dhamme attano attano kiccesu anivattamāne katvā
anya-e0301n:1257_11: dhura vāhitā. Indriyakiccaṃ pana vijānanādikiccaṃ ārabbha pavuccatīti.
anya-e0301n:1258_1: pavattentīti āhārā. Āharantivā ajjhattasambhūtā te te paccayadhammā paccayuppannadhammāca
anya-e0301n:1258_2: attānañceva attano attano paccayakiccaṃ paccayuppannakiccañca suṭṭhu haranti vahanti
anya-e0301n:1258_3: etehīti āhārā. Yathāhasabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti. Etthaca sabbe sattāti etena sabbe
anya-e0301n:1258_5: Yathārahaṃ catuvīsatipaccayehi ṭhitisabhāvāti attho. Nanucettha paccayāhārova vutto.
anya-e0301n:1258_6: Na āhārapaccayo. Idha pana catubbidho āhārapaccayadhammova vuttoti. Saccaṃ, paccayaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1258_7: pana āhāranāmakānaṃ sabbesaṃ catuvīsatipaccayadhammānaṃ majjhe yedhammā cattāro āhārāti
anya-e0301n:1258_8: visesetvā vuttā. Te tesaṃ paccayāhārānaṃpi āhārabhūtāti siddhā hontīti. Imasmiṃ atthe
anya-e0301n:1258_9: catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ mahanta bhāvo pākaṭo hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1259_0: Tattha yathā yavabījānaṃvā sālibījānaṃvā ānubhāvo nāma kaḷiraṅkurānaṃ uppādāna padhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1259_1: hoti. Tatoparaṃ pana sassabhāvaṃ patvā cha pañca māse vaḍḍhiyāvā ṭhitiyāvā pathavi
anya-e0301n:1259_2: rasaāporasānaṃ ānubhāvo padhānaṃ hoti. Evamevaṃ kabaḷī kārāhārūpajīvīnaṃ kāmasattānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1259_3: kammassa ānubhāvonāma paṭisandhirūpuppādane padhānaṃ hoti. Tatoparaṃ pana yāvatāyukaṃ
anya-e0301n:1259_4: vaḍḍhīyāvāṭhitiyāvā utuāhārānaṃ ānubhāvo padhānaṃ hoti. Kammajarūpāni hi yāva āsannamaraṇā
anya-e0301n:1259_5: pavattamānānipi utuāhārehi anuggahitānieva pavattanti. Utuca āhāru patthambhitoyeva
anya-e0301n:1259_6: attano kiccaṃ karoti. Tasmā tesaṃ sattānaṃ catusantatirūpaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārena anupatthambhīyamānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1259_7: ciraṃ napavattati. Upatthambhīyamānaṃeva yāvatāyukaṃ pavattati. Yathāca sakuṇāvā
anya-e0301n:1259_8: ḍaṃsamakasā dayovā tuṇḍena āhāraṃ gahetvā attabhāvaṃ posenti. Tuṇḍe asante āhāraṃ
anya-e0301n:1259_9: alabhantā maranti. Evameva ime sattā phassena ārammaṇesu rasaṃ gahetvā vedanāsaṅkhātaṃ
anya-e0301n:1259_10: upabhogaparibhogaṃ sampādetvā taṇhāvepullaṃ patvā tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ pūretvā yāvajjatanāpi
anya-e0301n:1260_0: Yadi hi phassonāma na siyā, ārammaṇarasaṃ alabhitvā vedanā paribhogarahitena taṇhuppattiyā
anya-e0301n:1260_1: okāso natthīti tividhavaṭṭameva nasiyāti. Yathāca te sakuṇādayo pakkhe viyūhitvā
anya-e0301n:1260_2: antarā apatamānā rukkhato rukkhaṃ vanato vanaṃ vicaritvā attānaṃ yāpenti. Pakkhesu
anya-e0301n:1260_3: asantesu gamanaṃ asampādentā patitvā maranti. Evamevaṃ ime sattā āyūhanalakkhaṇāya
anya-e0301n:1260_4: cetanāya cetayitvā kammasamaṅgitaṃ sampādetvā bhavato bhavaṃ vicaritvā yāvajjatanā
anya-e0301n:1260_5: vaṭṭe saṃsaranti. Yadi hi cetanānāma na siyā, kammavaṭṭassa abhāvo. Tadabhāveca vipākavaṭṭassa
anya-e0301n:1260_6: abhāvo. Tadabhāveca tadanusayitassa kilesavaṭṭassa abhāvoti vaṭṭaṃnāma na siyāti.
anya-e0301n:1260_7: Yathāca te sakuṇādayo cakkhunā gocaraṭṭhānaṃvā taṃtaṃdisābhāgaṃvā vibhāvetvā yāvajīvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1260_8: attānaṃ yāpenti. Cakkhusmiṃ asante kiñcigahetabbavatthuṃvā gantabbaṭṭhānaṃvā alabhitvā
anya-e0301n:1260_9: tattheva maranti. Evamevaṃ sampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇavijānalakkhaṇena viññāṇena taṃtaṃārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1260_10: labhitvā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ phassādayo uppādetvā tividhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ vaṭṭenti. Yadi hi viññāṇaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:1260_11: na siyā, phassādīnaṃ ārammaṇalābhoyeva natthīti vaṭṭameva na siyāti. Tenāha cattāro
anya-e0301n:1261_0: Cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃvā sattānaṃ anuggahāya
anya-e0301n:1261_1: kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷārikovā sukhumovā, phasso dutīyo, manosañcetanā tatīyā, viññāṇaṃ catutthanti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1262_0: Tattha bhūtānanti vuddhippattānaṃ. Sambhavesīnanti kalalādi kāle ṭhitānaṃ. Catunnaṃpana
anya-e0301n:1262_1: āhārānaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ anamatagge saṃsāravaṭṭevā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavevā ṭhitiyāvā
anya-e0301n:1262_2: anuggahāyavā pavatti ākāro vuttanayena veditabbo. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kopanettha āhāro.
anya-e0301n:1262_3: Kiṃ āhāretīti. Kabaḷīkārā hāro ojaṭṭhamakarūpāni āhāreti. Phassāhāro tisso vedanā.
anya-e0301n:1262_4: Manosañcetanāhāro tayo bhave. Viññāṇā hāro paṭisandhināmarūpanti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pākaṭaphalavasena
anya-e0301n:1262_5: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ojaṭṭhamakarūpuppādanaṃ pana kabaḷīkārāhārassa mahantaṃ kiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:1262_6: nahoti. Catusantatirūpupatthambhanameva mahantaṃ. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ ṭhitiyātica anuggahāyātica vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1263_0: Apica yathā upanissayāsevanapaccayā suttanti kapariyāyā abhidhammapariyāyātica duvidhā
anya-e0301n:1263_1: honti. Tathā āhārapaccayopi duvidho. Tattha yaṃ vuttaṃ manosañcetanāhāro tayobhaveti.
anya-e0301n:1263_2: Taṃ suttantikapariyāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Nahi paṭṭhāne arūpā hārā asahajātānaṃ dhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1263_3: āhāraṭṭhena paccayānāma hontīti. Pañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni nalabbhanti. Tāni hi dubbalakiccaṭṭhānavatthukattā
anya-e0301n:1263_4: rūpādīsu abhinipātamattāni hontīti na tesu vijjamānā vedanā ekaggatā jhānakiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:1263_5: sādhentīti. Vitakkapacchimakaṃ jhānantica vuttaṃ. Jhānaṅgānaṃ nāyakabhūtoca vitakko
anya-e0301n:1263_6: tesu natthīti tattha tāvedanā ekaggatāyo taṃ na sādhentīti. Vīriyupatthambharahitā
anya-e0301n:1263_7: dhammā sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvappattā nahontīti avīriyesu soḷasāhetukacittesu
anya-e0301n:1263_8: samādhibalakiccaṃ na sādheti. Vīriyapacchimakaṃ balanti hi vuttanti āha avīriyesu
anya-e0301n:1263_9: balāni nalabbhantīti. Heturahitā ca dhammā vaṭṭassa vivaṭṭassaca pattiyā pathabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1263_10: nagacchanti. Hetupacchimako maggoti hi vuttanti āha ahetukesu maggaṅgāni na labbhantīti.
anya-e0301n:1263_11: Vicikicchāsampayuttecitte ekaggatā adhimokkharahi tattā ekantena saṃsappanasabhāvāya
anya-e0301n:1263_12: vicikicchāya abhibhūtattā ca maggindriyabalabhāvāya balavatī nahotīti vuttaṃ vicikicchā
anya-e0301n:1263_13: citte ekaggatā maggindriyabalabhāvaṃ na gacchatīti. Dvihetuka tihetuka javanesvevāti
anya-e0301n:1263_14: ettha dvihetuka tihetukasaddena momūhadvayahasanajavanāni nivatteti. Javanasaddena
anya-e0301n:1265: “Dvihetukatihetukagahaṇena ekahetukesu adhipatīnaṃ abhāvaṃ dassetī”ti vuttaṃ, javanabhāvasāmaññattā pana hasanacittepi tesaṃ abhāvo dassetabboyeva hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1266_0: Yathāsambhavanti laddhapubbāti saṅkhārassa laddhapubbāgamassa ca ekekassa adhipatino
anya-e0301n:1266_1: sambhavānurūpaṃ ekova labbhati. Na dutiyo. Itarathā adhipatieva nasiyāti. Evañca
anya-e0301n:1266_2: katvā paṭṭhāne yathā indriyapaccayavibhaṅge arūpinoindriyā sampayuttakānaṃdhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1266_3: taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ indriyapaccayena paccayoti vuttaṃ. Na tathā adhipatipaccayavibhaṅge.
anya-e0301n:1266_4: Tattha pana chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānantiādinā ekekādhipati vibhāgavaseneva
anya-e0301n:1266_5: vuttanti. Evañhi sati adhipati indriyānaṃ viseso pākaṭo hotīti. Naveritāti nava īritā
anya-e0301n:1266_6: kathitā. Kusalā kusalā byākatehi samākiṇṇo kusalādi samākiṇṇo. [Missakasaṅgaho]
anya-e0301n:1267_0: 164. Cattāri saccāni bujjhatīti bodhi. Bujjhantivā tāni taṃ samaṅgino etāyāti bodhi.
anya-e0301n:1267_1: Catumaggañāṇaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ mahā niddese bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu-ñāṇanti. Pakkhoti
anya-e0301n:1267_2: koṭṭhāso sambhāro. Bodhiyā pakkhe bhavāti bodhipakkhiyā. Adhisīlā dhicittā dhipaññā
anya-e0301n:1267_3: saṅkhātāsu tīsu sikkhāsu pariyāpannānaṃ satthusāsanadhammānaṃ etaṃnāmaṃ. Te pana
anya-e0301n:1267_4: koṭṭhāsato satta vidhā hontīti āha cattārosatipaṭṭhānātiādi. Sampayutta dhammesu
anya-e0301n:1267_5: pamukhā padhānā hutvā kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu tiṭṭhanti nānārammaṇesu cittagamanaṃ nivattetvā
anya-e0301n:1267_6: tesveva kāyādīsu citta nibandhanavasena pavattantīti paṭṭhānāni. Satieva paṭṭhānānīti
anya-e0301n:1267_7: sati paṭṭhānāni. Cattārisatipaṭṭhānānīti vattabbe dhammabhāvaṃ apekkhitvā cattārosatipaṭṭhānā
anya-e0301n:1267_8: tivuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kāyeanupassanā kāyā nupassanā. Rūpakāye rūpasamūhe assāsapassāsādikassa
anya-e0301n:1267_9: avayavakāyassa taṃtaṃkāyabhāvenavā aniccādibhāvenavā yāva tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāye sammoho
anya-e0301n:1267_10: pahiyyati. Tāva punappunaṃ nirantaraṃ samanupassanāti attho. Navappabhedāsu vedanāsu
anya-e0301n:1267_11: sukhavedanādi kāyaavayavavedanāya taṃtaṃ vedanābhāvena udayabbayavasena ca anupassanā
anya-e0301n:1267_12: vedanānupassanā. Soḷasa pabhedesu sarāgā dīsu cittesu sarāgādikassa avayavacittassa
anya-e0301n:1267_13: taṃtaṃ cittabhāvena udayabbayavasenaca anupassanā cittānupassanā. Pañcapabhedesu
anya-e0301n:1267_14: nīvaraṇādīsu dhammesu kāmacchandādikassa avayavadhammassa taṃ taṃ dhammabhāvena udayabbayavasenaca
anya-e0301n:1269: “Kucchitānaṃ kesādīnaṃ āyoti kāyo. Assāsa passāsānaṃvā samūho kāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na sundara meva.
anya-e0301n:1271: “Kāyassa anupassanā kāyānupassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1272: Kāye kāyānupassī viharatīti hi vuttaṃ. Etena hi kāye anupassanā kāyānupassanāti ayamatthova padhānato dassitoti.
anya-e0301n:1274: “Vedanānaṃ vasena anupassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundaraṃ. Vedanāsu vedanānupassīti hi vuttaṃ. Tathā cittānupassanā padepi.
anya-e0301n:1276: “Saññāsaṅkhārānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhinnalakkhaṇānameva anupassanā dhammānupassanā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na sundarameva.
anya-e0301n:1277_0: Na hi katthaci pāḷiyaṃ saññāsaṅkhārāva visesetvā dhammāti vuttā atthīti. Pāḷiyañhi
anya-e0301n:1277_1: chanīvaraṇā pathamaṃ dhammāti vuttā. Tato pañcupādānakkhandhā. Tato dvādasāyatanāni.
anya-e0301n:1277_2: Tato sattabojjhaṅgā. Tato cattāri saccānīti. Yadievaṃ ekāya dhammānupassanāya vuttāya
anya-e0301n:1277_3: itarāpi siddhāti satipaṭṭhānaṃ ekameva vattabbaṃ, na cattāroti.Na. Yo hi dhammānupassanāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1277_4: rūpakkhandho vutto. So ruppanalakkhaṇānupassanavasena vutto. Ruppanalakkhaṇañhi nibbattitapara
anya-e0301n:1277_5: matthadhammo. Soca tathā anupassantassa visesato sukhumassa attavipallāsassa pahānāya
anya-e0301n:1277_6: hotīti. Kāyoti pana taṃtaṃ samūhabhūtarūpadhammavasena veditabbo. Naruppanalakkhaṇavasena.
anya-e0301n:1277_7: Naca taṃtaṃ kāyabhāvena gahito taṃtaṃ rūpadhammasamūho nibbattita paramatthadhammonāma
anya-e0301n:1277_8: hoti. Paññattimissakattā. Soca tathā anupassantassa visesato oḷārikassa subhādi vipallāsassa
anya-e0301n:1277_9: pahānāya hotīti. Tathā vedanācittesupi oḷārikavipallāso sukhumavipallāsoti dve dve
anya-e0301n:1277_10: vipallāsā honti. Tattha attupanibandhā niccasukha vipallāsā oḷārikā. Attavipallāso
anya-e0301n:1277_11: sukhumo. Tattha vedanā cittā nupassanā oḷārikavipallāsānaṃ pahānāya visuṃ vuttā.
anya-e0301n:1277_12: Dhammesu vedanākkhandhaviññāṇakkhandhā sukhuma vipallāsa pahānāyāti. Tasmā cattārova
anya-e0301n:1277_13: satipaṭṭhānā vattabbāti. Sammā padahanti etehīti sammappadhānāni. Kāmaṃ tacoca nhāruca,
anya-e0301n:1277_14: aṭṭhica avasissatu. Upassussatu me sarīre maṃsalohitaṃ. Yantaṃ purisathāmena purisaparakkamena
anya-e0301n:1277_15: pattabbaṃ. Na taṃ apatvā vīriyassa saṇṭhānaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ anivattanavutti vasena
anya-e0301n:1277_16: pavattassa sammāvāyāmassa etaṃ nāmaṃ. So pana tathā pavatto ekopi samāno kiccasiddhivasena
anya-e0301n:1278_0: Tattha uppannānaṃpāpakānanti asukasmiṃ kāle dese ṭhāne vā ahaṃ idañcidañca nāma pāpaṃ
anya-e0301n:1278_1: akāsiṃ, idañcidañcanāma mayhaṃ uppannanti evaṃ attano santāne uppannabhāvena viditānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1278_2: akusalānaṃ. Pahānāyāti tesaṃ attano santāne ajjatagge yāvaparinibbānāpuna anuppādadhammatāpādanakaraṇatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1278_3: Vāyāmoti sīla pūraṇa samatha vipassanābhāvanākammesu daḷhaṃ vāyāmo. Anuppannānanti
anya-e0301n:1278_4: attano santāne uppannapubbanti aviditānaṃ parasantānesuvā suttantesuvā disvāvā sutvāvā
anya-e0301n:1278_5: viditānaṃ. Anuppādāyāti yesaṃ akusala mūlānaṃ atthitāya imesaṃ sattānaṃ īdisāni kilesajātāni
anya-e0301n:1278_6: vā pāpakammānivā uppajjanti. Tāni mayi vijjantieva. Ahaṃpi tehi kilesehivā kammehivā
anya-e0301n:1278_7: aparimuttoyeva. Ahaṃpi svevā parasuvevā bhavantaresuvā tāni attano santāne uppādessā
anya-e0301n:1278_8: miyevāti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā tesaṃ akusalamūlānaṃ attano santāne uppattiyā paccayasamucchindanatthaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1278_10: visuddhidhammā mayā appattā anadhigatāeva hontīti evaṃ ñatvā samaye anatikkanteeva
anya-e0301n:1279_0: Uppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ bhiyyo bhāvāyāti yāni sīlādīni kusalāni mayi uppannāni. Tāni
anya-e0301n:1279_1: yāva niyāmaṃ naokkamanti, tāva mayhaṃ etānīti vattuṃ nārahanti. Svevā parasuvevā
anya-e0301n:1279_2: bhavantaraṃ patvāvā bhijjissanti yevāti evaṃ paccavekkhitvā attano santāne uppannānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1279_3: tesaṃ sabbaso akuppadhammatāpādanavasena suṭṭhutaraṃ vaḍḍhanatthāya. Etesu pana catūsu
anya-e0301n:1279_4: mukhesu yena kenaci ekena mukhena uppanno vāyāmo catukiccasādhakoeva hotīti veditabbo.
anya-e0301n:1279_5: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana maggakkhaṇe eva ekassa tassa catukiccasādhakatā vuttāti.
anya-e0301n:1280_0: Ijjhanaṃ iddhi, tassa tassa yogakammassa siddhi samiddhi nibbattīti attho. Sā pana
anya-e0301n:1280_1: saṅkhepato abhiññeyyānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhiññāsiddhi, pariññeyyānaṃ pariññāsiddhi, pahātabbānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1280_2: pahānasiddhi, sacchikā tabbānaṃ sacchikaraṇasiddhi, bhāvetabbānaṃ bhāvanāsiddhīti
anya-e0301n:1280_3: pañcavidhā hoti. Ijjhatītivā iddhi satthusāsane yogakammena ijjhantānaṃ sabbesaṃ
anya-e0301n:1280_4: mahaggata lokuttaradhammānaṃ nāmaṃ. Pajjati etenāti pādo. Iddhiyā pādoti iddhipādo.
anya-e0301n:1280_5: Iddhipattiyā balavupāyo padhānakāraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. So pana catunnaṃ adhipatidhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1280_6: vasena catudhā hotīti vuttaṃ cattāro iddhipādātiādi. Adhipatibhūto chandova iddhipādoti
anya-e0301n:1280_7: chandiddhipādo. Esanayo sesesupīti. Etthaca sabbe mahaggatānuttarabhūtā uttarimanussa
anya-e0301n:1280_8: dhammānāma napākatikena chandenavā vīriyenavā cittenavā paññāya vā adhigantabbā honti.
anya-e0301n:1280_9: Yena kenaci palibodhena paṭibāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyena adhipatibhāvapattena chandādināeva
anya-e0301n:1280_10: adhigantabbā. Tasmā ime cattāro dhammā adhipatibhūtāva idha adhippetāti daṭṭhabbāti.
anya-e0301n:1282_0: “Ijjhati adhiṭṭhānādikaṃ etāyāti iddhi, iddhividhaññāṇaṃ. Iddhiyā pādo iddhipādo”ti
anya-e0301n:1282_1: vuttaṃ. Taṃ saṃyuttake katamāca bhikkhave iddhi. Idha bhikkhave bhikkhu anekavihitaṃ
anya-e0301n:1282_2: iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti. Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti.La. Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ
anya-e0301n:1282_3: vatteti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave iddhīti imāya pāḷiyā sameti. Evaṃsantepi idha abhidhammapariyāyova
anya-e0301n:1283_0: Vibhaṅge pana pathamavāre lokiya lokuttaramissakā citta cetasikarāsīeva iddhipādāti
anya-e0301n:1283_1: vuttā. Aṭṭhakathāyañca-pathamajjhāna parikammaṃhi iddhipādonāma. Pathamajjhānaṃ iddhināma.La.
anya-e0301n:1283_3: iddhināma. Sotāpattimaggassa vipassanā iddhipādo nāma. Sotāpattimaggo iddhināma.La.
anya-e0301n:1283_4: Arahattamaggassa vipassanā iddhipādonāma. Arahattamaggo iddhināmātica. Pathamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1283_5: iddhipādonāma. Dutiyajjhānaṃ iddhināma. La. Ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṃ iddhi pādonāma.
anya-e0301n:1283_6: Nevasaññā nāsaññā yatanajjhānaṃ iddhināma. Sotā pattimaggo iddhipādonāma. Sakadāgāmimaggo
anya-e0301n:1283_7: iddhināma.La. Arahattamaggo iddhināmāti ca vuttaṃ. Taṃtaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ iddhipādonāma.
anya-e0301n:1283_8: Tato tato vuṭṭhahitvā uppāditamaggo iddhināmātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Idha pana uttaracūḷabhājaniye
anya-e0301n:1284_0: Tattha pana lokuttarabhūtāeva adhippetā. Idha lokiya lokuttara missakabhūtāti. Indriyabalāni
anya-e0301n:1284_1: atthato heṭṭhā vuttāneva. Pākaṭaṭṭhānato pana catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu saddhāya thāmo
anya-e0301n:1284_2: veditabbo. Yathāha-kattha bhikkhave saddhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu
anya-e0301n:1284_3: ettha saddhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Catūsu sammappadhānesu vīriyassa. Yathāha-kattha
anya-e0301n:1284_4: bhikkhave vīriyindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu sammappadhānesu ettha vīriyindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0301n:1284_5: Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu satiyā. Yathāha-kattha bhikkhavesatindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu
anya-e0301n:1284_6: satipaṭṭhānesuettha satindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Catūsu jhānesu samādhissa. Yathāha-kattha
anya-e0301n:1284_7: bhikkhave samādhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu jhānesu ettha samādhindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.
anya-e0301n:1284_8: Catūsu ariyasaccesu paññāya thāmo veditabbo. Yathāha-kattha bhikkhave paññindriyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1284_9: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Catūsu ariyasaccesu ettha paññindriyaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Sambodhi vuccati
anya-e0301n:1284_10: catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ, samantato bujjhati paṭivijjhati bujjhanti vā etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0301n:1284_11: Sā hi catusaccadhammaṃ bujjhamānā ekakkhaṇe soḷasahi atthehi saddhiṃ samantato bujjhati,
anya-e0301n:1284_12: na ekadesa toti tassā sambodhiyā samuṭṭhāpanaṭṭhena sambodhiyā aṅgo sahakārībalavapaccayoti
anya-e0301n:1284_13: sambojjhaṅgo. Satieva sambojjhaṅgo satisambojjhaṅgo. Sā hi kāyādīsu catūsu attano
anya-e0301n:1284_14: gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhusaṃvaḍḍhamānā anupubbena sabbapamāda pakkhaṃ vidhametvā
anya-e0301n:1284_15: sabbaṃ appamādapakkhañca pūretvā catumaggaññāṇa saṅkhātaṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti.
anya-e0301n:1284_16: Vipassanāya bhūmibhūte ajjhatta bahiddhādhamme vicināti kakkhaḷattaphusanādīhi aniccatādīhica
anya-e0301n:1284_17: vividhā kārehi cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ kurumānoviya tesu daṭṭhabbākāraṃ asesaṃ upadhāretīti
anya-e0301n:1284_18: dhammavicayo. Soeva sambojjhaṅgoti dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo. Sopi hi attano gocarabhūtesu
anya-e0301n:1284_19: tesu dhammesu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhusaṃvaḍḍhamāno anupubbena sabbaṃsammoha pakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1284_20: vidhametvā sabbaṃ asammohapakkhaṃ pūretvā sayaṃ catumaggañāṇa sambodhi hutvā samuṭṭhahatīti.
anya-e0301n:1284_21: Sammappadhānavīriyameva sambojjhaṅgoti vīriyasambojjhaṅgo. Tampi hi catubbidhesu
anya-e0301n:1284_22: attano gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānaṃ anupubbena sabbaṃ kusalesu dhammesu
anya-e0301n:1284_23: līnasaṅkoca kosajjapakkhaṃ kilesajātaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ dhurasaṃpaggahapakkhaṃ pūretvā
anya-e0301n:1285_0: Pītiyeva sambojjhaṅgo pīti sambojjhaṅgo. Sāpi hi vuttappakāresu gocaresu suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā
anya-e0301n:1285_1: kusalesu dhammesu sabbaṃ cittassa aratiukkaṇṭhapakkhaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ dhammarati
anya-e0301n:1285_2: dhammanandidhammārāma pakkhaṃ pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Passaddhieva
anya-e0301n:1285_3: sambojjhaṅgo passaddhi sambojjhaṅgo. Sāpi hi vuttapakāresu gocaresu bhāvanāvasena
anya-e0301n:1285_4: suṭṭhu saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbaṃ cittassa sārambha darathapakkhaṃ vidhametvā sabbaṃ vūpasantasītalapakkhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1285_5: pūretvā vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpeti. Samādhieva sambojjhaṅgoti samādhi sambojjhaṅgo.
anya-e0301n:1285_6: Tassa sambodhisamuṭṭhāpanatā pākaṭā. Tatramajjhattatā saṅkhātā upekkhāeva sambojjhaṅgoti
anya-e0301n:1285_7: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo. Sāpihi vuttappakāresu satiādīnaṃ gocaresu bhāvanāvasena suṭṭhu
anya-e0301n:1285_8: saṃvaḍḍhamānā sabbaṃ cittassa līnuddhaccapakkhaṃ vidhametvā samavāhitapakkhaṃ pūretvā
anya-e0301n:1285_9: vuttappakāraṃ sambodhiṃ samuṭṭhāpetīti. Sammā aviparītato dassanaṃ sammādiṭṭhi. Sā
anya-e0301n:1285_10: pana dukkhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhasamudaye ñāṇaṃ, dukkhanirodhe ñāṇaṃ, dukkhaniro dhagāminipaṭipadāya
anya-e0301n:1285_11: ñāṇanti catubbidhā hoti. Sammā aviparītato saṃkappanaṃ sammāsaṅkappo. Yathā sammādiṭṭhi
anya-e0301n:1285_12: daṭṭhabbasabhāvesu pharamānā pavattati tathā tassā saṃvidhānanti attho. Teneva hi
anya-e0301n:1285_13: so paññākkhandhe saṅgahitoti. Yathāha-yācāvuso visākha sammādiṭṭhi, yoca sammāsaṅkappo,
anya-e0301n:1285_14: ime dhammā paññākkhandhe saṅgahitāti. Sammāvācā dayo pubbe vuttatthāyeva. Sammā vāyamanti
anya-e0301n:1285_15: ekenāti sammāvāyāmo. Catukiccasādhakaṃ sammappadhāna vīriyaṃ. Passaddhidvayaṃ passaddhisāmaññena
anya-e0301n:1285_16: ekaṃ katvā cuddasete sabhāvatoti vuttaṃ. Sattadhāti vuttappakārānaṃ satipaṭṭhānacatukka
anya-e0301n:1285_17: sammappadhānacatukkādīnaṃ vasena sattadhā. Idāni tesaṃ cuddasannaṃ kiccānaṃ ṭhānabhedaṃ
anya-e0301n:1287: “Sattadhā tattha saṅgahoti vatvā puna taṃ dassetuṃ saṅkappapassaddhicātiādimāhā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:1288_0: Na hi tattha satta sarūpaṃ labbhatīti. Saṅkappo viratittayañca ekaṃ maggaṅgaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1288_1: pāpuṇāti. Passaddhica pītica upekkhāca ekaṃ bojjhaṅgaṭṭhānaṃ. Chandoca cittañca ekaṃ
anya-e0301n:1288_2: iddhipādaṭṭhānanti evaṃ navadhammā ekaṭṭhānikā honti. Ekaṃ vīriyaṃ catusammappadhāna
anya-e0301n:1288_3: iddhi pādindriya balabojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena navaṭṭhānikaṃ. Ekā sati catusatipaṭṭhāna
anya-e0301n:1288_4: indriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena aṭṭhaṭṭhānikā. Eko samādhi indriya bala bojjhaṅga
anya-e0301n:1288_5: maggaṅga vasena catuṭṭhāniko. Ekāpaññā iddhipādindriya bala bojjhaṅga maggaṅga vasena
anya-e0301n:1288_6: pañcaṭṭhānikā. Ekā saddhā indriya bala vasena duṭṭhānikāti. Te pana sattatiṃsa pabhedā
anya-e0301n:1288_7: dhammā pubbabhāge nānārammaṇā nānākhaṇikāca honti. Maggaphalesu pana navaṭṭhānikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1288_8: vīriyaṃ ekameva nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃkatvā navasuṭhānesu atta paṭipakkhānaṃ pāpa dhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1288_9: paccaya yamugghātavasena nava kiccāni sādhayamānaṃ ekameva pavattati. Esa nayo aṭṭhaṭṭhānikādīsu.
anya-e0301n:1288_10: Tasmā te ekakkhaṇe ekacitte sabbe ekato upalabbhantīti vuttaṃ sabbe lokuttare hontīti.
anya-e0301n:1288_11: Navāsaṅkappa pītiyoti ettha vāsaddo kvaci saddattho. Saṅkappo kvaci dutīyajjhānikā
anya-e0301n:1288_12: dikepītica kvaci catutthajjhānikādike lokuttare nahontīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1289_0: Lokiyepīti sīlavisodhanādivasena pavatte kāmā vacarakusalādike lokiyakusala kriyacittuppādepi.
anya-e0301n:1289_2: viratittayādīnaṃ anurūpaṃ. Chabbisuddhipavattiyanti sīla visuddhādīnaṃ channaṃ visuddhīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:1289_3: anukkamena pavattikāle. Etena diṭṭheva dhamme maggaphalapatiṭṭhābhāvatthāya pūrite
anya-e0301n:1289_4: catupārisuddhi sīlepi saddhāsatiādayo bodhipakkhiyesu saṅgahitā eva honti. Tathā
anya-e0301n:1289_5: maggapādakatthāya uppāditesu mahaggatajjhānesu mīti dasseti. Tathā hi bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttake –
anya-e0301n:1290_0: Evaṃ bhāvito kho kuṇḍaliya indriyasaṃvaro tīṇi sucaritāni paripūreti. Evaṃ bhāvitāni
anya-e0301n:1290_1: tīṇi sucaritāni cattāro satipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti. Evaṃ bhāvitā cattāro satipaṭṭhānā
anya-e0301n:1290_2: satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti. Evaṃ bhāvitā satta bojjhaṅge vijjāvimuttiyo paripūrentīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1291_0: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi nakevalaṃ balavavipassanā maggaphalesueva bojjhaṅge uddharanti. Vipassanāpādaka
anya-e0301n:1291_1: kasiṇajjhāna ānāpāṇā suka brahmavihārajjhānesupi uddharantīti vuttaṃ. [Bodhipakkhiyasaṅgaho]
anya-e0301n:1292_0: 165. Sabbasaṅgahe pañcakkhandhāti pañca rāsayo. Atītādi bheda bhinnānaṃ rūpānaṃ khandho
anya-e0301n:1292_1: rāsīti rūpakkhandho. Ekasmiṃ ruppana lakkhaṇe rāsiṃ katvā ñāṇena pariggahitā rūpadhammāeva.
anya-e0301n:1292_2: Tathā ekasmiṃ vedayitalakkhaṇe sañjānana lakkhaṇe rāsiṃ katvā pariggahitā atītādibhedabhinnā
anya-e0301n:1292_3: vedanāsaññāyo vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho canāma. Saṅkharontīti saṅkhārā. Phassa
anya-e0301n:1292_4: cetanā dayo. Tehi chasuvā upapattidvāresu tīsuvā kammadvāresu ekato saṅgamma samāgamma
anya-e0301n:1292_5: phusanacetayitādīhi attano attano kiccehi dassanasavanādīni sādhāraṇakiccānivā kāyika
anya-e0301n:1292_6: vācasikamānasikānivā sayana nisajjaṭṭhāna gamana kathana cintanādīni sabbāni kiccāni
anya-e0301n:1293_0: Kiñca bhikkhave saṅkhāre vadetha. Saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti kho bhikkhave tasmā
anya-e0301n:1293_1: saṅkhārāti vuccanti. Kiñca saṅkhataṃ abhi saṅkharonti, rūpaṃ rūpatthāya saṅkhataṃ
anya-e0301n:1293_2: abhisaṅkharonti. Vedanaṃ vedanatthāya saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharonti. Saññaṃ saññatthāya
anya-e0301n:1293_3: saṅkhata abhisaṅkharonti. Saṅkhāre saṅkhāratthāya saṅkhata mabhisaṅkharonti. Viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1293_4: viññāṇatthāya saṅkhata mabhi saṅkharontīti. Saṅkhata mabhisaṅkharontīti kho bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:1294_0: Tattha rūpaṃ rūpatthāya saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontīti yasmiṃ yasmiṃ kāle sayana nisajjādivasena
anya-e0301n:1294_1: pavattā yā yā rūpavikati icchīyati, tasmiṃtasmiṃ kāle tassā tassā rūpavikatiyā jātatthāya
anya-e0301n:1294_2: iriyāpatha parivattanādi vasena taṃ taṃ rūpavikatiṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontīti attho.
anya-e0301n:1294_3: Khajjabhojjādikaṃ vatthālaṅkārādikaṃ mañca pīṭha geha rathādikaṃ sabbaṃ upabhoga
anya-e0301n:1294_4: paribhogabhūtaṃ bāhira rūpaṃpi gahetvā yojetuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Vedananti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1294_5: samparāyikañca sabbaṃpi vedanaṃ. Tattha diṭṭhadhammikaṃ vedanaṃ saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontā
anya-e0301n:1294_6: cittakammanaccagītādīni taṃ taṃ vedanupakaraṇāni sampādana vasena samparāyikañca
anya-e0301n:1294_7: abhisaṅkharontā mānusakaṃvā dibbaṃvā taṃtaṃ vedanaṃ patthetvā dāna sīlādi sampādana
anya-e0301n:1294_8: vasena abhisaṅkharonti. Esanayo sesesupi. Saṅkhāresu pana phassaṃ phassatthāya cetanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1294_9: cetanatthāyātiādinā dānaṃ dānatthāya sīlaṃ sīlatthāya pāṇātipātaṃ pāṇātipātatthāyātiādinā
anya-e0301n:1294_10: vā sabbaṃ lokapavattiṃ ñatvā vitthāretabbāti. Ettha siyā, kasmā saṅkhāresu pākaṭā
anya-e0301n:1294_11: cetanādayo vitakkādayo lobhādayo saddhāsatipaññādayoca dhamme visuṃ visuṃ khandhabhāvena
anya-e0301n:1295_0: Yathā hi cheko mahābhisakko bhesajjamūlāni gahetvā cuṇṇaṃ karonto tesu mūlesu imāni
anya-e0301n:1295_1: thūlānipi mudūni honti. Imāni khuddakānipi kakkhaḷāni hontīti ñatvā tato pathamataraṃ
anya-e0301n:1295_2: kakkhaḷāni visuṃ uddharitvā suṭṭhu koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karoti. Sesāni pana sabbāni mudūni
anya-e0301n:1295_3: ekato katvā koṭṭetvā cuṇṇaṃ karoti. Tato ubhayāni missetvā silāyaṃ pisetvā bhesajjakamme
anya-e0301n:1295_4: upaneti. Evaṃ karonto nakilamati. Evamevaṃ bhagavāpi nāmarūpadhammesu tilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1295_5: āropetvā niccasukhaatta vipallāsānaṃ pahānatthāya anuyuñjantā devamanussā vibhāge
anya-e0301n:1295_6: akate tīsu dhammesu kilamissantīti ñatvā nāmadhammesu vedanāsaññācittasaṅkhāte tayo
anya-e0301n:1295_7: dhamme visuṃ uddharitvā ekamekaṃ khandhaṃ nāma katvā desesi. Tathā hi yathā macchānāma
anya-e0301n:1295_8: udake sati ukkaṇṭhitā nāma natthi. Asati pana ekantena ukkaṇṭhitāyeva honti. Yathāvā
anya-e0301n:1295_9: madhukarāvā bhamarāvā yasmiṃ vane puppharasa phalarase labhanti, tattha ukkaṇṭhitānāma
anya-e0301n:1295_10: natthi. Alabhamānā pana ekantena ukkaṇṭhitāeva honti. Evameva imesaṃ sattānaṃ sukha
anya-e0301n:1295_11: saññitesu patisaraṇesu vedanāsadisaṃ patisaraṇaṃnāma natthi. Manussadevabrahmasampattiyo
anya-e0301n:1295_12: assādentāpi sukhavedanatthāyaeva assādenti. Yadica tāhi vinā yathicchitaṃ sukhavedanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1295_13: labheyyuṃ. Konāma tā sādiyissati. Tathā phassacetanādīhi vitakkavicāravīriyādīhi
anya-e0301n:1295_14: lobhadosādīhi saddhāsatipaññādīhi ca saṅkhārakkhandhadhammehi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca
anya-e0301n:1295_15: yaṃkiñci saṅkhataṃ abhisaṅkharontāpi sukhavedanatthāyaeva abhisaṅkharonti. Yadica
anya-e0301n:1295_16: tādisena abhisaṅkharaṇena vināpi yathicchitaṃ sukhaṃ labheyyuṃ, tehi dhammehi attho
anya-e0301n:1296_0: Iti sukhasaññitesu dhammesu vedanānāma imesaṃ sattānaṃ paramukkaṃsagataṃ sukhasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_1: hoti. Tasmā bhagavā taṃ visuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ katvā khandhadesanaṃ desetīti. Tathā
anya-e0301n:1296_2: imesaṃ sattānaṃ attasaññitesu patisaraṇesu saññāsadisaṃ patisaraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
anya-e0301n:1296_3: Tathā hi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sattanikāye uppannā te te sattā attāno attano visayesu sabbaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_4: jānitabbaṃ saññāya sañjānitvā viññuttaṃ āpajjanti. Tathā viññuttaṃ āpajjantā yattakaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_5: pare jānanti. Tattakaṃ mayaṃpi jānāma. Ko amhākaṃ uttaritaroti evaṃ loke ñāṇasammabhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_6: saññaṃ paramaṃ attānaṃ katvā vicaranti. Iti attasaññitesu dhammesu saññānāma imesaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_7: sattānaṃ paramukkaṃ sagataṃ attasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhagavātaṃpi visuṃ ekaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_8: khandhaṃ katvā khandhadesanaṃ desetīti. Tathā imesaṃ sattānaṃ niccasaññitesu patisaraṇesu
anya-e0301n:1296_9: cittasadisaṃ patisaṃraṇaṃ nāma natthi. Tathā hi sattā sukhaṃ dukkhaṃnāma aniccaṃ
anya-e0301n:1296_10: sukhapattānaṃ dukkhaṃ natthi. Dukkha pattānaṃ sukhaṃ natthītivā. Saññānāma aniccā,
anya-e0301n:1296_11: kadāci pamussati kadāci napamussatītivā. Vīriyaṃnāma aniccaṃ. Kadāci ārabhati, kadāci
anya-e0301n:1296_12: na ārabhatītivā. Lobhonāma anicco. Kadāci uppajjati, kadāci nauppajjatītivā. Dosonāma
anya-e0301n:1296_13: anicco. Kadāci uppajjati, kadāci na uppajjatītivā. Saddhānāma aniccā. Kadāci pasannacitto
anya-e0301n:1296_14: hoti, kadāci appasannacitto hotītivā. Paññānāma aniccā. Jānitabbaṃpi kadāci jānāti,
anya-e0301n:1296_15: kadāci na jānātītivā evaṃ cetasikadhammānaṃ anicca bhāvonāma kesañci lokiyajanānaṃpi
anya-e0301n:1296_16: pākaṭo hoti. Na pana cittassa. Na hi sattā cittaṃnāma aniccaṃ. Kadāci uppajjati,
anya-e0301n:1296_17: kadāci na uppajjatīti gaṇhanti. Taṃ pana sayaṃ niccaṃ pavattamānaṃ hutvā kadāci sukhena
anya-e0301n:1296_18: yuttaṃ hoti, kadāci dukkhenātiādinā tasmiṃ niccasaññameva uppādentīti. Iti cittaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:1296_19: niccasaññitesu dhammesu paramukkaṃ sagataṃ niccasaññitaṭṭhānaṃ hoti. Tasmā bhagavā
anya-e0301n:1296_20: taṃpi visuṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ katvā khandhadesanaṃ desetīti.
anya-e0301n:1298_0: “Bhājana bhojana byañjana bhattakāraka bhuñjaka vikappavasena pañceva vuttā”ti vatvā
anya-e0301n:1298_1: taṃ vibhāvantena “rūpañhi vedanā nissayattā bhājanaṭṭhāniyaṃ. Vedanā bhuñjitabbattā
anya-e0301n:1298_2: bhojanaṭṭhāniyā. Saññā vedanassāda lābha hetuttā byañjanaṭṭhāniyā. Saṅkhārā abhisaṅkharaṇato
anya-e0301n:1298_3: bhattakārakaṭṭhāniyā. Viññāṇaṃ upabhuñjakattā bhuñjakaṭṭhāniyaṃ. Ettāvatāca adhippe
anya-e0301n:1298_4: tatthasiddhīti pañceva vuttā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ sārato nadaṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1299_0: Na hi taṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ etapparamavinicchaye āgataṃ. Upamādīpaneeva āgataṃ. Na ca
anya-e0301n:1299_1: bhagavatā bhājanādivikappasiddhimattaṃ uddissa pañceva khandhā vuttāti sakkā vattuṃ.
anya-e0301n:1301: “Desanākkamepi idameva kāraṇaṃ. Yattha bhuñjati, yañca bhuñjati, yenaca bhuñjati, yoca bhojako, yoca bhuñjitā. Tesaṃ anukkamena dassetukāmattā”ti vuttaṃ. Taṃpi asāraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1302_0: Catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ visayabhūtā khandhā upādānakkhandhā. Sabba sabhāgadhamma pariyādānavasena
anya-e0301n:1302_1: sāsavā anāsavāca dhammā pañcakkhandhāti vuttā, vipassanā bhūmipariggahavasena sāsavāeva
anya-e0301n:1302_2: pañcupādānakkhandhāti vuttā. Āyatanti attano phaluppattiyā bhusaṃ ussahantā viya
anya-e0301n:1302_3: hontīti āyatanāni. Āyatanasaddo pana chasu ajjhattikesu dvāradhammesu pavattamāno
anya-e0301n:1302_4: sañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena, chasu bāhiresu ārammaṇadhammesu
anya-e0301n:1302_5: pavattamāno samosaraṇaṭṭhena, ubhayatthapi kāraṇaṭṭhena pavattati. Tattha citta cetasikā
anya-e0301n:1302_6: dhammā ekasmiṃvā bhave anamataggevā saṃsāre punappunaṃ saha jāyamānā cakkhādīsu chasu
anya-e0301n:1302_7: dvārapadesesueva jāyanti, na aññattha. Santānānubandhavasena nivasantāpi tesveva
anya-e0301n:1302_8: nivasanti, na aññattha. Ākiritvā thapitā viya pavattamānāpi tesveva pavattanti, na
anya-e0301n:1302_9: aññattha. Tasmā cakkhādīni chasañjātidesaṭṭhena nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhenaca
anya-e0301n:1302_10: āyatanānināma. Devāyatanaṃ viya adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenātipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1303_0: Yathāca sampannapupphaphalesu khemesu rukkhesu tato tato pakkhino nilinatthāya āhāratthāyaca
anya-e0301n:1303_1: niccaṃ samosaranti. Evaṃ rūpādīsu chasuṭhānesu tato tato cittacetasikā dhammā ārammaṇakaraṇatthāya
anya-e0301n:1303_2: niccaṃ samosaranti. Tasmā rūpādīni cha samosaraṇaṭṭhena āyatanānināma. Tadubhayāni
anya-e0301n:1303_3: pana tesaṃ citta cetasikānaṃ kāraṇaṭṭhena āyatanānināma. Cakkhuca taṃ āyatanañcāti
anya-e0301n:1303_4: cakkhāyatanaṃ. Evaṃ sesāni. Tattha cakkhusotāni sattānaṃ hitakriyāsu bahupakārattā
anya-e0301n:1303_5: kāmarūpa byāpitattā ca pākaṭānītiādimhi vuttāni. Tehi āsannattā tadanantaraṃ ghānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1303_6: Tato jivhāti imāni cattāri padesāyatanānināma. Tato sakalakāyabyāpako kāyo. Tato
anya-e0301n:1303_7: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ gocaravisayaggāhakaṃ manoti. Sesāni pana tesaṃ visayattā tadanukkameneva vuttānīti.
anya-e0301n:1304_0: Kassaci pana puggalassavā sattassavā manussassavā devassavā brahmunovā vase avattitvā
anya-e0301n:1304_1: attanoeva sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo. Visuṃ visuṃ vavatthitasabhāvattāvā yathāsabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1304_2: dhārīyanti sallakkhīyanti vavatthapīyantīti dhātuyo. Apica, nissatta nijjīvaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1304_3: dhātuyo. Tattha nissattaṭṭhenāti sattākārā bhāvaṭṭhena sattakiccābhāvaṭṭhena. Ko
anya-e0301n:1304_4: panettha sattākāro kiṃ sattakiccanti. Jīvayogo sattākāro. Īhāca byāpāro ca sattakiccaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1304_5: Nijjīvaṭṭhenāti ekasmiṃ bhave yāva namarati. Bhavaparaṃparāyavā yāva saṃsāro na nivattati.
anya-e0301n:1304_6: Tāva abhijjamāno acchijjamāno ekova vattatīti evaṃ gahitassa jīvassa abhāvaṭṭhena.
anya-e0301n:1304_7: Cakkhādayoca dhammā sabbaso sattākārarahitā satta kiccarahitāca honti. Naca sayaṃ
anya-e0301n:1304_8: jīvānāma honti. Nāpi jīvayogāti. Iti nissattaṭṭhena nijjīvaṭṭhenacatedhātuyonāmāti.
anya-e0301n:1304_9: Tesaṃ pana daṭṭhabbākāro aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto. Yathāha-bheritalaṃ viya cakkhudhātu
anya-e0301n:1304_10: daṭṭhabbā. Daṇḍo viya rūpadhātu. Saddoviya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā ādāsatalaṃ viya
anya-e0301n:1304_11: cakkhudhātu. Mukhaṃ viya rūpadhātu. Mukhanimittaṃ viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Athavā,
anya-e0301n:1304_12: ucchuyanta kilayantaṃ viya cakkhudhātu. Yantacakkayaṭṭhi viya rūpadhātu. Ucchurasa
anya-e0301n:1304_13: telāni viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Tathā adharāraṇi viya cakkhudhātu. Uttarāraṇi viya
anya-e0301n:1304_14: rūpadhātu. Aggi viya cakkhuviññāṇadhātu. Esanayo sotaviññāṇadhātuādīsu. Manodhātu
anya-e0301n:1304_15: pana yathāsambhavato cakkhuviññāṇadhātuādīnaṃ purecarānucarā viya daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:1305_0: Dhammadhātuyā vedanākkhandho sallamiva sūlamivaca daṭṭhabbo. Saññā saṅkhārakkhandhā
anya-e0301n:1305_1: vedanāsalla sūlayogā āturā viya daṭṭhabbā. Puthujjanānaṃvā saññā āsā dukkhajananato
anya-e0301n:1305_2: rittamuṭṭhi viya ayathābhuccanimittagāhato vanamigoviya. Saṅkhārā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanato
anya-e0301n:1305_3: aṅgārakāsuyaṃ khipanapurisā viya. Jātidukkhānubandhato rājapurisānubandhacoro viya.
anya-e0301n:1305_4: Sabbānatthāvahassa khandhasantānassa hetuto visarukkhabījāni viya. Rūpaṃ nānāvidhupaddavanimittato
anya-e0301n:1305_5: khura cakkaṃviya daṭṭhabbaṃ. Asaṅkhatāpidhātu amatato santato khemato ca daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n:1305_7: aññaṃ gahetvā pavattanato vanamakkaṭo viya, duddamanato assakhaluṅgo viya, yattha
anya-e0301n:1305_8: kāmanipātito vehāsaṃ khittadaṇḍo viya, lobhadosādi nānāppakāra kilesayogato raṅganaṭo
anya-e0301n:1305_9: viya daṭṭhabbāti. Ariyasaccānīti ettha santassa dhammassa bhāvo saccaṃ. Santassāti
anya-e0301n:1305_10: bhūtassa tathassa aviparītassa. Apica, kenaṭṭhena saccanti. Tathaṭṭhena avitathaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1305_11: anaññathaṭṭhena. Yañhi cakkhussa dukkhattaṃ, taṃ tathaṃ hoti avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1305_12: Dukkhadukkha saṅkhāradukkha vipariṇāmadukkha saṅkhātehi tīhi dukkhehi taṃ samaṅgipuggalassa
anya-e0301n:1305_13: abhiṇhapīḷanato. Tattha saṅkhāradukkhaṃ nāma kammajānaṃ uppattiyā pageva taṃtaṃkammā
anya-e0301n:1305_14: bhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ. Tathā utujādīnaṃ uppattiyā pageva taṃtaṃ utucittāhārānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1306_0: Cakkhu hi nāma rūpibrahmānaṃpi purimabhave jhānabhāvanā saṅkhātaṃ mahantaṃ kammābhisaṅkharaṇa
anya-e0301n:1306_1: dukkhaṃ anubhavantānaṃyeva uppajjati. No aññathā. Kāmasattānaṃ pana purimabhave kammasaṅkhāradukkhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1306_2: anubhavitvā uppannaṃpi yāvajīvaṃ pavattiyā āhārādisaṅkhāradukkhañca paṭijaggana dukkhañca
anya-e0301n:1306_3: anubhavantānaññeva pavattati, no aññathā. Pavattamānañca paccayavekallevā jāte antarāyevā
anya-e0301n:1306_4: āgate yadākadāci bhijjati. Maraṇakālaṃ patvā pana ekantena bhijjatiyeva. Tasmā taṃ
anya-e0301n:1306_5: assādetvā tadatthāya kammaṃvā āhārādipaccayaṃvā paṭijagganaṃ vā saṅkharontānaṃ anamatagge
anya-e0301n:1306_6: saṃsāre saṅkhāradukkhassa pariyantonāma natthi. Iti sabbaṃ cakkhu apariyantena saṅkhāradukkhena
anya-e0301n:1306_7: puggalaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Idamassa saṅkhāradukkhaṃ. Idaṃ cakkhu nāma paccayavekallevā
anya-e0301n:1306_8: jāte antarāyevā āgate yadā kadāci bhijjanajātikaṃ. Tasmā tassa bhijjanabhayena pageva
anya-e0301n:1306_10: vā bhijjamānevā bhinnevā socanaparidevanādidukkhañca vipariṇāma dukkhaṃnāma. Iti
anya-e0301n:1306_11: sabbaṃ cakkhu apariyantena vipariṇāmadukkhena puggalaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Idamassa
anya-e0301n:1306_12: vipariṇāmadukkhaṃ. Dukkhadukkhaṃ pana tadubhayena dukkhena saheva sijjhati. Evaṃ
anya-e0301n:1306_13: cakkhu dukkhadukkha saṅkhāra dukkha vipariṇāma dukkhasaṅkhātehi tīhi dukkhehi taṃ
anya-e0301n:1306_14: samaṅgipuggalaṃ abhiṇhaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Yañca tassa tathāpīḷanaṃ, taṃ tathaṃ hoti, avitathaṃ,
anya-e0301n:1306_15: anaññathaṃ. Tasmā cakkhu dukkhasaccaṃnāma. Esa nayo sotādīsu tebhūmakadhammesu.
anya-e0301n:1307_0: Sesasaccesupi yaṃ lobhasseva dukkhasamudayattaṃ. Yaṃ nibbānasseva dukkhanirodhattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1307_1: Yaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasseva dukkhanirodhamaggattaṃ taṃ kathaṃ hotītiādinā vattabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1307_2: Yāvaca lobho na pahiyyati. Tāva cakkhādīni assādetiyeva. Yāvaca tāni assādeti. Tāva
anya-e0301n:1307_3: tesaṃ pavattiyā kammādīni saṅkharontiyeva. Yāvaca kammādīni saṅkharonti. Tāva cakkhādīni
anya-e0301n:1307_4: pavattantiyeva. Yāvacatāni pavattanti. Tāva tesaṃ vuttappakārehi saṅkhāra dukkhādīhi
anya-e0301n:1307_5: namuccatiyeva. Tasmā lobhassa dukkhasamudayattaṃ tathaṃ hoti. Cakkhādīsuca pavattamānesu
anya-e0301n:1307_6: vuttappakāraṃ sabbaṃ dukkhaṃ āgacchatiyeva. Apavattamānesu nāgacchati. Tasmā tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:1307_7: pavattinirodhabhūtassa nibbānasseva dukkhanirodhattaṃ tathaṃ hoti. Tathā lobhapahānato
anya-e0301n:1307_8: añño dukkhamuttimaggonāma natthi. Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggoca uppajja māno ekantena taṃ pajahati.
anya-e0301n:1307_9: Tasmā aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasseva dukkhanirodhamaggattaṃ tathaṃ hoti, avitathaṃ, anaññathanti.
anya-e0301n:1308_0: Evaṃsantepi saccasaddo pariyāya saccesupi vattatīti vuttaṃ cattāriariyasaccānīti.
anya-e0301n:1308_1: Tattha dukkhasacce tāva sakkāyapariyā pannā ajjhattadhammāeva ariyasaccaṃnāma. Teyeva
anya-e0301n:1308_2: hi asmimānassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtā hutvā yāvataṃ mānaṃ na samūhanati. Tāva dukkhakiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:1308_3: karonti. Dukkhapariññācanāma yāvadeva asmimānasamugghātāya hoti. Asmimānoca tesveva
anya-e0301n:1308_4: ajjhattadhammesu nivisatīti tesu pariññātesu pariññākiccaṃ siddhameva hotīti. Tabbiparī
anya-e0301n:1308_5: tena pana anindriya baddhadhammā maggaphaladhammāca aṭṭhaṅgikavajjā udayabbaya pīḷanato
anya-e0301n:1308_7: eko lobhoyeva ariyasaccaṃnāma. Sohi attasamaṅgino satte attanica ārammaṇadhammesuca
anya-e0301n:1308_8: assādaṃ janayitvā niccaṃ vaṭṭadukkhato anukkaṇṭhamāne karotīti tesaṃ lobhasadiso
anya-e0301n:1308_9: añño ñātivā mittovā sahāyovā attāvā attaniyaṃvā natthiviya khāyati. Tasmā taṃsadiso
anya-e0301n:1308_10: añño koci vaṭṭadukkhasaṃvidhāyakonāma natthi. Tañca pajahituṃ sakkontassa añño dujjahonāma
anya-e0301n:1308_11: natthi. Avasesāpana sabbepi sāsavā kusalākusaladhammā samudayasaccaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1309_0: Ettha siyā, nanu avijjāpi sabbassa vaṭṭadukkhassa mūlabhāvena vuttāti sāpi samudaye
anya-e0301n:1309_1: ariyasacceeva vattabbāti. Vuccate, yathāhi eko cheko uyyānapālo sampattiyuttaṃ bhūmi
anya-e0301n:1309_2: bhāgaṃ labhitvā attano ñāṇabalena bhūmibhāgañca nānābījānica abhisaṅkharitvā nandanasadisaṃ
anya-e0301n:1309_3: uyyānaṃ māpesi. Tattha bhūmi uyyāna pālassa bījānaṃ rukkhānañca patiṭṭhānakiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:1309_4: sādheti. Bījānica aṅkuruppādanakiccaṃ sādhenti, uyyānapāloyeva pana sabbakiccāni
anya-e0301n:1309_5: sādheti. So hi bhūmiyaṃ bījesu rukkhesuca yaṃyaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti. Taṃ sabbaṃ karoti.
anya-e0301n:1309_6: Mametanti pariggaṇhāti rakkhati. Tato uppanne bhoge bhuñjati. Tasmā ko idaṃ māpesi,
anya-e0301n:1309_7: kassedaṃ uyyānanti vutte uyyānapāloyeva māpesi. Tassedaṃ uyyānaṃ icceva vuccati.
anya-e0301n:1309_8: Na bhūmiṃ māpesi. Bījāni māpenti. Tesaṃ idaṃ uyyānanti vuccati. Kā pana uyyānasampattiyā
anya-e0301n:1309_9: paccayaparaṃparāti vutte pana bhūmieva ādito vattabbā. Na uyyānapālo. Naca bījānīti.
anya-e0301n:1309_10: Evaṃ sampadamidaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paṭiccasamuppāda nayañhi patvā paccayaparaṃ paravasena
anya-e0301n:1309_11: dukkha dhammānaṃ pavatti nivattividhāne avijjāeva ādi pabhavapadhānabhūtā hoti, na
anya-e0301n:1309_12: taṇhā. Saccadesanāyaṃ pana tesaṃ nibbattakadhammavidhāne taṇhāeva sāmijeṭṭhaka padhānabhūtā
anya-e0301n:1309_13: hoti. Na avijjāti natthi samudayāriyasaccabhāve avijjāya okāsoti daṭṭhabbo. Kilesānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1309_15: Chasu lokiyavisuddhīsu maggaṅgāni maggasaccaṃ nāma. Aṭṭhaṅgiko lokuttaramaggoeva
anya-e0301n:1310_0: Ariyasaddo cettha katthaci kadāci kesañci kutoci kathañci avitathabhāvena uttamatthavācakoti.
anya-e0301n:1310_1: Vibhāvaniyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayena saccasaddassa attho vibhāvito dukkhaṃariya
anya-e0301n:1310_2: saccanti ettha pīḷanaṭṭho, saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭhoti imehi catūhi
anya-e0301n:1310_3: atthehi cakkhādikassa ekekassa tebhūmakadhammassa dukkhasaccatā veditabbā. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1310_4: saṅkhataṭṭha vipariṇāmaṭṭhā pubbe saṅkhāra dukkhavipariṇāmadukkhesu vuttanayāeva.
anya-e0301n:1310_5: Padatthatopana paccayehi saṅkharīyatīti saṅkhato. Pageva kammādipaccayābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena
anya-e0301n:1310_6: vinā na uppajjati, napavattatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Virūpo hutvā pariṇāmo vipariṇāmo. Parihāniceva
anya-e0301n:1310_7: paribhedoca. Pīḷanaṭṭhoti ettha pīḷitabbanti pīḷanaṃ. Pīḷetīti pīḷanaṃ. Pīḷīyate
anya-e0301n:1310_8: pīḷanaṃ. Atthoti sabhāvo. Pīḷanaṃ attho yassāti viggaho. Tattha yathā ekissā duggatitthiyā
anya-e0301n:1310_9: kucchimhi putto uppajjati. Soca nānārogehi sayaṃ niccaṃ pīḷito hutvā paṭijagganadukkhehi
anya-e0301n:1310_10: mātarañca niccaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Yañca tassā kucchimhi tādisassa puttassa uppajjanaṃ,
anya-e0301n:1310_11: tañca tassā itthiyā pīḷanakiccameva hoti. Evamevaṃ ye cakkhādayo dhammā jarāmaraṇehi
anya-e0301n:1310_12: niccaṃ pīḷīyanti, te paṭijagganadukkhehi taṃ samaṅgīnaṃ puggalaṃ niccaṃ pīḷentiyeva.
anya-e0301n:1310_13: Yañca tassa santāne tesaṃ uppajjanaṃ, tañca tassa pīḷanakiccamevāti. Yathāhayo bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:1310_14: cakkhussa uppādo ṭhiti abhinibbatti pātubhāvo. Dukkhasseso uppādo. Rogānaṃ ṭhiti
anya-e0301n:1310_15: jarāmaraṇassa pātubhāvo. Yo bhikkhave sotassa ghānassa jivhāya kāyassa manassa uppādotiādi.
anya-e0301n:1311: Santāpaṭṭhoti rāgaggiādīhi ekādasahi aggīhi bhusaṃ paridayhanaṭṭho. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:1312_0: Cakkhuṃ ādittaṃ. Kena ādittaṃ. Rāgagginā ādittaṃ. Dosagginā. Mohagginā. Jātiyā. Jarāya.
anya-e0301n:1312_1: Maraṇena. Sokena. Paridevena. Dukkhena. Domanassena. Upāyāsena ādittanti vadāmi.
anya-e0301n:1312_2: Sotaṃ ādittaṃ. Ghānaṃ ādittaṃ. Jivhā ādittā. Kāyo āditto. Mano ādittoti.
anya-e0301n:1313_0: Ādipanaṃ santāpanaṃ paridayhananti idha atthato ekanti. Ettha siyā, ariyamaggopi
anya-e0301n:1313_2: puggalaṃ susaṃ pīḷetiyeva. Tathā vipariṇāmadhammoca. Tasmā sopi piḷanādiatthena dukkhasaccasaṅgaho
anya-e0301n:1313_3: siyāti.Na. Sabbadukkhasanti vaṃhattā. So hi vuttappakāraṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1313_4: anubhūtassa puggalassa sakiṃ uppajjamāno sabbaṃ kilesajātaṃ khepento uppajjati. Nirujjhamānoca
anya-e0301n:1313_5: sabbaṃ āyatiṃ anamatagge saṃsāre vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vūpasamento nirujjhati. Vūpasantaṃca
anya-e0301n:1313_6: anāgata dukkhaṃ upādāya vuttappakāraṃ abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhaṃ gaṇanupagaṃ nahoti. Bhijjantoca
anya-e0301n:1313_7: anuttaraṃ vimuttisukhaṃ datvāva bhijjati. Tasmā tassa vipariṇāmapaccayāpi puggalassa
anya-e0301n:1313_8: kāci hānināma natthīti na so dukkhasaccasaṅgahoti. Lokiyadhammā pana uppajjamānā
anya-e0301n:1313_9: pavatta mānāca pubbe vuttapakārehi saṅkhāradukkhehi bhusaṃ pīḷetvā eva uppajjanti
anya-e0301n:1313_10: pavattantica. Nirujjhamānā mahantaṃ pariḷāhadukkhaṃ janetvā apariyante khuracakkasadise
anya-e0301n:1313_11: vaṭṭadukkhayante puggalaṃ yojentāva nirujjhanti. Tasmā teeva pīḷanādiatthehi ekantadukkhā
anya-e0301n:1313_12: hontīti. Etena nibbānassapi sampāpakapaccayābhisaṅkharaṇalesaṃ gahetvā dukkhasaccattapasaṅgo nivattito hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1314_0: Dukkhasamudayo ariyasaccanti ettha bhavābhavasaṅkhātaṃ dukkhakkhandhaṃ samudeti.
anya-e0301n:1314_1: Punappunaṃ abbocchinnaṃ katvā udayati uṭṭhāpeti vaḍḍhetivāti dukkhasamudayo, āyūhanaṭṭho,
anya-e0301n:1314_2: nidānaṭṭho, saṃyogaṭṭho, palibodhaṭṭhoti catūhi atthehi lobhassa dukkhasamudayatā
anya-e0301n:1314_3: veditabbā. Tattha āyūhanaṭṭhoti bhavābhava saṅkhātassa ekekasmiṃ bhavepi vatthukāmapaṭisaṃyuttassa
anya-e0301n:1314_4: dukkhakkhandhassa bhiyyo paribyūhanaṭṭho rāsikaraṇaṭṭho nidānaṭṭhoti tadeva nirantaraṃ
anya-e0301n:1314_5: katvā anuppadānaṭṭho niyyātanaṭṭhoti vuttaṃ hoti. Saṃyogaṭṭhoti dukkhakkhandhasmiṃeva
anya-e0301n:1314_6: daḷhaṃ bandhanaṭṭho. Palibodhaṭṭhoti tato tassa tassa muccanupāyassa nīvāraṇa vasena
anya-e0301n:1314_7: palibundhanaṭṭho uparundhanaṭṭhoti attho. Dukkhanirodho ariyasaccanti ettha vaṭṭadukkhassa
anya-e0301n:1314_8: nirujjhanaṃ anuppāda dhammatāpatti vasena khiyyānaṃ dukkhanirodho. Dukkhaṃ vā nirujjhati
anya-e0301n:1314_9: napavattati etasminti dukkhanirodho. Nissaraṇaṭṭho vivekaṭṭho, asaṅkhataṭṭho, amataṭṭhoti
anya-e0301n:1314_10: catūhi atthehi nibbānassa dukkhanirodhatā veditabbā. Tattha nissaraṇaṭṭhoti nissaraṇa
anya-e0301n:1314_11: vimuttiyā vimuccanaṭṭho. Vivekaṭṭhoti vaṭṭadukkhapalibodhato viviccanaṭṭho. Asaṅkhataṭṭhoti
anya-e0301n:1315_0: Dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadāti ettha dukkhanirodhaṃ gameti sampāpetīti dukkhanirodhagāminī.
anya-e0301n:1315_1: Attano santāne paṭilābhakaraṇa vasena paṭipajjitabbāti paṭipadā. Dukkhanirodhagāminīca
anya-e0301n:1315_2: sā paṭipadā cāti viggaho. Niyyānaṭṭho, hetvaṭṭho, dassanaṭṭho, adhipateyyaṭṭhoti
anya-e0301n:1315_3: catūhi atthehi aṭṭhaṅgikamaggassa dukkhanirodhamaggatā veditabbā. Tattha niyyānaṭṭhoti
anya-e0301n:1315_4: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādikaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ paṭinivattetvā avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodhotiādikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1315_5: vaṭṭapaṭisotaṃ abhimukhaṃ niggamanaṭṭho. Hetvaṭṭhoti sabbesaṃ ariyaguṇānaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāva
anya-e0301n:1315_6: sādhanaṭṭho. Dassanaṭṭhoti aññāṇaadassanasaṅkhātassa sammohassa pahāna vasena catusaccadhammassa
anya-e0301n:1315_8: sayameva attano adhipati hutvā virocanaṭṭho. Lokiyamaggā hi taṇhāya ārammaṇabhāve
anya-e0301n:1315_9: ṭhitā taṇhādāsabyaṃ nātivattantīti. Etthaca ime sattānāma ekantena dukkhapaṭikūlā
anya-e0301n:1315_10: honti dukkhabhīrukā. Yeca attani dukkhaṃ janenti. Tesu verisaññaṃ uppādenti. Attano
anya-e0301n:1315_11: pana ekantadukkhaṃvā ekantadukkhajanakaṃvā te najānanti. Tasmā te attano dukkhamuttiyā
anya-e0301n:1315_12: yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ āyūhanti. Taṃ taṃ attano dukkhavaḍḍhiyāeva sampajjati. Kiṃ pana ekantadukkhaṃ,
anya-e0301n:1315_13: kiṃca ekanta dukkhajanakanti. Atītānāgatapaccuppannabhūtā attano attano attahāvapariyāpannā
anya-e0301n:1315_14: tebhūmakadhammāeva attano attano ekantadukkhānāma. Kasmā, tehi mutteeva sabbadukkhehi
anya-e0301n:1315_15: muccanato, amutteca amuccanatoti. Attano taṇhāeva attano ekantadukkhajanakaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1315_16: Kasmā, tāya pahīnāyaeva ekanta dukkhehi muccanato, apahīnāyaca amuccanatoti.
anya-e0301n:1316_0: Tathā ime sattā ekantena sukhakāmā honti sukhābhinandino. Yeca attani sukhaṃ janenti.
anya-e0301n:1316_1: Tesu piyamittasaññaṃ uppādenti. Attanopana ekantasukhaṃvā ekantasukhamaggaṃvāte najānanti.
anya-e0301n:1316_2: Tasmā te attano sukhavaḍḍhiyā yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ āyūhanti. Taṃ taṃ attano dukkhavaḍḍhiyāeva
anya-e0301n:1316_3: sampajjati. Kiṃ pana ekantasukhaṃ koca ekanta sukhamaggoti. Ekantadukkhadhammassa
anya-e0301n:1316_4: abhāvoeva attano ekanta sukhaṃnāma. Ekantadukkhajanakassa pahānamaggoeva attano ekanta
anya-e0301n:1316_5: sukhamaggonāmāti imamatthaṃ dassento imāni catusaccapadāni kathesīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1318: “Dukkhassa anuppādanirodho ettha etenātivā dukkhanirodho”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha etenāti idaṃ nayujjati.
anya-e0301n:1319_0: Na hi nibbānaṃ dukkhassa anuppādanirodha kriyāsādhane dukkhena sahakārī kāraṇaṃ hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1319_1: Sesacetasikāti vedanā saññāhi sesā paññāsa cetasikā. Atītādivasena tividha bhinnānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1319_2: ajjhattādi oḷārikādi hīnādi dūrādivasena duvidhabhinnānañca dhammānaṃ rāsaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1319_3: khandhavohāro hoti. Nibbānassa pana tādi so bhedo natthīti vuttaṃ bhedābhāvenātiādi.
anya-e0301n:1319_4: Tañhi atītādike tividhabhede ekaṃpi na hoti. Kasmā. Aniddisitabba dhammattā. Tañhi
anya-e0301n:1319_5: tekālikadhammānaṃ khayavirāganirodhabhūto animitta dhammoyeva hoti. Tasmā idaṃ atīte
anya-e0301n:1319_6: asukabuddhakāle nibbānaṃ. Idaṃ anāgate. Idaṃ etarahīti evaṃ kālabhedena niddisitabbaṃ
anya-e0301n:1319_7: nahoti. Tathā disā desaṭhānabhedena parinibbutapuggalabhedena ca. Kevalaṃ pana anamatagge
anya-e0301n:1319_8: saṃsāravaṭṭe yattakāni anattha padāni dissanti. Tappaṭipakkhasiddhehi guṇapadehieva
anya-e0301n:1319_9: taṃ kathe tabbanti. Dukesu pana ajjhattadukaṃ patvā taṃ bahiddhāeva hoti. Na ajjhattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1319_10: Oḷārikadukaṃ patvā sukhumameva hoti, na oḷārikaṃ. Hīnadukaṃ patvā paṇītameva hoti,
anya-e0301n:1319_11: na hīnaṃ. Dūre dukaṃ patvā dūreeva hoti, na santiketi. Khandhasaṅgahanissaṭanti khandhasaṅgahato vimuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1320_0: Dvārālambaṇabhedenāti dvārachakka ārammaṇachakkānaṃ bhedena. Āyatanāni dvādasa bhavantīti
anya-e0301n:1320_1: yojanā. Etthaca dvārachakkaṃ dhammārammaṇaṃevāti sesadhammālambaṇaṃ sandhāya ārammaṇachakkaṃ
anya-e0301n:1320_2: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dvārā.La. Pariyāyenāti channaṃ dvārānaṃ channaṃ ālambaṇānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1320_3: tesu dvārālambaṇesu uppannānaṃ viññāṇānañca kamena dhātuyo aṭṭhārasa bhavantīti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:1320_4: Etthapi dvārachakke manodvāraṃ viññāṇekadesameva hoti. Dvārachakkaṃ viññāṇasattakañca
anya-e0301n:1320_5: dhammā lambaṇekadesamevāti. Maggo lokuttaro maggonāma matoti yojanā. Maggayuttā ekūnatiṃsadhammā
anya-e0301n:1320_6: phalabhūtāca sattatiṃsa dhammā catusacca vinissaṭā catūhi ariyasaccehi vinissaṭā
anya-e0301n:1320_7: vimuttā. Yamettha vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti.
anya-e0301n:1325_0: 166. Evaṃ sattahi paricchedehi pathamassa nāmarūpapariccheda ñāṇassa vidhānaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0301n:1325_1: idāni dutīyassa paccayapariggahañāṇassa vidhānaṃ dassento yesaṃsaṅkhatadhammānantiādi
anya-e0301n:1325_2: māha. Idāni yesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatabhūtā yedhammā yathā yehi hetādīhi
anya-e0301n:1325_3: paccayākārehi paccayā upakārakā honti. Taṃ vibhāgaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paccayuppannabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1325_4: vibhāgañca tesaṃ paccayadhammānaṃ vibhāgañca tesaṃpaccayākārānaṃ iha vibhāgañca imasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:1327: “Paccaye dassetu”nti vuttaṃ. Taṃ taṃ vibhāganti iminā na sameti.
anya-e0301n:1329: “Iha imasmiṃ samuccaya saṅgahānantare ṭhāne”ti iha saddassa atthavibhāvanaṃ vuttaṃ. Taṃpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n:1330_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati idāni saddo niratthako hotīti, paṭicca phalaṃ samuppajjati etasmāti
anya-e0301n:1330_1: paṭiccasamuppādo. Tattha paṭiccāti avinā, amuñcitvāti attho. Avijjādiko paccayadhammoti
anya-e0301n:1330_2: vaṇṇenti. Athavā, samuppajjanaṃ samuppādo. Sahajātadhammehi saheva kalāpavasena abhinibbatti
anya-e0301n:1330_3: pātubhāvoti attho. Yathāsakaṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca tena avinābhāvīhutvā samuppādo paṭicca
anya-e0301n:1330_4: samuppādo, atthato pana sabbesaṃ paccayapaccayuppannabhūtānaṃ saṅkhata dhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1330_5: paccayāyattavuttitāsaṅkhātaṃ sabbasaṅkhatasādhāraṇaṃ ekaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ. Yaṃ idappaccayatātica
anya-e0301n:1330_6: vuccati. Tatthaca idappaccaya tāti ayaṃ imassa paccayo ayaṃ imassa paccayoti evaṃ
anya-e0301n:1330_7: niddisitabbo ayaṃ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā. Saṅkhatadhammā. Idappaccayānaṃ bhāvo
anya-e0301n:1330_8: idappaccayatā. Yathāvutta sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ evāti attho veditabbo, na paṭicca phalaṃ
anya-e0301n:1330_9: samuppajjati etasmāti paṭiccasamuppādo. Avijjādiko paccayadhammotica imesaṃ paccayā
anya-e0301n:1330_10: idappaccayā. Idappaccayāeva idappaccayatātica. Visuddhimagge pana samuppajjanaṃ samuppādoti
anya-e0301n:1330_11: ayamattho paṭikkhitto. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ayameva adhippeto viya dissati. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:1331_0: Katamoca bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo. Jātipaccayā bhikkhave jarāmaraṇaṃ, uppādāvā
anya-e0301n:1331_1: tathāgatānaṃ anuppādāvā tathāgatānaṃ ṭhitāva sā dhātu, dhammaṭṭhitatā dhammaniyāmatā
anya-e0301n:1331_2: idappaccayatāti.La. Avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā uppādāvā.La. Idappaccayatā. Iti kho bhikkhave
anya-e0301n:1331_3: tatra tathatā avitathatā anaññathatā idappaccayatā. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādoti.
anya-e0301n:1332_0: Ettha hi ṭhitāva sā dhātūtiādinā tatra tathatā avitathatātiādināca yathāvuttaṃ idappaccayatā
anya-e0301n:1332_1: saṅkhātaṃ sāmañña lakkhaṇameva paṭiccasamuppādonāmāti dasseti. Na cettha bhāvasādhane
anya-e0301n:1332_2: kate sati paṭiccasaddena saha samuppādasaddassa asamānakattutāsaṅkhāto byañjanayuttivirodho
anya-e0301n:1332_3: atthi. Yo paṭicca kriyāya kattā, tasseva samuppādakriyāyapi kattutā sambhavato. Na
anya-e0301n:1332_4: hi kriyānāma katturahitāsambhavatīti. Saṅkhatadhammesuca gambhīresu sati aniccatādilakkhaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1332_5: viya idaṃpi saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ gambhīrameva hotīti nayidha gambhīravacanavirodho sambhavati.
anya-e0301n:1332_6: Athakho saṅkhatadhammato saṅkhatalakkhaṇameva gambhīrataraṃ hotīti. Tādisena pana
anya-e0301n:1332_7: sāmaññalakkhaṇena sampannā yathāvuttā avijjādayo saṅkhatadhammā paṭiccasamuppannānāma.
anya-e0301n:1332_8: Yathāha-katameca bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppannādhammā jarāmaraṇaṃ bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppannaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n:1332_9: Avijjā bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppannāti. Iti sabbesaṃ paccayapaccayuppanna bhūtānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1332_10: saṅkhatadhammānaṃ paccayā satta vuttitāsaṅkhāto paṭiccasamuppādoca so nīyati ñāyati
anya-e0301n:1332_11: paṭivijjhīyatīti katvā nayocāti paṭiccasamuppādanayo. Paṭhapeti saṅkhatadhamme nānāpakārehi
anya-e0301n:1332_12: paccayabhedehi pavatteti deseti etthāti paṭṭhānaṃ. Mahāpakaraṇaṃ. Paṭṭhāne desito nayo paṭṭhānanayo.
anya-e0301n:1333_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccayadhamme bhāve vijjamāne sati te te bhavanti sīlenāti tabbhāvabhāvino.
anya-e0301n:1333_1: Saṅkhatadhammā. Tesaṃ bhāvo tabbhāvabhāvibhāvo, imasmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti. Imassa uppādā
anya-e0301n:1333_2: idaṃ uppajjatīti evaṃ pavatto saṅkhatadhammaniyāmo. Tabbhāvabhāvibhāvoeva ākāro tabbhāvabhāvibhāvākāro.
anya-e0301n:1333_3: So eva tabbhāvabhāvibhāvākāramattaṃ. Mattasaddena hetādipaccaya sattiniyamaṃ nivatteti.
anya-e0301n:1333_4: Tena upalakkhito nayo paṭiccasamuppāda nayo. Āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitiṃ ārabbhāti ettha
anya-e0301n:1333_5: hetu ārammaṇā divasena tathātathā upakārakatāsaṅkhāto paccayasatti viseso āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitināma.
anya-e0301n:1333_6: So hi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārātiādīsu viya paccayadhammuddhāramatte aṭṭhatvā hetupaccayo
anya-e0301n:1333_7: ārammaṇapaccahotiādinā paccayasatti visesuddhāravasena āhacca matthakaṃ pāpetvā desitattā
anya-e0301n:1333_8: āhaccapaccayaṭṭhitīti vuccati. Paccayadhammā tiṭṭhanti attano paccayuppannābhisaṅkharaṇa
anya-e0301n:1333_9: kiccaṃ patvā anosakkamānā hutvā pavattanti etāyāti katvā. Ārabbhāti paṭicca. Vuccatīti
anya-e0301n:1334_0: Ubhayaṃ pana vomissitvā papañcenti ācariyāti idaṃ paṭicca samuppādaṃ papañcente sandhāya
anya-e0301n:1334_1: vuttaṃ. Tehi taṃ papañcayantā paṭṭhāna nayaṃpi āharitvā papañcentīti. Yathā sūriyo
anya-e0301n:1334_2: udayanto andhakāre vidhametvā dabbasambhāre mahājanassa pākaṭe karoti. Evamevaṃ uppannaṃ
anya-e0301n:1334_3: catusaccañāṇaṃ avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā catusacca dhammaṃ vidati pākaṭaṃ karotīti
anya-e0301n:1334_4: vijjā. Tappaṭipakkhattā moho avijjānāma. So hi uppajjamāno dhammesu aññāṇaadassana
anya-e0301n:1334_5: saṅkhātaṃ andhakāraṃ janetvāva uppajjati. Paṭicca phalaṃ eti āgacchati etasmā etenāti
anya-e0301n:1334_6: vā paccayo. Avijjāca sā paccayo cāti avijjāpaccayo. Tasmā avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā
anya-e0301n:1334_7: sambhavantīti sambandho. Saṅkhataṃ kāyavacīmanokammaṃ abhisaṅkharonti sattā etehīti
anya-e0301n:1334_8: saṅkhārā. Vijānātīti viññāṇaṃ. Vijānanti sattā etenāti vā viññāṇaṃ. Ārammaṇe namatīti
anya-e0301n:1334_9: nāmaṃ. Ruppati vikāraṃ āpajjatīti rūpaṃ. Adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena āyatanaṃ. Devānaṃ devāyatanamiva.
anya-e0301n:1334_10: Phusatīti phasso. Phusanti sampayuttakā dhammā etenāti vā phasso. Vedayatīti vedanā.
anya-e0301n:1334_11: Vedayanti paccanubhavanti sattā etāyātivā vedanā. Tassati paritassatīti taṇhā. Niccapipāsavasena
anya-e0301n:1334_12: ārammaṇahetu niccaṃ cañcalati pattheti vāti attho. Tassanti paritassanti cañcalanti
anya-e0301n:1334_13: sattā etāyāti vā taṇhā. Upādiyatīti upādānaṃ. Amuñcagāhaṃ gaṇhātīti attho. Upādiyanti
anya-e0301n:1335_0: Bhavati vaḍḍhatīti bhavo. Bhavanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti sukhadukkhāni etenāti vā bhavo.
anya-e0301n:1335_1: Jananaṃ jāti. Jāyanti pātubhavanti saṅkhata dhammā etāyāti vā jāti. Jīraṇaṃ jarā.
anya-e0301n:1335_2: Jīranti jiṇṇabhāvaṃ gacchanti etāyāti vā jarā. Socanaṃ soko. Socanti cittapariḷāhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1335_3: gacchanti etenāti vā soko. Paridevanaṃ paridevo. Taṃ taṃ pavattiṃ parikittetvā devanti
anya-e0301n:1335_4: kandanti etenāti vā paridevo. Khamituṃ sahituṃ dukkaranti dukkhaṃ. Dummanassa virūpacittassa
anya-e0301n:1335_5: bhāvo domanassaṃ. Bhuso āyāsanaṃ upāyāso. Āyāsananti anassāsanaṃ. Visīdananti attho.
anya-e0301n:1335_6: Evanti iminā yathāvuttena. Avijjādi saṅkhārādipaccayapaccayuppanna paraṃparavidhinā
anya-e0301n:1335_7: samudayo hotīti sambandho. Etassakevalassadukkhakkhandhassāti avijjādikassa etassa
anya-e0301n:1335_8: sakalassa dukkharāsissa kenaci sukhena asaṃmissassa vā dukkharāsissa abhinibbatti
anya-e0301n:1335_9: hotīti attho. Etthaca duvidho paṭiccasamuppādanayo suttantikanayo abhidhammanayoti.
anya-e0301n:1335_10: Tattha suttantikanayena tāva avijjā catubbidhā dukkhapaṭicchādikā samudayapaṭicchādikā
anya-e0301n:1336_0: Saṅkhārā suttantikanayena sāsavā kusalākusalacetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro puññābhisaṅkhāro
anya-e0301n:1336_1: āneñjā bhisaṅkhāroti pana tividhā honti. Tattha dvādasa akusalacetanā apuññāti saṅkhāronāma.
anya-e0301n:1336_3: Abhidhammanayena pana sabbāpi lokiyalokuttarabhūtā kusalākusalacetanā saṅkhārānāma.
anya-e0301n:1336_4: Kiriyacetanā pana sabbāpi vibhaṅge nagahitā. Aṭṭhakathāyañca kiriyadhammānaṃ pana
anya-e0301n:1336_5: yasmā neva avijjā na kusalā kusalamūlāni upanissayapaccayattaṃ labhanti. Tasmā kiriyavasena
anya-e0301n:1336_6: paccayākāro navuttoti vuttaṃ. Avijjāca kusalākusalamūlā nica kiriyadhammānaṃ upanissaya
anya-e0301n:1336_7: paccayā na honti. Tasmā kiriyadhammā paṭiccasamuppādadesanāyaṃ nagahitāti vuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:1336_8: hoti. Saṃyuttepi yato kho bhikkhave bhikkhuno avijjā pahīnā hoti. Vijjāuppannā. So
anya-e0301n:1336_9: avijjā virāgā vijjuppādā neva puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti. Na apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1336_10: Na āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharotīti vuttaṃ. Attano anurūpapaccayavasena pana tesaṃpi
anya-e0301n:1336_11: paṭicca samuppādo avāritoyeva. Nahi koci paṭiccasamuppādarahito saṅkhatadhammonāma
anya-e0301n:1336_12: atthīti. Esa nayo viññāṇādīsupīti. Viññāṇanti bāttiṃsavidhaṃ lokiyavipākaviññāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1336_13: suttantikanayena. Abhidhammanayena pana kiriyacittavajjitaṃ ekūnasattatividhaṃ lokiyalokuttaraviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1336_14: Nāmarūpanti lokiya viññāṇa sahajātaṃ vedanādikhandhattayaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ kammajarūpaṃ
anya-e0301n:1336_15: pavattiyaṃ cittaja rūpañca suttantikanayena. Abhidhammanayena pana sabbaṃ kusalākusala
anya-e0301n:1336_16: vipākasampayuttaṃ khandhattayaṃ vuttappakārarūpañca. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana laddhapacchājātapaccayaṃ
anya-e0301n:1339_0: Saḷāyatananti cha ajjhattikāyatanāni eva sabbattha pāḷiyaṃ vibhattāni. Ekacce pana
anya-e0301n:1339_1: ācariyā bāhirāyatanāni phassassa paccayā hontīti katvā tānipi idha gaṇhanti. Taṃpi
anya-e0301n:1340_0: Katamoca bhikkhave lokassa samudayo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1340_1: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso. Phassapaccayā vedanā. Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.La. Domanassupāyāsā
anya-e0301n:1340_2: sambhavantīti ayaṃ lokassa samudayo. Sotañca.La. Manañca paṭicca dhammeca uppajjati
anya-e0301n:1340_3: manoviññāṇaṃ. Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso.La. Lokassa samudayoti.
anya-e0301n:1341_0: Phassavedanādayopi nayadvaye taṃ taṃ viññāṇasampayuttā veditabbā. Taṇhupādānāni pākaṭāni.
anya-e0301n:1341_1: Bhavo duvidho kammabhavo upapattibhavoca. Lokiyakusalākusalabhūtā cetanāca. Cetanāsampayuttā
anya-e0301n:1341_2: abhijjhādayo anabhijjhādayoca kammabhavo. Yathāha-sabbaṃpi bhavagāmikammaṃ kammabhavoti.
anya-e0301n:1341_3: Kammanibbattā pana sabbepi lokiyavipākakkhandhā sabbānica kammajarūpāni upapattibhavo
anya-e0301n:1341_4: suttantikanayena. Abhidhammanayena pana lokuttara khandhāpi vibhaṅge āgatāeva. Jātijarāmaraṇāni
anya-e0301n:1341_5: sabbesaṃ saṅkhata dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇapattāni. Sokādīsu ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa
anya-e0301n:1341_6: socanākārena pavattā domanassavedanā sokonāma. Rodanākārena pavatto aniṭṭho cittajasaddo
anya-e0301n:1341_7: paridevonāma. Kāyikā dukkhavedanā dukkhaṃnāma. Cetasikā dukkhavedanā domanassaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1341_8: Ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ saṃsīdanavisīdanākārapavatto doso upāyāsonāma. Ayamettha vibhāgo.
anya-e0301n:1341_9: Yesaṃ pana khandhadukkhe avijjā appahīnā hoti. Tesaṃ itarasaccesupi sā appahīnāeva
anya-e0301n:1341_10: hotīti te khandhapavattiyaṃeva sukhasaññaṃ labhanti. Khandhanirodhe dukkhasaññaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1341_12: Tasmā khandhapavattipaccayabhūtā puññā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhāradhammāeva tesaṃ avijjānivuṭānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1341_13: sukhakāmānaṃ dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisaraṇā hontīti vuttaṃ avijjāpacca yāsaṅkhārāti.
anya-e0301n:1341_14: Etthaca visesato paccuppannakhandhapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya duccaritabhūtā apuññābhisaṅkhārā
anya-e0301n:1341_15: sambhavanti. Anāgata khandhapaṭicchādikāya avijjāya sucaritabhūtā puññāneñjābhisaṅkhārā
anya-e0301n:1341_16: sambhavantīti veditabbā. Saṅkhāresu sati appahīnabhavataṇhānaṃ sattānaṃ cutianantaraṃ
anya-e0301n:1341_17: punabhavābhinibbattiyā koci vibandho nāma natthi. Tasmā saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1341_18: nāmarūpaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ phasso vedanāti ime attabhāvasaññitā pañcadhammā bhavantare
anya-e0301n:1341_19: pātu bhavanti. Tattha pana viññāṇameva padhānaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ hotīti vuttaṃ. Saṅkhārapaccayāviññāṇanti
anya-e0301n:1341_20: viññāṇeca sati tassa udayabhūtānaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ uppattiyā vibandhonāma natthīti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1341_21: Viññāṇapaccayānāma rūpanti. Ettāvatā sāmaññato paripuṇṇonāma kāyo rūpa kāyoca vutto
anya-e0301n:1341_22: hoti. Evaṃsantepi tesu dvīsu kāyesu yedhammā sattapaññattiyā padhānaṅgabhūtā honti.
anya-e0301n:1341_23: Yehica phassā dīni upari aṅgāni āgatāni honti. Yesuca sattā attagāhaṃ daḷhataraṃ
anya-e0301n:1341_24: gaṇhanti. Te visuṃ nīharitvā dassetuṃ nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatananti vuttaṃ. Nāmarūpe
anya-e0301n:1341_25: sati tesaṃpi uppattiyā vibandho natthiyeva. Saḷāyatanasamuṭṭhitoca phasso saḷāyatane
anya-e0301n:1341_26: sati ekantena sambhavatīti vuttaṃ saḷāyatanapaccayāphassoti. Phassasamuṭṭhitāca vedanā
anya-e0301n:1341_27: phasse sati ekantena sambhavatiyevāti vuttaṃ phassapaccayāvedanāti. Sukhavedanāsadiso
anya-e0301n:1341_28: taṇhāya avassayonāma natthīti vuttaṃ vedanāpaccayātaṇhāti. Kāmupādānañcanāma ekasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:1341_29: ārammaṇe punappunaṃ samudācaritvā daḷhattappattā taṇhāeva, diṭṭhiyoca attanica attano
anya-e0301n:1341_30: ārammaṇesuca assādana khamana rocana bhūtāya taṇhāya vasena daḷhattaṃ āpajjantīti
anya-e0301n:1341_31: vuttaṃ taṇhāpaccayāupādānanti. Upādiyantāca tassa tassa upādāniyassa atthassa hitavuḍḍhisaññitaṃ
anya-e0301n:1341_32: taṃtaṃ kammabhavaṃ āyūhantiyevāti vuttaṃ upādānapaccayābhavoti. Bhavasaddo hettha
anya-e0301n:1343_0: Kammabhave sati ekantena punabhavopi sambhavatīti vuttaṃ bhavapaccayājātīti. Jātiyāca
anya-e0301n:1343_1: sati ekantena jarāmaraṇaṃ hotiyevāti vuttaṃ jātipaccayājarāmaraṇanti. Ayamettha tabbhāvabhāvibhāvavidhi.
anya-e0301n:1343_2: Sokādivacanañcettha īdisena tabbhāva bhāvibhāvena pavattassa sakalassa vaṭṭadhammassa
anya-e0301n:1343_3: ādīnavarāsidassa natthaṃ vuttanti. Etthāti imasmiṃ paccayasaṅgahe. Tatthāti tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:1343_4: paṭiccasamuppādanaye. Addhānavante dhamme bhuso dhāretīti addhā. Kālo. So hi tekālike
anya-e0301n:1343_5: dhamme santānānupabandhavasena kappaparaṃparā vassa utu māsa pakkha ratti diva paraṃparāca
anya-e0301n:1343_6: hutvā apatamāne dhārento viya upaṭṭhātīti. Athavā, bhuso dahanti tiṭṭhanti pavattanti
anya-e0301n:1343_7: tekālikā dhammā etthāti addhā. Kāloyeva. So pana sayaṃ abhinnopi bhedavante dhamme
anya-e0301n:1343_8: upādāya bhinno viya upacarituṃ yuttoti vuttaṃ tayoaddhāti.
anya-e0301n:1345: “Atati satataṃ gacchati pavattatīti addhāti vuttaṃ”. Taṃ na sundaraṃ.
anya-e0301n:1346_0: Evañhi sati addhānanti nasijjhati. Yathā addhānamaggapaṭipannoti. Aṅgānīti avayavapadhānaṅgāni.
anya-e0301n:1346_1: Padhānasambhārāti vuttaṃ hoti. Ākārāti avayavakoṭṭhāsā. Koṭṭhāsattho hettha ākārasaddo.
anya-e0301n:1346_2: Yathā dvattiṃsākārāti. Ākiranti tattha tattha pakiritvā thapitā viya hontīti ākārātipi
anya-e0301n:1346_3: vadanti. Sandhīti dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ saṅkhepānaṃ saṅghaṭanaṭṭhānaṃ. Saṅkhepāti padhānadhammasaṅgahā.
anya-e0301n:1346_4: Vaṭṭanti punappunaṃ āvaṭṭantīti vaṭṭāni. Mūlayanti sabbepi vaṭṭadhammā ettha tiṭṭhanti
anya-e0301n:1346_5: tadāyattavuttitāyāti mūlāni. Patiṭṭhā. Pabhavāti attho. Yasmā eko puriso ekāya aṅguliyā
anya-e0301n:1346_6: samuddo dakaṃ gahetvā mahājanassa mukhe pakkhipitvā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udakassa
anya-e0301n:1346_7: loṇabhāvaṃ saññāpento viya bhagavāpi avijjā paccayā saṅkhārātiādinā ekameva paccuppannabhavaṃ
anya-e0301n:1346_8: paripuṇṇaṃ desetvā anamataggassa sakalassa saṃsāravaṭṭassa pavattiṃ ñāpesi. Paripuṇṇaṃ
