anya-e0301n:1454_55: vuttaṃ. Tattha manodvārassaāpātamāgatanti cakkhūni nimmilitvāvā aññasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvāvā
anya-e0301n:1454_56: āvajjantassa cakkhunā diṭṭhasadisaṃ manodvāre paccupaṭṭhitaṃ hoti. Uggahanimittaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1454_57: Suṭṭhu avinassamānaṃ katvā gahitattā. Sāca bhāvanā samādhiyati. Na tāva bhāvanantarabhāvaṃ
anya-e0301n:1454_58: pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Tathā samāhitassāti tena matthakapattena parikammasamādhinā
anya-e0301n:1454_59: samāhitassa etassa yogino. Tatoparanti uggahanimittuppatti to paraṃ. Bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa
anya-e0301n:1454_60: citte sannisinnanti sambandho. Tattha anuyuñjanthassāti nirantaraṃ padahantassa.
anya-e0301n:1454_61: Tappaṭibhāganti sabhāva dhammabhūtena tena uggahanimittena sadisaṃ. Vatthudhammavimuccitanti
anya-e0301n:1454_63: uggahanimittato vimuccitvā visuṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ. Tatoyeva paññattisaṅkhātaṃ nimittapaññattiiti
anya-e0301n:1454_64: kathitaṃ. Bhāvanā mayanti kevalaṃ bhāvanācittabalena pasiddhaṃ. Ālambaṇanti tadeva
anya-e0301n:1454_66: sannisinnaṃ niccalabhāvena saṇṭhitaṃ hutvā suṭṭhu appitaṃ pavesitaṃ hoti. Tanti nimittālambaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1454_67: pavuccatīti sambandho. Yasmā candamaṇḍalādikassa viya tassa nimittālambaṇassa parisuddhapariyodātabhāvena
anya-e0301n:1454_69: cittassa vaseneva hoti. Na tassa ālambaṇassa vasena. Nahi paññatti dhamme tādiso
anya-e0301n:1454_70: guṇonāma upalabbhatīti. Tasmā paṭibhāga nimitte samuppanne nīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ paṭibandhakadhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1454_71: vikkhambhitatā siddhā hotīti vuttaṃ tatopaṭṭhāyātiādi. Paṭibandhanti nīvārenti nissaraṇapakkhikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1454_72: cittaṃ pātentīti paṭibandhā. Nīvaraṇa dhammā. Visesena pahīnā paṭibandhā etāyāti
anya-e0301n:1454_73: paṭibandhavippahīnā. Samāsevantassāti suṭṭhu āsevantassa. Sattavidhaṃ nimitta rakkhaṇavidhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1454_74: sampādetvā cakkavattigabbhaṃ viya suṭṭhu rakkhitvā punappunaṃ bhāvanāvasena sevantassāti attho.
anya-e0301n:1455: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
anya-e0301n:1458: Nacireneva kālena, hoti kassaci appanāti hi vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1459_0: Rūpāvacarapathamajjhānaṃappetīti kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā sātisayaṃ saṇhasukhumabhāvappattaṃ
anya-e0301n:1459_2: saṅkhātaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ tasmiṃ nimitte anupavisitvā viya vattatīti attho. Tameva
anya-e0301n:1459_3: pathamajjhānaṃ vasībhūtaṃ katvāti sambandho. Pañcasu vasītāsu pana pathamajjhānato
anya-e0301n:1459_4: vuṭṭhāya pathamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjati. Tato vicāraṃ. Tato pītiṃ. Tato sukhaṃ. Tato
anya-e0301n:1459_5: samādhiṃ. Tato puna vitakkaṃ. Tato vicāranti evaṃ punappunaṃ jhānaṅgāni āvajjantassa
anya-e0301n:1459_6: yadā taṃtaṃjhānaṅgālambaṇā cittavārā antarantarā katipayabhavaṅgehi antaritā hutvā
anya-e0301n:1459_7: nirantarabhūtā viya pavattanti. Tadā āvajjana paccavekkhana vasitāyo vasībhūtānāma
anya-e0301n:1459_8: honti. Etā pana sabbaññubuddhānaṃ matthakappattā honti. Tesañhi yamakapāṭi hāriyādikālesu
anya-e0301n:1459_10: pavattanti. Antarabhavaṅgānipi pacchimavārassa upacāra bhūtāni bhavaṅga calana saṅkhātāni
anya-e0301n:1459_11: dveeva pavattanti. Yattha aparaṃ jhānaṅgaṃ āpāta māgacchati. Nahi ārammaṇe āpātaṃ
anya-e0301n:1459_12: anāgate bhavaṅgaṃ calati. Naca vinā bhavaṅgacalanena āvajjanuppattināma atthīti.
anya-e0301n:1459_13: Thapetvā sabbaññubuddhe aññesaṃ vasibhāvapattānaṃpi antarantarā bhavaṅgacāre gaṇanānāma
anya-e0301n:1459_14: natthīti paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Visuddhimagge pana ayaṃ pana matthakappattāvasī
anya-e0301n:1459_15: bhagavato yamakapāṭihāriyakāle labbhati. Aññesaṃvā evarūpe kāleti vuttaṃ. Jhānassa
anya-e0301n:1459_16: sīghataraṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasīnāma. Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ samāpajjane
anya-e0301n:1459_17: dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ. Esanayo sesāsupīti. Tathā samāpajjitaṃ jhānaṃ accharāmattādivasena
anya-e0301n:1459_18: atiparittakaṃpi khaṇaṃ thapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasīnāma. Samāpajjitajjhānato
anya-e0301n:1459_19: sīghataraṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasīnāma. Paccavekkhanavasī pana āvajjanavasiyā
anya-e0301n:1461_0: Yattakaṃ kālaṃ icchati. Tattakaṃ cirataraṃ jhānaṃ thapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitānāmātipi
anya-e0301n:1461_1: vuttaṃ. Tathā paricchinna kālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathāparicchinnakālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā
anya-e0301n:1462_0: Pāḷiyañhi pathamajjhānaṃ yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhānāya
anya-e0301n:1462_1: dandhāyitattaṃ natthītiādinā sīghataraṃvā hotu. Cirataraṃvā. Yattakaṃ kālaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_2: thapetuṃvā yattake kāle tato uṭṭhātuṃvā icchati. Tattakaṃ kālaṃ anūnaṃvā anadhikaṃvā
anya-e0301n:1462_3: katvā adhiṭṭhātuṃvā vuṭṭhātuṃvā samatthatāpi dassitāyeva hotīti. Evañcasati vuṭṭhānavasitāpi
anya-e0301n:1462_4: adhiṭṭhānavasitāya siddhāya siddhāevāti tāsaṃ dvinnaṃ visesakappanāpi nippayojanā
anya-e0301n:1462_5: hotīti daṭṭhabbā. Vasanaṃ vasī. Samatthatāti attho. Issara bhāvoti vuttaṃ hoti. Vasīeva
anya-e0301n:1462_6: vasitā. Yathā devoeva devatāti. Katvā padahatoti sambandho. Vitakkādikaṃ oḷārikaṅgaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_7: pahānāyāti ettha pathamajjhānaṃ tāva vasībhūtaṃ katvā ṭhitassa vitakko oḷārikato
anya-e0301n:1462_8: upaṭṭhāti. Tadā ahovatame avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ assāti evamassa ajjhāsayo saṇṭhāti. Tadā
anya-e0301n:1462_9: avitakkaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjissāmīti puna tasmiṃ paṭibhāganimitte parikammaṃ karontassa
anya-e0301n:1462_10: sā bhāvanā vitakkavirāgabhāvanānāma hoti. Sāpi yāva vitakke nikanti na pariyādiyati,
anya-e0301n:1462_11: tāva parikammabhāvanānāma. Pariyādinnāya pana vitakkanikantiyā upacāra bhāvanānāma
anya-e0301n:1462_12: hoti. Esanayo sesajjhānupacāresupi. Evaṃ taṃtaṃjhānaṅgavirāgabhāvanābalena vitakkādikassa
anya-e0301n:1462_13: oḷārikassa tassa tassa jhānaṅgassa pajahanatthāya. Vicārādisukhumaṅguppattiyāti vicārādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_14: sukhumānaṃ catunnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dvinnaṃ puna dvinnaṃvā jhānaṅgānaṃ tena tena vitakkādinā
anya-e0301n:1462_15: oḷārikena aṅgena vinā puna uppattiyā. Pāhatoti padahantassa. Padhānanāmakaṃ ātāpavīriyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_16: karontassāti attho. Dutīyajjhānādayoti dutīyajjhānādīni sesarūpāvacarajjhānāni. Yathārahanti
anya-e0301n:1462_17: idaṃ dvāvīsakammaṭṭhānesu dutīyajjhānādīnaṃ anurūpāni kasiṇaānāpāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1462_18: Avasesesu pana aṭṭhārasakammaṭṭhānesu yasmā arūpajjhānāni nāma ārammaṇātikkamanavaseneva
anya-e0301n:1462_19: pavattanti. Tadatikkamanatthañca kasiṇugghāṭanaṃnāma hoti. Tasmā yesu tadugghāṭanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_20: sambhavati. Tāniyeva kasiṇāni dassetuṃ ākāsavajjitakasiṇesūti vuttaṃ. Ākāsakasiṇañhi
anya-e0301n:1462_21: ugghāṭīyamānaṃpi ākāsa meva hotīti natthi tattha tadatikkamanasambhavoti. Ugghāṭetvāti
anya-e0301n:1462_22: yathādiṭṭhe kasiṇanimitte kasiṇanimittasaññaṃ akatvā tattha ākāsaṃ anantaṃ ākāsaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_23: anantanti ākāsasaññaṃ pavattentassa citte taṃkasiṇanimittaṃ antaradhāyati. Tappamāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_24: ākāsameva upaṭṭhāti. Evaṃ kasiṇasaññāvidhamanena ākāsasaññāpavattanenaca yaṃkiñci
anya-e0301n:1462_25: kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā viyojetvāti attho. Laddhaṃ ākāsaṃ ārabbhāti pāṭṭhasesena sambandho.
anya-e0301n:1462_26: Esanayo pathamā ruppaviññāṇantiādīsupi. Anantavasenāti anantaṃ ākāsanti evaṃ pavattamanasikāravasena.
anya-e0301n:1462_27: Santametaṃ paṇītametanti parikammaṃ karontassāti ettha tathā sambhāvetvā parikammaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_28: karontassapi ārammaṇassa samatikkantattā upari jhānaṃ hotiyevāti vuttaṃ catutthāruppamappetīti.
anya-e0301n:1462_29: Parikammaṃkatvāti so bhagavā itipi arahantiādinā samanussaraṇaparikammaṃ katvā. Tasminti
anya-e0301n:1462_30: tasmiṃ buddhaguṇādike ālambaṇe. Bhūmatthe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Nimitteti tassa ārammaṇassa
anya-e0301n:1462_31: ākārasaṅkhāte nimitte. Bhāvalakkhaṇe cetaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Sādhukamuggahiteti ārammaṇassa
anya-e0301n:1462_32: vibhūtatara vasenavā cittassa tasmiṃ ninnapoṇapabbhāravasenavā suṭṭhu uggahite. Upacāroca
anya-e0301n:1462_33: sampajjati ariyasāvakānaṃ diṭṭhasaccānanti adhippāyo. Itaresaṃpi vā maraṇasaññāvavatthānesūti.
anya-e0301n:1462_36: nisandabhūtaṃabhiññā pavattiṃ dassetuṃ abhiññāvasenapavattamānantiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1462_37: yo katādhikāro hoti. Āsannabhave samathajjhānesu katābhiyogovā hoti, pūritabodhisambhāro
anya-e0301n:1462_38: mahāpurisa jātikovā. Tassa aṭṭhavidhesu navavidhesuvā samathajjhānesusijjha mānesu
anya-e0301n:1462_39: abhiññāpi sijjhatiyeva. Rūpajjhānamattesupi sijjhantesu sijjhati yevātipi vadanti.
anya-e0301n:1462_41: abhiññāpādakatāsambhavo vuttoti. Dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana nahi aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu
anya-e0301n:1462_42: cuddasahākārehi ciṇṇavasībhāvaṃ vinā upari abhiññādhigamo hotīti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pana
anya-e0301n:1462_43: thapetvā purisa visese avasesānaṃ bahūnaṃ ādikammikakulaputtānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena
anya-e0301n:1462_44: vuttanti yuttaṃ. Teneva hi visuddhimagge imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ aparidametvā
anya-e0301n:1462_45: pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro iddhivikubbanaṃ sampādessatīti netaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_46: ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti vuttaṃ. Tasmā tādisānaṃ aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ciṇṇavasībhāvānaṃ abhiññākamme
anya-e0301n:1462_47: ādikammikakulaputtānaṃ kasiṇā nulomato kasiṇapaṭilomatotiādinā nayena vuttehi cuddasahi
anya-e0301n:1462_48: ākārehi attano rūpapañcamajjhānacittaṃ paridametvā tikkhaṃ sūraṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_49: katvā idāni iddhivikubbanaṃ karissā mīti ārabhantānaṃ abhiññāvasena pavattamānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_50: pana rūpāvacarapañca majjhānaṃ rūpādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathārahaṃ appetīti yojanā
anya-e0301n:1462_51: veditabbā. Abhiññāpādakapañcamajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvāti abhiññāya pādakatthāya yaṃabhiññājātikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_54: nimmitarūpaṃ. Taṃ adhiṭṭheyyaṃ ādi yassa avatthukassa āvibhāvatirobhāvādikassa kammassāti
anya-e0301n:1462_55: adhiṭṭheyyādikaṃ. Āvajjitvā parikammaṃkarontassāti ettha iddhividhe tāva yaṃyaṃsatādikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_56: nimmitarūpaṃvā āvibhāvādikaṃ nimmitakammaṃvā nipphādetuṃ icchati. Taṃ taṃ avajjitvā
anya-e0301n:1462_57: sallakkhetvā sataṃ homi sahassaṃ homītivā sataṃ hotu sahassaṃ hotūtivā idañcidañca
anya-e0301n:1462_58: hotu evañcevañca hotūtivā parikammaṃ karontassa. Dibbasotādīsu pana yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_59: sotuṃvā passituṃvā jānituṃvā anussarituṃvā icchati. Taṃ taṃ sallakkhetvā asukassa
anya-e0301n:1462_60: asukānaṃvā saddaṃ suṇomītiādinā parikammaṃ karontassa. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana parikammaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_61: katvā puna pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ āgatameva. Yathāha abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā
anya-e0301n:1462_62: vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati. Sataṃ homīti parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_63: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya adhiṭṭhāti. Adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva sataṃ hotīti. Tatthaca
anya-e0301n:1462_64: ādito pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ parikamma cittassa samādānatthāya hoti. Pacchimaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_65: pana abhiññāya anu balappadānatthāyāti. Tathā hi pādakajjhānabalena suṭṭhu samāhitaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_66: parikammacittaṃnāma attano visaye abhiññācittagatikaṃ hoti. Pubbenivāsānussaraṇakāle
anya-e0301n:1462_67: teneva cittena tasmiṃ bhave atītaṃ dhammajātaṃ yāva paṭisandhiyā jānāti. Teneva hi
anya-e0301n:1462_68: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ taṃsampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ parikammasamādhiñāṇanti vuttaṃ. Atītaṃsañāṇantipi
anya-e0301n:1462_69: vuccatīti. Sesābhiññāsupi tassa ñāṇassa visayaviseso yathārahaṃ vattabboti. Therena
anya-e0301n:1462_70: pana pacchimaṃ pādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃnāma na sabbesaṃ hoti. Na hi abhiññāsu vasībhāvapattānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_71: puna pādakajjhānena kiccaṃ atthīti katvā taṃ idha nagahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Rūpādīsuālambaṇesuyathārahamappetīti
anya-e0301n:1462_72: ettha iddhividhañāṇaṃ tāva tekālikabhūtesu chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati. Tañhi rūpādīsu
anya-e0301n:1462_73: chasu ārammaṇadhammesu yaṃ yaṃ nipphādeti. Taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati. Pādakajjhānacittaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_74: pana kāyagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā dissamānenakāyena ākāsegamanakāle atītaṃ pādakajjhānacittaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_75: ārabbha pavattati. Kāyaṃ cittagatikaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā adissamānena kāyena gamanakāle
anya-e0301n:1462_76: paccuppannaṃ rūpakāyaṃ ārabbha pavattati. Tathāpavattamānassa pana tassa ñāṇassa
anya-e0301n:1462_77: kiñcirūpaṃ ārammaṇa mattaṃ hoti. Kiñci ārammaṇapurejātaṃ. Kiñci vatthārammaṇa purejātaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_78: hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Anāgate idaṃnāma hotūti adhiṭṭhāna kāle anāgataṃ taṃtaṃrūpadhammaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_79: ārabbha pavattatīti. Paccuppanno saddo dibbasotassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Atīte sattadivasāni
anya-e0301n:1462_80: anāgate sattadivasānīti etthantare kāle atītā nāgatapaccuppannabhūtaṃ parassacittaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_81: cattārovā khandhā cetopariya ñāṇassa. Cittañhi jānanto taṃ sampayuttadhammaṃpi icchanto
anya-e0301n:1462_82: jānissatiyeva. Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne kusalā khandhā ceto pariyañāṇassa yathākammupagañāṇassa
anya-e0301n:1462_83: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayoti ñāṇadvayaṃ ekato katvā vuttaṃ. Etthaca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_84: tāva paracittassa paccuppannālambaṇatānāma santativasenavā addhā vasenavā yojitā.
anya-e0301n:1462_85: Yadi hi khaṇikavasena yojeyya. Āvajjane paccuppannaṃ yaṃkiñci ekaṃ cittaṃ āvajjetvā
anya-e0301n:1462_86: niruddhe javanānipi tadeva āvajjanena saddhiṃ niruddhaṃ atītaṃ gaṇhantīti tāni kālato
anya-e0301n:1462_87: āvajjanena saha bhinnālambaṇāni nāma honti. Naca aniṭṭhe maggaphalavīthito aññasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_88: ṭhāne kālamattenāpi tesaṃ tena saha bhinnālambaṇatā aṭṭhakathācariyehi anu matāti.
anya-e0301n:1462_89: Tasmā īdisesu ṭhānesu paccuppannaṃnāma santativasena addhāvasenaca gahetuṃ yuttanti.
anya-e0301n:1462_90: Mūlaṭīkāyaṃ pana khaṇikapaccuppanna vaseneva yojitaṃ. Nahi abhidhamme atītārammaṇattikaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_91: santati addhānavaseneva vuttanti sakkā vattuṃ. Itarathā paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa
anya-e0301n:1462_92: dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo āsevanapaccayena paccayoti vattabbo siyā. Na
anya-e0301n:1462_93: tu vutto. Atīto dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo āsevanapaccayena
anya-e0301n:1462_94: paccayoticceva pana vutto, tasmā āvajjanādīni sabbāni cittāni paccekaṃ attanā khaṇavasena
anya-e0301n:1462_95: sahuppannāni parassa cittānigaṇhantīti yuttaṃ, naca tāni dhammato bhinnā lambaṇānināma
anya-e0301n:1462_96: honti. Gahaṇā kārassa abhinnattā. Āvajjanaṃpi hi cittanteva āvajjati. Javanānica
anya-e0301n:1462_97: cittaṃ cittanteva javanti. Tānica sabbāni cittānieva hontīti. Atītānantara cutito
anya-e0301n:1462_98: pana paṭṭhāya atītā khandhā khandhupani bandhā nāma gottakasiṇa nimittādikā paññattiyo
anya-e0301n:1462_99: nibbānañca pubbenivāsañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Paccuppannaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ dibbacakkhussāti
anya-e0301n:1462_100: evaṃ rūpādīsu chasu ālambaṇesu yathāraha mappetīti. Idāni abhiññāvasena pavakkhassa
anya-e0301n:1462_101: tassa pañcamajjhānassa kiccabhedena pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ iddhividhantiādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n:1462_102: Tattha yaṃ yaṃ adhiṭṭhāti. Yathā yathāca adhiṭṭhāti. Tassa tassa tathā tathāvā ijjhana
anya-e0301n:1462_103: saṅkhāto vidho koṭṭhāso pakārovā etassāti iddhividhaṃ. Taṃ pana tividhaṃ adhiṭṭhā
anya-e0301n:1462_104: niddhi vikubbaniddhi manomayiddhi vasena. Tattha attano pakativaṇṇaṃ avijahitvā tasseva
anya-e0301n:1462_105: sata sahassādi bahubhāva karaṇa vasenavā ākāsagamanādivasena vā bahiddhā nānāvaṇṇa
anya-e0301n:1462_106: pāṭihāriya dassana vasenavā pavattitā iddhi adhiṭṭhāniddhināma. Pakativaṇṇaṃ pana
anya-e0301n:1462_107: vijahitvā attānameva kumāravaṇṇanāgavaṇṇādikaṃ katvā dassanavasena pavattitā iddhi
anya-e0301n:1462_108: vikubbaniddhināma. Attano sarīrabbhantare aññaṃ sabbaso attanā sadisaṃ sarīraṃ nimminitvā
anya-e0301n:1462_109: nīharitvā dassanavasena pavattitā iddhi manomayiddhināma. Dive bhavaṃ dibbaṃ. Devaloke
anya-e0301n:1462_110: jātanti attho. Dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ. Devānaṃ uḷārakammanibbattā dūrepi
anya-e0301n:1462_112: idaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃpi dibbasotanti vuccati. Kasiṇajjhāna saṅkhātenavā dibbavihārena
anya-e0301n:1462_113: paṭiladdhattā sayañca tasmiṃ dibbavihāre pariyāpannattā dibbañca taṃ sotañcāti dibbasotaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1462_114: Parassa cittaṃ vijānanti etenāti paracittavijānanaṃ. Tadeva cetopariyāyanti paricchijja
anya-e0301n:1462_115: jānanti etenāti katvā cetopariyañāṇantipi vuccati. Pubbe nivāso vuccati atītabhavesu
anya-e0301n:1462_116: attano chasu dvāresu āpātaṃ āgatā suṭṭhu viditā dhammā. Pubbe atītajātīsu gocara
anya-e0301n:1462_117: nivāsavasena nivasiṃsu attano chadvārikāni cittāni etthāti katvā. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_118: pana paresaṃ chadvāragahitāpi dhammā pubbe nivāso hotiyeva, pubbe nivāsassa anussaraṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_119: pubbenivāsānussati. Idha pana taṃ sampayuttañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Pubbe vuttanayena dibbañca
anya-e0301n:1462_120: taṃ cakkhucāti dibbacakkhu. Taṃ sadisattā idaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃpi dibbacakkhūti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:1462_121: Dibbavihāra vasena paṭiladdhattā sayañca dibbavihārasannissitattā dibbañca taṃ cakkhucāti
anya-e0301n:1462_122: dibbacakkhu. Yathākammupagañāṇaṃ anāgataṃsañāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni imasseva paribhaṇḍañāṇānināma.
anya-e0301n:1462_123: Nahi tesaṃ paṭilābhatthāya visuṃ cittaparidamanaparikammaṃnāma atthi. Dibbacakkhuñāṇe
anya-e0301n:1462_124: paṭiladdhe tesaṃpi paṭiladdhattāti. Tattha dibbacakkhunā nirayesu dukkhaṃ devesuvā
anya-e0301n:1462_125: sukhaṃ anubhavante satte disvā tesaṃ atītaṃ kammaṃ jānissāmīti parikammaṃ karontassa
anya-e0301n:1462_126: taṃ kammārammaṇaṃ yathākammupagañāṇaṃ pavattati. Tato cavitvā kattha bhavissantīti
anya-e0301n:1462_127: tesaṃ anāgate pavattiṃ passissāmīti parikammaṃ karontassa tesaṃ anāgatakhandhārammaṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_128: anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ pavattati. Pubbe nivāsānussati ñāṇaṃ viyaca sabbaṃpi anāgatadhammajātaṃ
anya-e0301n:1462_129: etassa ārammaṇaṃ hotiyeva. Etañhi attano visaye sabbaññutañāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1464: Anāgate sattadivasato paṭṭhāya cittacetasikadhammā dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāya yaṃkiñci ārammaṇaṃ etassa visayoti adhippetaṃ. Tampi yuttaṃviya dissati.
anya-e0301n:1465_0: Nahi bhavantarepi anāvatadhamme jānituṃ samatthaṃ etaṃ imasmiṃ bhave anāgatadhamme
anya-e0301n:1465_1: najānātīti sakkā bhavituṃ. Yathā cetaṃ, tathā pubbenivāsañāṇaṃpi imasmiṃ bhave parasantānagate
anya-e0301n:1465_2: atītadhammeti. Pāḷiyaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāsuca bhavantaragatadhammehi eva ñāṇadvayaṃ
anya-e0301n:1465_3: yojitaṃ. Taṃ pana asādhāraṇakālavasena ānubhāvavisesapākaṭatthaṃ yojitanti yuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:1465_4: siyāti. Gocarabhedoti dasakasiṇādīsu gocaresu samathajjhānānaṃ pavattibhedo.
anya-e0301n:1467_0: 171. Sabbalokiyamahājanehi yathādiṭṭhaṃ puggalasattaitthi purisādikaṃ nicca dhuva
anya-e0301n:1467_1: sukha atta nimittañca atikkamitvā visesena passanti etāyāti vipassanā. Kiriyā kammaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_2: Bhāvanāpayogo. Vipassanāya kammaṃ vipassanākammaṃ. Vipassanā eva vā kammanti vipassanā
anya-e0301n:1467_3: kammaṃ. Vipassanākammassa ṭhānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ bhumīti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Khandhādidhammajātaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_4: Vipassanā kammameva vā uttaruttarassa bhāvanā visesassa ānisaṃsavisesassavā ṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_5: āsannakāraṇanti vipassanākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Tasmiṃ vipassanākammaṭṭhāne sattavidhena visuddhi
anya-e0301n:1467_6: saṅgaho tīṇi lakkhaṇānītiādinā sambandho. Niccasīlameva sayañca dussilyamalato visuddhattā
anya-e0301n:1467_7: kāyaṃ vācañca tato visodhanato visuddhīti sīlavisuddhi. Subhāvita cittasantānameva
anya-e0301n:1467_8: sayañca nīvaraṇamalato visuddhattā taṃsamaṅgipuggalañca tato visodhanato visuddhīti
anya-e0301n:1467_9: cittavisuddhi. Cittasīsena cettha samādhi adhippeto. Dhammavavatthānañāṇasaṅkhātā
anya-e0301n:1467_10: diṭṭhieva taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhimalato visodhanato visuddhīti diṭṭhivisuddhi.
anya-e0301n:1467_11: Soḷasavidhaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vitaranti atikkamanti etāyāti kaṅkhāvitaraṇā. Paccayapariggahañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_12: Sā eva taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ ahetu diṭṭhi visamahetudiṭṭhīhi saddhiṃ yathāvuttāhi duvidhāhi
anya-e0301n:1467_13: kaṅkhāhi visodhanato visuddhīti kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi. Maggoca amaggoca maggāmaggā.
anya-e0301n:1467_15: maggonāma. Tassa anupāyabhūto manasikārovā adhimānavatthūnivā amaggonāma. Maggassa
anya-e0301n:1467_16: maggato amaggassaca amaggato jānanaṃ dassanañca maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ. Tameva taṃsamaṅgīpuggalaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_17: amagge maggasaññāya visodhanato visuddhīti maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma. Upari
anya-e0301n:1467_18: visesaṃ paṭipajjanti etāyāti paṭipadā. Vipassanāparaṃparasaṅkhāto pubbabhāgamaggo.
anya-e0301n:1467_19: Paṭipadābhūtaṃ ñāṇadassananti paṭipadāñāṇadassanaṃ. Tameva niccasaññādito visuddhattā
anya-e0301n:1467_21: sammohamalato visuddhattā visuddhīti ñāṇadassanavisuddhināma. Etthaca sutamayādivasena
anya-e0301n:1467_22: siddhaṃ anumāna ñāṇaṃpi ñāṇamevāti taṃ paṭikkhipitvā atthapaccakkhañāṇameva gahetuṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_23: sabbattha dassanagahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ. Lakkhīyanti sallakkhīyanti ime aniccāevāti
anya-e0301n:1467_24: ekantena vinicchīyanti dhammā etenāti lakkhaṇaṃ aniccatā eva lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_25: Pubbapade bhāvapaccayalopo. Aññohi anicco, aññā aniccatāti. Tattha yathāgamanakriyāyogena
anya-e0301n:1467_26: puriso gatoti vuccati. Na pana gamana kriyā puriso. Naca puriso gamanakriyā. Aññā
anya-e0301n:1467_27: hi kriyā, añño puriso. Tathā aniccatāyogena sabbo saṅkhatadhammo aniccoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:1467_28: Na pana aniccatā so dhammo, naca so dhammo aniccatā. Aññā hi aniccatā, añño so dhammoti.
anya-e0301n:1467_29: Katamā pana sā aniccatāti. Vipariṇāmā kāro. Jīraṇākāro bhijjanākāroti vuttaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1467_30: Taṃ pana ākāraṃ disvā tadākāravante dhamme ñāṇaṃ pavattati ayaṃ dhammo aniccoti.
anya-e0301n:1467_31: Tasmā sā aniccatāyeva idha lakkhaṇantipi vuccatīti. Esanayo sesesupi dvīsu. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1467_32: pana abhiṇhasaṃpaṭipīḷanākāro dukkhatānāma. Avasavattanākāro anattatānāmāti. Yathāvuttāya
anya-e0301n:1467_33: pana aniccatāya saha aniccassa dhammassa aniccena vā dhammena saha aniccatāya anuanupassanā
anya-e0301n:1467_34: aniccānupassanā. Esa nayo sesāsupi dvīsu. Yāva sarīre dhammānaṃ tividhalakkhaṇayuttatā
anya-e0301n:1467_35: attano ñāṇena paññāyati. Tāva tesu tividhalakkhaṇavibhāvanavasena punappunaṃ masanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_36: āmasanaṃ sammasanaṃ. Sammasanākārena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ sammasanañāṇaṃ. Udayo vuccati
anya-e0301n:1467_37: taṃtaṃ khaṇānurūpaṃ taṃtaṃ paccayānurūpañca navanavānaṃ dhammānaṃ pātu bhāvo ceva
anya-e0301n:1467_38: uparupari vaḍḍhanañca. Vayo vuccati yattha yattha laddhapaccayā navanavā dhammā pātubhavanti
anya-e0301n:1467_39: ceva vaḍḍhantica. Tattha tattha aladdhapaccayānaṃ purāṇadhammānaṃ antaradhānaṃ. Samūha
anya-e0301n:1467_40: santativasena pana udayapakkhassavā vayapakkhassavā samanupassanañāṇaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_41: Tesu pana dvīsu pakkhesu udayakoṭṭhāsonāma uparupari pākaṭo hutvā āgacchati. Vayakoṭṭhāso
anya-e0301n:1467_42: pana apākaṭo. So eva ca aniccatāya paramā koṭīti tasseva suṭṭhutaraṃ samanupassanañāṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_43: bhaṅgañāṇaṃ. Bhaṅge diṭṭhe evaṃ bhijjanasabhāvānaṃ dhammānaṃ anekasahassasoka dukkhavatthubhāvena
anya-e0301n:1467_44: tathā tathā bhāyitabbapakārasamanupassanañāṇaṃ bhayañāṇaṃ nāma. Loke pana kiñci bhayavatthuṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_45: passantāpi āsanne aññasmiṃ paṭisaraṇe sati na bhāyanti. Asati eva bhāyanti. Evaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_46: bhāyitabbānaṃ tesaṃ sabbaso aññapaṭisaraṇābhāvadassanaṃ ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma. Kutoci
anya-e0301n:1467_47: paṭisaraṇābhāvena tehi ukkaṇṭhatākāra sahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ nibbidāñāṇaṃnāma. Nibbindīyamānehi
anya-e0301n:1467_48: tehi attānaṃ vimuccituṃ ajjhāsayasahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ nāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_49: Suṭṭhu muccituṃ icchantassa sīghaṃ muccanatthaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ cattālīsāya ākārehi
anya-e0301n:1467_50: anekādīnavarāsi bhāva paṭisaṅkhānavasena suṭṭhuvipphārataraṃ pavattamānaṃ vipassanā
anya-e0301n:1467_51: ñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ nāma. Tesaṃ pana anekādīnavarāsibhāve suṭṭhu diṭṭhe saṅkhāresu
anya-e0301n:1467_52: nikantiyā pariyādinnāya idāni muccanupāyo laddhoti adhimattabyāpāraṃ akatvā samena
anya-e0301n:1467_53: vāyāmena saṅkhāre pariggaṇhantassa saṅkhārapariggahe majjhattākārasahitaṃ saṅkhāresuvā
anya-e0301n:1467_54: bhayañca nandiñca pahāya udāsinabhāvasahitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_55: Upari maggappavattiṃ vahituṃ samatthabhāvena magguppattiyā anulomehi thāmabalehi
anya-e0301n:1467_56: sampannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇaṃ nāma. Heṭṭhimānaṃvā ñāṇānaṃtaṃ anulomaṃ hoti
anya-e0301n:1467_57: lakkhaṇattayassa suṭṭhutaraṃ vibhāvanato. Uparimaggassavā anulomaṃ hoti tassa parikammabhāvato,
anya-e0301n:1467_58: padaṭṭhānattācātipi anulomañāṇaṃ nāmāti. Atta jīvasuññatādassana balena khandhesu
anya-e0301n:1467_59: kilesabandhanato vimuccamāno maggo suññatāvimokkho nāma. Saṅkhārānaṃ yāni nimittāni
anya-e0301n:1467_60: kilesānaṃ avassayo hoti. Tāni vidhamitvā sabbaso dhammānaṃ anātha bhāva dassana balena
anya-e0301n:1467_61: vimuccamāno maggo animittovimokkho nāma. Saṅkhāresu sabbaso assāsābhāva dassanabalena
anya-e0301n:1467_62: vimuccamāno maggo appaṇihitovimokkhonāma. Suññatānupassanāti anattānupassanā. Sā
anya-e0301n:1467_63: hi dhammānaṃ samūhaghana santatighana kiccaghana ārammaṇaghanesu taṃtaṃghana vinibbhujjana
anya-e0301n:1467_64: vasena pavattattā attā iti gahetabbassa kassaci sārassa abhāvānupassanato suññatānupassanāti
anya-e0301n:1467_65: vuccati. Animittā nupassanāti aniccānupassanā. Sāpi hi santati vicchedana vasena
anya-e0301n:1467_66: pavattattā ahanti gahitassa nimittassa vidhamanato animittānupassanāti vuccati. Apaṇihitānupassanāti
anya-e0301n:1467_67: dukkhā nupassanā. Sāpi hi mahāādīnavarāsi bhāva vibhāvanavasena pavattattā idaṃ mama
anya-e0301n:1467_68: etaṃ mamāti gahetabbassa kassaci paṇihita guṇassa abhāvānupassanato appaṇihitānupassanāti
anya-e0301n:1467_69: vuccatīti. Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlanti vinayapaññattisīlaṃ. Tañhi sabbalo kiyasīlānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_70: jeṭṭhakattā patica hoti. Catubhūmakakusalānaṃ ādipabhavabhūtattā mukhañca. Iti patimukhaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1467_71: pātimokkhanti vuccati. Tamevaca dussilyamaggassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato saṃvaroti
anya-e0301n:1467_72: vuccatīti. Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiyā cakkhādīni indriyāni viphanditāni honti. Lolāni
anya-e0301n:1467_73: honti. Tadanubandhāca akusaladhammā uppajjanti. Tesaṃ uppatti maggassa saṃvaraṇavasena
anya-e0301n:1467_74: pavattamānā sati indriya saṃvaronāma. So eva sīlanti indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ. Ājīvanti
anya-e0301n:1467_75: jīvitaṃ kappenti etenāti ājīvo. Paccayapariyesanavāyāmo. Soyeva buddhapaṭikuṭṭhehi
anya-e0301n:1467_77: Sā eva sīlanti samāso. Tathārūpena parisuddhena bhikkhācārādinā payogena paṭiladdhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_78: paccayānaṃ paṭiggahaṇa paribhuñjanakālesu sammohassa gedhassa madassa pamādassaca
anya-e0301n:1467_80: paccavekkhanavasena pavattaṃ paccayasevane paṭisaṅkhāñāṇaṃ paccaya sannissitasīlaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_81: Parisujjhatīti parisuddhi. Parisuddhieva pārisuddhi. Sā eva sīlanti samāso. Cattāri
anya-e0301n:1467_82: pārisuddhisīlānīti catupāri suddhisīlaṃ. Cittavisuddhīti ettha cittasaddena samādhi
anya-e0301n:1467_84: vasenāti ettha dhammānaṃ paccattasabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃnāma. Aggissa uṇhattaṃ viya. Tena
anya-e0301n:1467_85: sabhāvena sādhetabbaṃ kiccaṃvā sādhanapaccayā paṭiladdhaguṇasaṅkhātā sampattivā rasonāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_86: Aggissa parivācana jotanāni viya. Sā eva sampattivā kāriyasaṅkhātaṃ phalaṃvā paccupaṭṭhānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_87: Aggissa dhūmo viya. Attano uppattiyā asādhāraṇapaccayasaṅkhātaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃnāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_88: Tesaṃ vasena nāmassaca rūpassaca pariggaho ñāṇena paricchinditvā gahaṇaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_89: diṭṭhivisuddhināma. Etthaca pariggaho duvidho saṅkhepa pariggaho vitthārapariggahoti.
anya-e0301n:1467_90: Tattha ajjhattadhamme dvidhā katvā idaṃ nāmameva, na rūpaṃ. Idaṃ rūpameva, na nāmaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_91: Aññaṃ nāmaṃ aññaṃ rūpaṃ. Tadubhayatoca añño attāvā jīvovā sattovā puggalovā manussovā
anya-e0301n:1467_92: devovā brahmāvā natthīti evaṃ paccakkhato sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā pariggaṇhanaṃ saṅkhepapariggahonāma.
anya-e0301n:1467_93: Ñāṇuttarikohi puggalo ettakamattenapi sakkāyadiṭṭhiṃ vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti saddhiṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_94: saññā cittavipallāsehīti. Tayo hi vipallāsā. Yathāha-anattani attāti saññāvipallāso
anya-e0301n:1467_95: cittavipallāso diṭṭhivipallāsoti. Tattha satthusāsanadhamme suṭṭhu patiṭṭhitena saddhāmattenapi
anya-e0301n:1467_96: diṭṭhi vipallāso vikkhambhito hoti. Itare pana nāmarūpapariggahe kateyeva vikkhambhitā
anya-e0301n:1467_97: honti. Yāvaca ete dve avikkhambhitā honti. Tāva nāmarūpapariggahoca aparisuddhoyeva
anya-e0301n:1467_98: hoti. Taṃmūlikāca kilesadhammā avikkhambhitā eva hontīti apica. Catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_99: vasena catudhā, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena pañcadhā, channaṃ dhātūnaṃ vasena chadhātiādinā
anya-e0301n:1467_100: nayena nāmarūpaṃ pariggahe tabbameva. Tattha cha dhātuyonāma pathavidhātu āpodhātu
anya-e0301n:1467_101: tejodhātu vāyodhātu ākāsadhātu viññāṇadhātuyo. Pakkusāti kulaputto hi imā cha dhātuyo
anya-e0301n:1467_102: pariggaṇhitvā anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā capitvā suddhāvāsesu nibbattoti. Yattake vā pana
anya-e0301n:1467_103: dhamme pariggaṇhanto attā meti pavattamāne saññācittadiṭṭhi vipallāse vikkhambhetuṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_104: sakkoti. Tattakāpi pariggahetabbā yevāti. Imasmiṃ pana saṅgahapakaraṇe yo yo cittacetasika
anya-e0301n:1467_105: vibhāgo rūpavibhāgoca heṭṭhā vutto. Tassa sabbassa vasena nāmarūpassa pariggaṇhanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_106: vitthārapariggahonāma. Ayaṃpana ādikammikānaṃ avisayo. Paṭividdhacatusaccānaṃ pana
anya-e0301n:1467_107: ābhidhammikattherānaṃ eva visayoti veditabbo. Nāmarūpaṃ pariggaṇhantassa pana nāmarūpa
anya-e0301n:1467_108: mattato uddhaṃ aññassa kassaci abhāvadassanatoca sarīrabbhantare jīvasaññito attā
anya-e0301n:1467_109: atthi. So karoti, so paṭisaṃvedeti, saṃsarati, sandhāvatīti evaṃ pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati.
anya-e0301n:1467_110: Suddhe nāme evavārūpe evavā puggalasattakriyasaññitānaṃ īhābyāpārānaṃ sabbaso abhāvadassanato
anya-e0301n:1467_111: tadubhayasaṃyogeeva tesaṃ labbhamānatā dassanatoca tadubhayaṃvā ekamekaṃvā uddissa
anya-e0301n:1467_112: attāti pavattā diṭṭhi pahīyati. Attā jīvo satto puggalo manusso devo brahmāti evamādīsu
anya-e0301n:1467_113: vohāresuca vohāra matte aṭṭhatvā attānāma ekantato atthi jīvonāma ekantato atthītiādinā
anya-e0301n:1467_115: attānāma atthi jīvonāma atthītiādinā daḷhataraṃ abhiniveso. Atidhāvananti nāmarūpaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_116: attātiādinā gahaṇaṃ. Paccayapariggahoti etthapi duvidho paccayapariggaho saṅkhepato
anya-e0301n:1467_117: vitthārato cāti. Tattha vatthārammaṇavasena nāmassa cittotukāhāravasena rūpassa avijjātaṇhupādānakammavasena
anya-e0301n:1467_118: tadubhayassaca paccayaṃ pariggaṇhanto saṅkhepato pariggaṇhātināma. Heṭṭhā paccayasaṅgahe
anya-e0301n:1467_119: vibhattehi paṭiccasamuppādanaya paṭṭhānanayehi pariggaṇhanto vitthārato pariggaṇhātināma.
anya-e0301n:1467_120: Etthapi paṭṭhānanayena pariggaho ādikammikānaṃ avisayoeva. Paccayaṃ pariggaṇhantassapana
anya-e0301n:1467_121: yathāvavatthitassa sabbassa nāmarūpassa sabbaso paccayāyattavuttikatādassanato ahetukadiṭṭhi
anya-e0301n:1467_122: pahīyati. Attano anurūpapaccayasāmaggiyā vinā aññathā pavattiyā adassanato issaranimmāna
anya-e0301n:1467_124: vipākappavattiyāca aññassa kammakārakassavā vipāka vedakassavā kattuno abhāvadassanato
anya-e0301n:1467_125: kāraka vedaka diṭṭhi pahīyati. Anamataggeca saṃsāre tīsu addhāsu hetuphala paraṃparāvasena
anya-e0301n:1467_126: kevalassa nāmarūpamattasseva pavattidassanato ahosiṃ nukho ahamatītamaddhānanti evamādikāya
anya-e0301n:1467_127: puggalasatta visayāya soḷasavidhāya kaṅkhāyaca atikkamo hoti. Sabhāvadhammapavattiyāca
anya-e0301n:1467_128: suṭṭhu diṭṭhāya desanādhammassa sudhammatā dassanato buddhasubuddhatañca disvā satthari
anya-e0301n:1467_129: kaṅkhati dhamme kaṅkhatītiādinayapavattā aṭṭhavidhāpi kaṅkhā pahīyatīti. Lokuttaradhammānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_130: saṅkhatānaṃpi sataṃ asammasanupagattā tebhūmakasaṅkhāresūti vuttaṃ. Anusayasamūhanatthañca
anya-e0301n:1467_131: sammasananti katvā yattha kāmarāgādayo anusayā anusenti. Teyeva dhammā sammasanārahā
anya-e0301n:1467_132: hontīti vuttaṃ tebhūmakasaṅkhāresūti. Imassa ca padassa lakkhaṇattayaṃ sammasantassāti
anya-e0301n:1467_134: ekādasahi bhedehi bhinnesu. Khandhādinayaṃārabbhāti paṭisambhidāmagge vibhattaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_135: dvārachakkaṃ ārammaṇachakkaṃ viññāṇachakkaṃ phassachakkaṃ vedanāchakkaṃ saññāchakkanti
anya-e0301n:1467_136: evamādikaṃ sammasanabhūmivibhāganayaṃ ārabbha anugantvā taṃnayānusārenāti attho.
anya-e0301n:1467_137: Tattha pana tevīsatiyā dhammakoṭṭhāsesu yassa yo koṭṭhāso pākaṭo hoti. Tena taṃ gahetvā
anya-e0301n:1467_138: sammasanaṃ ārabhitabbaṃ. Sakkontena pana sabbampi gahetvā ārabhitabbameva. Kalāpavasenasaṃkhipitvāti
anya-e0301n:1467_139: khandhapañcakena ye rūpaṃ tāva atītānāgatapaccuppannādibhedabhinnaṃpi samānaṃ sabbaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_140: ekarūpapiṇḍabhāvena saṃkhipitvā esa nayo vedanā dīsupīti. Tatrāyaṃ nayo. Yaṃkiñci
anya-e0301n:1467_141: rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃvā bahiddhāvā oḷāritaṃvā sukhumaṃvā hīnaṃvā
anya-e0301n:1467_142: paṇītaṃvā yaṃ dūre santikevā. Sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1467_143: anattā asārakaṭṭhena. Yākāci vedanā.La. Yākāci saññā.La. Yekeci saṅkhārā.La. Yaṃkiñci
anya-e0301n:1467_144: viññāṇaṃ.La. Sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena. Dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti.
anya-e0301n:1467_145: Etthaca sabbaṃ rūpaṃ.La. Sabbaṃ viññāṇanti gahaṇameva kalāpavasena saṅkhipananti
anya-e0301n:1467_146: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aniccaṃkhayaṭṭhenāti ettha rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena. Vedanā aniccā.
anya-e0301n:1467_147: Saññā aniccā. Saṅkhārā aniccā. Viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā nayena sammasitabbadhammapariggahena
anya-e0301n:1467_148: saheva sammasanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Itarathā sammasanaṃ na ruhati. Tadatthassa pana pākaṭattā
anya-e0301n:1467_149: idha aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasanapadameva therena gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1467_150: rūpaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhenāti taṃtaṃrūpaṃ ñāṇena daḷhaṃ gahetvā ayaṃ pathavidhātu aniccā
anya-e0301n:1467_151: khayaṭṭhena. Ayaṃ āpodhātu aniccā khayaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasanaṃ kātabbaṃ. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1467_152: imasmiṃ kāye sabbaṃ thaddhakriyāmattaṃ pathavīnāma. Sāca kriyā sītuṇhaparivattiyāvā
anya-e0301n:1467_154: nānā kāyikakriyā parivattiyāvā parivattati. Nānāsantati saṅkanti hotīti attho. Tattha
anya-e0301n:1467_155: navanavāsu kriyāsantatīsu pātubhontīsu pubbapubbakriyāsantatiyo nassanti. Yasmāca
anya-e0301n:1467_156: santati nāma dhammato visuṃ natthi, tasmā navanavasantatīnaṃ pātubhāvonāma navanavakriyānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_157: uppattieva. Pubbapubbasantatīnaṃ nassanaṃnāma pubbapubba kriyānaṃ bhijjanamevāti.
anya-e0301n:1467_158: Evaṃ attano kāye nānāthaddhakriyānaṃ parivattiṃ passanto pathavidhātuyā khayavayaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_159: passati. Tañca passanto taṃsahajātānaṃ rūpānaṃ khayavayaṃ passatiyeva. Āpo nāma ābandhanakriyāmattaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1467_160: Tejonāma sītakriyāmattaṃ uṇha kriyāmattañca. Vāyonāma vitthambhanakriyāmattaṃ. Imāca
anya-e0301n:1467_161: kriyā khaṇe khaṇe parivattantiyeva. Imāsañca, visuṃ visuṃ santatiparivattiṃ passanto
anya-e0301n:1467_162: āpādīnaṃ taṃsahajātarūpānañca khayavayaṃ passati. Santatiparivattiṃ pana bahiddhā
anya-e0301n:1467_163: cakkhunā disvā jānāti, sarīrabbhantare pana kāyasaṃphassena jānāti. Santatisarīrabhūtānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_164: pana dhātūnaṃ khayavayaṃ ñāṇenaeva passati. Tasmā attano sarīrabbhantare taṃtaṃsantati
anya-e0301n:1467_165: parivattiṃ ñatvāvā tathā tathā kappetvā vā rūpadhātūnaṃ aniccattaṃ ñāṇena sudiṭṭhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_166: katvā punappunaṃ sammasitabbaṃ. Sesakhandhesupi taṃtaṃsantatinānāttaṃ ñatvā vedanādīnaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_167: khayavayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā sammasanaṃ kātabbanti. Bhayaṭṭhenāti bhāyitabbaṭṭhena.
anya-e0301n:1467_168: Yañhi aniccaṃ hoti. Khaṇamattepi vipariṇāmadhammaṃ. Taṃ ekantena bhāyitabbameva.
anya-e0301n:1467_169: Kasmā, tañhi yo abhāyitvā vissāsaṃ karoti. Etaṃ meti attano aṅgaṃ katvā pariharati.
anya-e0301n:1467_170: Taṃ apariyantehi anekasahassehi abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhehivā vipariṇāmadukkhehivā abhiṇhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_171: pīḷeti. Bādhati. Iti nānādukkhadhammehi abhiṇhaṃ sampaṭipīḷanasabhāvattā ekantena
anya-e0301n:1467_172: bhāyitabbaṭṭhena dukkhaṃnāmāti. Attapaṭipakkhattā anattā. Yo hi ito uddhaṃ mayhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_173: abbhantarimataronāma natthīti evaṃ paramajjhattabhāvena pariggahito hoti. So attāti
anya-e0301n:1467_174: vuccati. Katamo pana tathāpariggahi tabboti. Yo attano vase sabbaso vattati. Yathā
anya-e0301n:1467_175: vuttehi abhisaṅkharaṇakiccehi vinā kevalaṃ attano chandenavā vasenavā ajjhāsayenavā
anya-e0301n:1467_176: āṇāvidhānenavā niccaṃ avirajjhamāno pavattati. So tathā pariggahetabboti. Tathārūpo
anya-e0301n:1467_177: eva hi dhammo niccaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ sattānaṃ attakiccaṃ karoti nāmāti.
anya-e0301n:1467_178: Yo pana niccaṃ sukhakāmānaṃ tesaṃ yathāpavattaṃ sukhaṃ viddhaṃseti vikireti. Dukkhapaṭikūlānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_179: tesaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇādi mūlakaṃ nānādukkhaṃ janeti vaḍḍheti. So attapaṭipakkhoeva
anya-e0301n:1467_180: hoti. Idañca rūpaṃ edisameva hoti. Iti attakiccassa akaraṇato attapaṭipakkhakiccassa
anya-e0301n:1467_181: karaṇatoca rūpaṃ anattānāmāti. Kasmā panetaṃ attano vase navattati attakiccaṃ na
anya-e0301n:1467_182: karoti attapaṭipakkhakiccaṃ karotīti āha asārakaṭṭhenāti. Tattha sāronāma paccayasāmaggiyā
anya-e0301n:1467_183: vinā kevalaṃ ajjhāsayamattena uppajjituṃvā uppajjitvāca paccayupatthambhena vinā
anya-e0301n:1467_184: yadicchakaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ vā samatthabhāvasaṅkhāto thāmabalaviseso vuccati. Rūpaṃ pana
anya-e0301n:1467_185: sayaṃpi evarūpo sāronāma na hoti. Naca evarūpena sārena yuttanti. Nahi tassa paccayasāmaggiyā
anya-e0301n:1467_186: vinā uppajjituṃvā uppajjitvāpi paccayupatthambhena vinā khaṇamattaṃpi patiṭṭhātuṃvā
anya-e0301n:1467_187: thāmovā balaṃvā atthi. Yañca attano thāmena balena vinā kevalaṃ paccayasāmaggi baleneva
anya-e0301n:1467_188: uppajjati. Paccayupatthambheneva patiṭṭhāti. Taṃ aneka sahassāni paccayābhisaṅkharaṇadukkhāni
anya-e0301n:1467_189: janetvā ekantena niccaṃ attapaṭipakkhakiccaṃ karoti, pīḷeti, bādhatiyevāti. Esanayo
anya-e0301n:1467_190: vedanā aniccā khayaṭṭhenātiādīsu. Iti lakkhaṇattayaṃ samma santassāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n:1467_191: Addhānavasenāti ekekabhavaparicchinnassa pavattakālassa vasena. Nahi bhavantare uppannaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_192: khandhapañcakaṃ aññaṃ bhavantaraṃ gacchati. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhaveeva asesaṃ nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0301n:1467_193: Apica, ekasmiṃ bhavepi tiṇṇaṃ vayānaṃ mandādīnaṃ dasannaṃ dasakānaṃ saṃvaccharautu
anya-e0301n:1467_194: māsa pakkhatithi ahoratti yāma pahārādīnañca vasena addhānabhedo yojetabbo. Santativasenāti
anya-e0301n:1467_195: sabhāgekasantānavasena pavattamānāya rūpasantatiyāvā arūpa santatiyāvā vasena. Khaṇavasenāti
anya-e0301n:1467_196: rūpārūpadhammānaṃ āyu parimāṇasaṅkhātassa khaṇassa vasena. Etthaca khaṇavasena sammasanaṃnāma
anya-e0301n:1467_197: sabbaññubuddhānaṃ eva visayo siyā, na sāvakānaṃ. Nahi te evaṃ parittake khaṇe uppādaṃvā
anya-e0301n:1467_198: nirodhaṃvā sampāpuṇituṃ sakkontīti. Tasmā addhāsantativasena sammasanameva idhā dhippetanti
anya-e0301n:1467_199: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Lakkhaṇattayaṃsammasantassāti tesu tebhūmaka saṅkhāresu dhammesu tilakkhaṇāni
anya-e0301n:1467_200: āropetvā te dhamme punappunaṃ āmasantassa parimajjantassa. Tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anicca
anya-e0301n:1467_201: jātikataṃvā dukkhajātikataṃvā anattajātikataṃvā ñāṇe suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ karontassāti
anya-e0301n:1467_202: attho. Visesato pana imasmiṃ ñāṇe aniccalakkhaṇadassanameva padhānaṃ. Tasmiṃ diṭṭheyeva
anya-e0301n:1467_203: itarāni kamena diṭṭhāni honti. Adiṭṭheca adiṭṭhānīti. Tasmā ādito aniccalakkhaṇasseva
anya-e0301n:1467_204: suṭṭhu pākaṭabhāvo adhippetoti. Tesvevāti tebhūmakasaṅkhāresu eva. Paccayavasenāti
anya-e0301n:1467_205: rūpakkhandhe tāva avijjātaṇhupādānakammāhārasaṅkhātānaṃ paccayānaṃ vasena. Vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāresu
anya-e0301n:1467_206: pana āhāraṭṭhāne phasso vattabbo. Viññāṇeca nāmarūpaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ nayo. Atītānantarabhave
anya-e0301n:1467_207: avijjātaṇhupādāna kammesu appahīnavasena samuditesu imasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
anya-e0301n:1467_208: rūpasantatiyo vedanāsaññāsaṅkhāra viññāṇasantatiyoca samudenti. Yāva maraṇakālā khaṇe
anya-e0301n:1467_209: khaṇe nānākalāpavasena udenti pasavanti. Tesu pana tasmiṃ bhave eva pahīnavasena
anya-e0301n:1467_210: niruddhesu tā rūpārūpasantatiyo nirujjhanti. Bhavantare puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ nirodhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_211: pāpuṇanti. Ettha pana yathā udake sati macchānāma honti, asati na honti. Evaṃ kammajesu
anya-e0301n:1467_212: nāmarūpesu sati itarāni nāmarūpāni honti. Asati na hontīti itarāni sabbāni kammajesu
anya-e0301n:1467_213: saṅgahetvā kammavasena udayabbayavidhānaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ avijjātaṇhupādānakammapaccayānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1467_214: vasena pañcakkhandhassa udayabbayapavatti hotīti. Kammavasena pana imasmiṃ bhave
anya-e0301n:1467_215: samudentānipi paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya khaṇe khaṇe kabaḷīkārāhārūpatthambhanaṃ laddhā
anya-e0301n:1467_216: eva yathā pavattarūpasantatiyo anubandha mānā navanavā rūpasantatiyo samudenti. Aladdhā
anya-e0301n:1467_217: pana nirujjhanti. Taṃ santatiyaṃ puna anuppādasaṅkhātaṃ ekabhavanirodhaṃ pāpuṇanti,
anya-e0301n:1467_218: yathā pavattasantatiyo vā chijjanti bhijjanti antaradhāyantīti.
anya-e0301n:1468_0: Vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārā pana bahiddhā ārammaṇesu āpātāgatesu ārammaṇasamphassaṃ laddhāeva
anya-e0301n:1468_1: chadvārikā kusalākusalavipāka kriyabhūtā samudenti. Navanavā santatiyo pātubhavanti.
anya-e0301n:1468_2: Aladdhā pana nirujjhanti. Santatiṃ na ghaṭenti. Viññāṇaṃca sahajāta nāmeca vatthurūpeca
anya-e0301n:1468_3: pavattamāneeva pavattati. Nivattamāne nivattatīti. Khaṇavasenāti vuttappakāre paccaye
anya-e0301n:1468_4: anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ nāmarūpānaṃ pavattikkhaṇavasena. Khaṇasaddena cettha sammasanañāṇe
anya-e0301n:1468_5: vuttarūpasantati nāmasantatiyopi gahetabbā. Nahi sāvakānaṃ ñāṇaṃ khaṇavasena nāmarūpānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1468_6: udayaṃvā vayaṃ vā sampāpuṇituṃ sakkotīti. Yathā pana rattandhakāre anto leṇe mahanto
anya-e0301n:1468_7: tamokhandho jāyati. Dīpaṃ jālentassa pana dīpobhāso ekakkhaṇe eva sakalaṃ antoleṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1468_8: pharamāno udeti. Tamokhandho veti. Ālokassa udayo hoti. Tamokhandhassa vayo. Puna
anya-e0301n:1468_9: dīpe nibbāpīyamāne tamokhandhassa udayo hoti. Ālokassa vayo. Eva mevaṃ sarīre nānāutuvasenavā
anya-e0301n:1468_10: nānāhāravasenavā nānācitta vasenavā nāniriyāpathavasenavā nānāpayogavasenavā udayapakkhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1468_11: vayapakkhānañca nānāsantatīnaṃ udayañca udayato vayañca vayato sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā samanupassantassāti
anya-e0301n:1468_12: attho. Evaṃ samanupassantassa pana āraddhavipassakabhāvaṃ pattassa udayabbaya ñāṇe
anya-e0301n:1468_13: tikkhe sūre vahante dasavidhā vipassanupakkilesasaṅkhātā pāripanthakadhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0301n:1468_14: Te dassetuṃ obhāsotiādigātha māha. Tattha obhāsoti vipassanā cittasamuṭṭhito sarīrobhāso.
anya-e0301n:1468_15: Pītīti vipassanācittasampayuttā pañcavidhā pīti. Passaddhīti duvidhāpassaddhi. Adhimokkhoti
anya-e0301n:1468_16: saddhādhimokkho. Paggahoti vīriyaṃ. Sukhanti somanassaṃ. Ñāṇanti vipassanā ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1468_17: Upaṭṭhānanti sati. Upekkhāti tatramajjhattupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca. Nikantīti
anya-e0301n:1468_18: obhāsādīhi saha vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā taṇhā. Ayameva pana ekantato
anya-e0301n:1468_19: vipassanupakkileso hoti. Obhāsādayo pana tassā vatthubhūtattā upakkilesāti vuttā.
anya-e0301n:1468_20: Tesu hi uppajjamānesu na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo. Evarūpā pīti.La.
anya-e0301n:1468_21: Upekkhā uppannapubbā addhā maggaṃ pattosmi. Phalaṃ pattosmīti evaṃ assādasahitā amagge
anya-e0301n:1468_22: maggasaññā aphale phalasaññā uppajjati. Tadā koci abyatto yogāvacaro kammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1468_23: vissajjetvā adhimānavasena vikkhipanto vicaratīti. Byatto pana tāvadeva sabhiṃ paṭilabhitvā
anya-e0301n:1468_24: idāni mama etesu obhāsādīsu etaṃ mama eso ha masmi eso me attāti cittassa nikāmanākāro
anya-e0301n:1468_25: paññāyati. Naca lokuttaradhammonāma īdisassa nikāmanassa vatthu. Addhā mama saṃkilesadhammo
anya-e0301n:1468_26: uppanno. So vaḍḍhamāno maṃ niyyānamukhato pātetvā vaṭṭamukhe yojessati. Handa tesveva
anya-e0301n:1468_27: lakkhaṇattayaṃ āropetvā nikantiṃ sodhetvā yathāpavattaṃ vipassanāvīthiṃ paṭipādessāmīti
anya-e0301n:1468_28: te obhāsādayo eva tāva pariggaṇhāti. Ayaṃ me obhāso anicco khayaṭṭhena dukkho bhayaṭṭhena
anya-e0301n:1468_29: anattā asārakaṭṭhenātiādinā sammasatīti attho. Evaṃ te obhāsādike vipassanāya upakkilesabhūte
anya-e0301n:1468_30: paripantha dhamme pariggaṇhitvā tappariggahavasena tesu nikantiṃ pariyādi yitvā ṭhitassa
anya-e0301n:1468_32: obhāsādīsu maggasaññāmalato yathā vuttanikantimalatoca visuddhattā. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ tesu
anya-e0301n:1468_33: nikantiyāpi vikkhambhitāya eva obhāsādipaṭibandhato suṭṭhu parisuddhaṃnāma hotīti.
anya-e0301n:1470: Aniccādivasena obhāsādi paṭibandhapariggahaṃ visuṃ avatvā maggāmaggajānanamatteneva maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhināma vuttā. Sā aṭṭhakathāya na sameti.
anya-e0301n:1471_0: Tathā paripanthavimuttassāti tathā pariggahetvā tato vipassanupakkilesaparipanthato
anya-e0301n:1471_1: vimuttassa yāvānulomāti yāvaanulomañāṇā. Tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāti sambandho. Vipassanāparipākaṃāgammāti
anya-e0301n:1471_3: paccaya bhāvappattiyāca vipassanāñāṇassa paripākaṃ āgamma paṭicca. Idāni appanā uppajjissatīti
anya-e0301n:1471_4: vattabbakkhaṇeti sambandho. Appanā tica sotāpattimaggaappanā. Dvetīṇivipassanācittānīti
anya-e0301n:1471_5: tikkhapaññassa dve vipassanācittāni. Mandapaññassa tīṇi vipassanācittāni. Yaṃkiñcīti
anya-e0301n:1471_6: tīsu lakkhaṇesu aññataraṃ yaṃkiñci. Yāsikhāpattāsānulomāsaṅkhārupekkhāti matthakapattā
anya-e0301n:1471_7: anulomañāṇasahitā yā saṅkhārupekkhā atthi. Sā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanātica vuccatīti
anya-e0301n:1471_8: yojanā. Saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ anulomañāṇanti imāni dve ñāṇāni vuṭṭhānagāmini vipassanānāmāti
anya-e0301n:1471_9: vuccantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Idaṃ pana paripākagatavipassanā dassanavacanaṃ. Etthaca vuṭṭhānanti
anya-e0301n:1471_10: maggo vuccati. So hi vipassanāñāṇassa ārammaṇabhūta saṅkhāranimittatovā sayaṃ saṃyojanavatthubhāvatovā
anya-e0301n:1471_11: vuṭṭhāti. Taṃ samaṅgipuggalaṃvā puthujjanabhāvato samudayapahānavasena vaṭṭa pavattatoca
anya-e0301n:1471_12: vuṭṭhāpeti. Tasmā vuṭṭhānanti vuccati. Avassaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti etāyāti vuṭṭhānagāminīti
anya-e0301n:1471_13: evaṃ dvinnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ vuṭṭhāna gāminibhāvo veditabbo. Tatoparanti dvinnaṃvā tiṇṇaṃvā
anya-e0301n:1471_14: vipassanā cittānaṃ pavattiyā paraṃ nibbānaṃ ālambitvāti maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_15: hutvā tassa purecarabhāvena nibbānameva ārammaṇaṃ katvā. Tato yevaca taṃ vipassanānāmaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_16: nalabhatīti. Puthujjana gottamabhibhavantanti etena gottaṃ bhavati abhibhavatīti
anya-e0301n:1471_17: gotrabhu. Gottanti cettha paripuṇṇakilesa samāyogena anariyabhāvasaṅkhātā puthujjanajāti
anya-e0301n:1471_18: vuccatīti imamatthaṃ dasseti. Ariyagottamabhisambhontañcāti etena gottaṃ bhavati
anya-e0301n:1471_19: pāpuṇātīti gotrabhu. Gottantica taṃtaṃ kilesa visuddhabhāva saṅkhātā ariyajāti vuccatīti
anya-e0301n:1471_20: imamatthaṃ dasseti. Maggo appanā vīthiṃ otaratīti sambandho. Dukkhasaccaṃparijānantoti
anya-e0301n:1471_21: tebhūmaka dhammānaṃ ekantadukkhabhāvaṃ paricchijja jānanto. Parijānanañcettha tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_22: dukkhabhāva paṭicchādakassa sammohassa pahānameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Samudaya saccaṃpajahantoti
anya-e0301n:1471_23: attano cittasantāne anusayabhāvena pavattamānaṃ taṇhāsaṅkhātaṃ samudayasaccaṃ ekadesenavā
anya-e0301n:1471_24: anavasesenavā apacchāvattikaṃ katvā pajahanto. Nirodhasaccaṃsacchikarontoti cakkhumā
anya-e0301n:1471_25: viya nabhamajjhe virocamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ attano santāne ekadesassavā sakalassavā
anya-e0301n:1471_26: kilesa vaṭṭassavā āyatiṃ bhāvino vipākavaṭṭassaṃvā attano santāne puna anuppādadhammabhāpattivasena
anya-e0301n:1471_27: nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ paccakkhaṃ karonto. Maggasaccaṃbhāvanāvasenāti ito pubbe
anya-e0301n:1471_28: anamatagge saṃsāre anuppannapubbassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggasaccassa uppādanasaṅkhātāya
anya-e0301n:1471_29: bhāvanāya vasena. Maggacetanāya pana ānantarikaphalattā taṅkhaṇe apanītaggike padese
anya-e0301n:1471_30: puna udakaṃ āsiñcitvā nibbāpento viya maggānukūlapavattivasena dukkhaparijānanādīni
anya-e0301n:1471_31: cattāri kiccāni anukubbantāni tatoparaṃ dvevā tīṇivā phalacittāni pavattanti. Tatoparaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_32: bhavaṅgapāto hotīti dassetuṃ tatoparantiādimāha. Yathā pana pasādacakkhunāvā dibbacakkhunāvā
anya-e0301n:1471_33: kiñcirūpaṃ passantassa tāni cakkhūni taṃ rūpaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā pacchā tassa puggalassapi
anya-e0301n:1471_34: paccakkhato pātubhūtaṃ katvā nirujjhanti. Na tāva tesaṃ uppattikkhaṇe taṃ rūpaṃ tassa
anya-e0301n:1471_35: ahaṃ idaṃnāma passāmīti pākaṭaṃ hoti. Pacchā pana paccavekkhana vāresu pavattamānesueva
anya-e0301n:1471_36: taṃrūpaṃ tadanubandhāca nānākārā tassa pātubhūtā honti. Evamevaṃ idhapi paccavekkhanavāresu
anya-e0301n:1471_37: pavattamānesueva nibbānañca tadanubandhāni maggaphalādīnica pātubhavantīti vuttaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_38: punabhavaṅgaṃ.La. Pavattantīti. Idāni paccavekkhanañāṇassa bhūmiṃ dassetuṃ maggaṃphalañcanibbānantiādigātha
anya-e0301n:1471_39: māha. Tattha paṇḍitoti ariyāya paññāya samannāgato phalaṭṭho. Hīneti pahīne. Seseti
anya-e0301n:1471_40: apahīne uparimaggavajjhe. Imāni pana dve pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhanāni kesañci
anya-e0301n:1471_41: jīvitasamasīsipuggalānaṃ kilesa vibhāgesu akovidānañca nalabbhantīti vuttaṃ paccavekkhativānavāti.
anya-e0301n:1471_42: Etthaca visuddhimagge tāva sabbapathamaṃ maggapaccavekkhanaṃ vuttaṃ. Tato phalapaccavekkhanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_43: Tato pahīnakilesapaccavekkhanaṃ. Tato avasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhanaṃ. Avasāne nibbānapaccavekkhanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_44: vuttaṃ. Paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sabbapathamaṃ kilesapaccavekkhanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_45: Vuttañhi tattha paccavekkhanesu pathamaṃ kilesapaccavekkhanaṃ hoti. Tato maggaphalanibbānapaccavekkhanānīti.
anya-e0301n:1471_46: Taṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ paccavekkhana ñāṇassa niddesato pubbe pathamaṃ chinnamanupassane
anya-e0301n:1471_47: paññāvimutti ñāṇanti evaṃ visuṃ vimuttiñāṇassa āgatattā vuttaṃ. Tattha chinnanti
anya-e0301n:1471_48: tena tena maggena samucchinnaṃ kilesajātanti attho. Pāḷi anu sārena vuccamāne pana
anya-e0301n:1471_49: pathamaṃ pahīnaṃ kilesānaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ. Tato paccekaṃ maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādīnaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_50: Tato tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhanaṃ. Tato phaladhammānaṃ paccavekkhanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_51: Tato tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtassa nibbānassa paccavekkhananti vattabbaṃ hoti. Pāḷiyañhi
anya-e0301n:1471_52: paccavekkhanañāṇaniddese nibbānaṃ maggavārepi phalavārepi dvikkhattuṃ āgatanti. Iti
anya-e0301n:1471_53: nibbānapaccavekkhanaṃ nāma itaresaṃ paccavekkhanānaṃ ādimhivā majjhe antarantarāvā
anya-e0301n:1471_54: avasānevā yatthakatthaci pavattatīti siddhaṃ hoti. Tathā kilesapaccavekkhanaṃpi maggaphalapaccavekkhanānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_55: ādimhivā pacchāvāti. Evañhi sati maggaṃ phalañca nibbānanti ayaṃ gāthāpi aviruddhā
anya-e0301n:1471_56: hotīti. Evañca katvā adhimānaniddesaṭṭhakathāsu so hi maggaphalanibbāna pahīna kilesā
anya-e0301n:1471_57: vasiṭṭhakilesa paccavekkhanena sañjātasomanasso ariyaguṇapaṭivedhe nikkaṅkhoti vuttaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_58: Etthaca sotāpannassa pañca paccavekkhanāni honti. Tathā sakadāgāmissa pañca. Anāgāmissa
anya-e0301n:1471_59: pañca. Arahato pana avasiṭṭhakilesonāma natthīti cattārīti ekūnavīsati paccavekkhanāni
anya-e0301n:1471_60: hontīti. Idañca paripuṇṇa vasena labbhamānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Aparipuṇṇaṃpi pana
anya-e0301n:1471_61: hotiyeva. Tathā hi cūḷadukkhakkhandhasuttaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ sā pana na sabbesaṃ paripuṇṇā
anya-e0301n:1471_62: hoti. Eko hi pahīnakilesameva paccavekkhati. Eko avasiṭṭhakilesameva. Eko maggameva.
anya-e0301n:1471_63: Eko phalameva. Ekonibbānameva. Imāsu pana pañcasupaccavekkhanāsu ekaṃvādvevā no laddhuṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_64: navaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ chabbisuddhikamena bhāvetabbo catubbidho maggo ñāṇadassanavisuddhināma
anya-e0301n:1471_65: vuccatīti sambandho. Maggasaddena cettha catubbidhaṃ maggañāṇaṃ tadanukūlapavattivasena
anya-e0301n:1471_66: phalañāṇañca gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Etthāti vipassanākammaṭṭhāne. Tatthāti tesu anupassanā
anya-e0301n:1471_67: maggaphalesu. Abhinivisanaṃ abhiniveso. Heṭṭhā silāpathaviyaṃ nikhātasinerupādassa
anya-e0301n:1471_68: viya ajjhattakhandhesu daḷhaṃ gahetvā pavattīti attho. Attā iti abhiniveso attābhiniveso.
anya-e0301n:1471_69: Taṃ attābhinivesaṃ. Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ kevalaṃ paccayāyatta vuttitāya khaṇabhaṅgassaca
anya-e0301n:1471_70: adiṭṭhattā so abhiniveso pavattati. Tasmā taṃ dvayaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃ anattā
anya-e0301n:1471_71: vedanā anattātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃ abhinivesaṃ vimocayamānāti
anya-e0301n:1471_72: attho. Vimokkhamukhaṃ hoti, suññatavimokkha saṅkhātassa maggassa phalassaca pavesanadvārabhūtattā,
anya-e0301n:1471_73: vipallāsa nimittanti viparītavasena āsanaṃ upagamanaṃ pavattanaṃvā vipallāso. Anicce
anya-e0301n:1471_74: niccanti upagamanaṃ pavattanaṃvāti attho. So eva kile suppattiyā āsannakāraṇattā
anya-e0301n:1471_75: nimittanti vipallāsanimittaṃ. Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ khaṇabhaṅgassa adiṭṭhattā
anya-e0301n:1471_76: taṃnimittaṃ hotīti tesaṃ khaṇabhaṅgaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃ aniccaṃ vedanā aniccātiādinā
anya-e0301n:1471_77: punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃnimittaṃ vimocayamānāti attho. Taṇhāpaṇidhinti
anya-e0301n:1471_78: taṇhāeva abhisaṅgavasena ārammaṇe cittassa paṇidahanato daḷhaṃ thapanato paṇidhīti
anya-e0301n:1471_79: taṇhāpaṇidhi. Taṃtaṇhā paṇidhiṃ. Muñcantīti ajjhattadhammānaṃ mahāādīnavarāsibhāvassa
anya-e0301n:1471_80: adiṭṭhattā sopaṇidhi hotīti tesaṃ mahāādīnavarāsibhāvaṃ sudiṭṭhaṃ katvā rūpaṃdukkhaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_81: vedanādukkhātiādinā punappunaṃ samanupassanāvasena taṃpaṇidhiṃ vimocayamānāti attho.
anya-e0301n:1471_82: Tasmāti yasmā etā vimokkhamukhabhūtā tisso anupassanā evaṃ visesa nāmikā honti. Tasmā.
anya-e0301n:1471_83: Yasmā saṅkhāresu suññatadassanavasena atthasiddhināma kevalaṃ attākinivesabhūtassa
anya-e0301n:1471_84: diṭṭhigāhassa paṭipakkhabhūtassa ñāṇasseva ānubhāvo hoti, tasmā tathā samanupassitvā
anya-e0301n:1471_85: vimuñcantassa vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātañāṇa kiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ yadivuṭṭhāna.La.
anya-e0301n:1471_86: Suññatovimokkho nāmahotimaggoti. Aniccadassanavasena atthasiddhināma nimittāti nivesabhūtassa
anya-e0301n:1471_87: mānagāhassa paṭipakkhabhūtāya saddhāyapi ānubhāvo. Tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa
anya-e0301n:1471_88: vipassanāpi maggopi sahajātasaddhā kiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ yadianiccato.La.
anya-e0301n:1471_89: Animitto vimokkhonāmāti. Dukkhadassanavasena atthasiddhināma paṇidhisaṅkhāta taṇhāgāhapaṭipakkhabhūtassa
anya-e0301n:1471_90: samādhissapi ānubhāvo. Tasmā tathā samanupassitvā vimuccantassa vipassanāpi maggopi
anya-e0301n:1471_91: sahajātasamādhikiccena nāmaṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ. Yadi dukkhato. La. Appaṇihito vimokkhonāmāti.
anya-e0301n:1471_92: Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti.
anya-e0301n:1471_93: Dukkhato manasikaroto samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Anattato manasikaroto paññindriyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_94: adhimattaṃ hotīti. Magge pana tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccavisesonāma vipassanāgamanavaseneva
anya-e0301n:1471_95: siddhoti vuttaṃ maggo. La. Nāmāni labhatīti. Tattha suññatavimokkhena vimutto ariyasāvako
anya-e0301n:1471_96: sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dhammānusārīnāma hoti. Majjhe chasu maggaphalakkhaṇesu diṭṭhippatto
anya-e0301n:1471_97: nāma. Arahattaphalakkhaṇe paññāvimuttonāma. Animittavimokkhena vimutto sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe
anya-e0301n:1471_98: saddhānusārīnāma. Upari sattasu ṭhānesu saddhāvimuttonāma. Apaṇihitavimokkhena vimutto
anya-e0301n:1471_99: pana aṭṭhasupi ṭhānesu kāyasakkhināma. Soyeva arūpajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vimutto
anya-e0301n:1471_100: arahattaphale ṭhito ubhatobhāgavimutto nāmāti ettāvatā yaṃ heṭṭhā vuttaṃ vipassanāparipākamāgammāti
anya-e0301n:1471_102: paccayabhāvappattiyāca vipassanāñāṇassa paripākaṃ āgamma paṭiccāti. Taṃ sarūpato
anya-e0301n:1471_103: niddiṭṭhaṃ hotīti. Maggavīthiyaṃ phalañca maggāgamana vasena tathā tīṇi nāmāni labhatīti
anya-e0301n:1471_104: yojanā. Yathāvuttanayena vipassantānanti yadi anattato vipassatītiādinā vuttappakāranayena
anya-e0301n:1471_105: vipassantānaṃ catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ. Yathāsakaṃphalanti sotāpannassa sotāpattiphalaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_106: Sakadāgāmissa sakadāgāmiphalantiādinā nayena attano attano santakabhūtaṃ yaṃ yaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_107: phalaṃ vipassanāgamana vaseneva suññatādivimokkhotica vuccati. Namaggāgamanavasenāti
anya-e0301n:1471_108: adhippāyo. Etthaca vipassanāgamana vasena maggassa animitta nāmalābhonāma suttantikapariyāyena
anya-e0301n:1471_109: vutto. Abhidhamme pana animitto nāmamaggo naāgato. Nahi so nippariyāyato animittonāma
anya-e0301n:1471_110: hoti. Hīnapaṇītādivasena vibhāgārahassa saṅkhāranimittassa sabbhāvato. Teneva hissa
anya-e0301n:1471_111: dukkhapaṭipadā dandhā bhiññādivasenavā pāramidhammānaṃ parittamahantādivasenavā hīna
anya-e0301n:1471_112: paṇīta paṇītatara paṇītatama vibhāgo sandissatīti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana aniccānupassanā
anya-e0301n:1471_113: saṅkhāresu niccanimittaṃ vidhamanavasena pavattattā animittānupassanānāma samānāpi
anya-e0301n:1471_114: sayaṃ saṅkhāranimitte pariyāpannattā ekantena attanonāmaṃ maggassa dātuṃ nasakkoti.
anya-e0301n:1471_115: Tasmā maggo abhidhamma pariyāyena animittanāmaṃ nalabhatīti vuttaṃ. Suttantikapariyāyena
anya-e0301n:1471_116: pana yathā pathavikasiṇārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ pathavikasiṇanti vuccati. Evaṃ suññatādināmaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_117: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattāni maggaphalānipi ārammaṇavasenapi suññatādināmaṃ
anya-e0301n:1471_118: labhanti. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pana sampayogavasenavā palibodhakarāca nimittakarāca
anya-e0301n:1471_119: paṇidhikarāca rāgādayo kilesadhammā tesu natthi. Tasmā tāni aññaṃ āgamanaṃvā ārammaṇaṃvā
anya-e0301n:1471_120: anapekkhitvā attano sabhāvenapi suññatādināmaṃ labhantīti dassetuṃ ārammaṇavasenātiādi
anya-e0301n:1471_121: vuttaṃ. Tattha sarasavasenāti attano sabhāvena. Nāmattayanti suññatādi nāmattikaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_122: Sabbatthāti sabbāsu maggavīthi phalasamāpattivīthīsu. Sabbesaṃpīti sabbesaṃpi maggaphalānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1471_123: Samamevāti samānameva. Sadisameva. Etthapanāti etesu pana yathāvuttesu maggaphalesu.
anya-e0301n:1471_124: Yasmā sabbādiṭṭhiyoca soḷasavidhā vicikicchāca attadiṭṭhimūlikā eva honti. Attadiṭṭhiyā
anya-e0301n:1471_125: niruddhāya nirujjhanti sabbānica apāyagāmi kammānināma attadiṭṭhiyā satiyāeva vipaccanti.
anya-e0301n:1471_126: Asatiyā na vipaccanti. Diṭṭhasaccānañca sā diṭṭhi sabbaso pahīnā hoti. Tasmā sotāpattimaggaṃ.La.
anya-e0301n:1471_127: Pahīnāpāya gamanoti vuttaṃ. Apāyaṃ gacchanti etehīti apāyagamanāni. Diṭṭhivicikicchāvippayuttā
anya-e0301n:1471_128: akusaladhammāceva pubbekataduccaritakammānica. Pahīnāni apāyagamanāni etassāti pahīnāpāyagamano.
anya-e0301n:1471_130: vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhitā honti. Kilesadhammā pana hāyanapakkhe. Tasmā te anukkamena parihāyitvā
anya-e0301n:1471_131: gacchantā uparima koṭiyā sattahi bhavehi sabbaso parikkhayaṃ gacchantīti vuttaṃ sattakkhattuparamosotāpannonāma
anya-e0301n:1471_132: hotīti, tattha sattakkhattusaddena sattapaṭisandhigahaṇavārā vuccanti. Paramoti ukkaṃsaparicchedo.
anya-e0301n:1471_133: Iti sattakkhattuṃ paramo etassāti. Sattakkhattuparamo. So pana devesu sattakkhattu
anya-e0301n:1471_134: paramo, manussesu sattakkhattu paramo, ubhayattha sattakkhattu paramoti tividho hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n:1472_0: Katamoca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā
anya-e0301n:1472_1: sotāpanno hoti, avinipātadhammo niyato, sambodhiparāyano, so sattakkhattuṃ deveca
anya-e0301n:1472_2: manusseca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti. Ayaṃ vuccati puggalo sattakkhattu paramoti.
anya-e0301n:1473_0: Ettha hi ca saddo aniyamattho. Etena yoca deveeva sattakkhattuṃ saṃsarati. Yoca manusseeva
anya-e0301n:1473_1: sattakkhattuṃ saṃsarati. Yoca deveca manusseca missakabhava vasena sattakkhattuṃ
anya-e0301n:1473_2: saṃsarati. Tividho peso sattakkhattu paramonāmāti dasseti. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana missakabhava
anya-e0301n:1473_3: vasenassa attho vutto. Etthaca yasmā mahaggatajjhānassaca uparimagga vipassanā yaca
anya-e0301n:1473_4: ānubhāvaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ imassa maggassa ānubhāvagatiyā eva sattakkhattuparamonāma
anya-e0301n:1473_5: vutto. Soca pāḷiyaṃ katamesaṃ pañcannaṃ idha niṭṭhā. Sattakkhattuparamassa kolaṃ
anya-e0301n:1473_6: kolassa ekabījissa sakadāgāmissa yoca diṭṭhevadhamme arahāti vuttattā kāmabhaveeva
anya-e0301n:1473_7: jhānarahito sukkhavipassakovā parihīnajjhānovā daṭṭhabbo. Tenevaca paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭha
anya-e0301n:1473_8: kathāyaṃ tayopi ime sotāpannā kāmabhavavasena vuttā. Rūpārūpabhave pana bahukāpi
anya-e0301n:1473_9: paṭisandhiyo gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāyañca aṭṭhamaṃ bhavanti kāmabhave
anya-e0301n:1473_10: aṭṭhamaṃ paṭisandhinti vuttaṃ. Tasmā ye kāmabhaveyeva sattavārato oraṃvā diṭṭhadhamme
anya-e0301n:1473_11: yevavā uparimaggaṃ gaṇhanti. Tesaṃ tathārūpo pavattiviseso upari maggavipassanābalena
anya-e0301n:1473_12: siddhoti veditabbo. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāsu upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ vipassanā niyāmetīti
anya-e0301n:1473_13: vuttaṃ. Ye pana diṭṭhadhammevā sakkaanāthapiṇḍikavisākhādayo viya sattasu bhavesu
anya-e0301n:1473_14: yatthakatthaci bhavevā jhānaṃ uppādetvā brahmalokaṃ gacchanti. Yeca brahmalokeyeva
anya-e0301n:1473_15: sotāpattimaggaṃ labhitvā tattheva parinibbāyanti. Tesaṃ tathārūpo pavatti viseso
anya-e0301n:1473_16: mahaggatajjhānabalena siddhoti. Yasmāca pāḷiyaṃ sattakkhattuṃ devecāti etena kāmabhave
anya-e0301n:1473_17: satta opapātika paṭisandhiyo dasseti. Sattakkhattuṃ manussecāti etena satta gabbhaseyyakapaṭisandhiyo
anya-e0301n:1473_18: dassetīti ubhayena cuddasa paṭisandhiyo dassitā honti. Tasmā tena pariyāyena labbhamāne
anya-e0301n:1474_0: Ito satta tato satta, saṃsarāni catuddasāti vuttaṃ. Tathā aṅguttareca tikanipāte
anya-e0301n:1474_1: sace udāyi ānando avitarāgo kālaṃ kareyya, tena cittapasādena sattakkhattuṃ devesu
anya-e0301n:1474_2: devarajjaṃ kareyya. Sattakkhattuṃ imasmiṃyeva jambudīpe mahārajjaṃ kareyya. Apica
anya-e0301n:1474_3: udāyi ānando diṭṭhevadhamme parinibbā yissatīti vuttaṃ. Keci pana imehi suttapadehi
anya-e0301n:1474_4: sattakkhattu paramassa sotāpannassa kāmabhave cuddasa paṭisandhiyo icchanti. Mahāvaggasaṃyuttaṭīkāyañca
anya-e0301n:1474_5: keci pana kāmabhave sattakkhattuṃeva uppajjati, na tato uddhanti vadanti. Taṃ vīmaṃsitabbanti
anya-e0301n:1474_6: vuttaṃ. Vibhaṅge pana tattha tattha aṭṭhānasuttesuca aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno
anya-e0301n:1474_7: puggalo aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbatteyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatītica, aṅguttare chakkanipāte
anya-e0301n:1474_8: abhabbo diṭṭhasampanno puggalo aṭṭhamaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetunti ca, mahāniddese ajitapañhe
anya-e0301n:1474_9: sohāpattimaggañāṇena abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa, nirodhena sattabhave thapetvā anama
anya-e0301n:1474_10: taggesaṃsāre ye uppajjeyyuṃ nāmañca rūpañca, etthete nirujjhanti. Vūpasamanti. Atthaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_11: gacchanti. Paṭipassambhantītica, evaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā vuttattā yathāvuttanayeneva tesaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_12: suttapadānaṃ attho veditabboti. Rāgadosamohānanti kāmarāgassa dosassa tadekaṭṭhamohassaca.
anya-e0301n:1474_13: Tanukarattāti yathā sotāpannasantāne uppajjantā dhammikesu kāmavatthūsu balavantā
anya-e0301n:1474_14: hutvā uppajjanti. Yato tesaṃ methunavatthusamāyogopi pavattati, tathā uppajjituṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_15: asamatthe katvā saṃlikhanavasena tanukaraṇato. Adhiccuppattivasenaca pariyuṭṭhānamandatāvasenaca
anya-e0301n:1474_16: tanukabhāvaṃ sādhanatoti attho. Tattha adhiccuppattivasenāti kadāci cirena uppattivasena.
anya-e0301n:1474_17: Pariyuṭṭhānamandatāyāti cirena uppajjantānaṃpi mandataraṃ pariyuṭṭhānavasena. Mahāsivattherena
anya-e0301n:1474_18: pana tesaṃpi methunavatthu samāyogo icchito. So mahāṭṭhakathāyaṃ paṭikkhitto. Yañca
anya-e0301n:1474_19: chakkanipāte migāsālavatthumhi abrahmacārinopi isidattassa brāhmaṇassa sakadāgāmittaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_20: bhagavatā byākataṃ, taṃpi tassa āsannamaraṇakāle adhigamavasena byākatanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1474_21: Sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā āgamanato sakadāgāmīnāma hotīti yojanā. Yamettha vattabbaṃ,
anya-e0301n:1474_22: taṃ heṭṭhā pathamaparicchede vuttameva. Arahattaṃbhāvetvāti arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetvākhīṇā
anya-e0301n:1474_23: cattāro āsavā yassāti khīṇāsavo. Dakkhiṇā vuccati kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvā
anya-e0301n:1474_24: āyatiṃ phalapaṭilābhatthāya dinnadānaṃ. Dakkhanti vaḍḍhanti sattā etāyāti katvā.
anya-e0301n:1474_25: Tāya pana dakkhiṇāya vipattikarānaṃ kilesānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato sampattikarānañca
anya-e0301n:1474_26: sīlakkhandhādiguṇānaṃ sabbaso paripuṇṇattā dakkhiṇeyyesu aggo jeṭṭhako hutvā taṃdakkhiṇaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_27: paṭiggahituṃ arahatīti aggadakkhiṇeyyo. Puggalabhedoti catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhapuggalānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_28: saṅkhepabhedo. Vitthārabhedo pana evaṃ veditabbo, aṭṭhakathāsu tāva catuvīsati sotāpannā,
anya-e0301n:1474_29: dvādasa sakadāgāmino, aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino, dvādasa arahantoti phalaṭṭhānaṃ channavutibhedo
anya-e0301n:1474_30: vutto. Tattha saddhādhimutto paññādhimuttoti dve sotāpannā honti. Te ekabījī kolaṃkolo
anya-e0301n:1474_31: sattakkhattuparamocāti tīhi guṇitā cha. Puna catūhi paṭipadāhi guṇitā catuvīsati
anya-e0301n:1474_32: honti. Tividha vimokkhacatupaṭipadānaṃ pana bhedena dvādasa sakadāgāmino dvādasa
anya-e0301n:1474_33: arahantoca honti. Anāgāmino pana avihesu tāva tayo antarāparinibbāyino, eko upahacca
anya-e0301n:1474_34: parinibbāyī, eko uddhaṃ soto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca. Teyeva sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī
anya-e0301n:1474_35: asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīcāti dvīhi guṇitā dasa. Tathā atappasu dassasudassīsu ticattālīsa
anya-e0301n:1474_36: honti. Akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīnāma natthīti cattāro sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyino
anya-e0301n:1474_37: cattāro asaṅkhāraparinibbāyinoti aṭṭhāti. Sabbe aṭṭhacattālīsa hontīti. Suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_38: pana dvādasa sotāpannā, dvādasa sakadāgāmino, catuvīsati anāgāmino, dve arahanto,
anya-e0301n:1474_39: cattāro maggaṭṭhāti catupaññāsa honti. Teyeva saddhādhura paññādhura vasena dvīhi
anya-e0301n:1474_40: guṇitā aṭṭhasataṃ puggalā hontīti āgato. Etthāti etasmiṃ puggalabhede. Sabbesaṃpīti
anya-e0301n:1474_41: catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃpi sādhāraṇāva. Na nirodhasamāpatti viya ekaccānaṃeva sādhāraṇāti
anya-e0301n:1474_42: adhippāyo. Ativiya mamāyitassa abhinindi tassa ajjhositassa attano cittasantānassa
anya-e0301n:1474_43: apavattikaraṇaṃ nāma bahalarāgavimuttānaṃeva sijjhatīti vuttaṃ, anāgāmīnañceva arahantānañcalabbhatīti.
anya-e0301n:1474_44: Tesaṃpi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ kāmarūpabhavagatānaññeva idha gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1474_45: Kasmā, ādito paṭṭhāya anupubbanirodhabaleneva gantabbattā. Tenāha tatthātiādi. Tatrāyaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_46: vidhi, pathamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha gate saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato
anya-e0301n:1474_47: anattato vipassati. Tato dutīyajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate saṅkhāre
anya-e0301n:1474_48: tatheva vipassati. Tato tatīyaṃ jhānaṃ. Tato catutthaṃ jhānaṃ. Tato pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1474_49: Tato ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Tato viññāṇañcā yatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatthagate
anya-e0301n:1474_50: saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati. Tato ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_51: saṅghapatimānanaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ addhāna paricchedoti imaṃ catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_52: karoti. Tato nevasaññā nāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati. Ekaṃvā dvevā cittavāre atikkamitvā
anya-e0301n:1474_53: acittako hoti nirodhaṃ phusatīti. Tatthatatthevāti tato tato jhānato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_54: vuṭṭhitakāleeva. Vipassantoti nirodhassa samatha vipassanā yuganandhabaleneva pattabbattā
anya-e0301n:1474_55: vipassanābalenapi cittasantānassa saṇhasukhumabhāvā pādanatthaṃ idaṃ pathamajjhānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_56: aniccantiādinā nayena vipassanto. Yāvaākiñcaññāyatanaṃgantvāti yāva ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānaṃ,
anya-e0301n:1474_58: icchitabbāniyeva. Teneva hi paṭisambhidāmagge pañcavidhā vasiyo nirodhaparikammesu
anya-e0301n:1474_60: adhiṭṭheyyaṃ. Attano sarīrābandhe parikkhāre thapetvā nānābandhāni civarādīni parikkhārāni
anya-e0301n:1474_61: aggiādinā parissayena māvinassantūtivā, ekasīmāyaṃ saṅghakamme karīyamāne saṅgho
anya-e0301n:1474_62: maṃ pabhimānessati, tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā, satthā maṃ kenacikāraṇena pakkosā pessati,
anya-e0301n:1474_63: tadā vuṭṭhahāmītivā adhiṭṭhānakiccaṃ. Ādisaddena nirodhabbhantareeva maraṇaṃ nukho
anya-e0301n:1474_64: me bhavissatīti evaṃ pavatto addhāna paricchedo gahito. Dvinnaṃ.La. Vocchijjaticittasantati
anya-e0301n:1474_65: tadatthāya ādito paṭṭhāya tathārūpassa payogavisesassa suṭṭhu katattā. Tatoti tasmiṃ
anya-e0301n:1474_66: kāle. Anāgāmino anāgāmi phalacittaṃ nirāvajjanaṃpi nipparikammaṃpīti adhippāyo. Tathāhi
anya-e0301n:1474_67: ādito paṭṭhāya punappunaṃ pavattitaṃ vipassanāparikammameva tassa parikammaṭṭhāne
anya-e0301n:1474_68: tiṭṭhati. Na visuṃ āsannaparikammaṃ nāma atthīti. Paccavekkhananti phalapaccavekkhanaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1474_69: Evaṃ duvidhaṃ kammaṭṭhānanayaṃ niddisitvā idāni yadatthaṃ so niddisīyati, tadatthe
anya-e0301n:1474_70: sotujane niyojento bhāve tabbanti gāthamāha. Tattha paṭipajjitabbāti paṭipatti. Paṭipajjantivā
anya-e0301n:1474_71: etāya uparupari visesanti paṭipatti. Sīlādidhammo. Rasīyati nirāmisasukhānubhavanavasena
anya-e0301n:1474_72: anubhavīyatīti raso. Jhānamagga phalabhūto adhigamadhammo. Arahatta phalamevavā.
anya-e0301n:1474_73: Tadubhayaṃ paṭicca uppannapītisomanassamevavā. Paṭipattiyā raso paṭipatti raso. Soeva
anya-e0301n:1474_74: assāditabbaṭṭhena assādo cāti paṭipatti rasassādo. Sāsane paṭipattirasassādaṃ patthayantena
anya-e0301n:1474_75: bhikkhunā iccevaṃ mayā niddiṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ bhāvanādvayaṃ bhāvetabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0301n:1479_0: 172. Cārittena kulācārena sobhite ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā visāle kule udayo
anya-e0301n:1479_1: vaḍḍhi yassa soti cārittasobhitavisālakulodayo. Tena. Saddhāya abhivuḍḍhānaṃ parisuddhānañca
anya-e0301n:1479_2: attano sīlasutacāgādiguṇānaṃ udayo vaḍḍhi etasminti saddhātivuḍḍhaparisuddhaguṇodayo.
anya-e0301n:1479_3: Tena. Nampavhayenāti nampanāmakena upāsakena. Paṇidhāyāti bhusaṃ nidhāya hadaye thapetvā
anya-e0301n:1479_4: upādāya paṭicca. Parānukampanti paresaṃ attano mandabuddhīnaṃ pacchimajanānaṃ anukampaṃ
anya-e0301n:1479_5: anudayaṃ kāruññaṃ paṇidhāyāti sambandho. Patthitanti abhiyācitaṃ. Puññena tena vipulenāti
anya-e0301n:1479_6: tena vipulena abhidhammattha saṅgahapakaraṇassa karaṇapuññena. Tumūlasomanti evaṃ
anya-e0301n:1479_7: nāmakaṃ vihāraṃ. Vuttañhi khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṃsīhaḷadīpe tumūlasomavihāre saṅghassa
anya-e0301n:1479_8: pākavattaṃpi tāla paṇṇaṃ vikkiṇitvā karīyati. Na hi tattha paṇṇena attho atthi. Sabbepi
anya-e0301n:1479_9: iṭṭhakacchannā pāsādādayoti. Eso kira vihāro ādito abhayagirirañño aggamahesibhūtāya
anya-e0301n:1479_10: somadeviyā kārāpitattā yāvajjatanāpi somavihārotveva paññāyittha. Tumūlasaddo pana
anya-e0301n:1480: Athettha vattati saddo, tumūlo bheravo mahā;
anya-e0301n:1483_0: Viya. Soca vihāro saṭṭhimattehi mahāpariveṇehi saṇṭhito hotīti ativiya vipulo mahanto
anya-e0301n:1483_1: vitthiṇṇo hoti. Tasmā so vipulattā mahantattā vitthiṇṇattā tumūla somoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n:1483_2: Taṃ tumūlasomaṃ. Atthato mahāsoma vihāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena thero attano ācariyavaṃsassa
anya-e0301n:1483_3: vasana vihāraṃ kitteti. Attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pana nāmarūpaparicchede kittitaṃ. Dhaññādhivāsanti
anya-e0301n:1483_4: tasmiṃ vihāre ādikammikabhūta mahindattherādīnaṃ puññavantattherānaṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhabhūtaṃ.
anya-e0301n:1483_5: Dīpapasādaka mahāmahindattherassa hi vaṃse jātattā tasmiṃ vihāre ādikammikabhūto
anya-e0301n:1483_6: mahātheropi mahindattheronāmāti dhātuvaṃse vutto. Uditoditanti ativiya uditaṃ. Nabhamajjhe
anya-e0301n:1483_7: puṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya sakalasīhaḷadīpe ativiya uggatanti attho. Ariyamaggapaññāvasena
anya-e0301n:1483_8: pariyattivesārajjādi paññāvasenavā avadātehi pariyodātehi guṇehi sotitāti paññāvadātaguṇasotitā.
anya-e0301n:1483_9: Te eva lajjīpāpagarahino. Maññantūti anussarantu. Puññavibhāvodaya maṅgalāyāti vipulānaṃ
anya-e0301n:1483_10: puññānaṃ vaḍḍhisaṅkhāta maṅgalatthāya. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā, puññena tena vipulena dhaññādhivāsaṃ
anya-e0301n:1483_11: uditoditaṃ tumūlasoma vihārañca tattha nipāsino mahindattherādike paññāvadāta guṇasobhite
anya-e0301n:1483_12: lajjibhūte bhikkhūca puññavibhavodayamaṅgalāya āyukantaṃ maññantu pacchimā janāti.
anya-e0301n:1483_13: Athavā, taṃvihāraṃ aññe paññāvadāta guṇasobhita lajjī bhikkhū maññantūti yojanā.
anya-e0301n:1483_14: Etena thero pacchimajanānaṃ chasu anuttariyadhammesu anussatānuttariyasaṅkhātaṃ puññavisesañca
anya-e0301n:1499: Ubho lokamhi jotantu, saddhammo yāva tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0301n:1500_0: Tattha nagare dīparaṅgamhīti dīpavāsimahājanaṃ rañjetīti dīparaṅganti laddhanāme
anya-e0301n:1500_1: nagare. Gāme nāmaketi rohitamigānaṃ nivāsabhūmitale patiṭṭhitattā evaṃnāmake mahāgāme.
anya-e0301n:1500_2: Sāketi kaliyuge. Yā mayāti paramatthadīpanīnāma yāṭīkā mayā saṅkhatāti sambandho.
anya-e0301n:1500_3: Laṅghatīti vissutālayeti evaṃvissute araññavihāre. Sāresīnanti sāragavesīnaṃ. Sārāsāravivekinanti
anya-e0301n:1500_4: ayaṃ sāro ayaṃ asāroti evaṃ sārañca asārañcavive cetvā jānituṃ samatthānaṃ. Sāketi
anya-e0301n:1500_5: kaliyuge. Komudasāra deti kumudapupphayutte saradautu pariyāpannepacchi makattikamāse.
anya-e0301n:1500_6: Amatapphalāti nibbānapayojanā. Subhāti atthabyañjanasampattiyā sobhaṇā. Saddhammoti
